Summary: We booked a anniversary weekend getaway and this hotel did not disappoint! From the moment we checked in Jazmin made sure our check in was flawless and asked us the reason for our stay. She sent a special anniversary token to our room that set a great vibe from the minute we walked in the room. After dinner, we came back to the room and saw we had night service. Our room had been cleaned up and our bed was made simply to just lay down without having to take decor pillows out.  They have a beautiful restaurant over looking the bay with sofas & fireplace, beautiful area to people watch and live music Saturday night. Sonya was great server.  This hotel blew my mind. A 10/10, we will certainly be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We Love The Balboa Bay Club
Summary: It is a treat for us to be in Newport Beach a couple times a year and we have loved returning to the resort the last five years! The service and attention to detail are top notch. Our favorite is to be in a room on the water watching the boats go by and enjoy watching or not all the action on the water no matter what time of day, dusk, nighttime or early morning! Joey greeted us with a smile and was terrific throughout our stay. Collin had helped us with luggage last year, and this time as well. We had a second floor middle over the restaurant, which we thought might be a bummer, and it wasn’t! We enjoyed the live music from our patio with a glass of wine. The housekeeping staff were all familiar to us, especially Lucia, who we love. We didn’t want service this time around,  but
Room tip: Bay view rooms are gorgeous and you choose noise level by being on the patio, in the room door...
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us and for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for the last 5 years! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the resort along with our Bayview room and the many amenities on property. We appreciate you recognizing our staff that made your stay so memorable and we are excited for your return very soon.

Summary: Last minute emergency meant we needed nice clothes and fast.  We stopped into the boutique and Danielle and Thalia rushed to our rescue.  Clothes purchased and all on sale.  Our thanks to these incredible women for saving the day!!  We are staying at the resort for ten days and it's great knowing they are here for us!  Thank you!!
Manager Response: Thank you for telling us about your great experience at the Bayfront Boutique. We are so happy to hear that you found new outfits for your emergency. Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your ten day stay and we hope to welcome you back again soon! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Danielle at the BayFront Boutique was extremely helpful with helping me find the perfect gift for my Daughter's 16th birthday. I couldn't have done it without her help! The hotel itself was fantastic. Very clean rooms.
Manager Response: We're so grateful that you took the time to share your feedback with us.  It's great to hear that you had a positive experience.  We are glad that you were able to find your daughter a gift in our boutique and that you were provided with excellent service.   We hope you can stay with us again soon. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: Friendly staff - excellent breakfast buffet, the store carries great items.
Summary: My room was well maintained and the housekeeping staff paid attention to details.  My room was immaculately kept.  The grounds were well kept and the staff very helpful and welcoming.  The gym was clean and had multiple exercise options (Peloton, Mirror, treadmill, etc).
Manager Response: Hello Vanessa,  We appreciate you taking the time to provide us feedback on your stay.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the resorts amenities! We hope to welcome you back to the resort soon. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: The service is so bad, please avoid this Hotel
Summary: Staying at Balboa Bay Resort is the worst travel experiences in my life. I stayed Balboa Bay Resort from 12/28 to 12/30  I usually only stay in large hotel chains but I decided to give it a try since Balboa Bay Resort is Amex Hotel collection, which was a huge mistake. The service was so bad, worse than many two star hotels. Balboa Bay Resort  is a 4 star and historic hotel, so I can’t help wondering if they are just reluctant to serve colored people  We checked in at around 3pm and found the AC at the room was not functioning, there was only heat. My husband called front desk and guest services multiple times (at least 3 times), but no one answered.  When the engineer came, the temperature was 84 degree. We had been at a room with such high temperature for more than one hour.
Manager Response: Hi Connie, On behalf of Balboa Bay Resort, we are so sorry that your stay was unsatisfactory. We continue to take full responsibility for the issues and inconvenience you experienced. We have extended an offer to welcome you back for a complimentary overnight stay. We encourage you to please contact us at fdmanagement@balboabayresort.com and we would be happy to arrange at your convenience. Again, we are very sorry about the negative experience and hope we can welcome you back to the resort soon.  Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: The worst experience ever. We celebrated the New Year due to fantastic experience of previous Year. For sure smth has changed on the management or even on ownership bcs it  was far from one year ago. The menu of ala cart dinner was strange with 3 different red wines and one glass për  each!!!! The band was low quality (less paid) compared with the previous one…
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback on your New Year's Eve experience. We sincerely apologize that your experience was not what you expected. We take pride in providing high quality holiday events with top tier dining and service, as our goal is create an unforgettable experience for our guests. If you would like to discuss this directly with a member of our management team, please reach out to us at fbmanagers@balboabayresort.com and we will be happy to hear more from you. We hope we can welcome you back to the resort soon for another opportunity to exceed your expectations.  Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: Worst Hostesses Ever @ A+O Restaurant, Balboa Bay Resort, Newport Beach, CA
Summary: Hotels stay is very nice. A+O Restaurant's foods are super delicious, and the waiter is A+++ services . However, we got the terrible experiences with the Balboa Bay Resort A + O  Restaurant / Bar's three hostesses on Saturday night, 12/3/2022.  Reserved for 3 adults and 2 kids at 7 p.m. around 4 p.m. same day. Arrived to restaurant, one of the three rude hostesses told to wait as table was not ready. After a while, a second very unfriendly one told us we need to seat with others guest!!! She told with an attitude to wait after we refused. Another 3rd one told us to come in with instruction that 3 adults will be sitting on the bar-like table with white tall chair, and 2 kids will be sitting on a different lower table!!! Another waiting game with those 3, we finally got in and had
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for providing us your feedback. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed the food and service, but sincerely apologize that your experience did not meet our standards. We have passed along your message to our team so that we can improve. If you would like to provide us any more information, you can reach out to us at fbmanagers@balboabayresort.com. We hope to welcome you back to the resort in the future so that we can have another chance to provide an amazing dining experience at A+O Restaurant | Bar.  Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Wow! What a beautiful hotel. Don't be fooled by its  4* rating. It is probably the nicest 4* star hotel.  With that being said, there is no beach access and there is nothing to explore within walking distance (except Ferrari and Maserati dealerships!). But Fashion Island, Balboa Island are not far. And free Evian and Pinot Noir bottles are a nice touch!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. Although we do not have instant beach access, our valet offers a shuttle service that can take you to the nearest beach as well as Fashion Island or any other nearby stores or restaurants. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you back with us again soon!

Summary: Was very pleased with the customer service extended to me. It was positively memorable. Everyone that I came in contact with greeted me and ensured I was comfortable and well taken cared of. Would highly recommend Angeline. Previously had facials done in Dallas, Pebble, etc.. I have to say, Angeline is top tier. So wonderful.. I was struggling not to fall asleep. lol.  Ally - Locker room staff was friendly and was a pleasure to chat with. She expressed gratitude about her day. Corina and Jocelyn at the front desk were very nice.  Goal met with staff customer service. Excellent.  T’was a great day. I’ll be back again!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We appreciate you recognizing those team members that made your stay so memorable and are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Spa. We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: Nice hotel with nice amenities. But the service is what really sets this hotel apart! The conference room support from Miguel and his team was amazing...from the meal service to the IT support! The check-in staff was great, the concierge was great, the housekeeping staff was very friendly, and the wait staff at the bar and restaurant were great! Rooms were spacious, clean, and well-appointed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and will make sure to relay this message to our team. We hope to see you again very soon!

Summary Heading: Make sure to get a Bay-side room if you want a quiet stay
Summary: Very nice and comfortably furnished rooms. BUT many rooms face on Hwy 1 which is very busy and loud with motorcycle and hot car mufflers. When I asked if my room was considered a quiet room, I was told yes, and it faces "our neighborhood". Rooms facing away from the highway carry a $150-300 surcharge. They did not do a good job when building the hotel to install proper soundproofing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. While we are located on the Pacific Coast Highway, we are fortunate enough to also be located right on the water and offer multiple room types and views to accommodate all preferences. We also offer ear plugs for any noise that may impact the guest experience. We apologize that your stay was not what you expected and we hope to have another opportunity to exceed those expectations in the future. Please feel free to reach out to us at reservations@balboabayresort.com for your next visit so that we may personally assist you in making your reservation.

Summary Heading: Comfortable Clean but Overpriced hotel. Restaurant was delicious. Resort fee $30 will be extra and self park is $39
Summary: I would rate this place 3.8. Its nice but it is older style nice. Many things are dated and the pricing is as if its ultra modern chic with a great view. Its very overpriced. But it is clean. The view is of the marina but the marina is stacked with boats where you can barely see water so its just ok. It has access to a dock which is good if you have a boat. The restaurant had delicious food. The rooms are clean. The TVs are older. They charge $30 for resort fee and $39 to self park in a parking lot which is a walk away from the place.  Which basically means all rooms are $69 more expensive then what they quote. If you get a room not with a view you face the road which is not pleasant. But almost all rooms have a balcony. The pool was nice also but simple and much older. Thank
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are proud to offer an array of amenities included in the resort fee such as wifi, pool, fitness center access, shuttle, and more. Our self parking fee is $36 to safely park on property instead of the busy Pacific Coast Highway. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your overall stay and hope to see you back with us again soon! Please reach out to us at reservations@balboabayresort.com so we can personally assist with your next reservation.

Summary: Be sure to check out the resort’s coffee shop. You will be treated very well by Michael Johnson and Reagan Temple. They both went above and beyond with their customer service by making sure all our drinks were perfect. We will be coming back because of them.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our coffee shop and appreciate you recognizing those team members that made your experience memorable. We will be sure to relay the information onto our team and look forward to your return visit to Blend!

Summary Heading: Good Convention / Wedding Venue, Not Resort Stay
Summary: Newer remodeled hotel on marina. Upon seeing the hotela nd surroundings we realized it was not the resort setting we had hoped. Rooms and pool are basic and hotel Sterile. To add insult they held us to our reservation when we asked to cancel upon seeing the hotel. Not happy about that nor the Bed and Breakfast special we thought was a Food & Beverage credit but learned it all had to be used for breakfast. Clearly not a mgmt team looking to inpsire trust and good will to guests they hope would return. If it is a resort setting you are looking for this is not the place.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. The Bed and Breakfast package states on our website and email confirmation that there is a 5 day cancellation policy and a daily breakfast credit. We apologize for any confusion you may have experienced. We strive to provide excellent customer service to our guests and we apologize if your stay with us was not what you expected.

Summary: This is the second time we've stayed there.  We went there for a few days a few weeks ago.  Our room wasn't ready yet, so they offered us a glass of wine.  After just a few minutes wait, the room was ready.  Up at the room, there was a bottle of wine in the frig.  Our room was very clean and the view was amazing!  Later in the early evening we received a charcuterie board with lots of yummies.  The staff was very friendly.  We will be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the many amenities we had to offer. We look forward to your return visit for another memorable stay!

Summary Heading: Some very nice featuring, but many gating factors
Summary: I recently stayed at the hotel for 10 days.  The first several days were on my own; the last half of the stay my husband joined me.  Due to lack of room availability (my issue since I booked late), I had a room that overlooked the driveway for the first part of my stay, and a beautiful Bay Room for the second part of the stay.  For context, pre-COVID I travelled around 120 - 150 days a year for work.   I am just getting back into travel mode, and boy everything feels more difficult these days.  I am a total princess when it comes to hotels, and tend to stay at Four Seasons, Langham, Peninsula, Mandarin - you get the idea.    The reason for the choice of this hotel was that I am a member of a reciprocal club, and that gave me access to the Balboa Bay Club, which is right beside
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel was fine. Not great but not bad
Summary: The hotel was fine.  They did give us a complimentary bottle of champagne for our anniversary and my husband’s 60th bday. This was a nice treat.   The biggest disappointment is there isn’t much to see or do at this hotel. There is no beach and a small pool area that is not very nice. Also we tried to go for a walk in the morning but there is no where to walk to. You can go on PCH but it’s high traffic and there is nothing close by. No shops, boutique or cafes are within walking distance. You would need to drive. There is a small bay in front of the hotel that you can see water but there are so many giant boats in front that it blocks the view. And you can’t walk at their bay front because the hotel’s portion of the bay is super small.  The pool was a bit depressing. Needs
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy that our customer service exceeded your expectations, but apologize that the entirety of the stay was not what you expected. Since we are located on Pacific Coast Highway, it can be fairly busy in the surrounding area. Therefore, we do our best to offer shuttles to and from the beach, Fashion Island and other hotspots in the Newport Beach area. Our goal is to provide our guests with exceptional service so we will make sure to pass along your concerns to our management team so that we may improve for the future. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at reservations@balboabayresort.com.

Summary: My review is based on Value-Cost vs. experience.  This is at best a 1 star value-let me explain, first we are paying an astronomical price for a 1 bedroom suite-we agreed to it, so that is on us, but I am willing to pay up for great service and amenities, this is anything but.  Second there are an incredible amount of fees and taxes on top of my astronomical room rate, amounts to about 30% of room rate-occupancy tax, sales tax, resort fees, parking, etc, no other hotel in the area I could find has this level of fees and couldn't find anyone else charging a 10% occupancy tax.  Second room is Ok, good view but overlooking club pool that is extremely loud, so making difficult to enjoy our balcony view.  Room air conditioning is barely working so it was hot in bedroom and bathroom
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize that your stay did not meet your value cost vs. experience expectations. Many resorts charge a resort fee and charge for parking in addition to the room or suite rate. Hotel taxes in this area amount to 13.25% which can seem like a lot when you add it to the price of a suite. Although some of our rooms are located on the club side, we do offer similar amenities on the resort side as well as a shuttle to nearby beaches. Our staff normally points that out during the check in process. We hope that you will give us another chance to exceed your expectations if you find yourself in the Newport Beach area again. Please do request the resort side so we can make sure you have a more quiet experience overlooking the water. Do not hesitate to reach out to us if you would like to discuss further at reservations@balboabayresort.com.

Summary Heading: Underwhelmed, beach and pool areas of property for members only and not hotel guests
Summary: Had huge expectations for the visit based on reviews but very underwhelmed by the boxy property that lacked warmth, originality, or options to enjoy the bay.  Small beachfront area on the bay and that is displayed in advertising was not open to guests as the property doubles as a private club that allows only members to use the beach and pool area.  The hotel space seems to be set up for banquets more than an intimate hotel space.  Also very high priced for the room and the food.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We apologize that your experience with us did not exceed your expectations. Although our beachfront area is restricted to members, we are proud to offer our courtyard pool on the resort side of our property as well as shuttles to take guests to nearby beaches. We hope to welcome you back to our property soon!

Summary: Last minute trip down to Newport Beach found balboa bay club thru a friend and so thrilled we stayed there. It’s the perfect spot to enjoy the area. Natalie the manager was professional ,welcoming and always made us feel special. Alberto in AO restaurant is a gem - you must eat there and ask for him . Can’t wait to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us and for pointing out the team members that made your stay memorable. We are glad that you enjoyed your time at Balboa Bay Resort and enjoyed the area as well. We hope to see you back with us again very soon!

Summary Heading: Treat yourself to the backdrop of yachts, breezy open air restaurant and chill vibe of the pool with cocktail bar.
Summary: I stayed here for a few days on business, but it felt like a vacation. From the moment you enter the serene lobby, to the friendly front desk( Natalie), to eating delicious seafood at A & O, to the fun bartenders at the pool bar..you will feel pampered. The excellent service at A&O by Lucias and Didi, and Tara at the bar, is refreshing and great hospitality. Room service for breakfast is great and very quick and the individual business rooms helped me work on the go. Valet( Darren) will kindly take you to the beach and Pier and the Shop by the spa had nice staff and great branded sweatshirts( bought one for my Dad). Overall, the staff and positive vibes of this resort are amazing.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for your business trip. We truly appreciate you recognizing those team members that made it so memorable and hope to see you back with us again very soon!

Summary: Quick weekend girls trip! We have stayed a number of times at Balboa Bay and never have been disappointed.  Valet and Front desk staff were fantastic! It was very busy , but they are a well oiled machine.  Room was spacious and very clean! Had lunch at A + O and the food was delicious.  Pool has plenty of seating and live music on the weekends.  We sat on our patio and listened to the musician.  Coffee shop is great for breakfast. It is centrally located to restaurants and shopping.  No beach access unless you are a member, but even then I wouldn’t consider that a true beach.  It is an easy drive to Newport Beach.  Will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us for your girls trip weekend. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the resort and the many amenities it has to offer. We hope you enjoyed the Newport Beach area and look forward to your return visit!

Summary: Made reservations April 17 for August 5-7 stay.  Requested a bay view room and was charged $638.35 for first night nearly three months in advance of stay.  As a seasoned traveler I never encountered this procedure before.  When reservations were made I was not told or was not aware that AAA and AARP members could have a 10% discount.  Only found out about that two days before check in.  The hotel web site also does not reveal the outrageous charges for valet, self parking and "resort fees" charged daily.  Upon check out I asked the desk agent to apply the AAA or AARP discount to my balance.  She, Kimberly said she was not empowered to do that.  However, her manager, Natalie was to be in by 9:00 am and Kimberly said she would have Natalie call me to discuss.  Well folks,
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to provide us your feedback. Collecting one night deposit is a standard procedure, and our extra charges are listed on our website at the time of checkout. We are proud to offer the AAA and AARP discounts when applicable, but regret to inform our guests that it is only available on select days. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced and would like the opportunity to discuss this further with you. Please reach out to our management team at fdmanagement@balboabayresort.com and we will be happy to assist. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: Time to kick back and relax
Summary: The service was what you would expect from a Forbes rated hotel… excellent! The seamless service from checkin to checkout was amazing. Stayed here for 4 nights and enjoyed every minute of the time I was there. Friendly helpful service and an amazing location. Close to Fashion island, Pelican hill and many other hot spots.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. Our goal is to provide our guests with excellent service so we are happy to hear that it had exceeded your expectations. We hope to see you back in the Newport Beach area again soon!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel right on the harbor
Summary: We were thrilled with our stay at the Balboa Bay Resort! It's tough to find a hotel with two Queen beds rather than Doubles, and Balboa Bay offered just what we needed. There is no beach access for hotel guests, the only tiny beach strip is reserved for their club guests. But the pool offers a place to enjoy the sun, even though it doesn't have a water view. Our favorite part of the stay was taking out one of the resort's duffy boats! We went all around Lido and Balboa Islands and enjoyed the harbor and views of the houses. The hotel was super clean, and the room and bathroom were spacious. You can't really walk anywhere from there very reasonably, it's kind of landlocked in a business district. But it is right on the harbor. I'd definitely recommend Balboa Bay!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that we provided exactly what you needed for your relaxing visit. We hope to see you back with us again soon for another trip out on one of our duffy boats!

Summary: Beautiful pool, friendly staff, nice vibe.  Would stay again.  The only thing to be aware of is that you have to drive to get to a lot of things. That being said, the drive is not too far.  Concierge was helpful and provided good tips.  Restaurant was nice for breakfast in the morning,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our property and that our Concierge was able to assist you in any off property activities. We can't wait to see you back with us again!

Summary: Stayed for a week on business. Had a great stay. The staff were all lovely and brill and the food in AO was superb. The burger is darn good for a start. Pool is big and would happily bring my kids there too.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our restaurant as well. We hope to see you very soon for your family vacation!

Summary: Great staf and service / location is excelleret.   Nothing bad to say - loved it. Would say the rooms soon may need an upgrade - But really loved it.   The pool is Great - even it hasent Ocean view.  Seen you again
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and look forward to having you visit with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice property on a busy street
Summary: We stayed here with our college aged kids while visiting Southern California from the Midwest. The property is very upscale, attentive staff, very comfortable and clean rooms, lovely pool area, etc. I would point out to those unfamiliar with the area that the property is situated right on the busy PCH. The surrounding area is very congested so you can’t go out and do any kind of nice hike or walk directly from the property. For dinner we did drive over to the nearby island( can’t recall the name but about 10 min drive) and ate at a charming restaurant and walked along a walkway on the water with beautiful multi million dollar homes- even saw a sea lion. So was nice property for our quick overnight stay but I would aim for someplace with a real beach if staying longer
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and were able to explore the lovely area of Newport Beach. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you back with us again!

Summary Heading: ADA Handicap wheel chair accessible room onlyfaces  parking lot and noisy street.  And is miles away from elevator
Summary: Why they don’t offer nicer locations for ADA rooms? Maybe treat them like able bodied people.  They to locate them in unwanted areas.  The room has a small balcony with two chairs and a blaring overhead light that does not turn off so you sit in bright spot  light.  Not relaxing.  Main lobby and restaurants are in a beautiful setting and location to enjoy big yacht and harbor action.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are proud to offer many ADA accessible guestrooms in various locations across the property including waterfront rooms, but are disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations. Please contact us next time you are in the area so that we can assist with your room location during your next stay. Send us an email to reservations@balboabayresort.com if you would like to discuss this directly with a member of our team.

Summary: We stayed with a bay view and absolutely loved the resort!  The room was clean, spacious and had stunning views.  We enjoyed breakfast and lunch at A&O restaurant on the premises.  The location was truly central to everything, which we loved as well.  However, you never need to leave the hotel if you don't want to.  The spa on site provided us with great massages and facials, and the pool was a delight!  If you need a quick snack, swing by the onsite shop for salads, smoothies and more.  It really has all you need and I can't recommend it enough.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our resort as well as the many amenities it has to offer. We appreciate you sharing your positive experience with us and hope to see you back with us again very soon!

Summary: This hotel provides a lovely respite along busy PCH in Newport Beach.  Overlooking a row of large yachts and the harbor beyond, Balboa Bay is a worthy option.  I was particularly taken with the sophisticated interior design.  The public spaces and rooms were comfortable and elegant, evoking the best elements of the SoCal "look".  Attending a conference, we were exceptionally well fed by catering.  Kudos are in line for the wonderful repast on the pool terrace for a gorgeous al fresco lunch or dinner overlooking the yachts with outdoor fire pits for the cocktail hour.  My king room was generous, well appointed and quiet.  As always, loathing having to take a shower in a bathtub, I was gladdened (& relieved) to find a separate stall shower.  Bravo!  I would return.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience. We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and made your stay worthwhile. We look forward to having you return and appreciate you staying with us!

Summary Heading: Customer service all friendly, we were looking for something else
Summary: We had a family event about 30 minutes inland from here.  We stayed that far because we come from Northern Ca where beaches are cold and grey and Southern California has a gorgeous coastline reputation, so we wanted to be along the water.  I had no idea that Newport Beach coastline is all built up.  When we got up to take a morning hike, it was all buildings and highway, no beach, no views.  The resort has a small beach, but it's for club members only.  There was three of us, Mom and two sisters.  The room was big enough and we had a small  balcony with a pool view.  We debated paying more for the ocean view, but  it looks like these rooms are above the restaurant, a restaurant that is very loud and so glad I didn't book it.  The restaurant is extremely popular and you need
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your courtyard room and the time you spent here with your family. We appreciate the kind comments about our staff and our service. We will make sure to pass this on to our management team. As far as the incident on the balcony, we apologize for what you experienced. We will make sure this feedback gets passed on to our security team so that it does not happen to another guest. We hope to see you back with us again very soon!

Summary: Saw this place advertised as a good place to go for a babymoon and so I booked it as a short get-away for my wife and I.  Overall the resort was "subpar."  First off, our hotel room was located in the Balboa Bay building that was reserved for "club members."  It didn't feel like a great experience to be at a building where essentially all the amenities were "not for hotel guests."  I can't use the fitness club, I can't use the basketball or raquet-ball courts, the pool, the dining area, the beach etc.  so why place hotel guests there?  I first learned about this when I tried to enter the fitness center and was surprised when the worker told me it was reserved for "club members."  I noticed the sign thereafter in my room, that the amenities in the building we were placed were for
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback regarding your recent stay. We regret that you had a negative experience due to your room being located on the club side of the resort.  We are a unique resort in that part of the facilities are reserved for our club members.  Although the guest rooms on the club side do enjoy some of the best views, non-members are limited regarding the amenities.  Fortunately, most of those amenities are also offered on the resort side such as our pool, restaurant, bar, and fitness center as well as our boutique and coffee shop. Please feel free to reach out to us next time so that we can make sure your room is reserved on our resort side.  We hope  you will allow us another opportunity to exceed your expectations. If you have any further questions or concerns please reach out to our reservations team reservations@balboabayresort.com

Summary Heading: Relaxing Way to Return to Travel
Summary: As seniors, my husband and I were worried about our ability to handle traveling again after 27 months of being homebound.  So we planned our itinerary to be slow-paced and flexible.  Our first three nights were spent in Newport Beach at Balboa Bay Resort.  Our room was immaculate and the decor was cool, calming, and beautiful. Even better than our accommodations was the helpfulness and friendliness of the staff, starting at check-in and throughout our stay.  We especially appreciated the enthusiasm and eagerness to help that we received from Mike at the Blend Cafe on site.  He went out of his way to provide directions and information that enabled us to find whatever we needed during our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We are glad that we were able to provide a relaxing trip for your first time traveling in a couple of years. We also appreciate you recognizing our staff member that made your stay with us so memorable. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you back again for another relaxing stay in Newport Beach!

Summary: The location is beautiful and the food was great! Everything from the rooms, the gym, the pool and even the toiletries scents were truly fantastic. However, I want to point out that the customer service by Jennifer and Marcos was for me the BEST part.  They made us feel like very special and I certainly can’t wait to be back. They both are AMAZING!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience with us. We appreciate you recognizing those employees that made your stay truly memorable. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we can't wait to have you back again!

Summary: This is a beautiful resort with stunning views and a fabulous spa! I am a repeat guest, having lived at the resort several years ago. Unfortunately my last experience was less than amazing due to two random doors.  There was 2 doors random leaning against the wall in the hallway my entire stay. After check-in I asked housekeeping if there was construction in that area (so I could request another room), there was somewhat of a language barrier but I was told there was not and it was temporary.  Later in the day when the doors were still there I notified the front desk and was told they would be moved immediately. The following day, doors still there, I spoke with Guest Services and was told that there was a photo shoot going on in one of the rooms and the doors would be moved
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We sincerely apologize that your previous stay did not exceed your expectations. We have brought this up with our management team so that we can improve for the future. We are happy to hear that you did enjoy the location and hope to see you back with us again soon.

Summary: We booked online and accidentally selected 1 King bed for myself, my husband and daughter. At check in we asked for 2 queens instead which is usually an interchangeable option at every other hotel. Well, instead we got two full beds which are super tiny and uncomfortable. I contacted the front desk to try and change the room as I paid over $400 a night for this room and was told in order to change it would be another $80 per night. Absolutely ridiculous. Definitely DO NOT recommend. For this money there are way better hotels to stay in Newport.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback on your stay. We apologize that you did not get the room that you had hoped for. Unfortunately, our 2 Queen Beds do run at a higher rate because the rooms hold more people. Please reach out to our reservations team at reservations@balboabayresort.com if you would like to discuss this further. We hope to have you back with us again so that we can have another opportunity to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Lovely Waterfront Location, Pool & Rooms, but Restaurant experience needs attention...
Summary: Fantastic waterfront location, and lovely rooms & pool; front desk, Bell, Valet and Housekeeping staff were all super-helpful and friendly, as were the staff at the pool. But. As a family of 3 (2 adults and a young child), our otherwise lovely stay was spoiled by our experience attempting to have breakfast or dinner at A&O, the hotel's waterfront restaurant. When I requested to book a table for dinner on a Saturday evening I was told 'it gets crazy here' and that I should expect 'drunk people, as I see you have a kid' (our 8 year old). I had to insist we still wanted to eat at the restaurant, and was told that was only possible if we agreed to dine at 5pm. When I persisted I was begrudgingly given a 7.45pm booking. When we arrived for this booking, we were again rebuffed, told
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed the resort and pool and were able to have a great check in experience. We apologize for any inconvenience you might have experienced during your stay with us. We take guest reviews seriously and will let our management team know so that we can improve for the future. We hope to see you back with us again soon so that we can have the opportunity to exceed your expectations.

Summary: Grace at the Bayfront Boutique is extraordinary. On several visits she has assisted my husband in finding me fabulous outfits and accessories.  With a genuine eagerness to please, Grace knows the inventory well and makes an extra effort to locate the perfect size and accoutrements. We always leave with twice as much as planned. The shop carries unique inventory. Grace is one of the reasons we’ll pop in for just a coffee next door and to check out what new gems are on display. Thank you Grace!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience in the Boutique with us. We appreciate you recognizing our team member that made it so memorable for you. We look forward to having you back to see what new items we have in store. See you soon!

Summary: We actually live pretty close by in Los Angeles but like to take quick staycations in other beautiful SoCal locations. We love Newport so the Balboa Bay Resort was absolutely perfect choice! Close to everything Newport Beach has to offer there are also plenty of reasons to just hang out at the hotel. They have an awesome heated pool and hot tub with cabanas to lounge in. Also the location of the hotel is right on the water surrounded by incredible luxury yachts.   The restaurant A + O is right there so one of our favorite parts of the stay was having dinner and cocktails on the outdoor patio and watching the sun set.   Highly recommend a stay here if you want to hang out in beautiful Newport and Balboa.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that we could provide a relaxing and enjoyable spot for your staycation. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the property as well as the resort amenities and hope to continue to exceed your expectations in the future. We appreciate the kind review!

Summary: This is a lovely, well kept hotel with incredibly helpful and friendly staff. I was extremely impressed by Shane park and Mary Grantz, both but the willingness of all the staff to help out at all times was impressive. The room I had was very handsome with a great view of the yachts and standards of cleanliness throughout were impeccable. Most of all I shall remember the lovely staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We are thrilled to hear that our staff exceeded your expectations and appreciate the recognition for those mentioned. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you back with us very soon!

Summary: Beautiful, upscale resort overlooking the yachts in the Harbor!  The staff was warm and helpful.  Special Kudos to Grace at their Bayfront Boutique…great shopping!  Grace was very welcoming and very helpful in selecting some perfect items for our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are happy to hear that our staff was able to make your trip memorable. We appreciate you sharing your positive experience and we hope to see you back very soon!

Summary Heading: The Boutique Inside The Hotel Though!
Summary: I had a first floor room. I loved the surprises they'd leave on the bed. Like lavender and sleeping aid organic juice. And how when we ordered room service the guy said "bon apetite"   When we needed masks, the front desk guy had some. When we forgot our toothpaste, they delivered it in a gift bag with other great travels size items.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. We are glad that we were able to provide for your stay and allow it to be an enjoyable experience. We appreciate the kind review and hope to have you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome, awesome staff and great location
Summary: This hotel was as beautiful as it's photos and the staff were so helpful.  I was able to get an early check in day of which meant everything because I had been traveling since 3am Atlantic Time to get in to California at 1pm Pacific Time.  The Spa was an amazing experience - my massage therapist helped smooth out the leg cramps I was experiencing and got me out on time so that I could make the conference I was attending there.  Room service was so fantastic and delish food.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you had such a relaxing and enjoyable experience with us. We appreciate your kind review and hope that we get to see you back with us very soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent Service and Amazing Marina View!!!
Summary: Just stayed at Balboa Bay Resort and my experience was amazing! The staff was super friendly and service was impeccable. The staff went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable and comfortable.  I stayed at the King room Bay View on the 3rd floor with a private balcony and amazing views of the Marina. The room was spacious and comfortably quiet. It’s beautifully decorated with modern furnishings. The room amenities include a work desk, a bathroom with modern style soaking tub, separate shower and “his and her” dual sinks and comfortable single lounge sofa. Property amenities include a spa, pool, and a restaurant called The  A+O  kitchen which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. During my recent stay, I enjoyed a dinner at the patio with their famous delicious burger and
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you enjoyed your experience and that you were able to enjoy all of our amenities as well. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us and hope that we can continue to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary: Hector with Balboa is incredible!! SO helpful, and understands what five star service is REALLY about! So thankful for Hector; going above and beyond to please his guests as a five star hotel should. Would stay again, only for customer service such as his. Thankful to cross his path and be reassured in customer service in 2022, once again. Otherwise, as we know, it’s extremely subpar.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our goal is to provide great customer service for our guests and we are happy to hear that one of our employees was able to make that happen. We hope to only exceed your expectations for your future stays with us.

Summary Heading: Mary Grantz and Nayeli at the front desk are the best!
Summary: Fantastic, relaxing visit to Newport Beach.   Professional, courteous, accommodating staff, regardless of time of day or night. Nayeli checked me in flawlessly. The property is HUGE! Mary Grantz took her time to walk me to my meeting space or else i would've been lost. She’s a great asset to your company!  Rooms were clean and well appointed with everything needed. Looking forward to our next stay. Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your positive experience. We always appreciate the recognition of our employees and all the hard work they do. Our goal is to make the guest experience as enjoyable as possible and we are glad we could exceed your expectations. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to having you back with us again soon!

Summary: Beautiful hotel right on the marina. Fantastic staff, very friendly. If you get a chance to go to the Bayfront Boutique inside the hotel, definitely go see Grace and Monze (think I might have spelling wrong) but they were awesome!!! Highly recommend and can’t wait to come back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for recognizing those employees who made your stay so special. Our goal is to make each guest feel welcome and we are glad we could exceed your expectations. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Excellent time.  Celebrated our anniversary with a spa treatment.  Love the spa room with all the necessary amenities.  We dined and ate breakfast at the A + O restaurant...food was delicious.  As a matter of fact, I cancelled at a famous restaurant nearby for better view, ambiance and its menu.  We live in coastal Encinitas, so this small get away is just what we needed.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for celebrating your anniversary with us! We are glad we could make it memorable for you and hope to exceed your expectations on your next visit as well.

Summary: Be careful of Sunday breakfast.  That was the only negative.  Had a burger ordered from the bar on Sunday evening and it was one of the best I've ever had.  Different chef I guess, otherwise an excellent, comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you were able to enjoy your evening meal and still have a relaxing stay with us. We hope to see you back soon to enjoy the restaurant again!

Summary: We live in Tustin Ranch and felt we need to stay waterfront for Saturday evening, where elso to go than the BBC, right?  We loved the room assigned to us, I truly hope we can get it again next time we do a similar weekend
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and can't wait to see you back again. Thank you for your kind review.

Summary: beautiful resort with extremely friendly staff and fabulous amenities. I hope to be able to stay here again next time I am in Newport Beach and visit the spa. Pro tip: if you don't want to pay for parking, there's plenty of it on the street!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and can't wait to see you back again. Thank you for your kind review.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel in Newport Beach on the water
Summary: I recently stayed at the Balboa Bay Resort as I had a business meeting/dinner with a customer who lives close by.  I have stayed at this property before and had a great time.  They did not disappoint this time either.  I stayed in the "club" section as they call it instead of the main building and I really liked it.  I had a room overlooking the water so I did not complain.  The room was big, clean and quiet.   I ate in A+O a few times and the food and beverages were fantastic.  I would highly recommend staying at the Balboa Bay Resort.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience at Balboa Bay Resort and we hope to see you again soon! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management

Summary Heading: Great Stay Each Time We Visit
Summary: We stay at Balboa Bay Resort on a regular basis when we are in the area for business, as well as down time.  Over time, the Resort has become our home away from home.  The staff is always attentive, facilties are well-maintained, and the overall atmosphere is positive and inviting.  There is usually a lot happening there on the weekends and as a guest, the added energy of events and nights out for people just add to the experience.  Highly recommend for business or personal stays.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We really enjoy the quality of the food and the atmosphere for our annual conference.  The service is exceptional.  The rooms vary from bay side to street /valet side; the street/valet side has traffic noise. This is my 2nd time staying at the Balboa Bay Resort.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms are spacious and clean- sadly I was on the first floor across from the gym and housekeeping so no view. I could hear the floor above me starting at 530 am. Service was great and being on the water was lovely
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stayed here a few weeks ago, gave them one more shot
Summary: Initial room was literally the further room away on the premise. Like the place, that was awful. Came back tonight, mentioned it to Hector at the front desk, very accommodating and got a room for me right next to the front desk for a quick one night stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great room, great hotel and Kirsten at Front Desk always steered us right
Summary: We loved  the hotel, the room, the pool, the ping pong table and the restaurant with fire places, live band and view of the Marina. Kirsten at front desk made excellent recommendations for restaurants, bike routes and other places to visit.  We came for 2 nights but stayed for a week. Great place!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Fabulous resort - staff is so helpful - peaceful and fun property.  Food is great - rooms are modern and clean, many places to sit and read, do work, just relax, pool is awesome for doing laps.  Smoothies are really good.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice resort and helpful staff. Bayfront rooms get a lot of noise from the restaurant/bar. We were as far away as possible, and the noise kept us awake. Room service menu could use some work. They seem to cater to business groups and not for relaxing couples
Manager Response: We thank you for writing us a review regarding your stay and apologize for the noise inconvenience. Our goal is to provide a positive experience to both groups and individual travelers on vacation. Your feedback has been directed to management to improve our guests' stay. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management

Summary: Wonderful experience friendly staff great chef in food and beverage was there on business 4 days and had ballroom with different theme each night. Best food. Hotel room nice and modern. New water bottles each day. Good little gym.  Little lovely place hidden in marina area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice and helpful. Clean safe environment. All staff was great, very professional and informative. Would stay here again and will recommend to family and friends.  Easy services and reliable. Lots to do on site and around the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hospitality was amazing, everyone was nice and welcoming. The cleanliness brought a comfortable experience and the gesture of a complimentary wine made it much more enjoyable. Front desk were very professional and welcoming which made the rest of the day great.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Christmas in California! I want to recommend HIGHLY this beautiful and amazing Resort! ESPECIALLY RANDY!!! He IS AMAZING
Summary: This Resort is AMAZING! Christmas especially! All of the employees were EXCELLENT, ESPECIALLY RANDY!    He is an amazing person and employee! He’s professional and extremely considerate! He turned a difficult Christmas into a JOY!    THX RANDY!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent luxury stay with a great bar overlooking the water and excellent staff. Highly recommend!! Stayed for New Years and enjoyed complimentary wine and a beautiful view off the balcony. A must stay if you want to be in the hub of Newport!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room accommodations were lovely, comfortable and high quality.  FREE unlimited water bottles was a very pleasant, unexpected perk, along with a complimentary bottle of wine upon arrival.    Everyone on staff was kind, helpful and friendly!    I appreciated meeting Steve,  who assisted me with my bags upon my departure.  He was the best.  Thank you !
Manager Response: none

Summary: Choose a room with a comfortable bed.  The room was large and the view and patio were lovely.  The resort was beautifully decorated for the holidays.  We did not have the opportunity to try out the spa.  We did go to the fitness room, which is much smaller than depicted on the website, but adequate since there wasn’t anyone else in it competing for equipment.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are pleased that you enjoyed your time at the resort. We hope to host you again soon!

Summary: You cannot rely on location alone. I have no problem spending money on accommodations… but I expect a value added experience. First time staying here, for the cost, I have had significantly better accommodations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband, two young daughters, and I stayed here for Christmas 2021. This resort surpassed all of our expectations. Gorgeous rooms, incredible staff, and a location that’s to die for. A bit pricey, but definitely worth it for the quality!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Newport Beach, CA
Summary: Beautiful resort, supportive staff. Everything was great. We will stay again. The only negative comment is the "resort fee" was for "complimentary" things available in the room. How can things be complimentary when you pay for them? Also there was not option to delete the fee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wifi does not work at night. 3 nights in a row, get back to room around 9 pm and device (ipad,) shows connected but nothing downloadable. NYT does not load, no emails etc. Called front desk and said someone who's check the next day.
Manager Response: We apologize that the wifi was not working for you. We have passed along your feedback to our team for further investigation. You are a valued guest and we thank you for your feedback. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Very disappointing/ in addition to issues stated earlier, the room directly below was chain smoking on the veranda filling our veranda and room w smoke as we watched the Beautiful boat parade. As boat parade ended our in room food order arrived after 3 hours, just in time for Bed. Golly gosh, I recommend this property regularly and I am hesitant now. Valet and Bell service, restaurant server were kind and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us feedback on your stay. We are disappointed to hear that there were delays in your service, but we thank you for your patience during this busy time. We look forward to hosting you again soon! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Brunch is $75. Pp. then 35% kitchen staff tip + tip for the actual people that wait on you. Our room was not ready until 35 minutes after 4:00 check in time. With 4:00 check in and 11:00 check out the least they could do is be ready at check in.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect stay in a perfect location
Summary: We stayed at the resort as a one-night staycation to watch the Christmas boat parade. The location is just wonderful and offered a perfect view of the parade. The staff was extremely attentive and friendly, from the concierge to the housekeeping staff. My husband and three year old even got to enjoy the outdoor hot tub…no crowds to fight in December! We are looking forward to doing more family staycations there, particularly in warmer weather to enjoy the pool a bit more. Also a note, we didn’t hear anything once in our rooms. We faced the courtyard so no street noise, and no noise from the hall or other rooms could be heard.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really enjoyed the hotel and the staff is great.  The food and service is top notch. We were there for the boat parade and Michael in the cafe gift shop was fantastic, providing excellent service and giving us information about the hotel and amenities. Thanks Michael and we’ll definitely be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: In town for work and overall had a great experience. Everything was made so easy for us. One of the first people we met was Michael in the cafe. He was very knowledgeable and warm. The absolute best! Great intro to a perfect week.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From start to finish, my experience at the Balboa Bay Resort was amazing. Everyone from the first valet to the last visit at the front desk were so friendly and helpful. The ground are beautiful. My room was great( super clean too). The restaurant was very good and my morning coffee at the Blend was delicious. Balboa Bay resort was the finest experience I have every had. Can’t wait to go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The weather wasn't as warm as we would have liked, but everything about the resort more than made up for it. Valet. Food. Room. Service. Christmas Events. Our business events were well handled. The location is close to Newport and Balboa Piers as well as Fashion Island.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I decided to get away for a weekend. Decided on coming down to Dana point. Balboa Island was a spot we decided to go to. From the moment we got here and were greeted everybody was so polite. One of the staff Collin Pittman recommended some places for dinner and also breakfast. Later that evening I had forgotten my iPhone charger called the front desk Colin came to the rescue and was able to get us a USB charging for my phone.   We’ve had dinner here and room service breakfast the food is absolutely delicious the view is phenomenal do yourself a favor when you’re ever in Dana point please come down to Balboa Bay Resort trust me you will love it like we do
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had the pleasure of working with Jason and Kimberly from Food and Beverage to celebrate my birthday.  They arranged for me and my friend to have a beautiful and delicious breakfast overlooking the water.  I'm still thinking about the Lemon Ricotta pancakes, and the chicken and waffles are out of this world!   My friend and I had the pleasure of being served by Mr. Lucius J. and I have to say that he provided the most impeccable service. The level of detail and attentiveness that he gave us was very much appreciated and really made my birthday experience outstanding. Every team member I came across (valet, food service, and in passing) treated us with such grace and kindness.   Once I completed the brunch, I headed over to the spa and had the most amazing massage by Ms. Olga.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our go to Hotel for the holidays!
Summary: Our family booked the Presidential Suite for Thanksgiving last year. It was a fantastic experience for all. We even invited family over to have dinner with us at our Suite. The room service was appropriate for Covid as was the restaurant and bar areas. The staff did an excellent job at keeping guests safe and feeling comfortable. After our stay, we booked Christmas in a Bayview King for the wife and I. We had the same wonderful experience. This Christmas we are returning to a Bayview King. Feels like home away from home! Thank you BBR!!
Manager Response: Dave, thank you for sharing your holiday experiences at Balboa Bay Resort.  We look forward to welcoming you and your family back this Christmas.  We are offering a Christmas Eve Dinner and Christmas Trees in your room this year.  Please reach out to us if you would like to have your room decorated for the holidays. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Once a top club, now a nondescript hotel
Summary: The Balboa Bay club was a legendary club of celebrities and affluent folks located on the harbor in Newport Beach.  The old club is gone, replaced by massive cement building lacking any architectural aesthetic that is blocking the Harbor views and operating as a hotel and restaurant.   Big yachts still in front of the property but the old charm and memorable membership is long gone.
Manager Response: Although the Resort and Club have evolved over the years in order to accommodate our members and guests, history and tradition live on at Balboa Bay Resort and Club.  We just celebrated a sold out annual Thanksgiving Dinner by the bay as well as two sold out nights for The Great Holiday Feast, a Harry Potter inspired event.  Additionally, we are getting ready for our James Bond Themed New Year’s Eve Celebration and we hope you can join us as we and create new memories and continue to pay homage to our past. Thank you for reaching out to us!

Summary: all was great-going back-staff was helpful and friendly-very very cleana and very popular.  HAd a lot of fun and very active bar scene with great staff and nice music Would recommend to anyione-location and views great
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A perfect Stay in a perfect area
Summary: All is perfect, restaurants, resort , location, organization , employees , cleanliness , all is outstanding. It's perfect for business and it's even better for vacations. Nothing to change, nothing to improve
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I arrived for a seminar at the resort, having stayed at this lovely property before.  Unfortunately, we arrived late and had booked the wrong type of room.  The night manager couldn't help us with a move at that late our but assured us that it would be addressed the next day.  Oliver called the next morning and was absolutely amazing!  he moved us to a perfect room just in time for my birthday celebration.  The entire staff was so helpful and pleasant, but our hero is definitely Oliver.  Outstanding customer service.  Thank You,  The Blocks
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Picture Perfect Resort at a Picture Perfect Location
Summary: I live in the community, so frequent the dining options.  This time I wanted to treat my sister to a luxurious and pampered filled day and evening.  She has had a tough time these past 20 months.  From the reservation, front desk, to the amazing room it was simply perfect.  Highly recommend this resort, hotel, and dining to all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The place is perfection. Gorgeous spot (definitely spring for ocean-front rooms). Staff is excellent. Food at restaurant is top notch. Love this place and can't wait until my next stay. Best in Newport!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came up for a wedding at your resort. The ambiance was beautiful! The resort clean and inviting! Rooms are spacious and relaxing. Thoroughly enjoyed our short stay. We were welcomed from the moment we pulled up. Everyone was pleasant and happy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They have everything you need...great service, Kristen at the concierge desk was incredible, food at the restaurant was good.  The view is incredible!  The staff is very accommodating! And what can you say about the view!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay here for a wedding and I just wanted to say it is a beautiful resort. The best thing was the Recreation Concierge Kristen Sonntag. She is the perfect person for this job, so fun, friendly and really makes you feel comfortable. Need something she is there to help. Thanks Kristen for making our trip fun!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Accommodations, meeting facilities, food and service was amazing!!!  Avocado toast, ahi poke and every meal was delicious!  Staff especially Jose, Tia, Didi and Nicole went out of there way to be friendly, helpful which made our meals at the waterfront restaurant and stay 100% enjoyable. I would definitely schedule another business meeting and come back for personal stay as well. Can’t go wrong on all fronts!  Enjoy!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful service from Tia, Jose, and Didi in the restaurant!  Delicious food!  Beautiful property!  Great location.  Lovely staff including Nicole at the concierge’s desk.  Don’t miss the avocado toast and the overnight oats.  Also the poke.  Very nice wines!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort is 5 Star when is comes to venue location, food, atmosphere and customer service!  Special thanks to sales manager, Rachel Reitkopp.  You made us feel welcome and cared for of at all times…thank you!  Also, many thanks to Jose, Banquet Captain for your exceptional service.  Looking forward to our next event at BBC!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Could Not Care Less About Their Guests During A Time of Need
Summary: If you are looking for a place for family members to stay while you are at Hoag Hospital do NOT arrange for them to stay at the Balboa Bay Resort. Frankly, after our experience with this facility, I would not stay here if you are looking for a hotel that treats you as something more than a warm, paying body filling a room.  I needed to have a cardiac procedure at Hoag. We decided rather than having my wife and daughter hang around the waiting room while I was in surgery it would be better for them to relax in a room at the Resort. Balboa Bay Resort is just a half-mile down the road from the hospital and Hoag has an excellent texting system to keep family members informed of a patient’s progress. We booked a Bay View room (and did not ask for a hospital stay related discount).
Manager Response: Hello Bill,  Thank you for reaching out. We are relieved to hear that you are recovering well from your surgery. We are aware of the situation you have described and we are still making multiple attempts to get ahold of you via email and telephone, and have continued to be unsuccessful. We are anxious to speak with you. Please contact our Director of Front Office, Oliver, at frontdesk@balboabayresort.com so we can communicate with you directly.  Thank you and we look forward to speaking with you about this unfortunate incident.  Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management

Summary: The staff here are the friendliest - they surprised me with a box of chocolates and balloons when I checked in.  I love the location and the food.  Thank you for the Duffey ride, the tour around the harbor is gorgeous. I will definitely be back soon.  Shay B
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a wonderful experience at your hotel. We would most like to highlight the incredible service we received from Nicole Hickey. My decision to select your hotel was made from the moment I made phone contact with Nicole. I could tell immediately we would be in good care with her guiding our experience. She provided countless insights to the available in-house amenities as well as nearby activities. I proposed to my long-time girlfriend on the trip and Nicole went above and beyond helping me plan the finer details. She made an indelible mark on our trip and it will not be forgotten.  We are forever grateful and want to highlight her service.  10/10 recommend!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience with us! Congratulations to you and your fiancé. We can't wait to celebrate with you again!

Summary: While attending a conference at the resort, one of our employees had an unexpected  death in the family.  I worked with Nicole, the lovely and compassionate concierge.  She quickly arranged for a private car to take our employee to the airport and gave the driver detailed instructions on how to handle the delicate situation.  It was such a relief! She was so thoughtful, patient and compassionate. Several staff even checked in with us the following day to ensure that our staff member arrived home safely.  Top notch service, great food and above all- personal, professional and extremely warm service!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent location, cleanliness, food and service was great. The views are amazing, you can get inspired there. We went for a business trip and the installations were perfect. Staff looked happy and excited.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an amazing stay at this hotel! Beautiful bay views and the staff were so nice. Kristen definitely stood out the second we stepped into the hotel grounds. She was so friendly and even had some cookies and balloons for my boys. You are a gem! Thank you ❤️
Manager Response: none

Summary: A fantastic property in a beautiful location with dedicated and kind staff. The evening sunsets were gorgeous and so many of the little intimate spaces to gather with friends were perfect viewing locations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful food, awesome staff, large clean rooms with a geat view, reasonably priced, who could ask for more?  I can't wait to visit again for pleasure next time not for work.  I would love to see more of this beautiful area.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfection in guest experience at Balboa Bay Resort
Summary: Exceptional customer service in a beautiful resort setting! I loved every aspect of my experience at Balboa Bay resort. The culture that has been built at the resort is reflected in every employee that I engaged with from our cocktail event and fabulous hors d’oeuvres to the gift shop and concierge.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I surprised my boyfriend for a quick weekend get away. Everything was perfect! We reserved a King Bay view room. We had coffee on the balcony every morning and the tranquility from the bay was so relaxing. The sunsets in the evening were magical. We loved everything about this hotel. It seemed to be an older crowd which was nice. No riff raff. Seemed more of an upscale clientele. People were there to relax and enjoy themselves. The location is great too. Far enough from the Newport/Balboa piers to avoid the crowds but close enough to ride our bikes.  The pool was nice, warm, and good service. A + O restaurant was yummy with great views of the bay also. There was always a wait so we just sat at the bar every time and enjoyed the view from there. The customer service was great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had an amazing stay at the resort because of Nicole Hickey ( Concierge.)  She went above and beyond taking care of all our dinner reservations, entertainment and overall experience. We were greeted with champagne and chocolate covered strawberries. Our room was beautiful, roomy and immaculate. view was amazing. We started the evening at the  A and O restaurant the water at the resort. Beautiful music and service.  Nicole suggested a restaurant close by in Newport, she set up our dinner provided a car for transportation. Was seamless!  The food was great.    A 12 out of 10! I  An experience we all wish for when on a vacation or just an overnight stay for a birthday or any celebration!!!  Thanks so much Nicole!!!! Your amazing!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is horrible , the amenities are outdated and far from a 5 stars hotel . The food experience is poor and unsophisticated . Customers have no access to waterfront beach and pool . Rooms are old , smelly and noisy .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We strive to provide each Guest with the best possible service and value during their stay. Please let us know when you are back in the Newport Beach area so we can have another opportunity to exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Fantastic overall experience nearly ruined by poor front desk customer service.
Summary: I purchased the hotel package that included a $150 spa credit and a $100 food and beverage credit.  When I checked in, I confirmed these credits and the front desk informed me to charge everything to my room and we would see the credits at checkout.  Upon check out, neither of the credits appeared on the bill and the front desk fought me for both and did not want to meet the commitment that was given to me when I booked.   They ended up giving me the $100 food credit but did not give me the $150 spa credit.  Not only did I spend over $1K on the hotel stay but I also spent over $1,500 on the Sunday brunch.  I would expect better professionalism and customer service from the front desk at a location like this.  All other experiences with customer service were fantastic.  But the
Manager Response: We sincerely appreciate your honest feedback regarding your stay and apologize for any inconveniences you experienced. It is our goal to provide our valued Guests with the best possible service in every department. Your review has been passed to the respective teams to ensure that we are properly serving everyone who stays with us.

Summary: This is one of the best hotels we have ever stayed. The staff was awesome. Upon arrival we knew we were at a great place. Bottle of wine was waiting for us in our room and a bowl of fruit was delivered to us the first night we were there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We felt like we made a vacation family here with how friendly and outgoing all the staff were!    The resort was beautiful, food was delicious and unique, and the views were spectacular - but what really made this trip memorable was how Kristin went out of her way to make sure our needs were met with a new baby.   Traveling and making arrangements with a baby can be tough, but she truly made it feel like a breeze so we could enjoy our anniversary even with a little one!   Brandon and the other valet drivers were exceptional as well and really went out of their way to ensure we were comfortable on our rides, had water, helped us with luggage and accessories, and had good conversation!  They recommended great spots to enjoy our time here as well.   We highly recommend this resort
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful Hotel and resort and I highly recommend staying here and Make sure you search out the Best Concierge I have ever experienced in my 64 years of travel. Kristen from the moment we walked into the resort showed us such tremendous Kindness and hospitality and she was so helpful in making our stay the most pleasurable experience !  She is a Gem and the Balbao Bay Resort is so lucky to have her on their staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had a great experience with our staff. We look forward to hosting you again! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: Beautifully appointed, perfectly located, gorgeous view of yachts at marina!!!
Summary: Stayed in room 377. marina view from balcony! helpful staff. be sure to take a duffy boat cruise of the harbor. live dj at the pool on weekends. hosted dinner for 30 in Bay View room and the food was fabulous! highly recommend
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff overall were great and very accommodating. The room had a beautiful view and was overall pleasant. A couple of issues in the room were the air conditioning ducts were really dirty and made me wonder about the air quality. Luckily, the weather was beautiful so we kept the door to the outside open and that helped. My biggest issue was the lack of dining options for someone with a gluten allergy. They really had very little to offer and that was disappointing.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay! We thank you for the review on your experience and have forwarded your feedback to the respective departments. Our goal is to exceed our guests' expectations and will do our best to accommodate all requests. Please let us know next time you are in the Newport Beach area so we can provide you with an amazing stay. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Excellent staff, excellent amenities, beautiful view and good food. Poor cleanliness of rooms due to cockroaches. Bed was too stiff and hard, making sleep uncomfortable to back. With $800+ per night, did not meet expectations.
Manager Response: We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We are looking into the situation to ensure every room exceeds our high standards. Thank your for taking the time to give us your feedback! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: The entire experience was 1st class and everyone made you feel welcomed upon entering the property. The location was great which made it east to visit other places.  Happy hour in the bar was very nice with awesome water views.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming! We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you again next time. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Everything was Perfect!! I was in town for a wedding and chose the Resort because I have stayed here previously. During these hard times with hiring good employees, this Resort has a fabulous staff that met and attended to my every need.
Manager Response: It was a pleasure having you at the Resort! Thank you for the kind feedback. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: I had a continuing education event in Irvine and decided to make it a getaway weekend with my wife. I picked Balboa Bay Resort because of the location. Our room was beautiful! Facing the Marina. My wife enjoyed sitting out in the balcony and having her coffee.  We had dinner at the restaurant and it was great. Good drinks and food was good. Would love to return sometime :)
Manager Response: Thank you for telling us about your stay! We look forward to hosting you again soon. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team
