Summary: We just completed a wonderful weekend at this lively hotel.  Super friendly.  Clean.  Casual elegance.  The best part however was the fabulous brunch  we just completed.  The food was wonderful but the service we experienced from Carmen  and Ronaldo was over the top.  Highly recommend
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay! Come again soon. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Property was excellent!  Food was delicious, brunch was spectacular, only "negative" was the shampoo/conditioner/etc was not top notch, but the pool was nice and the location here is great, cannot beat it -- and Nicole at concierge is a rockstar!
Manager Response: It is great to hear that you had a wonderful time during your stay. Thank you for your feedback! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Management Team

Summary: My wife and I intentionally came in after Labor Day to be away from the crowds.  We frequently stay in the OC so we are relatively familiar with the Newport Beach area. Our stay was magnificent. Spacious, clean rooms; the Blend was perfect for early morning breakfasts and A+O was a romantic spot for nightly entertainment and a nightcap. The service is outstanding and every staff member smiled at us and greeted us warmly during our stay.  It was a great four day mid-week stay.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our facilities. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Dated rooms. Many with views of the highway or parking lot. Can hear thru the walls.  Asked for a nice place to walk. They sent me down the highway. Incompetent and overwhelmed staff. Pool wont serve a fruit smoothie. So you have to walk inside to the cafe and get your own.  Just nothing you would expect at a 4 Diamond resort...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay. We value all of our guests and your feedback helps us improve. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations, but would love another chance to show you our beautiful resort when you are back in Newport Beach. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: For a resort with so much hype, I was expecting much better service and amenities . It seemed like there would be tons of activities or a nice place to walk around the hotel. No place to walk, elevator broken with no one to help.
Manager Response: We are disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations. Please let us know when you are back in Newport Beach so we can have another opportunity to provide you with a positive experience. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: I decided to have my 30th Birthday at the cabanas at the pool at the Balboa Bay Resort and I am so glad I did. The pool servers were on top of it and accommodated all our requests. Everyone enjoyed the food that was served ( peppered shrimp, grilled cheese and chicken tenders) perfect by the pool snacks. Everyone had a great time and so did I. I will be back soon ! Thanks BBR
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for providing your feedback, and happy birthday! Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: We had a mishap with a boat charter. Which wasn't anything to do with Balboa Bay Resort. We explained to concierge our issue and how we were supposed to celebrate 🍾 a 40th birthday. And the original charter wasn't what was advertised. Nicole was super friendly and also was able to work out our problems and made some phone calls. We had a new charter with a very nice Yacht within an hour we didn't miss out on our party.  Nicole went above and beyond to accommodate our stay. This place and staff is top knotch! Hands down best place we've ever stayed and we've to lots of resorts. Resort is super clean and very fancy. Elegant is word for this place! Thanks Jesse
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback about your stay. We are so happy to hear that you had a great time despite your situation. Happy birthday! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: If you can get a room with a Bay View, you won't be disappointed. The Spa and Pool area are outstanding. The staff was very knowledgeable and helpful, we've never been here before and they made us feel so welcomed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Come again soon! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: The room was beautiful and pristine.  The staff were all so nice.  Usually I can't wait to get back to the comforts of home, but this time, I didn't want to leave.  I am looking forward to returning in the future.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon! Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Great location and service! The concierge was especially helpful.  The food was tasty. They get lots of local visitors over the weekend, but that didn't affect our experience negatively.  I recommend renting their bikes.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: The good, bad and ugly aspects
Summary: Balboa Bay Resort The Good, Bad and Ugly aspects.  After the Pelican Hill Resort, this place is the most expensive hotel in the area. Rooms are easily twice the price as those at other upscale hotels in the area.  The good… the resort is bay front and a pleasant place to watch boats parading up and down the bay channels. The bad… there are a limited number of rooms facing the bay, and they are the most expensive.  The next nicer view rooms overlook the courtyard and swimming pool. A large portion of the rooms overlook the super busy and noisy Pacific Coast Hwy or the driveway entrance to the resort.   The ugly… my room was on the top floor overlooking the bay with a pretty view but Friday eve from 6:00 -9:00 pm when the bar/restaurant has its mediocre singer for entertainment,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We greatly appreciate your honesty about your stay. We value all of our guests and apologize for any disappointment you may have experienced. Please let us know when you are back in Newport Beach so we can have another opportunity to surpass your expectations. Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: Nice, but service does not match room rate
Summary: My wife and I recently stayed two nights at the Balboa Bay Resort with our two-year old son.  We paid $509 per night, with the Resort fee and required parking charge it was closer to $600.  Here is an honest review: - Valet was well-run and efficient.  This was even during a weekend with two weddings.  Hats off to the valet staff they were consistently the highlight of the service during our stay. - Check-in, they offered us two options for a room at check-in.  One room right next to the lobby or a room furthest away from the elevator which they warned was a 5-minute walk.  With a young son who needs to nap, we opted for the less than ideal walk.  And they weren’t kidding it was a 5-minute walk from the lobby.  I asked how much it would be for an upgrade, and they said all they
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your honest feedback about your stay. We are deeply sorry to hear that we didn't surpass your expectations. Should you choose to come back to Newport Beach, please let us know so we can have another opportunity to make your stay unforgettable.  Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: I was planning a surprise engagement with my now  fiancé and needed help in doing so.  The Concierge Nicole and her team held my hand every step of the way.  Gave me great ideas and plotted the whole thing out at A+O restaurant and a Duffy ride after around the bay (with champagne and chocolate covered strawberries). They even helped me hire a photographer to capture the moments.  Which my fiancé loved!  I could not have done this without their help.  And the resort is just as good!  I highly recommend to anyone vacationing in Newport Beach.  The great thing is we will be going back every year now to celebrate.
Manager Response: Thank you so much and congratulations! Nicole will be thrilled to know that your arrangements went off without a hitch. We think you should plan your wedding at Balboa Bay Resort!

Summary: I just stayed 2 nights for a short visit - but had a great dinner, excellent breakfast from room service. All staff were helpful polite and professional. Very nice lobby, valet were helpful, all service was quick and the place was spotless.
Manager Response: So happy to hear! Thank you so much for your nice comments. Maybe come back and stay a little longer on your next visit!

Summary: First class resort with great service, great views, and great location. We stayed in a Harbor View King room that was perfect. The room had a great view and was very large. Everything about the Balboa Bay Resort was perfect.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Never have I ever had such a GREAT concierge team work to make my our stay so great!!! THEY ARE THE BEST!!!  KRISTEN and NICOLE were the ABSOLUTE BEST!!!!  I highly recommend them when you stay here!!! Thanks Kristen and Nicole!!! You’re truly the best!
Manager Response: So happy  that we were able to make your stay amazing! Will absolutely pass on your compliments to Nicole and Kristen. Thank you so much and look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort.

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Room are comfortable and staff is super nice. The restaurant is outside seating and very good food. Hotel is close to balboa pier and have couple restaurants in walking distance. Pool area is comfortable and service is good
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had a wonderful experience during my brief stay! From the amazing staff to the classy amenities, to the exquisite dining ...   I now understand why the Balboa Bay Resort is the top destination when visiting the Newport Beach area!
Manager Response: Thank you so much, your comments mean everything to us! Look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Lovely location amazing crew everything was great … would definitely visit  again … checked on in 2 min and checked out in lest than that ..people at the pool were amazing … great food … super clean room …
Manager Response: We love to hear this kind of feedback thank you! Hoping to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I stayed with my family in July, 2021.  It is a lovely family resort, in a perfect location.  The pool is great, the bar/restaurant is lively, and with good food. Outdoor dining on the deck with live music at night was an awesome experience.   East driving access to the Newport pier, fashion Island, and local restaurants.  Valet parking is expensive and can be busy if there is an event going on.  Try the street or self parking.
Manager Response: Thrilled you enjoyed your stay! Apologies for the parking delays it can get busy especially in the summer and on the weekends. Hope to see you back this fall.

Summary: 2nd Time to the resort and it was jumping!  Staff was friendly and accommodating, requested an early room checkin in and got it!.  Room was clean, spacious and had a nice deck with a view. Location is primo, close to lots of things to do.   A&O restaurant food was very good, sandwiches are tasty and huge, esp. breakfast!   We'll be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much! So thrilled you had a great time and are a returning guest! Will pass your nice comments on to the team.

Summary: It was my anniversary and I requested something nice if possible sent to the room while I was away at dinner as a surprise.  Unfortunately it was last minute on my part and they told me they would not be able to assist me in that request because they did not have anything available, which I understood completely....  I went to dinner and upon arrival in my room they surprised me and my wife with a bottle of wine and chocolate covered strawberries. It was awesome and they went above and beyond my expectations trying to make it happen for me. At poolside I had a server Aaron who went above and beyond during my time at the pool and set the cherry on top for my anniversary getaway. He was a great person, very personable and an asset to the resort. Thank you for making my stay and
Manager Response: You are so welcome and happy belated Anniversary! So thrilled we were able to exceed your expectations. Hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: The trip was wonderful there are many places to visit around the area that I wasn’t able to the staff are friendly the room is clean the options are more than you think overall it’s a wonderful stayThe only thing that might be a concern as you may need to ask them for other types of surfaces like but shadow to beach or toiletries but over eyes are green and environmental friendly stay
Manager Response: none

Summary: Tara at the bar makes a great cocktail. The level of service is pre pandemic, a welcome change from the low cheap service being offered at other locations. You might also see some famous faces around the property!
Manager Response: Thank you for such nice comments! It means to much to our team members when guests enjoy their experience at Balboa Bay Resort! Hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: The staff and amenities are exceptional. I have been coming here for years and it never disappoints. They have rentals for everything from paddlboards, Duffy boats and bikes. The food and bar provide a great experience.
Manager Response: Such a nice note thank you! We appreciate you and look forward to your return!

Summary: When planning my birthday party, we all agreed to stay in Newport Beach. My close friend is a member at Balboa Bay Club, so we decided this would work out great for me and my girlfriends that traveled from the northwest. We booked 8 rooms one being a large governor suite that we were told would hold 20-24 people. Long story short, we were having a nice time when at 8:30pm security came up and asked us to leave the room or we were going to be evicted. He said even though we had a suite with a 10 person dining table and a bar, only 4 guest were allowed in the room. All this would have been fine as I understand policy, but the way these sexist men spoke to us was incredibly unacceptable and unwarranted. It was two security guards that (older, large men, very intimidating) screaming
Manager Response: Dear Joalean, Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. We are disappointed to hear that you had a negative experience at our resort. We do not condone disrespectful behavior from our team members in any situation and will take corrective measures as needed.  In this case, we have a no party policy for our suites and we also have noise and capacity restrictions in order to ensure the safety of our members and guests at all times, as well as to provide a pleasant experience for all guests.  Thank you for your understanding and please let us know when you are back in Newport Beach so we can give you another opportunity to have a wonderful stay. Sincerely, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary Heading: Will not stay again, to many inconvinces.
Summary: We stayed 3 nights, one night the heat-A/C would not regulate the temperature, we froze. We had a room with view of pool but the pool music was so loud we could not leave the patio door open. Room was nice good beds and good pillows.  Chairs for desk are so heavy we could not move them once seated. There was only 2 waste paper baskets - need at least 3. Staff was excellent. Food was good. World traveler; All seven continents, over 157 countries
Manager Response: We can't thank you enough for taking the time to give us this very important feedback. We clearly fell short of your expectations and hope that you will accept our apology for your inconveniences. We take guest comments very seriously and will pass along your notes regarding the wastepaper baskets to the Housekeeping department. We hope you will return and suggest our Newport Rooms might offer a bit more distance from the pool and any live music. So appreciate your notes regarding the staff and food and will pass them along. Thank you again!

Summary: Wonderful 4 day getaway to be with family. Staff and facilities were excellent. Will definitely return to unwind again. Location was perfect for seeing Newport and all that it offers. Elegant yet not stuffy
Manager Response: So nice to hear thank you! We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: What a beautiful resort.  The decor, location and staff was amazing.  WE were at the resort to celebrate a birthday with 3 other couples.  We rented a Duffy boat that was available on site and it was such a fun adventure.  We will be back.
Manager Response: You are so nice to take the time to send us such wonderful comments. Aren't those Duffy boats great? So relaxing! Hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel needs work. Its getting a little run down. front desk staff are nice but robots Room was weak. the doors on the built in were falling off. No sheers on curtains when we got there. Carpet is old needs to be replaced. Your parking staff is the best.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comments. We work very hard to ensure that we are exceeding expectations from all of our guests and apologize that your expectations were not met. We conduct regular maintenance and updating of our facility and have noted your concerns.  So thrilled that you appreciated our parking staff and hope we will have another opportunity to welcome  you back to Balboa Bay Resort.

Summary: The location of this property is spectacular.  Staff is excellent but the restaurant can get very crowded -- not enough wait staff.  The room is out of date.  Cleanliness of the room was the biggest problem.
Manager Response: Thank you Christine for taking the time to give us some honest feedback. We have noted your comments regarding the room and will ensure that we review all cleaning protocols with staff as we understand how important that is for our guests. Thrilled you enjoyed our staff and yes A+O gets a little crowded in the evening  on weekends. Popular place!

Summary: The entire staff at this property where extremely friendly and made the stay that much more enjoyable. I want to give a special thanks to Jazmine R at the front desk for going above and beyond for us. The valet staff should also be giving props for taking care of us as well.
Manager Response: You are so nice to take the time to compliment our staff especially Jazmine R at the front desk! We definitely will pass this along to her as well as your note regarding our valet staff. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed on the third floor and the elevator only worked for the first night we were there, even though staff kept telling us that it would be fixed that day or next day. Even as we were leaving - still was not fixed. If there was a 2nd elevator or a better way up to the third floor than the service stairwell, we were not told about it, and we asked.   I got locked out of my room - the key card was not working. I called down to the front desk, told them my problem, and was hung up on. I called down to the front desk again and heard the phone being picked up, then hung up on a 2nd time.   I understand that hotels have maintenance issues - the terrible service and rude staff was ultimately the biggest problem. The room I stayed in was $600+/night.....
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to detail your recent experience here at Balboa Bay Resort. We apologize for the elevator maintenance and key card issues but more importantly for not addressing the issue with you in a timely manner. This is not our normal protocol and will review response procedures so we can ensure that we will immediately respond to guest concerns. Thank you so much again for your comments as it assists us in ensuring that our service levels exceed guest expectations.

Summary: Disorganized food delivery and presentation of ancillary items at restaurant. Very limited food and liquor availability (e.g., no Scotch nor vodka martini). Clogged sink. Noisy doors upon opening and closing them underneath the sink. Mattress was too soft - valleys. Pillows could be much better.
Manager Response: We apologize that for the inconveniences that you experienced. Our goal is to make every guest feel comfortable and exceed their expectations. Thank you for letting us know, and we look forward to having another opportunity to show you the best of Balboa Bay Resort.

Summary: Flickering light in bathroom was never fixed.  TV remote on arrival didn't work.  Replaced with another remote that worked for about an hour,  Finally housekeeping put in new batteries and the TV worked beautifully.  The visit to the facility was excellent, overall.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location.  Bar /restaurant is great but can get very crowded. Rooms were very nice and staff was fabulous, very friendly. Not sure what the hotel can do about it but both nights we stayed was woken up by loud drunk people walking around the floor after midniight
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at every location starting with Valet, Front Desk, Housekeeping, Spa, Boutique, and Dinning were exceptional!  They made my friend and myself feel so welcomed.  This was my second time staying at your Resort and I will keep going back in the future as my STAYCATION destination!    There really are no words to express how wonderful your staff are!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice Resort, Not on The Beach
Summary: It was a little misleading to advertise all these things that can be done on the beach like, dinner, & a massage when the only people to have access to their little slice of beach, is the members. A little disappointing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beware of the getting taken for $500 and receiving a room next to valet and the parking lot. I’m not sure if it was because I booked through hotels.com, but don’t chance it if you have to stay here…book direct through an employee at the hotel to make sure you don’t get assigned such a horrible accommodation.
Manager Response: Ryan we are very sorry that you were not happy with your accommodations. We are hoping you return and suggest perhaps a Courtyard Room or even a Bayview Room with beautiful views of the Newport Harbor!

Summary: It’s a lovely resort, however not welcoming at all. It has members area, where our room was at but we were prohibited to go anywhere in it. Not even walk through to get to the other side. I’m not sure why we were booked there. The staff there isn’t nice in that area at all. When booking the rooms it should ask ethnicity because unfortunately it matters here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid feedback. Yes the Balboa Bay Club next door is a members only facility  but also has some guest rooms overlooking the club facilities. We hope you enjoyed our pool, fitness facility, spa, Bayfront Boutique and signature waterfront restaurant, A+O Restaurant | Bar.  Finally. our Forbes service standards require that all team members treat our guests with the utmost respect please know we work very hard to achieve this high standard.

Summary Heading: Very nice facility but only average rooms
Summary: Nice place but they need doorstops for their bathroom doors! Mattress was hard and truthfully I expected more of this kind of property. The public spaces are lovely but the rooms are really just average for this star hotel
Manager Response: Thank you Monica for your candid review! Have passed on your suggestion for a doorstop so appreciate the idea! Hope to see you back again as we are adding quite a few fun activities like our new cabana program by the pool.

Summary: Our company had an amazing retreat at the Balboa Bay Resort. We loved every aspect of it; the dining, ambiance, bay views, service, and meeting location. We plan on having all our retreats there. We'll be back for our next retreat!
Manager Response: Thrilled to hear! Thank you! Look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: In a city famous for Zhuzh, the Balboa Bay Resort offers understated elegance with high touch service. This is my first mask-free, post-pandemic getaway. Balboa Bay Resort provides peace of mind with helpful signage and hand sanitizing stations throughout the property. Housekeeping goes above and beyond to provide clean rooms. Service staff are masked, providing an extra level of comfort.
Manager Response: Such nice comments, have passed them along. Hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Beautiful location, upscale hotel - well maintained. Tough parking situation but valet staff was super efficient and friendly. Friendly staff overall. Outstanding rooms, quiet. Meeting space was exceptional. Overall feel is professional, yet would be ideal for romantic getaway. One down-side was A&O Restaurant - staff was a bit unfriendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. So happy you enjoyed your stay and have passed your comments onto the valet staff. Very sorry to hear that our A+O team did not exceed your expectations. Will strive to improve our guest service and interactions. Hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: I always enjoy my stay at the resort. The staff is always friendly and accommodating. The location is great and accessible to many things. My family and I have recently stayed a few times during the shutdowns. It would be nice if the staff recognized the guests a little more.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Referred by a BBC member this week for a staycation for a babymoon with my wife and daughter. Grossly overcharged on things I didn’t sign up for, hotel leadership completely disregarded my feedback and we were treated like no from the staff has any passion about satisfying guests. Sandy on the member side is great, Tara was great behind the bar, but hotel management didn’t seem to care that there are big misses in all aspects of their operation. Plenty of great options in the area, won’t be back.
Manager Response: We apologize and are so sorry that you encountered several issues during your stay. I understand a team member has reached out to you to discuss. We take this kind of feedback very seriously and will use it to help us continuously improve. We do hope you will consider retuning so we can demonstrate our commitment to extraordinary service.

Summary: If you go to this property as a hotel guest, don't expect much.  Although the hotel photos brag of a private beach and lovely pool area, restaurants, bars, the only thing you will have at. your disposal is a swimming pool much like you'd see at a common motel, not the same pool the photos show of Balboa Bay Resort.  The facilities you have access to is that pool and a restaurant / bar.  The rooms could use an upgrade, it's been many years since the last time.  The linens they use are of the poorest quality, rough and also full of wrinkles.  In addition, they don't even fit the bed, so the bottom sheet bunches up and is uncomfortable to sleep on.  I requested new sheets, explained the problem and they were replaced by the same rank and rough sheets. If you get a room with a patio
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid  response. I understand a team member  has been in touch with you directly and hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: According to Balboa Bay website 5 people can stay in one bedroom suit with king bed (3 on bed, one on the rollaway bed and one on the couch), however the king bed would fit 2 adults only, couch one skinny person and rollaway bed was a regular twin size. Rollaway bed was squeaky.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in new port beach
Summary: Worth writing this review; stay exceeded expectations, especially Nicole the concierge. Amenities and rooms are top notch, as is the location. Absolutely cannot go wrong. Valet parking is reasonable bonus as well. Many activities are being offered now too. Honestly, don't think twice, this place is excellent. Theres plenty of food options in Newport, probably worth exploring. Sometimes, you hear some loud cars in the morning, but Newport seems to have a lot of irritating loud vehicles.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There are lots of other places in the area that make the Balboa Bay Resort irrelevant on price and quality.  This is the highest cost option for the lowest quality offering.  I was unfortunate to find myself a prisoner to the Bay Resort holding my wedding venue deposits hostage in the eye of covid. Regardless of the abrasive top level management team who remain strangers to flexibility and competence, my wife and I decided to put our poor dealings with the resort aside and move forward with our wedding there.  The one star in my review is solely for the magnificent venue right on the bay, and the four empty stars can’t fully justify how uneducated all levels of staff and management are in basic customer service.  My room (mind you, I was the groom) wasn’t ready until 5pm after
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Wedding, but I got the room from hell
Summary: The property is beautiful & clean.  The staff are very professional, attentive and knowledgeable. The  venue for the wedding I attended was lovely and done with great care.  The reception room was perfect for the wedding & the food was very tasty and served warm on beautiful large plates.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrible service. Boring rooms for the price
Summary: Very disorganized front desk. Stayed here for years as a reciprocal club member. Waiting on hold 6 phone calls to confirm room etc. had to hang up and call business office to walk over to tell the front desk to return my call ( on hold 45 minutes on that call then disconnected ) then got the wrong room at a very high price
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at Balboa for a week for a wedding in Silverado. The attentiveness of the staff is what sets Balboa apart. Everything is taken care of down to the smallest detail. Covid wouldn’t have stood a chance here anyway with how clean and properly kept everything is. We had a fantastic stay and will certainly be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Carefully selected this hotel for a night away. Was placed in room amidst a wedding party. The wedding party should've been strategically placed in rooms close to one another to account for their celebrating and being up all night partying, instead of next to guests there for a quiet night away. The girls in the room next door were loud until 5am. Needless to say, our night away was anything but relaxing. The service at the restaurant was good, as was the food, but the rooms are nothing special. For the price, I expected more. Disappointed, won't return.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us this feedback.  We are so sorry you experienced a less-than perfect stay and have passed your comments on to our Front office team members so we can review procedures to ensure a relaxing stay for all our guests!

Summary: What an awesome place to celebrate your anniversary and thats exactly what we did! This place is amazing. The food is great, the rooms are beautiful and the staff, from checking in to hostess/host and servers at the restaurant are amazing! Total VIP treatment poolside, which is always my favorite place to be. 2 people come to mind and I have to give them a shout out, Aaron and Tia. You both made our pool experience, bar none, the best we could have and we thank you for that. Always service with a smile and very helpful with our accommodations, drinks and food. Then there is Haley with her big smile and warm vibes. If she doesn't put a smile on your face, you don't have a pulse. We met some very nice people here and could not be happier. There is nothing better to us then sitting
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed a couple of nights at the Balboa Bay resort on our way to the desert.  Everything was first class.  Staff extremely friendly and helpful, location was beautiful and right on the water, and the food was excellent.  Large protected pool heated to a nice temperature.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We absolutely love it here! Best place in Newport. We stay here every time we visit Newport. The rooms are beautiful, and the hotel is in walking distance to many restaurants however A&O on site has the best food hands down.
Manager Response: none

Summary: BBC is an amazing property; on the water, surrounded by huge yachts, a beautiful pool with bar, beach for kids, and located in the heart of Newport Beach.  Close to fabulous shopping, gardens, and beaches.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was great. I recommend the room with Bay view! Spa services were fantastic. Limited vegan options in the restaurant but what I did have was delicious. Close proximity to beach and shopping. Loved it here.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A class act on the bay
Summary: We opted for a 1BR Bay View Suite and it had 1900 square feet, a large living room and 1 1/2 baths with a "kitchen" area and more.  It's almost too big for a couple, but we managed.  It's quiet and serene and the bay docks were loaded with yachts, a few in front of our suite in the 60 mil range as shown in the above photo.  All day dining is good enough.  The employees all seemed to be service minded and friendly which speaks to management being of high quality.
Manager Response: none

Summary: All I can say is THANK YOU to the whole staff for making our event a success! Our attendees had a wonderful time and everything went smoothly to plan from the A/V tech to the catering and the attention to Covid spacing requirements in the event space. And the most important part --- The WIFI connection was awesome! We were broadcasting the presentations and there was NO lag or drop-out. Group reservations, special requests & changes were a breeze. The quest rooms were clean, quiet and nicely furnished with lots of outlets for equipment & good WIFI as well. There were lots of fun activities either onsite or near by, as well as restaurants & shopping, that made it a very convenient place for an event.  The price was very reasonable for the results & excellent service! I would
Manager Response: none

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort is a great option when staying in the Newport area. Clean rooms, beautiful views, exceptional staff. I will definitely be coming back again soon. Highly recommended to anyone looking for a nice place to stay in the Newport area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Service here was very poor. Front desk seem like they didn’t care one bit. Paid good money to stay here. Was not impressed with service and seem like they didn’t want to do anything to help or solve room problem
Manager Response: Hello Jonathan,  Thank you for your valuable feedback. We value the guest experience and do everything we can to make sure our guests' have an amazing stay with us so I am very saddened to hear that did not happen. Please can you message us directly regarding this matter.   Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Always a pleasure to stay here.  We come down from Santa Monica a few times a year for a quick lovely get away. Quick drive for us.  We never left the hotel this stay.  Had all meals in the A & O which is always consistently good.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose to stay at Balboa Bay Resort! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your restaurant experience with us. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!  Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: My experience here was great! The check in process was smooth and easy. The valet was especially great, they were quick and responsive. The restaurants within the resort had great service and were very attentive. My room was beautiful and CLEAN. I would recommend improving your Resort App for ease of use, such as specific numbers to call for room service and restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fantastic resort - world class five star property
Summary: This resort is head and shoulders above anything else in the area.  Its in line with Four Seasons and Ritz Carlton in many ways.  True five star luxury. If thats what you are after, this is the place to be. the facilities are magnificent and the staff are accommodating.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Top notch service, cleanliness, food...Room was spacious & well equipped with coffee, water, complimentary wine, refrigerator, nice shower/bathroom products, robe & slippers, wonderful staff at every level from valet to front desk, housekeeping, restaurant/bar patio on the bay with fire-tables, heaters & entertainment on weekends.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is the perfect choice for a relaxing getaway, a business trip or a destination event. The location is beautiful and gives both the opportunity to enjoy being on the water yet convenient to the city for dining and shopping. The staff at Balboa Bay Resort are incredibly welcoming and provide exceptional guest service. We look forward to returning to this wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My boyfriend and I celebrated our anniversary. The Balboa Bay Resort exceeded my expectations. Staff members were ALL friendly and super helpful. I loved how clean the rooms were. I would definitely come back with friends or family!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice friendly place if your an owner.
Summary: We checked in on Sunday. It was very busy. Our balcony room overlooked the owners beach and grassy play are for ALL the kids there. We were guests and not allowed to use the beach but no beach was provided for guests. The room was average. Overpriced for the room but I guess we paid for the view of the owners frolicking on the shore. Monday 8AM- construction started on the owners pool and spa area also just below our 2nd floor room. Hammering, drilling, scraping, blower going it was just horrible. When I contacted the front desk and asked why our room is the owners bldg.? Why we weren’t made aware of the heavy construction at check in. can’t use the beach, pool, restaurant or anything in this building. Btw Called maid for towels and such.after returning to our room 5 hours later
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great resort but stay away from the A&O restaurant
Summary: Resort is great with friendly Staff. The in-house restaurant A&O is far too expensive for the sub-par food quality. If you do stay I would eat off site as you will get a better quality product for a lower price.
Manager Response: Hi there,   Thank you for taking the time to review our resort. We are meeting with our F&B team to ensure the food quality better serves the needs of our guests and appreciate your feedback.  Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Great location and beautiful scenery. Breakfast and other meals were great.  Staff were accommodating and pleasant. Thank you for complimentary wine and water for the guests.  Comfortable and clean rooms.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you enjoyed your time at our resort and we hope that you choose to return again in the near future.   Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Great valet service! Impeccable room; it was clean and well stocked with all the necessities. During checkout I was charged for dining at their restaurant even though my husband and I didn’t eat there. The issue was resolved once I noticed the extra charge. Another issue my husband and I had were the condescending looks we received from the front desk. It made us feel uncomfortable so we decided to not come back to this resort again.
Manager Response: Hi there,   Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort. I am sorry that some parts of your stay with us did not meet your expectations as we always strive to make our guests feel welcomed and relaxed at our property. Please do let us know when you are in the Newport Beach area again so we can exceed your expectations.   Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Quite overpriced for someplace that expects you to request your room to be made up or no service. The bar and restaurant area VERY POORLY managed! Waited at our table over an hour to get a glass of water and then waited over an hour for food. We had drunken groups of kids running through the hallways banging on doors at night. Will not be returning. Good location is not enough for this over priced hotel
Manager Response: Hi Kathy,   Please do accept our apologies for not exceeding your expectations during your stay. The impact that COVID has had on our ability to deliver the full guest experience in terms of housekeeping is something we have truly tried to navigate carefully in order to keep all guests safe. We appreciate your feedback for the bar and restaurant and will be working with our teams to address this.  Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: The resort was impeccably clean, tastefully beautiful. Staff are all friendly, helpful, ultra-professional. We took a water-view double-queen room which was comfortably large, beautifully appointed, and in a word, gorgeous. The room was spotless. Bedding fresh and wonderfully comfortable. We had a room service breakfast that was outstanding. One dinner at A&O, 3-and-a-half stars. We live about 90 minutes away in LA; this will definitely be our go-to homebase for Newport/Balboa getaways.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially your kind comments about our staff and well-appointed rooms. We hope to have you stay again with us soon!  Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Excellent except for confusion over maid service.  It took me awhile to learn that you only receive maid service at request.  I assumed that it would be provided when I left my room.  Also, it would be nice to have somewhere to get a drink and snack after 9 PM - even a coke machine would be nice.
Manager Response: Hi there,   Do accept our apologies for the confusion over maid service - COVID has had an impact on our ability to deliver the full guest experience, however, we used the last few months to work on safely providing and exceeding your expectations. Thank you for the feedback regarding food and beverage service at night - we are looking into this.   Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: The overall of the service is average.   The discount protocol for the reciprocal member is extremely confusing.    We were to show our introduction letter at the Dining outlet so that discount could be applied.    The servers and waiters told us otherwise.    Thus, when we checkout, front desk again told we could have shown the introduction letter.    Now we have to wait for the back office to iron out the situation before discount could be applied.     Late Check out We were told that $25.00 dollars would be applied for late check out at 1 p.m.  We adhered to it.   However, upon coming back from the swimming pool at around 12.30pm, the electronic lock of the room was dead.   Engineering finally showed up 25 minutes later.    It seemed to us that if there is an issue with the
Manager Response: none

Summary: we plan a family vacation on easter holiday to Balboa resort bay resort, all of the stuff in resort are very helpfull and friendly and the resort was very clean and most of important the location was extraordinary ,I recommend for everyone that need a nice vacation on Balboa island, this resort are spectacular, and the restaurant was very clean too ,delicious foods on the bay you can enjoy the sunset there
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Better places to stay in Newport for better prices
Summary: Our room didn't have hot water and we both had to take cold showers. Housekeeping was vacuuming at 730-8am and woke us up. For the price you charge, things should be better. If you enjoy these types of things, definitely stay here!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have hosted many soirees in the past at BBC came back for Easter celebration- front desk staff excellent.  Room lovely and staff assisted with ice and all questions with grace and effectiveness.  Thank you
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an excellent girl's weekend getaway! From arrival to departure, everything was perfect! Our guest rooms was sparkling clean and included complimentary water bottles and a bottle of wine! The staff here were so kind and helpful! The housekeeping team was quick to respond to all our requests even though they were not offering daily cleaning. The valet and bell staff was AMAZING. Even though it was really busy, they never rushed us and provided attentive service. Thank you to Colin! Not only did he help us when we checked in, he was there to assist us when we checked out too! He asked us how our weekend was and what we did while we were visiting the area! It seemed like he really cared! Thank you to everyone at Balboa Bay Resort and we look forward to visiting again soon!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Part 2: Average Stay for a (way) Above Average Priced Room
Summary: Based on the cost of the room, I would rate our stay as simple "average".  (1) Agree that the bay view is the way to go. But here's a pro-tip: Get the bay view from the 3rd floor. The 2nd floor has a VIEW-BLOCKING OVERHANG from the end of your balcony. Also, the ceiling/floors are acoustically thin so we heard the people above us constantly walking around!  (2) iPrefer loyalty club gets you 'late check-out'. When we checked in we were told that's only one hour more so from 11 am to 12 pm. Still we got a knock on the door from housekeeping manager at 11:30 am asking when we were checking out! When we noted that we had a late check out he said he did not have that list!  (3) Pool is in the middle of a courtyard so no view.  Staff (check-in, valet, Blend) was very friendly!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Celebratory Drinks at Balboa Bay Resor and Club
Summary: After getting off a lovely boat ride watching the sunset in the harbor where we were celebrating our engagement, the hostess at the club was able to fit us in for a drink, and the waitress, Terah, helped make our evening special with a champagne toast and delicious desert!  Thank you for a wonderful evening.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: BEAUITFUL; customer service leaves much to be desired
Summary: $400 room with beautiful view BUT a jackhammer outside for HOURS between me and the water and no one can tell me how long it will go on.   Hotel:  I can send you a video.  My room is under GOODMAN on resident side  It takes a long time to get anyone on the phone - guest services, valet, room service
Manager Response: none

Summary: I hate hotels that say they have a Covid policy they enforce, then don’t. Such as this place. Guests flout the mandatory mask policy with no repercussion. Hotel employees are endangered, the hotel doesn’t care. Maybe because so many of the employees are Hispanic and the patrons are white, the hotel just adapts to the prevailing racist social order. Wouldn’t be the first place. Rooms are nice. Restaurants under construction. You can eat in your room but the room service menu has no wine list attached. The employees scramble to help and are wonderful to deal with. Just wish the hotel — and patrons — returned the respect.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful place with a great pool area! From the time we pulled up, the valet/ parking staff was wonderful. Everyone was very accommodating and there was even a complimentary bottle of wine in the room. The rooms were spacious and all had balcony's. We had a view of the street, but that is what we paid for. There was no turn down service due to Covid, but there were extra linens and bags left in the room if needed. The pool area was beautiful and had full service (my favorite part of the resort due to the servers and hosts. Johnny was great!), with heat lamps and fire tables if the evening was cool. Loved the coffee shop. The entire stay was wonderful. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Poor service, does not meet 4-star standards
Summary: This hotel is not really a 4-star hotel especially given its poor service. I stayed at the hotel for 5 days and then planned to book another 5 days, but the manager (Lauren) was rude and dishonest. I asked her if they could extend my stay for the rate that I was originally given and she said they NEVER offer extended rates. I mentioned to her that we were given an extension at the same rate the first time, and then she backtracked and said that sometimes they can offer that if they have low occupancy rates. If that is the case, she should been honest and stated that from the beginning rather than wait for me to call her out on that policy she made up at the spot. Moreover, hotel is a bit outdated and the rooms need some remodeling. I mostly stay at 4 and 5 star hotels and this
Manager Response: Hi there,   Thank you for providing feedback about your most recent stay with us. We prioritize service and ensuring that guests have an amazing stay with us. I am very sorry to hear that you felt our team did not exceed your expectations. Please can you message us with your contact details so we can get in touch with you directly regarding this matter?  Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Management Team

Summary: Stayed here two nights over New Years and had a fabulous time. I have been to the property many times over the years for various events and meetings but never actually stayed overnight so this was a treat. The valet staff got our stay off to a lovely start with their courteous, professional manner and attempt to go above & beyond. One of them (so sorry I forgot his name) even lugged around multiple heavy heat lamps to where we were sitting outside on the patio one evening as it was a bit chilly. They are efficient and super friendly--especially Jon, Abel and Charles. The lobby was beautifully decorated for the holidays and check-in was seamless. Our room was gorgeous and the complimentary bottle of Angeline Chardonnay was a nice surprise. We appreciated all of the extra space in
Manager Response: none

Summary: From the moment you arrive to the time of departure, you are treated like a celebrity. The staff is professional and always accommodating. The private gym was open by appointment only, thus we had sole use of the gym for two hours. The restaurant and bar are great for people watching. Drinks are on the pricey side but a great view during the day time. Live music on certain nights. The rooms are plush and big. Great location to food, shopping, and site seeing.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and are excited to welcome you back on your next stay with us!  Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort Team

Summary: Horrible experience.  Room Service took 2 Hours when my brother arrived from LA. This weekend was a gift from me to him for Xmas. So I wanted his experience to be perfect. He must have called over 4+ times to find out where it was, while we were opening (or trying to) gifts in the room and trying to watch the boat parade. They said they took it to the wrong room.  But it was still 2 hours late. Finally at least they comped us for it; but it seriously.  Put a damper on our xmas gift opening, as he was so hungry he was VERY low blood sugar by the time it arrived. Paid for a Winter Wonderland Package which was a HUGE disappointment and not worth it. They say they refunded me, but I will see.  I paid over $2k for 2 Bay View Rooms and one was a gift to my Brother, Wife and Nephew for

Summary: This Resort is EXQUISITE⚓️🛳🏩💘!!  The grounds are beautiful & the rooms are DELUXE!!  I was a Flight Attendant for a Worldwide Airline & had the opportunity to stay at terrific properties- however this is the MOST EXQUISITE💘🏩!!  Separate Bath & Shower with in room robe & bath salts.  I felt so VERY, VERY spoiled!  I will return & feel like a Queen💘!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My recent overnight stay at Balboa Bay Resort was top notch. The views from the property and  rooms were absolutely beautiful and the service was fantastic! We got bottle service at A&O and had so much fun sipping champagne at the firepits. We live local but felt as if we were getting the royal treatment somewhere far away! I will definitely be recommending this hotel to friends and family and look forward to staying there again! :)
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great service with an incredible view
Summary: Jose at the bar was outstanding!!! not only the food and drinks were great, he made him more enjoyable with his suggestions and prompt service. The view is awesome. You have to come and check it out...
Manager Response: none

Summary: Jose was amazing! Best service. Always checking on us and suggesting options. He made it a relaxing and fun experience. I would recommend the fish tacos!! To die for!! A glass of champagne is always a treat❤️ We ended our experience with the pot the creme🥰
Manager Response: none

Summary: I just stayed at the Balboa Bay Resort as I was attending a conference at the property.  I was only at the resort for one night but it was fantastic.  The doorman were very friendly both at check-in and check-out.  Sylvia, who checked me in was awesome.  She let me know about my reservation for the fitness center as well as when room service and the restaurant were closing.   The room i stayed in was quite large and had everything I needed.  It was clean and I felt very safe and comfortable with all C19 protocols.  Unfortunately, I was not able to get outside but I did see all the nice yachts outside my window!  I would highly recommend the Balboa Bay Resort!
Manager Response: Thank you Mark for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience at our property. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Spent a few days here at recommendation of a friend. Was looking for an ocean getaway since other things are cancelled with COVID.   Pluses: The rooms and bathrooms are spacious and nicely appointed. Balcony view over the marina is a must! The yacht activity is interesting. The food at A&O Kitchen was very good and we ate here nearly every meal. Interesting cocktails, though could use a more extensive wine by the glass menu plus the QR menus were missing the wine lists by the glass. Breakfast only on Fri-Sun at this time. There is Blend Cafe with breakfast items and coffee drinks, etc. to go.    We had a few maintenance and service issues, which the staff responded to well! Kudos for that. The pool is nice for lap swimming with comfortable lounge chairs, bar and food services.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort met every expectation and and more. The staff is extremely kind and quick with their service. The food was amazing at A+O. All the tables were spread out..and they had a dj. It was a nice ambience. The hotel did make us wait 10 mins for our room (not a big deal) but they comp our dinner which was so nice!!Their customer service is amazing! The rooms are excellent and spacious. Everything was very clean and people were following the rules with social distancing and masks. It felt very safe. This was one of they best birthdays ever and a big part of that was because of the hotel experience. I also had a private boat pick me up from the docks of the hotel. They were very accommodating. Thank you Balboa Bay for making my 40th an amazing unique experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I left last night! Thank you !!!! It was an amazing stay. Isaiah was so so helpful, and i had no problems with the WiFi which was an important part of my stay given the test i was taking. Also mask requirements were reasonable and everything felt safe!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: There were so many issues with our stay that its hard to pinpoint just one that stood out.  I noticed that all bad commentary on this website is met with Tim the hotel's manager rudely responding making it sound like it was all the guest's fault, so I'm expecting to receive the same rude response by my commentary.  We tried to have an enjoyable family reunion for my mom's 75th birthday.  I called two weeks ahead to reserve a table at A&O restaurant where we received a table that looked like old patio furniture that was pushed against the wall of the hotel. It was literally the worst table you could received at the restaurant.  While the adults were at the restaurant, our children had pizza in one of the hotel rooms where we received a complaint at 7pm at night that they were
Manager Response: Thank you Ventura_Keys_Gal for providing you feedback about your recent experience at the Balboa Bay Resort. On your last post through TripAdvisor, our Front Office Manager responded to your review stating that when receive a noise complaint from another customer, we have to do our diligence to make the other guest aware. He apologized for the experience you had and explained that our follow up based on the noise complaint was not intended to put a damper on your stay with us. We absolutely value you as a guest and appreciate your understanding. When booking a room on property, there are a few Bayfront rooms that are attached to our member's only facilities. Although these have some of the best views, our hotel guests do access the amenities in the main building such as the pool, restaurant and coffee shop. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and would be happy do our best to accommodate a Bayfront room on the resort side of the property if you are willing to give us another opportunity to serve you again in the future. Timothy does respond to many reviews on this platform and provides his contact email in hopes that he can exceed customer expectations during their next visit. We thank you again for the opportunity to make us better in the future.

Summary: Stopped by for lunch and was served by Jose who was attentive and kind. He was a fantastic server and had great recommendations for us as regarding the food and drink. Beautiful setting and fantastic views of the various ships.
Manager Response: Thank you davidkL456YJ for you review about your recent experience with us at our A&O restaurant. We appreciate your positive comments about your server, Jose. We will be sure to celebrate him with the rest of the team. It is our hope that you will return to the property in the near future to enjoy the beautiful scenery from our hotel. We hope that you have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: I was looking for a nice place to take my BFF for her birthday. Nothing too far from home, yet close enough to feel like she has been away. I did some Googling and with the process of elimination, great reviews and photos, I selected this place. What a mistake.   When you drive up to the resort it is absolutely beautiful. The valet service is quick and professional. We walk into the main building to check-in and I speak with the person who checks us in. (I can't remember her name but her daughter's name is the same as mine but spelled with an E). Nevertheless, we begin the check-in procedure. She gives me the rate and I explained to her that was the incorrect package and the cost on their website. She tells us she will be right back and goes to the back. She returns and states
Manager Response: Thank you QueenOfReviews2020 for your feedback about your most recent stay with us at the Balboa Bay Resort. First off, we want to start by apologizing that your stay did not meet expectations. We can understand how frustrating it can be to checked into a room that appears damp or musty. Although we did have a room available for you to move to, we apologize about your delayed room move the following day. If customers request to move rooms at this time, we are typically not able to have the move complete until between 2pm-4pm the following day on a sold out evening. The ADA room type was offered as an alternative as it does come equipped with more space and the same view. Due to COVID 19, we do heavily stress cleanliness and fog each room before a new guest checks in. This is about a 2 hour process, which is why rooms for moves may not be ready until later in the afternoon. We only ask that you pack your luggage so that we can hold the items for you while the new room is being serviced. Furthermore, after reports of there being a pest in your room, we did contact our pest control to be sure the room was sprayed and clean after your massage. We take this very seriously as it does not occur often to be certain our property is clean and sanitary during these times. We have followed up with the front desk agent in regards to your room rate, and she did express that she had a very pleasant conversation with you about your family and your reason for travel. She did express when quoting the breakfast package that weekend prices would inflate. Again, we apologize for any inconvenience this caused during your departure. Overall, we are happy that you enjoyed your time at the spa as well as the views from your guest room. We hope that in the future you will give us another opportunity to serve you again so that we can exceed expectations during your next visit. We appreciate your time and hope that you have a wonderful holiday season!

Summary: A fabulous experience from beginning to end, and I cannot wait to return. Isaiah at check in was fantastic; our room was sparkling clean + spacious; hygiene throughout the hotel was outstanding; the pool was refreshing; A&O Kitchen +Bar was lovely (ate there twice, and Johnny took excellent care of us both times). Thank you for running such a wonderful property. Everyone deserves to be commended for delivering a topnotch experience.
Manager Response: Thank you Jennifer E for staying with us at the Balboa Bay Resort! We are so happy to hear that your stay exceeded expectations. We strive consistently to be sure that every customer has a "fabulous experience from beginning to end." We are grateful that you have such positive feedback about Isaiah and Johnny, and will be sure to celebrate them with the rest of the team. We truly are excited to welcome you back to the property in the near future to remake this experience!

Summary: Dont listen to them when they tell you its ok to have a gathering. They let you pay $3000 for the presidential suite then harass you the entire time. This place is the WORST!! Treat adults in a non rowdy dinner party as if its a teenage house party. DO NOT use this place for any type of gathering because they take your money and lie, threatening guests and sending a bunch of security as if you did something wrong.
Manager Response: Thank you plushys for your feedback about the most recent experience you had at the Balboa Bay Resort. Our Front Office Manager, Timothy Finley, was in contact with a member of your party on the day of departure to speak a little bit further about the situation. Although we absolutely love our guests to celebrate in the Presidential Suite, we do have to follow up when other guests report disturbances to be sure that all customers are enjoying their time on property. We did approve there to be 12 people in the room for a dinner party and definitely intended for you to enjoy your time. While it was reported that there were more than 12 people in the room, we did not ask anyone in the party to depart until the police were contacted by an outside source after 10pm, leading us to request that the party move down our bar at the A&O restaurant. After speaking with the member of your party, he seemed to understand our reason for follow up, but apologize for any inconvenience this caused your party. It is my hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you again in the future. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to Timothy Finley at tfinley@balboabayresort.com.

Summary: Had such a lovely time here with my dad, felt very serviced. The hospitality, food, view, and Drybar hair salon was all anyone could’ve asked for. Especially at the A&O restaurant where our server Jose was being so kind and attentive.
Manager Response: Thank you Desireemo18 for your positive feedback about your stay with with us at the Balboa Bay Resort. We are beyond excited to hear that you had a fantastic trip with your father and enjoyed all of the amenities we have to offer on the property. We will absolutely celebrate Jose for his kind hospitality and thank you for recognizing his hospitality after your visit at A&O. We hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: COVID struggles and dog accepting not friendly
Summary: This is a nice hotel in a pretty good location but is having troubles during COVID.  As admitted by their staff, they don’t have the staff to make things run normally.  This would be ok for a regular hotel, but for a premium hotel charging a premium that is not great.   We came with two kids plus dogs and got two rooms.  Check in is 4PM which is kind of late for a hotel, especially a higher end hotel- one room was ready at 3...the other they were supposed to text when ready.  At 4:15 went again to front desk and the room was ready then- this was the first apology for being understaffed.  The valet brought up the bags and just left them just inside the door- weird.  We chose the hotel because they were supposedly dog friendly- not so much.  There was a small patch of grass
Manager Response: Thank you N2132OAdavidm for your review about your recent experience at the Balboa Bay Resort. We appreciate your time and feedback in regards to our staffing levels and facilities. I can assure you that during this time, our staff is doing everything possible to satisfy guest needs and exceed expectations. We apologize that your room was not available until 15 minutes after check in time, but can assure you that we have a full team on property to assist our customers. We will absolutely follow up with our A&O restaurant about providing dog bowls and meals as we agree this would be a fantastic way to celebrate our furry friends! In addition, we just were approved by the city to bring our gym back inside. We are not scheduling appointments for all of our guests to be sure that the equipment and all areas are safe and sanitary. Overall, we hope that you give us another opportunity to serve you again in the future. If you plan on returning to Newport Beach, please reach out to our Front Office Manager, Timothy Finley, at tfinley@balboabayresort.com so that he can be sure the team exceeds expectations during your next visit.

Summary: This is a rough one, as the property is well located, common areas well appointed, and room beautiful. The valet service is also welcoming and efficient. However, if you are coming to the property to relax, unless you are willing to spring for a waterfront view, just do not plan to get any sleep. My wife and I went to sleep at 10 o’clock, which was difficult as we could hear the bathtub in the room next-door being filled and the people in the room above us walking around on our ceiling. What was really difficult is that the inland facing hotels rooms are 80-150 feet from Pacific Coast Highway. At this point along Pacific Coast Highway, at night, the rich and famous love to race their porches, Lamborghinis and Ferraris at high speed and you hear the zoom...zoom...zoom of cars
Manager Response: DavidMarino, Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay with us at the Balboa Bay Resort. I am sorry to hear that you room location did not exceed expectations.  We can agree that noise in general during your stay can be of discomfort. It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you again and would suggest one of our beautiful bay facing rooms.We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I stayed for 3 days/4 nights and was so impressed. Silvia did an amazing job at check-in, helped me with everything and explained the property and amenities very well.  Dylan (?) helped me to my room and was very polite, good luck to him and his career in computer science! Raymond and Stephen drove me to the beach, I was the ONLY one on the shuttle for both trips and had such a good time talking to them! Very polite valet/bellman.  Thank you to Nalleji from Guest Services for helping me with a billing issue, you did so good Nalleji!!  And BIG BIG thank you to Cody H. from Guest Services. I was trapped outside of my room for 40 minutes because my room keys got de-magnetized (my fault lol) and Cody came running to my aide while apologizing profusely. Give that man a RAISE!!!
Manager Response: arjoll317, Thank you so much for taking the time to share such wonderful feedback from your stay. We first wanted to apologize for the long wait you experienced while waiting for new keys. We are so glad our staff met your expectations and made your stay comfortable. We hope to welcome you back again very soon! We look forward to your return.

Summary: Staff was awesome. Complimentary champagne helped us unwind. Front desk accommodated every request. Valet took awesome care of my bikes And kept them safe. They also called after I checked out and accidentally left a bag. Bell hops were very polite and room service was delicious.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing us with such positive feedback, K7567OOmichelled! We are so happy our staff was attentive to your requests and made your stay comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon!

Summary Heading: Not worth it at all - go elsewhere
Summary: We arrived late night and were tired. Rude reception. No sign of contactless check in despite their web promises. A rude "you have to sign this disclaimer because you are travelling in these times". Really? My travel was NOT for leisure.  Being COVID scared  I chose this establishment because I thought paying the premium will guarantee professionalism,cleanliness and quality. I coyld not have been further from the truth.   Dirty laundry in front of every room on the way to 2202- it was 1130 at night. This was a King Harbor View room - the best ones aside from the suites. Got to my room - no shower gel in the container, dry as a bone. Only shampoo. A broken shower mixer - water was either GLACIER or LAVA, Nothing in between.   Dirty windows to the patio spoiled the harbor view
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Miekiesgp. We appreciate your feedback regarding your concerns with the service and issues with your guestroom. Our goal is always to exceed our guests expectations with our high level of service. We apologize for any inconvenience our COVID Awareness form may have caused, it is only meant to let guests know what to expect while staying with us. Our team is working diligently to ensure we maintain a high level of service during these unprecedented times, so it saddens us to hear we did not meet your expectations. We hope you give us another opportunity to better serve you.

Summary: My husband and I stayed this past weekend here. We were very disappointed in the service along with a power outage that they only discounted us for a small amount. I think with the amount we payed for the resort and the reason why we were there should have been a better experience but was not the case. Along with one of the waiters at the A & O kitchen being very rude to us and not even communicating properly made another negative check mark on my book. One night we ordered from the restaurant and one item was missing, my husband had to go down stairs and ask for it.. might as well just let the guest do everything themselves.  Not a resort we will be staying again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your recent feedback, Maryb626girl. Exceeding our guests expectations is something we strive for here at The Balboa Bay Resort. It saddens us to hear that we have not done so. We can agree that the power outage would cause unforeseen discomfort during your stay. We hope that you give us another opportunity to better serve you and exceed your expectations. We would love to connect with you regarding your most recent stay. Please call us at your earliest convenience.

Summary: The hotel is nice but not good customer service at the front desk or the mangers, no housekeeping, had issues with air conditioning and lost power for half a day , no accommodations whats so ever, charged too much for car parking .
Manager Response: Thank you 658amnaa for providing feedback about your most recent stay with us. We are very sorry to hear that we did not exceed expectations. As customer service is our passion, we strive to consistently provide a level of service to keep our customers coming back. With the unforeseen power outages in the state of California, we agree that there were areas of discomfort for our guests that were out of our control. We would like to assure you that this is not a normal occurrence, and would love to have the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: My husband and I needed a short  getaway for our anniversary. Balboa Bay Resort was perfect. The staff was very courteous and the dining was excellent. We had a great view from our Bay View room watching the Yachts sail by was the best!
Manager Response: Thank you love2knead7 for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay at the Balboa Bat Resort. We are so happy to hear that you had the most perfect Anniversary at our resort! We appreciate your positive feedback about your dining experience and our team members. We hope to welcome you back very soon!

Summary: I live this place my room Was right on the bay walk out into the sand. Next time will book boat in advance as many were sold out, also hopefully waterline will be open soon .  Great stay thanks!! And Covid friendly/safe
Manager Response: Thank you alyssabrook3210 for taking the time to provide feedback about your positive experience with us! We are so happy that you felt safe and secure with the procedures we have put in place during this time. We would be happy to assist you with booking a duffy for your future stay if you contact the hotel directly. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary: The service was only fair, they placed us over a room by the pools was noisy and chaotic. We wait an hour to change rooms and they put us over the pool again. The service was just marginal. I would not come back here again
Manager Response: Thank you mskosons for taking the time to write a review about your most recent stay with us at the Balboa Bay Resort. I am sorry to hear that you room location did not exceed expectations during your stay. We have a few other room categories that do not face the pool area, such as our standard and bay front rooms. It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: I have stayed here many times, I return because of beautiful Newport Beach, but also this resort has the best service (even in the current situation). Everyone there is happy, helpful and courteous. This resort has spectacular  views of the bay but what is so impressive is it's cleanliness, the grounds, the rooms, the restaurant, the restrooms, all of it is immaculate! The rooms are tastefully done, updated, you don't see any damage or shabby furniture, etc. Even though they are serving meals out of one restaurant there is plenty of space to accommodate everyone and lovely patio seating with a view of the Bay. I highly recommend to anyone who will be staying at this resort to request a Bay View room. These rooms are well priced for what you get, large space, luxury amenities,
Manager Response: Thank you whatdoyouwant for taking the time to review your most recent experience with us here at the Balboa Bay Resort. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the view from your Bayfront room. We appreciate you taking the time to provide positive feedback about the experience you had with our team members  and hope to welcome you back to our property soon for more fun in the sun!

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort is as luxurious as it is beautiful. You won't regret your stay. The staff are exceptional and the food is awesome. If you have the chance to stay in one of the bay suites enjoy the view with a drink. It's so worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, clwyhwh4. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our kind staff, dining options and waterfront location made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Poor maintenance in room. Plumbing was poor. Loud banging at night. Air conditioning was not functioning well. Room service was poor. Food at the pool was overpriced and very mediocre. For the money we expected much more. Room was also not very clean. Unfortunately we won’t be staying here again
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your most recent stay with us anycl1339ZE. First off, we want to apologize for the experience you had in your guest room. As customer service is our passion, it saddens us to heat that we did not meet expectations. It is our hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you in the future so that we can be sure to turn this around for you during your next visit.

Summary: Room smelled like dog urine, tv in the bathroom did not work, shower drain took forever to drain. No body enforced wearing a mask. They had a wedding going on music way to loud for people to enjoy sitting out on a balcony. Hardly no one wearing a mask at the wedding. Just a very horrible experience.  You think staying in the governors suit things would be amazing. It wasn’t!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Getawayallover. We appreciate your feedback regarding your room and apologize for any inconvenience regarding potential noise from our outdoor intimate wedding. Our team is enforcing mask wearing as best we can, but can always work to improve. We hope to welcome you back again to show you our high levels of service standards.

Summary: I enjoyed my time at the BBR so much that I stayed again the following week. The bay front location is great (ask for a corner room), and the food is California fresh done right. What makes this place is the staff, though. Always friendly, and really good at their jobs. Francesca at valet went above and beyond, but worth mentioning also: Raymon from valet, Isaiah at front desk, and Stephanie, Alba, José, and Emilio from Room Service.   I appreciate the lengths they go to during the pandemic, like keeping rooms vacant 24 hours between each guest. All staff wear masks.   Because I love BBR so much and look forward to many future stays, or joining the club, a couple things I’d like to see improved: better comforters, and a no political flags/signs policy (I did not enjoying having
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, veronicacI2795YS. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stays at the Resort, including our helpful staff and waterfront location. We appreciate your feedback and will share it with our team.
