We hope to welcome you back soon, as a guest or a member.

Summary: Great staff and resort! Great restuarants. Nice bay for runs on the Duffy. Room are big and quiet. Didn't want to leave but other life calls for work to get done🙂 Lots of nice restaurants along pch as well. They allow to bring your doggy also
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, sirputz2017. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our spacious rooms and waterfront location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Traveling during a pandemic can be very challenging.....having said that, this hotel did nothing to provide any discounts due to the lack of amenities! Parking could have been waived for the guests at the hotel and the hotel fee!  Absolutely ridiculous for the amount of amenities it lacked!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Resort experience iwth us, kjmille. We appreciate your feedback and are working hard to continue to provide the best possible service and amenities during this time. Our resort fee covers the wifi, pool usage, business center, wine in the room and other items, all of which are still available to guests. We hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: We picked this resort because it had great reviews and was part of the Preferred Hotels brand.  The hotel is also very welcoming for dogs which was also a major consideration on our staycation.  Location is fantastic and the service and attention to detail was excellent.  Did not disappoint and would highly recommend the hotel. Considering we are in a pandemic, we were pleasantly surprised at what you could still do.  We were limited in choices and cant wait until everything opens up again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, tomalioto. We are glad to hear that you and your pup had a great stay with us and that our helpful staff made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This place is awesome. I will always stay here when in Newport Beach. The bay view room was great. The staff was very friendly and professional. I invited friends to join me in celebration of my birthday and they all enjoyed themselves.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Relax534584. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our bay views and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Had a wonderful time at this resort.  All front desk staff and valet staff were excellent at their jobs.  Housekeeping was responsive.  Good job with Covid safety in the resort but still many younger adults with no masks throughout the facility :-(  Also, guests should be notified if their rooms are located above the restaurants/bars that there will be noise in the evenings.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Resort experience with us, O7351SBbarbarac. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our helpful staff made it even better. We appreciate your feedback regarding other guests wearing masks and do work hard to encourage all guests to wear masks in our spaces. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My family and I loved staying at the Balboa Bay Resort. They get 5 stars on service, food, accommodations. Over all, great experience!!  Every staff member were helpful and beyond kind. I love how everyone knows everyone’s names on the same day that we check in. Very friendly and family environment. Super clean and sanitized. We can’t wait to go back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, gabbyenriquez2020. We are happy to hear you and your family had a great stay with us including our helpful staff and cleanliness standards. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Absolutely wonderful location and amenities.   Close to shopping and water activities Staff wonderful and positive.   Hotel was clean and Covid 19 precautions were addressed.  On site restaurants were friendly and food was excellent
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, maryslittlelambs1. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and cleanliness standards. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: We just needed one night of rest during our home relocation. The food and the food servers were great! The room was clean and nice. We would have provided 5 stars if the initial front desk person would have been more engaged and offered additional options for our room. It gets a little chilly on the patio if not right next to the fire/heater. Nice place and nice people
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Resort experience with us, jwhite537. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your night at the Resort including our food options and cleanliness. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: It was such an amazing experience since I checked in, the front desk was really nice and helpful specially  Isaiah.  The room is clean and nice. Want to the swimming had an amazing drinks at the pool bar a huge thank you to Ray the bartender, Julian, Peter and Keri
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, YSY133. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our helpful staff at the front desk and pool made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Nayelli at Blend was super nice
Summary: I went to the blend coffee shop and   NAYELLI KNOCKED IT OUT OF THE PARK.  GREAT COFFEE! GREAT SERVICE! SHE'S A PRO!  i didn't know what to get so she recommended something to me and i put all my faith in her and she did not disappoint.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, shrekfan. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and your experience with Blend Café. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: So nice to get away for the weekend.  The room was great!  Pool was great and service was great!  Love to sit out on the terrace having coffee and watching all the yachts go by. Definitely will return when we can take advantage of all the amenities when all this COVID craziness is over.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Cindy G. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our pool and waterfront views. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort offers a beautiful setting by the marina, a short drive from most restaurants and the beach.  The room was spacious; the open-air restaurant was very nice; and the staff was wonderful.  The hotel seems to be taking good precautions during this difficult time:  everyone wears masks indoors, the very quick elevators are restricted to one family per trip; lounge chairs at the pool are clumped in appropriately distant groupings; etc.  Overall, our family had a great experience here during what was an important trip.  We plan to return.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, FSN_13. We are happy to hear that you and you family had a great stay with us and enjoyed our spacious rooms, friendly staff and cleanliness standards. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Unless you like cold showers stay elsewhere!
Summary: Stayed 4 nights but didn't have warm or hot water until the final day. We encountered several members of the staff that were generally not helpful and on multiple occasions rude. Valet, Bell, and pool staff were all very helpful and pleasant to interact with.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort Darren M. We appreciate your feedback regarding your water temperature. If a guest lets our team know if this issue we try our best to get our team to fix this in a timely manner. We do hope that we can welcome you back again to show you our high levels of service standards.

Summary: My only complaint was the down pillows in the room(not a fan) but i always bring my own so that wasn't a big issue. Also, getting incorrectly charged for 3 cars, (but Jennifer took care of that for me so no worries!) Everything else was perfect. The massage at the spa, the sunset at the restaurant, the pool, the service, all were great. It was the best time I've had alone. Thank you! I will be back :)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Alleena O. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay including our pool and helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Loved this classy resort and bay club!  From the Valet to the front desk. Style and grace. Needed a little getaway after 2020 shutdown and they came through on every level. Pool side and the attendants were perfectly on point. Drinks and food are top shelf and fine dining. Management, bartenders, and security made us feel fabulous.   Thank you Balboa Bay club and resort for the amazing getaway!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, 374chelseat. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and enjoyed our amenities, helpful staff and dining! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: He helped us with our reservation on the phone to accommodating us finding a dog sitter. The nicest gentlemen ever. We enjoyed his 5 star service. When booking our next stay I will certainly ask to speak with him.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, heatherwN7402DA. We are so happy to hear that Timothy was able to make your stay with us a memorable one! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I've heard of the BBR for many years but never stayed. Now it's going to an an annual staycation. The room was delightful. The service outstanding and the food and beverage service was fresh and innovative in their offerings.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Peter B. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and are looking forward to welcoming you back regularly!

Summary: Def recommend! Wonderful & attentive staff, Jennifer Nguyen and the front Desk concierge helped celebrate since we came to make my mom happy from her Health recovery & Her nursing license Dream come true. They gave cute balloons, wine, & chocolates which made her so happy! What a wonderful place
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Liltwinkoez. We are so happy to hear that you had a great celebratory stay! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: We just got a basic room but it still felt and looked like I got a suit anyway. Was so excited to stay there. We will be coming back for our yearly family trip! Hopefully we won't have to wear masks when we come back hahaha but had an amazing couple days.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Joeyherm. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay including our spacious rooms. We can't wait to welcome you back again.

Summary: Arrived on the Thursday prior to the holiday and everything was great until the day we checked out (7/4/2020).  Young adults staying directly across the room from us and already starting to "party" at 7am isn't quite the way you want to be awakened.  Checking out was all good until another young adult group checked in and attempted to "push their weight" around verbally degrading the front desk staff trying to help them out.  Having money and flashing it for everyone to see isn't a way to get the service you want.  Just because you have money doesn't give anyone the right to treat anyone else rude.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Marlo C. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your holiday weekend at the Resort. We hope to welcome you back again soon to enjoy the Resort.

Summary: Great location and potential but the hotel did not live up to the hype or the price.  Charged a resort fee for amenities that weren't available and staff, though very friendly, really did not know what was happening
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Resort experience with us, Howard M. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location. We appreciate your feedback regarding the Resort Fee. The fee does cover WiFi, in-room wine upon check in, the Resort pool and Fitness Center which is open by appointment. We hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: Just had a fabulous stay for 2 nights.  Staff takes COVID seriously.  With limited numbers at pool, empty rooms, even plastic bags over the remotes. Great food on site, pool, setting, decor, comfortable beds.  We felt well taken care of .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Amy T. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and that our cleanliness standards and other resort amenities made your stay even better. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Had a great stay at Balboa Bay resort over the Fourth of July. The Bay view room was the perfect place to watch the boats go by and get some fresh air. Beds are comfy, room is spacious, everyone is very helpful and courteous, and close proximity to everything. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, iberg5. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our bay views and helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: Great views, great service, good sized rooms. This hotel has it all. I’ll definitely be back. If you can, get a bay view. You won’t be disappointed. The restaurant was very nice and the tables outside by the fire pit is where you should eat. Chicken sandwich was average at best, but rest of the menu was really good
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Anthony J. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and enjoyed our bay views and dining options. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Celebrated my 14th wedding anniversary here. The Property is Excellent and the views from the Bayview room is superb. The only issue I had is when I asked for a late checkout I was denied rudely by the front desk. I called them twice to reason with them but the lady at the front desk wasn’t budging and was very dry and rude. It’s a shame as this would have been an excellent experience but the last impression I have before I leave the Resort is a Rude front desk staff. To be fair it was only the lady at the front desk the morning we checked out however the other staff members were professional and very helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Luv2travel1818. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and views. We appreciate your feedback regarding your check out experience and apologize that we were not able to accommodate a late check out. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, we are not able to accommodate late check outs so we can properly clean and sanitize all spaces. We hope to welcome you back to show you our high levels of service standards.

Summary: Lovely resort on the Bay. I would recommend paying a bit more for a bay view room. Great location between Newport Beach and Balboa Island. The front desk staff was very helpful. Felt clean and safe during this COVID reopening.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Linda M. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our bayfront location and helpful staff. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Average Stay for an Above Average Priced Room
Summary: Based on the cost of the room, I would rate our stay as simple "average". There was zero patio furniture on the room's patio to enjoy the view of the bay (which was the reason we purchased a bay view room) and were told there was nothing they could do when we called down to ask about it after check-in. We were also erroneously charged for room items post-check out and the follow-up to get these charges removed was not great. Probably wouldn't stay here again based on overall value.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Resort experience with us, Wanderer436713. We appreciate your feedback regarding the amenities in your room. We work had to ensure each guest has the best experience possible and hope to welcome you back again to show you our high levels of service standards.

Summary: I brought my husband here to celebrate his birthday and our stay was perfect’ Everyone we came in contact with was extremely helpful and friendly.  Our room was clean and beautiful. And we loved the location. Right on the water! Would definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your 5 star review with us, Sandiegoann2016. We are happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed your celebratory getaway at the Resort and that our waterfront location and kind staff made it even better. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Worst hotel experience I’ve ever had.
Summary: Terrible. Terrible. Terrible. I mean I don’t even know where to start. From the second we arrived we were not treated well. Valet was told not to put windows down in my car and before I even walked away they did it in front of me. Luckily there was no damage to the fresh tints that were installed. Once we walked in I would expect at least a smile and to be welcomed in. We payed close to $400 for the room for one night and I’ve had better service at a $60 motel. The lady at the front named Sylvia is the one who is responsible for this terrible review. She didn’t welcome me with a smile, but rather with a scowl and said “I’ll take you over here.” I thought it was pretty unprofessional but I didn’t make it a big deal. I thought I’d just smile and be nice, and maybe she would be
Manager Response: none

Summary: We loved our large room, great view of the pool area, the cleanliness, the quality of the food, the location and the pool. We had a relaxing time! It was just what we were looking for and a much needed break during this social distancing time.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review with us, jennifermr4. We are so happy to hear that you had a great getaway with us and enjoyed our spacious rooms and resort amenities. We can't wait to welcome you back again.

Summary: We stayed here in June.  Exceptional measures seemed to be taken to ensure our safety from COVID.  Main dining room was not open but the casual dining was good.  We enjoyed a delicious salmon dish.  Outdoor dining fabulous and we loved the bay view from our room balcony.  Service was attentive.  We booked a bed and breakfast package which included a dining credit for breakfast and free parking ($37 value).  Our room was comfortable and bedding was of high quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Jill B. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort, including our dining options and helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Parking and Pet fee too expensive
Summary: Loved the place but don't drive here. Parking adds too much to the bill $38/day. Plus they are pet friendly (which is great) but they charge way too much for a pet cleaning fee $150- which basically means choose another hotel (in Laguna) if you want pet friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, CarolH2011. We appreciate your feedback regarding the additional fees. Our parking is limited due to our waterfront location, and we try to ensure we are in line with other luxury resorts in the area. Our pet fee includes cleaning as well as pet amenities like a bed, bowls and treats. We hope to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: Great Property - Nice views, good food and drink
Summary: I checked in and was told that due to the Pandemic there will be NO housekeeping.  It seems to me that even though premium rates are being paid, there should still be this service or there should be some price consideration.   Then on Friday and Saturday the bar was completely packed - no social distancing, no masks, not a worry in the world about COVID-19.   So on one hand, it's very important to decrease service for the COVID cause, but on the other hand it's important to have standing room only in the bar with complete disregard for health and safety.    Doesn't make a lot of sense.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, ericbE2341SC. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location. We are limiting our housekeeping services for the time being in an effort to limit interaction between guests and staff in-room, but we do have amenities available upon request with the front desk. We appreciate your feedback regarding the bar and your experience dining. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Even though it was  a Friday and Saturday and not busy, due to reopening, the staff was not warm and welcoming. The reservationists was somewhat condescending and dismissive, and the security was very heavy-handed (knocking on the door at 10:01 saying it was now their “quiet hours “ and if the music was not turned off immediately we would be told to leave!). The pervasive attitude of the Balboa Bay staff (other than the man who delivered our luggage to the room; he was very kind) was as if they were superior to guests and we were an intrusion to their day. I don’t know why anyone would stay there more than once.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, 228kf. We appreciate your feedback regarding your experience with some staff members and will share your comments with our team. We work hard to ensure our guests are welcomed throughout the resort with smiles and helpfulness. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort to show you our high levels of service standards.

Summary: Friendly staff. Clean establishment. Perfect location close to the beach, restaurants and the mall. Family friendly with lots to do. Live music in the lobby restaurant was a nice added bonus. Will for sure be coming back
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, jgltna10. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort, especially our kind staff and waterfront location. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Beautifully maintained property in Newport Beach
Summary: The staff's concern for your safety and comfort was outstanding during a difficult transition to opening full time. The pool is large, warm and welcoming to children. Exceptionally clean rooms. The food is excellent (can be served poolside) and pricy but isn't everything. I will  be back when more of the amenities are available. COVID still has some areas of the hotel unavailable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, 74joannew. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay and the Resort and enjoyed our pool, guest rooms and dining options. We can't wait to welcome you back to Newport Beach.

Summary: Let’s start with the staff that works there. Starting with the valet parking guys, they were awesome and very polite. Always greet you when your coming and going. Open the door for you and your lady. Very well done. The staff at the front counter was very nice also. The hotel has a beautiful entrance that sits right in front of the balboa bay. I got a room with a balcony that faces the pool. The balcony was great to have for the morning and nights to sit out on. The rooms were decent size and the shower was unreal for a hotel shower. Very large shower! Overall the stay was very nice. Rooms were clean and all staff was very nice. The pool area was decent also. The price point might be a little high but overall a nice place and would definitely stay there again. Didn’t really get
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Christianslater85. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our Resort amenities and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Just got home from an amazing birthday weekend at this property.  This was our first staycation since the pandemic and they handled everything extremely well and we felt very comfortable.  We were welcomed at checkin with some birthday balloons, our room was ready and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves the whole weekend.  Service all around was great and the staff seemed genuinely happy to help in whatever it was.  From the valet, front desk to pool attendants - top notch service.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, KristyL3. We are so happy to hear that you had a great birthday weekend at the Resort and that our helpful staff were able to make it even better. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Our first hotel and getaway after months of not doing much and this resort and it’s staff was superb! From the valet to the front desk to staff all around the resort and specially Lynn at the pool (she rocks!) and Rey at the Blend pool bar. Given the circumstances and new rules we still felt and received a terrific experience and getaway! Bravo to management and staff at BBR! Can’t wait to go back for July 4th weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, tatitravels2020. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and that our helpful staff at the front desk, valet and pool were able to make it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: If you want a great way to see the Christmas Boat Parade, get a room on the water bay side with a balcony and you can watch it from your room on the 2nd or 3rd floor. It is so cool and you will be in your own private room enjoying a cocktail or whatever. Great way to get some good pic's as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, TSL313. We are happy to hear that you enjoy our bay view rooms, especially during the festivities of the Christmas Boat Parade. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful spacious room with a great view of the bay!
Summary: The room was huge and the beds were very comfortable. There was a great view of Balboa Bay. The hotel thought of everything and the service was outstanding. I would definitely recommend Balboa Bay Resort to anyone that needs a place to stay while visiting Balboa Bay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, Christian F. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort including our comfortable accommodations and waterfront views. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This was our second stay in 3 years at Balboa Bay Resort.  We stayed two nights on a quick getaway fro Ohio cold to visit our daughter. This place is classy beautiful and wonderful in every way. The location is perfect - for easy access to OCAirport and Hwy 1 and quiet and away from beach crowds yet it is on the waterway.   Dining and bar service has seating and fire tables outside on the marina. Service was excellent. The marina view rooms have private balconies overlooking the waterway where you can sit for hours watching the rowers and seals and yachts moving in and out . The king marina view room is spacious and well appointed and the bathroom is luxurious. All staff members are gracious and accommodating and valet service is the best I’ve ever experienced.   We would rather
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Jack-MK. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your Newport Beach getaway, including our waterfront views, dining options and kind staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Even though our conference was cancelled, the very friendly and accommodating staff were very helpful in providing suggestions to fill our time! The room was very clean with a modern/classic decor and the bed was very comfortable! We dined at the Waterline Restaurant on the property and we’re extremely satisfied with the quality of the food! I definitely recommend the Balboa Bay Resort for your next stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort including our dining options and comfortable accommodations. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Stayed here while visiting family.  This hotel is first class all the way. If you can stay in room 395. View on the water was outstanding. Check in was easy, room was spotless, and checkout was a breeze. Highly recommend! Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, LizH1174. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront views and had a great stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Loved our stay at the Balboa Bay Resort...it couldn’t have been nicer!  Staff was so pleasant and helpful, and our spacious room overlooking pool and courtyard lovely. We will certainly return on our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, storyteller520846. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort, including our spacious rooms and kind staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The resort is luxurious.  The staff is amazing.  The location is perfect.  The food is outstanding.  You are so welcomed and pampered.  I'd forgotten what that was like.  I had an incredible stay and can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, IslandGal03. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort, including our helpful staff, waterfront location, and dining options. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Excellent hotel, clean, nice, close to water and very friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are large and updated and nice. Gym is small but has updated new equipment. Gym is clean stocked with towels and bottled water.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, scottH1076IS. We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort, including our waterfront location and helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: I love the Balboa Bay Resort! The staff is amazing from the moment you arrive and throughout your stay. The view is stunning and the only resort in Newport with this view. Thank you for everything. We will be coming back soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Sassyblonde213. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort including our waterfront views and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I surprised my husband with this trip for his birthday. He ( & I ) was pleasantly surprised. Valet was very quick and attentive. Checking in was extremely easy. The room was clean and the view was perfect. The customer service at this resort was excellent. We had room service and we also attended that A&O bar. The food was great. We will definitely be back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your 5 star review with us, RhyBrown. We are happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed a great getaway at the Resort and that our helpful staff and dining options helped make your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wonderful room and service. Clean and bright. Recommend BBR to everyone. The front desk was very nice when I came in and the food service was great. Try AO restaurant for great drinks and food. The butter croissant at the cafe was the best I’ve ever had.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, travelfun1579. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort, including our kind staff and dining options. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel itself is nice and the location is fantastic - right on the bay, if you get a bay view room you are basically looking out at yachts and the water and you have a perfect-sized balcony to be able to watch gorgeous sunsets and sunrises. I'd honestly give it a higher rating if it weren't for our service at check in. This was probably the most uncomfortable I've ever felt checking in at any property - the woman who helped us was extremely cold and spoke in a condescending tone that made us feel like we weren't good enough to be staying there. The restaurants were described as "fine dining" and then "just...classier" with a sneer and we weren't provided any details regarding the charge on the card for incidentals or really much. We were anxious to get out of there. On top of
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Heather S. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and views. We appreciate your feedback regarding your check-in experience and room. We strive for a high level of service for every guest and will follow up with the team. We hope we can welcome you back again to wow you with our high levels of service.

Summary: Great location for a business event.  Rooms were very updated and spacious.  Dining outside next to yachts was pretty cool.  Staff was attentive and engaging.  Hotel shuttle was very accommodating, available for trips to local restaurants and beach area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, D7653CBmarkl. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your event and time at the Resort and that our waterfront location, helpful staff and amenities helped make your stay even better. We look forward to welcoming you back again for business or leisure soon!

Summary: We had a bay view king room.  Room was beautiful, clean and functional.  Breakfast at Waterline was excellent especially the green smoothie!   View from the room overlooked the bay.  Customer service was excellent.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you five star review with us, W6069FNjohns. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that the waterfront views, dining options and friendly staff made your stay great. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Booked this resort last minute. Excellent service and accommodations. Loved the location and beautiful views. Restaurants on site were great. Easy check in & check out. Definitely coming back for another stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, vam518. We are so happy to hear that you loved your stay, including our dining options and waterfront location. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Handicap shower & broken toilet paper holder
Summary: Not sure if it’s because we booked through Priceline express deals, but we did feel a little second rate here. It’s unfortunate, as we spent a good amount of money just to check in at 11pm and sleep for the night in what we expected would be a nice place.   When I googled the rooms, I saw patio doors which opened to the bay. It looked peaceful and quiet. The room we got was in the furthest corner of the hotel from the bay, closest to the street. We were surprised, when we arrived, to see we were in a room with a handicapped shower. As I was checking in, the only other lady I saw in the hotel was at the front mentioning they had just checked into their room, and they wanted to know if they could get a room with a bath tub. Sounds like they were given a handicapped room as well. I
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, wiesnerjason. We appreciate your feedback regarding your stay, as we work hard to ensure every guest has a great experience with us. We have a few different room types, with different views. The room type you reserved via Priceline was our Standard King Room, which overlooks the neighborhood; the rooms that overlook the Bay are our Bay View Rooms. Due to occupancy, some guests are placed in our ADA rooms. We apologize about the toilet paper holder not working and will ensure this is fixed. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary Heading: Terrible attitude by Balboa Bay Club
Summary: This is a negative review with regard to my stay in a Bay View room on the club side.  I had asked for a tour of the club.  A Selby Werner showed me around.  Her attitude was very “stand-offish” during the tour.  She also had told me that you needed to know somebody to become a member of the club.  I asked this question to several staff members, who denied that this was true.    I did not enjoy my stay on the club side, especially their snooty attitude.  It does not feel good to be lied to.    I am a paying guest here and do not support exclusionist attitudes.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience, 99287. We appreciate your feedback regarding your tour with our sister property, the Balboa Bay Club. They are updating their policies regarding new membership, which all employees may not be as familiar with; the membership team is the one to speak with regarding any policies. Please reach out if we can assist further.

Summary: The room we got what a downgrade from what we have reserved and paid. The light in the room was not working and we called twice but no one came to fix it. The room was dirty with someone’s dirty sock next to the bed an my 2 year old picked up and was playing with it before we noticed it. The customer service was non existent. Never coming back here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your Balboa Bay Resort experience, mariamE8145VY. We appreciate your feedback regarding the light and sock in your room and apologize for any inconvenience during your stay. We did have you in a Bay View Room, which is the room type that you booked. Our team has reached out to connect further and we hope we can welcome you back in to show you our high levels of service.

Summary: This is a beautiful property right on the bay overlooking some very impressive yachts. I spent two nights in a lovely room with a balcony over the courtyard and swimming pool. The bed was very comfortable, the room was spacious, and they give you a complementary bottle of chardonnay. We ate in the A&O cafe right on the water, and the brussels sprouts, fries, and lobster roll were delicious.   But what really makes this a five-star property is their service. While various staff members helped with directions, supplies and water bottles during out trip, it was Hector that truly went above and beyond! On the morning of my departure, my co-worker didn't show up for us to leave together. Hector called his room repeatedly, confirmed the room number for me, and when he didn't answer to
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you five star review with us, HoustonBell. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort including the comfortable accommodations, waterfront location and dining options. We are also happy to hear that our team was able to go above and beyond to ensure a positive end to your stay. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Room was nicely appointed, clean, staff extremely friendly.  I liked watching the rowing team glide by on the bay every morning and evening. Beautiful sunsets from my balcony.  A down side for my room is it was right above the pool where swim lessons happened everyday starting at 4pm.  The yelling instructors and screaming kids were a big distraction and annoying.  Luckily the complementary bottle of wine in the room helped. :)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, B2832LXjulies. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed out waterfront location and room amenities. We appreciate your feedback regarding the pool. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wow so pretty and quiet! Rooms are wonderful along Newport Beach Bay. You can Kayak or Paddle board ! Great pool and spa with masages! Great for couples get away or bring the family! Restuarants and bars are also fantastic and one of a kind!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, sirputz2017. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our amenities and dining options helped make it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Great venue and conference. This was my first experience at Balboa Resort and it was very impressive.  The conference was well planned and extremely valuable. I hope to come back when I can stay a longer time.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Earle F. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and at your conference. We hope to welcome you back again soon for business or leisure!

Summary: We had an amazing time on our staycation here! We are new parents and only get one night a year to get away. Monique made our stay unforgettable! She went above and beyond to make sure that my husband and I had the best trip possible! Thank you, Monique!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, KristenSophia. We are so happy to hear that you had a great staycation and that out helpful staff made it even better. We hope to welcome you back again for another staycation soon!

Summary: Expensive but worth every penny. Great location, great rooms. Wonderful service. Even charged my electric car for me each night. Lots of great restaurants nearby.  Super property, super service, great food.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, richarda808. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our waterfront location, spacious rooms and helpful staff helped make it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Lovely resort.  Helpful staff.   Clean and recently renovated rooms.  Good value compared to other hotels in the area.   Beds are awesome.  Quiet rooms.   Concierge and check in extremely helpful.   Walking distance to other restaurants if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Safari407576. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our helpful staff, comfortable accommodations and central location. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I only stayed one night for my anniversary, but I will come back for sure to stay at least 3 nights. Amazing environment and amazing staff. I usually do not write reviews but this place deserves the good one.  They also gave us some balloons and chocolates for our anniversary and that was really nice of them.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, 17sepidehs. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your anniversary stay with us and that our kind staff helped make it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The rooms have been nicely updated since my last stay. Service from the front desk was excellent. Hector was very nice and accommodating. I spent many nights in the hotel bar and had stellar service from Tara. She has a way of making you feel like a friend and not just a customer. I really liked the bourbon selection at the bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, TheDavidShea. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort and that our helpful staff and drink selections made your stay even better. We look forward to welcoming you back again!

Summary: Came to the Balboa Bay Resort for a work function!  Love the atmosphere and the rooms are amazing! The food catered for the seminars was DELICIOUS!!! I have come before in Winter months!  Need to come for a summer time trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, mechelle899. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your work event at the Resort and that our comfortable rooms helped make your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon for business or leisure.

Summary: Paulina was so helpful during my stay.  5 stars!!  Hote also offers some good dining options.  It has a beautiful view on the water. Will definitely be back here again.  Has the best views for the annual boat parade.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, 585julianc. We are so happy to hear that our waterfront location, helpful staff and dining options made your stay at the Resort great. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: A very nice hotel near UC Irvine
Summary: Huge rooms: easily 600 square feet and on the water. Superb bar: great drinks, great service, live music on Saturday night. Perfect coffee shop: great coffee and breakfast items. Yummy room service: ordered the cheese platter then ordered it again. Superb staffing: the desk clerk arranged for a free drink while our room was being readied, the bar staff did everything right and everyone else treated us well and with dispatch.  Made a reservation for our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, matthewgrimm. We are so glad that our spacious rooms, amenities, dining options and kind staff helped make your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Charger at night stand was busted and broken.  None of the doors in our room would shut with out slamming them.  At 6:30 am on Saturday morning staff was dragging and slamming chairs right outside of our room.  Visited the gym three times and all three time the tub of wipes was empty. I called the front desk the first time and they were to bring some down, this never happened.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, 372bretth. We appreciate your feedback regarding the gym, early morning noise and charging station. We work hard to ensure each guests has a great experience at the Resort and apologize for any inconvenience you encountered. We hope to welcome you back to show you our high standards of service.

Summary: The hotel is very nice. The rooms are very spacious with all of the amenities you want in a great hotel. The food at the hotel is great. The pricing was great to have a room on the water. I would recommend this location for events.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, bobfQ6808RT. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our amenities, dining options and waterfront views helped make your stay even better. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Service at the Balboa Bay Resort is top grade from the valet, to the front desk, to room service, to housekeeping.  All courteous, efficient, knowledgeable, and ready and able to help every guest.  The food is good in the room or in the restaurants.  The pool is excellent, as is the work out area.  This resort is a wonderful place to find peace and relaxation---even on work travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review with us, Michael W. We are glad to her that our helpful staff, dining options and amenities helped make your stay great. We look forward to welcoming you back for work or leisure again soon!

Summary: Beautiful hotel on the water!  The staff is incredibly friendly, especially Paulina!  I enjoyed my stay so much!  My favorite hotel in Newport!  Attention to detail and nice little extras (bottle of wine and water in the room)!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, ATomasino. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our waterfront location and helpful staff made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I have to admit I was very impressed by this hotel/resort. It was impeccably clean and beautifully furnished, tasteful yet comfortable. Service was great and the entire experience left me thinking we got a good value.  We had a Bay view room and I highly recommend it. For the added cost it was well worth it, not only for the water and boats but also for the incredible sunsets. Our balcony deck was well utilized, even in January.  The room was so comfortable and a perfect size for two people. The bathroom was very large with two sinks, a shower and deep soaking tub (well used by me) and a separate toilet compartment room.  Water was replenished each day and the complimentary welcome bottle of wine was appreciated.   The location is so easy to get around to all the Newport Beach
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review with us, TomBOak. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront views, helpful service and amenities. We appreciate your feedback regarding turn down service and the bathroom and will ensure our team is made aware. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Great spot, friendly staff, def recommend
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a staycation for her birthday and we had plans to see a movie, but it was sold out. The staff (Stephan) sent complimentary popcorn and snacks to our room — so nice!   The pool is great, bar is fun, and there’s a town car that will take you around town within 2 miles.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, jacobr181. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your staycation and that our helpful staff were able to make your evening memorable! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Poor customer service. My boyfriend and I had a long night of trying to figure out our reservation for the night through booking.com, when we got here the lady was incredibly rude.. told us she was way too busy for us and wouldn’t help us out in anyway, I had to have the bookings guy call her 2 or 3 times before she finally helped us out and we were sitting right next to her in the lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review with us, alexcinah. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with your booking via Booking.Com. As this is a third party site, we cannot change reservations made from these sites, and our staff does the best they can to assist and make sure everything is taken care of. We hope to welcome you back again to the Resort.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Location and Great Concierge: But Poor Service
Summary: I was very much looking forward to staying at this resort as it came highly recommended to me. And the location and facility are amazing. The concierge service was among the best I’ve encountered even in 5 star hotels.   However, the service (aside from the concierge) was atrocious. My second night there, a very loud party occurred above my room starting at 5pm. It went on all night, and in spite of repeated calls to the front desk, nothing was done for three hours, after I first called at midnight. At one point, I couldn’t even reach the front desk. I’m just glad there was no emergency as I couldn’t reach anyone for an hour.  Additionally, when I reported it the next morning after spending almost $400 for a night with no sleep, I was offered only a token apology. No discount,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, MT94110. We are happy to hear that our concierge was able to make your stay more enjoyable. We apologize for any inconvenience regarding the party above your room. We hope that after speaking with our team further you feel the issue has been heard and more resolved. We hope we can welcome you back again soon and show you our high level of service standards.

Summary: Great View of the Bay Everything you need, with a smile! And handy to everything, especially, Louies by the Bay. Congrats Ron and Pierre. Booth by the window the best dining spot in the area. Balboa Bay Resort only gets better and better. Room Service food excellent and quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, jbertstuft. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront views, kind staff and dining options. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I felt welcomed by Hector when I first checked in..! It felt very positive energy with the front desk.  The front desk team was very nice and helpful.  The security even helped me find my room.  I most definitely would love to stay here in future.   5 star customer service. .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Rissaditto. We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort and that our helpful staff helped make it even better. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: We loved staying at the Balboa Bay Resort. The staff is incredible. The hotel is beautiful and been redone. Victoria who served us a delicious breakfasts was the best waitress ever. We can’t wait to come back. Also beautiful views of the marina and right on the water.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, TorhazSanFrancisco. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort, and that our helpful staff and waterfront location made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Nice but out of the way resort.
Summary: We had a pleasant 5 night stay between Christmas & NYE.  The property will shuttle you to the surrounding attractions otherwise you do need a car as there are no restaurants or shops within walking distance.  Disappointed that bar menu was cut down for the holidays. Open or close, I don't care but if you are open then please be full service for the guests.  Found bar & restaurant staff to be very cool and not approachable so we did not use either after the first night.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, BariusBeerhunter. We appreciate your feedback regarding your dining experience and apologize for any inconvenience. There was a smaller food menu offered during the holiday period. There are some classic Newport Beach restaurants within a 15 minute walk of the Resort, but our complimentary shuttle does run within a 2 mile radius for guests looking to go to Lido Island or the surrounding areas. We hope to welcome you back again and show you our high levels of service.

Summary: Great location and lovely rooms at the Balboa Bay Resort and club.   It is conveniently located in Newport Beach and within walking distance to restaurants, boat rentals and Balboa Island.  Would highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, BrendaFitch. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the Resort's waterfront location and amenities. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wonderful property. Large, spacious room on  the water with a private porch. Friendly staff. I was most comfortable and slept great! I enjoyed staying here and would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Orange County
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, PR10024. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort including our spacious rooms, waterfront location and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: I wish I could delete my previous 5* review
Summary: I wish there was a way to delete my previous 5-star review on Balboa Bay Resort... I've stayed at this resort multiple times, I've raved about it, I know many of the staff members by name (see previous review), the resort has even used my previous stay's Instagram post on their own social media!!! I am typically a walk-in client & have always had a pleasant stay and traveled WITH my pet.   This time around, upon arrival, I was greeted by the rudest check-in agent--Katherine or something...who refused to even pull up my profile from previous stays, and remained adamant that I would not be able to stay at the hotel that evening despite availability, given her presumption that my pet was over the “30lb weight-restriction...” True he was, however… I have always assumed the 50lb
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, MTR879. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced while looking for accommodations. We are happy to welcome dogs under 35lbs, as stated online on our FAQs page, per our dog policy. Unfortunately we are unable to accommodate larger dogs, but do try to recommend local accommodations that could assist. We would be happy to connect further about your experience, if you could give the Resort a call.

Summary: My fiancé and I came this weekend for the boat parade and we had such an amazing experience! The Balboa Bay Resort is the perfect spot to watch the parade because of the inviting ambiance and all the cute Christmas decorations up during this time of the year! We will definitely be back next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Mgallegos14. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort and that our decor and vibe helped make your stay even better. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: I'm a professional event planner and have stayed at a lot of resorts and hotels due to my job. Kudos to Balboa Bay Resort management for hiring Angela as their concierge. Immediately upon entering the property, she greeted myself and my two boys, asked us what we needed and offered her services. It was so wonderful to have that be our first impression of the property!  Many four and five star resorts don't have the "right type" of concierges that are as warm, friendly and knowledgeable as Angela.   The valet and bell staff should be commended as well.   Good job!!!  I highly recommend staying here. Beautiful room and amenities.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, April25thdesign. We are so happy to hear that our helpful staff made your stay a great experience. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Fantastic place and pleasant staff who are warm and welcoming and make you feel at home! Big thanks to Becca and Monique and all the staff who spoiled and pampered us.  We will be back next year!!      Thanks!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Woodward24. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our helpful staff made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again!

Summary: We recently visited to enjoy the boat parade and the property and service was just stunning. Balboa Bay Club is the best place for the holidays and can’t wait to return for a stay in the summer months. Definitely the place to be. Thanks for an amazing holiday party, one for the books!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Nicklo92. We are happy to hear that you had a great time at the Resort for the Boat Parade and holiday experiences. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Thank you Everything was wonderful and an excellent location to enjoy the boat parade! We miss a Merry Christmas to all!!! Peace on earth and Good will to all!   The Balboa Bay Club is such a wonderful place to enjoy the holiday!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, 194SusanM. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the holiday at the Resort. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Overall we really enjoyed our visit! One of our favorite experiences with hotels so far. Only bummer was that the room was a little cold, but the service was outstanding and really made us get into the holiday spirit!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review with us, Doodlemomforlife. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our helpful staff made it even better. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The staff at all levels of this resort were great to work with. We hold events at this report as well as stay on a personal level. The catering and sales staff are great to work with and the customer service is excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, tfreeley. We are so happy to hear that you enjoy both your business and leisure time at the Resort and that our kind staff is able to make your time with us even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Clean and relaxing. Nice location. The staff were super welcoming and helpful, particularly Paulina was extremely kind at check out. Would recommend!!! Thanks for the excellent hospitality and we’re already looking forward to coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, 582laurenu. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wow! This hotel is beautifully decorated for the holiday season! My family and I visited Balboa Bay Resort for the Christmas tree lightning and my whole family was impressed. From start to finish, the valet showed excellent service and Luiza at the front desk made us feel welcome when we had a few questions. I would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Vacationgorl. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our Christmas Tree Lighting Ceremony and that our kind staff made you and your family feel welcome. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Lovely Time at the Christmas Tree Lighting
Summary: I had such a fantastic time at the tree lighting! Not only was it gorgeous, but the staff was incredible. Chatted with Luiza, who was kinda enough to answer all my questions. I know it is silly to say (maybe not) but I also need to mention the valet. They were so attentive! I will definitely be back to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review with us, E4375EPcourtneym. We are so glad to hear that you had a great time at our Tree Lighting ceremony and that our kind staff made it even more enjoyable. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Wow the staff was so kind and genuine while the hotel is beautiful and comfortable. I really enjoyed the small balcony overlooking the pool and keurig coffee machine just made me so happy when I woke up.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, PFflyer069. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort including our room amenities and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I was recently at the Balboa Bay Resort for a holiday business dinner and was very impressed. The holiday decor and exceptional service from friendly staff made our group feel welcomed. I will definitely be back in the near future. Thank you for making our visit memorable!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, BiCoastalCEO. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort this holiday season and that our helpful staff made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent experience and great front desk
Summary: Awesome property with great staff.  Hecter at front desk provided us with exceptional help during our stay at the property.  Housekeeping staff is very attentive.  Good location and close to many Newport attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, ajoys855. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel while we went to a company Christmas party and dinner. This hotel has been the chosen location for at least the last three years. The bed was comfortable; clean room; quiet; bellman Dylan was very good; Haley at trhe fromt desk was absolutely fantastic, both on the phone and in person- thanks, Haley!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Jaybirdtahoe. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your holiday party and stay at the Resort, including our comfortable beds and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here and the service and staff were some of the best if not the best we’ve ever had. Shout out to Timothy the front desk manager who  just happen to check us in and to Emily the concierge‘s but honestly everyone was superior. The resort itself was beautiful and really really clean with a beautiful pool and a beautiful view over looking the yachts while sitting on your patio!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Pcgeorgia. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort, especially our pool, waterfront views and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed in this resort after reading through the TA reviews and we couldn't be happier Great location, the staff very helpful. The valet service very efficient. We definitely will come back and will recommend this resort
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, 407davidm407. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your trip to Newport Beach and that our waterfront location and helpful staff made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My husband and I had a nonprofit conference in Irwin, California and decided to come in a couple of days early to unwind at The Balboa Bay Resort. We had one of two corner Bay View Suites overlooking the bay, with two balconies, sitting area, table for 4, mini bar and sink area, 1/2 guest bath, and enormous separate MB and bath containing two sinks, separate seated cosmetic area and a  walk in closet. A lounge chaise and two large chairs were also in the MB. The suite was easily over 1,000 square feet. Absolutely beautiful. We saw the rowing teams daily go by at various times which was fun to watch. The valet parking fee is $35 a night, or you can self park in the back, but the resort still charges $30 for that lot. We thought this was a  little steep considering we had a Suite
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, cjh302. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort and that you enjoyed our luxurious accommodations, dining options and recreation activities. Our parking charges are the same for all guests, and we work hard to keep our prices consistent with other waterfront resorts in the area. We can't wait to welcome you back to Newport Beach again soon!

Summary: This is a greta place to stay and the service is excellent. Location is very good. Avoid eating in the hotel if you can because the restaurants are very expensive and are good not great. If you have a car it costs $32 per day to self park or $37 for valet parking so factor that into the cost of your trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, PhilipJepson. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort, including our waterfront location and helpful staff. We appreciate your feedback regarding your dining experience and parking. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Thank you for making our family Thanksgiving wonderful.  Each staff member went out of their way to accommodate us.  The property was clean, beautiful and exactly what we had hoped for.  Thank you for making our Thanksgiving memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, 580pagem. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your Thanksgiving at the Resort and that our helpful staff made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Went here with my wife for a black tie fundraiser. We had never been to the property prior to this and decided to get a room the night of the event. We had no expectations as we haven’t heard much about the resort but it was a fantastic experience. Check in was seamless and the rooms were tastefully done / appeared to have been recently remodeled. The bed/pillows were very comfortable and the overall ambiance of the resort was spot on. We usually stay at the Montage or Monarch Beach Resort for our staycations but we will be visiting this property in the near future for our next one.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, travelnstyl. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your event and stay with us, including our comfortable and up-to-date accommodations. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Our go to place when visiting family.  Rooms big, beds comfortable, bathrooms nice.  Service very good,professional and friendly.  Room service for breakfast great and casual restaurant always good. Pool area large and you can find a quiet spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review with us, 363rr. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations, helpful staff and dining options during your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My wife and I enjoyed  a romantic weekend away and thoroughly enjoyed this resort. Rooms were gorgeous. Recommend bay view. Waterfront restaurant twas beyond delicious. The staff were very accomodating and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, mindylyles. We are happy to hear that you and your wife had a nice getaway at the Resort and enjoyed our Bay views, dining options and helpful staff. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: We love staying at Balboa Bay Resort. It’s so close to John Wayne Airport and minutes from the beaches and shopping. The staff is happy, friendly and very accommodating. This is our third time staying here and it’s become a second home for us!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Coastal743366. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your business trip to Newport Beach and your stay at the Resort. We look forward to welcoming you back again for business or leisure!

Summary Heading: No sleep here but Great social place
Summary: PROS:  Nicely upgraded hotel rooms. Waterline restaurant and service for breakfast is wonderful! Views of marina and beautiful yachts at back of hotel are stunning! Great place to get together for drinks and food in outside patios (service good too).  CONS:  Although the rooms look nice on the inside there is a sound barrier problem between the first floor and second floor; that is, if you're on the first floor you can hear people stomping above you at all hours of the night (if  you have a noisy group above). We could not get a good nights sleep here.  Although restaurant staff were all great, front desk staff was not helpful at all when we asked for help to stop the noise above us. They just said they went upstairs and stood in front of the door and heard nothing. Really?
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Vancouver_TrueFoodie. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Bay views and dining options and appreciate your feedback regarding the noise of the floor above you and your pool experience. We do hope to welcome you back again to show you our high service standards.

Summary: The decor, especially for the holidays, is gorgeous.  The lobby is welcoming.  The two bars; one with music and menu, the other quiet bar, are both beautiful.  There is terrace dining at the first bar/restaurant.  When considering a location to impress your guests, this is the location.  Easy access from Pacific Coast Highway.  Valet parking is available.  The Resort is on the water with beautiful yachts parked in front.  Very impressive yet comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Michele C. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort including our holiday decor, waterfront dining options and waterfront location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Location is great, and great service. Hotel is updated and the hotel employees were great. A bit disappointed in follow up when we called down to request a couple things that never showed. Waterline restaurant was the only real disappointment as we stayed for about 5 minutes. Super loud and obnoxious table inside made everyone head outside. The wait staff gave zero cares about our gluten free requests. Explaining that we had to fly home the next day and didn’t want to be sick he was very nonchalant and shrugged his shoulders. I am not going to drop $400 on someone who doesn’t care.  Other than that, I would stay here again. One bad personal doesn’t define our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Austintraveler45. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and amenities. We appreciate your feedback regarding your experience at Waterline and hope to welcome you back again soon to show you our high service standards.

Summary: We chose to have my Aunt's memorial service at the Balboa Bay Club/Resort and the level of customer service/ event coordinating provided by Rachel Reitkopp was off the chart. She went above an beyond to make sure that the event was perfect for our friends and family. Always mindful that we were in a state sorrow, she handled every detail without hesitation. The food was delicious and the location was beautiful! During the event I became ill and was hospitalized later that evening. When Rachel found out I was hospitalized she actually showed up with flowers to see me! UNBELIEVABLE ... I am still blown away by her!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Danalynn1118. We are so glad to hear that our kind staff were able to assist in making your Celebration of Life a lovely event. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort again in the future.

Summary: This hotel/resort has been around for a very long time. They have managed to not just maintain it but upgrade it through the years so it is contemporary. I've never been a big fan of the hotels on Coast Highway because you don't have many options to walk to. Everything is either taxi or car. However, as a destination point the hotel was great. The rooms are spacious and very nice and clean. The rooms have balconies. The service is very good as well. There is an interior pool/courtyard which is a great place to relax.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you Balboa Bay Resort experience, StationToStation. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort, and that our central location, spacious rooms and accommodations. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: So I was in town for a wedding and didn’t really know where I wanted stay but I decided that balboa bay resorts may fit my needs. As soon as I got to the front desk I was greeted by a young lady by the name of Becca, she was amazing. This girl knows everything about the town of Newport. Not only did she give us basically an overview of all the amenities she recommend places to eat and play. We are getting on the plane now and my lady just told me that she had the best time at the resort.  Next time I’m in town I hope I get Becca again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Jean P. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort and that our helpful staff were able to make it even better! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I believe this is my 4th time staying at this property, and it consistently is a great stay. Quiet, spacious rooms, comfortable beds, and a fabulous shower.  I've stayed in rooms with a harbor view, pool view, and no view. Breakfast, either by room service or in Waterline, is delicious, as are the options at the A&O kitchen for a casual dinner. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, AmyR3806. We are so happy to hear that you've enjoyed your stays at the Resort and that our amenities, dining options and comfortable accommodations have made them even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My stay was great. I love there service from the morning off my first night when I got a text letting me know I can reach out if I have any questions or needs. The restaurants are great, and the coffee shop makes great coffee and protein bars.   I will definitely come back again if the opportunity arises.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, yourlegacymatters. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and that our amenities made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Just arrived for a conference that starts tomorrow. My first impression upon checking in was that the staff is genuinely friendly. I’d like to give a shout out to front desk team members Becca and Timothy and also to server at A&O restaurant Pamela.  My stay will be short but as the saying goes “you only get one chance to make a good first impression” and they did!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, IndustryShrink. We are happy to hear that your business trip is going well so far and that our helpful staff have helped make it great. We hope to welcome you back again for business or leisure soon!

Summary: Stayed here for the weekend nice rooms & beautiful resort! Want to shout out to Caesar who brought me balloons & champagne in the morning!!! And shout out to Becca who we loved made our stay fun and comfortable and she went the extra mile! And Jason thank you for getting the coffee beans for our sambuka!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, kventura. We are so glad that you had a great birthday weekend and that our helpful staff made it even more enjoyable! We can't wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property and great view from A&O
Summary: Visited the hotel for a girls day out and had a great time at A&O.  Service was wonderful from start to finish.  All of the staff from valet to front desk to management was outstanding.  I will definitely go again to try out some different food and drinks on the A&O menu and to take in the wonderful view!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, sssallyj1005. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your girls' day at the Resort and at A&O Kitchen+Bar. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Fantastic property; excellent service; great location. Most peaceful night in a spacious room and comfortable and cozy bed. Plenty of space to do work or relax.  Includes an area for coffee or drinks; bathroom has nice amenities- love the black “makeup” towel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, deniselondrie. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and enjoyed our waterfront location, amenities and comfortable accommodations. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!
