Summary: We had a fabulous lunch visit to A & O. Timothy greeted us immediately in the lobby and escorted us to the outdoor restaurant patio. It was our first visit. Our server,I think her name was Liz, was very attentive and friendly. We felt very welcome. Food was mediocre, which was a bit surprising for the price. Cheese board and cherry gelato pie was the highlight of our menu items. Valet staff and front desk clerks were very friendly. Great view on patio for lunch.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your lunch experience with us, Debbie K. We are so glad to hear that our kind staff and waterfront views helped make your time at the Resort even better. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Attentive service. Beautiful property. Comfortable rooms.
Summary: The staff at the Balboa Bay Club resort is outstanding. From the valet to the bellman to the registration staff to the restaurant servers to the room service staff, everyone made us feel welcome. The property is beautiful, and the rooms are very comfortable. We love it, and will be back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review of Balboa Bay Resort with us, Justin464. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our helpful staff and amenities made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: My daughter and I came to have a few days together and visit some family. The Hotel was beautiful. We had a beautiful spacious room with a bay view. The staff was very attentive to all our needs. I was very impressed with every aspect of our stay and enjoyed our stay. I would highly recommend this resort if you are coming to OC for a visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, Explore6189. We are so happy to hear that you and your daughter had a great stay at the Resort and enjoyed our waterfront location and helpful staff! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I was completely overtaken by the beauty of the property upon checkin.  Wonderful staff and everyone was accommodating.  I was originally booked in a regular room but was upgraded to a top floor marina view when I tried to book a second night upon arrival.  For a small upcharge fee I was able to keep the same room for both nights during one of their peak nights.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, lisarI7839BL. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your getaway and our bay views. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: This resort is a reminder of what elegance and quality used to be for travelers. Terrific blend of warm hospitality and professional efficiency.  At every turn--check in, restaurant, in room dining, fitness center, valet, they were top notch!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, taylor3853. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed all of our amenities and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again for another great stay.

Summary Heading: My watch was stolen from my room while it was being made up
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Balboa Bay Resort the last week in September. It's a beautiful time of the year to spend in the Newport Beach area and this was the third time in the last handful of years that we've stayed there this time of year. The first afternoon we were there, I left my Apple Watch on the nightstand, on its charger, while my wife and I were at the pool. We were there about 2.5 hours and when we returned to the room my watch was gone. After the usual moment of confusion, I remembered that I had the "find my ...." app on my phone. I fired it up and sure enough, it showed my watch in another part of the hotel. Unfortunately, it was quite a ways from our room and it took me about 15 minutes to walk the halls and determine that my watch was in a service kitchen area
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, John T. Our team has left a follow up voice message for you and would love to connect. Please reach out to the team so we can discuss further.

Summary: Excessive resort and parking fees - $75/day. Housekeeping broke my $180 Sonicare toothbrush and waived $64 in parking fees.The location and amenities were OK. The Waterline restaurant is unremarkable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Noel C. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your  stay. Our Guest Services team has reached out to discuss further. Our Resort Fee includes WiFi, in room amenities including water, a Keurig, and a signature bottle of wine, as well as access to our fitness center and more. We do have valet and self parking available for guests, and due to our waterfront location parking is limited, but our pricing is in line with others in the area. We do hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: This was a great spot for a business conference. Food, service and accommodations were all top notch! Meals were top notch, room and amenities exceeded expectations. I will definitely be booking another stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us, Drew L. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your conference with us and that our amenities, dining and accommodations made your stay even better! We can't wait to welcome you back again for leisure or business!

Summary: We were provided with excellent service. We arrived at 9:30am with check in not being until 4:00pm They held our bags and provided water and balloons for our children. We were able to check into our room at 11:30 am with a free bottle of wine and more water waiting. They also had a crib set up for our youngest.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Annie H. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort and that our helpful staff and amenities made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We have been lucky on our last few trips to get a suite in the main building but this time was over in the member area. Its still beautiful but the view and the room isnt quite up to the hotel side. I wouldnt spend the same money for this side again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us, richarda808. We appreciate your feedback regarding your experience on the Member side of the Resort. We do our best to ensure that guests are given the best rooms possible and accommodate any requests. We hope we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My eighth visit & I’m already planning my return!!!!  Special shout out to the marvelous staff and particularly Becca Willis… Yoga on the lawn is a nice new addition…   We also enjoyed paddleboard and kayaking.   Colin always has a smile to greet you upon arrival. The rooms are comfortable & the hotel is in an excellent location- looking forward to seeing you all again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Suzzywalsh. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our amenities and that our helpful staff made your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Had the pleasure of spending two nights here. Very quiet and comfortable beds. The housekeeping was also some of the best we've encountered. They really went the distance with service. So many 5 star hotels have failed in this department. Turn downs were convenient and thorough. (Ice in the room, new supplies etc...) It's a convenient easy location in Orange County. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, LagunaGypsy. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and that our comfortable beds and friendly staff made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We went for lunch in their restaurant. Best service EVER! Very accommodating with allergies. Delicious food. Accommodated all of our weird requests, including adding seared tuna to the Cobb Salad. The halibut BLT was scrumptious.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Tartlett. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your lunch at Waterline Newport Beach and that the team was able to make it great. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Victoria what a great service you made my weekend! Please come and get a wonderful service by Victoria. I really enjoy my food, shrimp, fruit and of course mimosas! I had a good time and experience.!!!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review of Waterline Newport Beach at Balboa Bay Resort. We are so happy to hear that you had a great time dining with us and that Victoria made it even better. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I just returned from a work trip at this resort. I have a rare disease and some allergies that make travel a challenge, and my job, which I love, requires that I travel. The staff at this hotel made accommodations for me that made it much more manageable. I had a wonderful experience. Nick Willette was our primary contact, and I cannot say enough about his kindness and hospitality.  The staff at our catered meals were also wonderful, fun, and seemed genuinely concerned with making sure everyone had what they needed and had a good time. I had an AC issue when I arrived, and they fixed it immediately. Everyone, from the person who fixed my AC to the people at the coffee shop was lovely. Shout out to Hector (I hope I got his name right!) is pleasant and cheerful even at 3 AM. The
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, suzieboston. We are so happy to hear that you had a great experience at the Resort and that our helpful staff and catering team helped make it even more enjoyable. We can't wait to welcome you back for business or leisure soon!

Summary: Im not one to typically review , but based off my recent experience here I felt the need to do so . This past weekend I chose to give Balboa bay a try rather then my usual spot. My overall experience was not very impressive , to me it felt like a general lack of care for the customer. When you stay at a highly rated resort you would expect the service to match that, It did not. I had heard good things about this place from friends staying here in the past, but I did not get the hype. I will not be returning to Balboa Bay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: 5 stars across the board. From the staff to meals, accommodations and location, you really feel at home in your own private resort. The Eggs Benedict for, then the Steak and Avocado salad for dinner were absolutely perfect. Oh, also try Whisky Wednesday's, if there mid-week. YUMMY!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, Cliffhenley. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort, including our helpful staff and dining options! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: I was very impressed by the Balboa Bay Resort and stayed there for a conference. I thought my room was actually nicer than the photos, with premium finishings and special touches. My room was in the Bay Club building and overlooked the bay and beach. Being a weekend, we had a very lively crowd, but once I closed my balcony door, it was serenely quiet. The bathroom was huge - about 15' long with a huge soaking tub and separate toilet room. Towels were plush and plentiful. There was a free Keurig in the room and complimentary Evian with the turn down service (yes, they offered turn down and also refreshed all of the towels!)  I found the staff to be warm and welcoming and food was exceptional. I had lunch by the pool, and another meal at A&O by the water - both were wonderful with
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, Reldim. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort and enjoyed our amenities, dining options, waterfront views and helpful staff! We can't wait to welcome you back for business or leisure again soon.

Summary: I was in Newport Beach for a conference, and unfortunately (or so I thought) the hotel where the conference was being held was entirely booked up. Enter the Balboa Bay--maybe the best thing that's ever happened to me on a work trip! I arrived to Newport 10 hours later than expected because of a flight cancellation, and since I was flying in from the East Coast, I think I'd been in travel mode for something like 20 hours by the time I dragged myself into the lobby around midnight (on my time, anyway). The front desk staff could not have been nicer, and I was able to head straight to my super comfy, super nice room on the top floor. (The hotel was very kind to accommodate my request for a higher floor, as a woman traveling alone for work I'm usually not comfortable staying in a
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, IsabellaCrane. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort and that our helpful staff, room amenities and dining options made your tough travel worth it! We can't wait to welcome you back for an even more relaxing getaway soon!

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort is a beautiful place to visit. Had a great time with family and friends. The conceigne Dominique she did a great job of making our stay here great. The time I pulled up the valet staff was friendly,walked into the hotel was greeted with a warm hello by the check in staff also by Dominique. Visited the pool ordered food the sales clerk was a little rude but the other clerks were nice. Had plans for the night and the next day Dominique made sure our agenda went as planned. We had a great time will come back and recommend this resort to family  and friends and tell them to ask for the conceigne Dominique the one with the friendly personality. I watched her interact with other guest while waiting for my room to get ready everyone she spoke to left with a smile and
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Denise M. We are so happy to hear that you had a great getaway at the Resort and that our helpful staff were able to make it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Great hotel. Horrible self parking system. It’s a hassle every time you come and go due to taking a ticket each time. This needs to be fixed with a system that’s lets you come and go with a room key or something similar.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, johnkC6440UR. We appreciate your feedback regarding the self-parking system and apologize for any inconvenience this caused during your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: My stay here was fabulous. From when I walked in being greeted my Dominique and the staff pouring wine. To my pool side appetizers. The staff the views of the water was top notch. Thank you Balboa bay for hiring such great people to be the face for your establishment. Special thanks to Dominique for giving me awesome suggestion to dining and nightlife locations. Xoxo ❤️
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, A1realrussell. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our helpful staff and waterfront location made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Top notch facility and amenities. Secure and safe. Truly lives up to entrance placard that states “...best in the world”.  Pool area amazing, morning yoga was great, paddle board the bay, and every day is an amazing car show. Will return again and recommend to family and friends. Well done.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, Zachary C. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay including our amenities and waterfront location. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We arrived for one night of a cousin's getaway.  Booked a double Queen with a full bay view.  The room was having electrical issues so they graciously upgraded to a very large suite, previously occupied by Tim McGraw.  Tiny partial bay view but very large so why not!  Everything seemed to be going well until room service arrived.  Unacceptable presentation.  Dried up spaghetti and Turkey balls.  No sauce and horribly overcooked.  Turkey sandwich with thick slabs of processed turkey meat.  Stale bread to boot.  Really surprising.  The server set the table beautifully and was very kind.  But we still had to call and inform the kitchen and they offered to re-make the items.  We graciously declined ad they removed the charges, which was the right thing to do.   So when I say MIXED
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Deborah R. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our bay views, friendly staff and breakfast at Waterline. We appreciate your feedback about your room service experience and have addressed it with the team. We hope to welcome you back to Newport Beach soon.

Summary Heading: Always a great place to stay and right on the water.
Summary: Good restaurant and bar scene.  Hotel services are always first class and they will go out of their way to assist with any questions or services you may need.  Parking attendants are always prompt with your car.   I'm running out of things to say so I will end this with saying it's really a nice place to stay with a great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us, Tom H. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay and enjoyed our waterfront locations, helpful staff and dining options. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I had a view of the parking lot and was next to a very noisy PCH. Room was small and the mattress was awful. Not impressed and very disappointed. No on was at the desk to check me in. No one answered at the front desk when I called to ask about parking. I was supposed to get a reciprocity discount which I did not get.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Accomodations and Super Friendly Service
Summary: My wife and I really enjoyed our stay at the Balboa Bay Resort. The room was spacious, comfortable and nicely designed. The walk in closet was a nice touch, along with the super huge bathroom, tub and shower area. There was plenty of natural light that gave the room a very warm feel. We received excellent, friendly and helpful service from every resort staff member we encountered. The Concierge, Emily, was particularly helpful in helping us to set up activities to do during our stay. And lastly, the location of the resort was convenient in terms of having close access to many of the attractions and sights around Newport Beach. Staying at the Balboa Bay Resort made our vacation a most enjoyable one.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort review, MycoEJ. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our spacious accommodations, kind staff and waterfront location made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: When we checked in I specifically requested a room  in a quiet area.   Our room was a  bay view king room on the third floor. I was surprised to see what turned out to be  the members only balboa bay club  directly below us.  It was full of families who were having a good time but included kids screaming and loud music.  It was not enjoyable  to sit on our balcony or to have the door open.  I think it is unconscionable not to disclose this to us. Our room also  had an adjoining (not real solid)door with a gap big enough to let light through from the other room, like a night light. This gap also allowed all of the sound from the next room in.  The first night girls returning from a wedding after midnight and continuing the party in their room woke us up. The staff sent someone to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Ellygr. We appreciate your feedback regarding the noise level outside of your room from the pool and the noise from your neighbors. We work hard to make sure all guests feel comfortable and taken care of during their stay, and apologize if this was not up to standard during your stay. We would love to connect further to talk about your experience. We do hope to welcome you back again to show you our high standards of service.

Summary: Great place to stay to unwind.  Staff was exceptional and everything was spotless.  Awesome 😎.  Would certainly come back again.  The drinks were stiff and the food was amazing.  From the bartender, the wait staff, room service, valet staff & everyone was happy and aiming to please.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, HELLi-Pilot. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our helpful staff and your dining experience made it even better. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Spent two weeks at the Balboa Bay resort while we were waiting to move into our new house. We got a great rate and room considering the duration that we stayed at the hotel. The rooms are remodeled and nicely decorated. Staff were friendly and got to know them over the course of our stay. I would suggest getting a room with a view of the ocean or pool (we had a pool view). The highway rooms (overlooking PCH) is a bit noisy. The hotel switched us to a much better room and we were very happy.   The location is great and in walking distance of many restaurants. There are food options in the hotel as well, if you don't feel like leaving. A&O kitchen was my go-to. They did to-go options so I could have food upstairs. They don't do room service however.   I loved that the hotel is
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Stephanie P. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort, including our waterfront location, dining options, dog friendly amenities and kind staff! We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The service at this hotel is some of the best I've ever experienced.  Every single employee that we came across was beyond nice (with the exception of the pool cabana manager, more on that later).  My friends and I booked a weekend getaway.  The deal we got included a two hour rental for a duffy that included a cheese plate and a bottle of wine, and a poolside cabana.  The cost was totally worth it.  The grounds were well kept, lobby beautiful with wine welcoming us when we got there. From the servers, to the bell boys, to the front desk, everybody was amazing.  Deanna at the restaurant was awesome and super friendly.  Mitch and Justin were our servers at the pool, and they were both amazing.  Niels explained to us how to use a duffy, and he was training somebody named Connor,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, 381MichelleW381. We are so happy to hear that many of our helpful employees were able to make your weekend getaway even better! We are also glad to hear that you loved your Duffy boat excursion and dining experience. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We’ve been fortunate to have stayed at just about every high end hotel in Southern California.  Some of the rates in prime season especially Newport Coast can really get expensive and you just don’t feel like shelling out that kind of money for a weekend trip.  I reluctantly booked a weekend trip to visit friends in the area while we traveled up from San Diego.  I was very positively surprised.  This hotel is really an offshoot or secondary to the local’s private beach club, boating, work out facilities and restaurant.  This isn’t the most exclusive club in Newport but respectable and the members are higher end which dictates the service standard of the hotel.    The rooms were nice, large, had a deck with view.    If you are looking to be “in the right area” but not willing to
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, CEU4040. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and our large rooms and waterfront location. We are proud to have the Balboa Bay Club as our sister property next to the Resort. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Went out of their way to make the stay wonderful!
Summary: We were placed in a room overlooking the Bay Club pool which is filled with screaming children of the parents who belong to the club.  Being older guests of the resort, this was not a good fit to say the least.  We contacted reception and told them we would try for 24 hours and then let them know if we needed to change.  To our surprise Paulina Gonzalez contacted us with a room change to the Resort building.  Amazing!  No need to let her know what our decision was at the 24 hour mark.  She took it on to make sure we were going to be happy no matter what.  She also had balloons and chocolates delivered to our room on the day of my birthday.  Rooms were very clean.  All staff was professional yet also personable.  Location was perfect for getting around the bay area and the view
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, n_johnston. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort celebrating your birthday! We are glad that you enjoyed the waterfront views and that our kind staff were able to make your stay even better! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: What a wonderful hotel.  Relaxing spots with great views.  Great staff, very friendly and very accommodating. Amazing variety of restaurants with a huge selection of food choices. With an accessible location, it is easy to get around Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, Rossdog827. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort, including our friendly staff, waterfront views and dining options! We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Balboa Bay Resort:  Wish that it was not a business stay
Summary: I stayed again at the Balboa Bay Resort for a business meeting.  The conference facilities and service for the business events were very well managed.  The food was very good, and the service was excellent.  The guest room itself was large, tastefully done and comfortable.  WiFi service was easy to access and fast.  I had lunch outside in the restaurant.  Very pleasant, and again, the service was excellent.  I had breakfast in the room--food was good, service was excellent.  The front desk and the valets were also responsive and easy to deal with.  I wish that I could have been there just to relax.  Great spot, great service.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, 705alanm. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort for your business meeting and that our helpful staff, amenities and comfortable guest rooms made your stay even better. We hope we can welcome you back for some leisure time soon!

Summary: We have stayed at the Balboa Bay Resort for years for a yearly conference that we attend.  The amenities are wonderful, so I hate to write this review.  But I have spent the last week trying to get a hold of management and not one person has gotten back to me.  I have called three times, left voicemails and sent an email.  Unfortunately an accident was made when booking and the reservation was accidentally made for a day early.  My biggest concern was that my card was charged nearly $300 for not showing up on time but it was never communicated with me when charging the card.  This was never once communicated by the front desk staff and since my receipt was emailed to me I did not become aware of this until returning from my trip.  My biggest issue is the dishonesty and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff is beyond amazing. The bed was Motel 6 level uncomfortable and there were some ants. TV didnt work at first. Not worth the price. You cannot access the private beach on the property. Guest parking is really far away if you self park so valet.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, StephanieS6562. We are happy to hear that our kind staff were able to make your stay better, and appreciate your feedback regarding the room amenities and parking. The beach is only accessible for the Balboa Bay Club members, but we are happy to offer a complimentary shuttle service to guests to take them to near-by beaches. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Balboa Bay resort. The room (a corner suite) was gorgeous, spacious with a beautiful view of the marina with 2 balconies.  Bedding was comfortable. The bathroom and amenities were great.  Room service was excellent.  Lynn at the pool was excellent and service there was great. The Sunday brunch at the Waterline restaurant was a little lacking, at $52 USD per head the food was not great. The cold buffet was lacking, it was the unlimited mimosas and sparkling that made up for the price. Service here was also not the fastest or greatest. Clearly there is a preference for who sits on the terrace outside, they told us it was reserved but for the majority of our 3 hour brunch many tables remained empty.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Aussiejack1. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our spacious rooms, waterfront location and pool helped make it even better. We appreciate your feedback regarding Brunch at Waterline. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort was everything I could have asked for and more.  My plan was to take my mom and dad back to Newport for a quick holiday. It had been nearly 50 years since my dad had been to Newport and the Pier so I wanted to make it special.  This was the hotel that fit the bill.  The hotel is situated on the bay near the Ferrari, Pagani and McClaren dealerships.  The hotel is within a 7 min drive to Newport Pier but close to many other hot spots in the area. I travel here for work a lot and love this area.  Our room was upgraded to the members side and had a wonderful view of the bay and all the yachts.  We had a top floor balcony that overlooked the pool and lawn area. The bathroom was spacious and the overall room amenities were top notch.  My folks both commented that the
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, macros13. We are so happy to hear that your family enjoyed the Resort, especially the waterfront views, luxurious amenities and central location! We can't wait to welcome you all back soon for another getaway!

Summary: My husband and I spent the most wonderful afternoon at your resort. Miss Sonya is the best!!!! She is so professional, so lovely, so wonderful!!!!!! Thank you dear Sonya for making us feel so special!!!! XOXO, Bayrooti family
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, californianchica. We are so glad that our helpful staff were able to make your time at the Resort enjoyable. We will pass on your compliments of Sonya. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We really enjoyed a relaxing fun stay at the Balboa Bay Resort. Wonderful food, great service, beautiful setting! The rooms are clean and comfortable and the food and service at A+O was terrific  Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, FarAway229505. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our luxurious accommodations and dining at A&O Kitchen+Bar. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Balboa Bay is beautiful and just a classy place.  Staff is very helpful and friendly. You can’t go wrong staying here!  Great dining options and pool area. Actual bay is pretty and fun to watch the boats and yachts
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, Bbkg. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort and that our pool, dining options and Bay views made your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: 1. Food is extremely salty. I had dinner and room service a few times and I’ve never had food this intentionally over salted. Other guests I spoke with agreed.  2. My room and a nice patio where I was excited to have coffee every morning, unfortunately everybody (including hotel staff) park in front of it, while also leaving the engine on. Needless to say, not much privacy and car fumes get into the unit if you leave the door open.  3. One night a loud thudding sound woke me up at 5 am. I called the front desk and they said there was nothing they could do. It persisted for another hour. I brought this up at check out and they didn’t have an answer or an apology.   4. They’re sneaky about the gratuity. They already add it on the bill, but make no mention when you are signing the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Milad B. We are happy to hear that our helpful staff were able to make your stay better. We appreciate your feedback on your dining experience and balcony view. We apologize if any gratuity charges were not as clear as they could have been, we try to ensure guests are aware of all charges. We do hope we can welcome you back again to show you our high levels of service.

Summary: We loved everything.  The food at Waterline was delicious.  The other restaurant was excellent as well and we appreciated that there were two choices.   Our room was on first floor as we had requested.  Location of resort made it easy to see the sights.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, 168colleenh. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, including our dining options and waterfront location. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We had an amazing weekend.  The property is stunning and the staff were warm, friendly, and could not be more accommodating  It was my birthday and they got us a great table for dinner and breakfast and the food was fabulous. Had an amazing couples massage and rented paddle boards.  Highly recommend to anyone looking for a classy place to relax and play..
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, Amy E. We are so happy to hear that you had a great birthday getaway at the Resort and were able to enjoy our wonderful amenities like the spa, paddle boards and dining. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I booked this hotel long time ago. My expectations were high. Now, I can tell that the people at the vallet parking are really nice, and I think the rest too, although I did not have time to interact. The room was clean and comfortable, with a good bathroom, but right by the road, with views to it. Not good... I will not be remembering this place much longer...
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, germanloperena. We are happy to hear that our helpful staff helped make your stay enjoyable. Our standard rooms do have neighborhood views which can overlook Pacific Coast Highway; we have rooms that overlook the courtyard, Resort and Bay as well. we hope we can welcome you back so you can enjoy another great view.

Summary Heading: Out of the heat and into the BAY...Balboa Bay Resort that is.
Summary: Amazing location and ultra posh.  Even ran into a celeb while I was staying. Maybe they want to be discreate so I wont say who but that is the kind of place it is.. maybe you will run into someone when you stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience with us dianamccann. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our cool waterfront location made it even better. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful location with excellent hospitality and accommodations
Summary: The Resort focuses on excellent customer service which is evident the moment you arrive.  The accommodations are clean, spacious and comfortable.  Of course, the location is beautiful as it sits right on the bay.  There are excellent food and drinks at the Resort as well as many options within walking distance.  I hope to stay there again in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, 2015Blanca. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location, spacious rooms, food and drink options and helpful staff! We can't wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary: This was our second visit to the Balboa Resort in Newport Beach. Wonderful and relaxing! Exceptional service at the Waterline restaurant. James was a delightful and experienced waiter who made our lunches and dinners very special. The resort is the best for comfort, quality and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your five-star review, Vinyards. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay and that the helpful staff were able to make it even better, especially in Waterline! We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We stayed at the Balboa Bay resort for a girls weekend. We had such a wonderful time!! Damian was very gracious and helpful! We really enjoyed the live music on Saturday night in the A&O bar. The beds were very comfortable and we got a complimentary bottle of wine with our stay. We will definitely be back for our next girls trip!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, Sarah R! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your girls weekend at the Resort, including our dining and entertainment. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: the room is HIGH, $440.00 a night.  On top of that they charge you 40.00 a day for parking and an extra 35.00 a day for the resort fee.  For 440 a night I had an amazing view of a Taco Bell. For 100 more a night I was offered a room with a view of the marina. I’m an idiot and took it. Basically that let me look at parked boats and enjoy the noise of all the people maintaining them.   Let's talk about the resort fee. I actually called to see what all that entailed. Because all I saw was a pool about as nice as a Hampton inn. The nice young lady told me it also covers the two bottles of water in my room and the gym. I get free water when I stay at Hilton and a gym just as nice. So this resort fee is total crap. But now you know so you don't have to be annoyed like I am. Now they
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Dan B. We appreciate your feedback regarding the Resort fee, and are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Fresh bath amenities. Our Resort fee does cover many features, including 24-hour gym access, WiFi, the business center, in-room water and coffee. Our fee is lower than comparable hotels and resorts in the Newport Beach area, and we work hard to offer the best amenities we can for our guests. Our Bay View Rooms do offer views of the private yachts parked at the Resort marina, as well as Balboa Bay and Lido Isle. We hope we can welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary: From minnesota, so i know what nice is. Dominique and the girls at the front desk are awesome and helped me immensely! Absolutey awesome staff, great rooms, super clean, and right on the water - couldn’t ask for better!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, BigBenMN. We are so glad to hear that our kind staff and amenities were able to make your stay great! We can't wait to welcome you back to Newport Beach soon!

Summary: We have stayed here for our honeymoon in 2014 and have now returned with our 2 year old. The staff are amazing! The resort is beautiful. Breakfast staff are very accommodating with kids. A special mention to Jose who made breakfast special for our little boy.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, sanjan2014. We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay and that our helpful staff made it great! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome Hotel with spa and waterfront and great restaurants!
Summary: This is our favorite new SoCal place. Location can’t be beat in either direction. They have everything a resort should have! Beach,restaurants, spa, marina and bars. Rooms are well equipped and spacious. Staff is super friendly and we mostly love Becca at the front desk!!!  Ask for a corner room facing the water. It has a huge porch!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, DcavuM. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our waterfront location, amenities, spacious rooms and helpful staff were able to make it memorable! We can't wait to see you again soon.

Summary: We always enjoy coming to the Balboa Bay Resort. Friendly people upon arrival and Becca at the front desk is awesome!  The spa is nice and the restaurant /s at the hotel have good food and good service. Would Recommend this resort to anyone with out hesitation.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review with us, hnitro1. We are so happy to hear that our kind staff, spa and dining helped make your stay great! We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Good Hotel but not Family Friendly
Summary: The hotel is beautiful, Food it great and rooms are very large and clean. That said, we had an unhappy experience at the pool and may not stay here again. We were staying with our kids 14 and 10. The kids were swimming in the pool. The weather was cool and overcast. The kids decided to warm up in the jacuzzi. My son was asked to leave the jacuzzi since they do NOT allow kids under 14 in the jacuzzi. We asked if me or my husband sat with them, would it be ok and they said the GM said "No" and he was watching the pool area. I understand not allowing kids by themselves but not to allow a 10 year old with his parent in the jacuzzi is a little ridiculous. We asked why and were told because kids can dehydrate...well my husband is a doctor and says that applies to everyone not just
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Sofiaonetwothree. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the dining options and spacious guest rooms at the Resort. We also appreciate your feedback regarding your experience at the pool. As safety of our guests is a main priority, it is the Resort's policy to only allow those age 15 and up in the Jacuzzi. We hope to welcome you and your family back to the Resort in the future.

Summary Heading: A perfect getaway - lovely hotel with excellent service
Summary: Thank you Silvia Guerrero (front desk) for your cheerful and positive energy. Appreciate your kind help with our questions and wine request while we were there last weekend.  This is a fabulous hotel to stay in.  I love the little 'starbucks' like cafe located inside the hotel with delicious healthy breakfast and lunch options when I just wanted to grab something to eat and not go to a restaurant. The standard King room was nice and spacious. The little gym room was a bit warm but other than that I was just happy to have a place to burn some of the extra calories I consumed eating in the restaurant located inside the hotel.  Oh there was a live male singer and another guitarist on Friday night singing cover songs and they were great!  You can refill your water in the lobby -
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, miss d. We are so glad to hear that our helpful staff, dining options, spacious guest rooms and other amenities! We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: Gorgeous historical property worth exploring. Fabulous room, with many amenities & fabulous dining options. Bayside resort with beautiful patio & view of the impressive yaughts. Nearby shops, dining & bars.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, jennnort. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our spacious rooms, waterfront views and other amenities. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We had an excellent experience, and we cannot wait to revisit this resort. Everything was perfect, aside from the firm bed. From the moment we arrived, the staff was very helpful and the amenities of the resort were excellent. The restaurants had great drinks and food with exceptional service. We are pleased to say that we will be bringing our family in the very near future. We live in Dana Point so we're very close and always looking for great hotels for a quick, fun, getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, Escape39830436792. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort and enjoyed our amenities, dining options and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back soon for a getaway!

Summary: First, I would like to say the staff at Balboa Bay Resort are among the best I've ever experienced while traveling. Every single person, from the valet, to the doorman, to the receptionist, to the pool bartenders was friendly and cheerful. Best of all, there was no pretension to their excellent work. Seriously, management and staff here do a great job. Moving on, room was comfortable with a great shower, comfortable bed, and the usual coffee maker/fridge. There's a large pool and small hot tub outside with servers bringing you a nice selection of beverages. Best of all? Across the entranceway is a great spa with all the treatments you could want. Avail yourself of them. Worth every penny. The location is convenient to all things Orange County along the coast. Linger here.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience with us, SanNic44. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort, including our spacious guest rooms, wonderful spa and helpful staff! We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Location right on water. Very good fitness facility; nice pool area with sundeck; friendly staff; well maintened  property - excessive valet charge - terrific bath with 2 sinks and king bed - would return
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Visitfifty. We are happy to hear that our kind staff, pool and accommodations made your stay great. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The Balboa Bay Club Resort is the perfect spot for a relaxing getaway. The resort is beautiful, the staff is helpful, and the service was spot on. We enjoyed the property so much that we rearranged all of our plans so that we could be on the property as much as possible. After a fun Duffy boat ride from their own private dock, we canceled our off-property dinner plans, enjoyed the views from our room, and then had a delicious dinner at Waterline. Instead of rushing off the next morning, we slept in, ordered room service and enjoyed the pool.  It was just the type of relaxation and reprieve we needed! We had the most amazing visit and we look forward to returning again!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Nikki R. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that you were able to enjoy our waterfront views, fun recreation activities and delicious dining options! We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort again soon!

Summary: My two-night stay at this hotel was absolutely amazing from start to finish. The rooms were spacious, modern, and very clean. The bed was very comfortable! The room comes with a bottle of wine which is a nice touch. Our room overlooked the harbor. It was nice to sit on the balcony and enjoy the views and read a book.   Customer service was outstanding from the valet to front desk and restaurant. Everyone made you feel like you were someone special.  There are a few restaurants not a far drive or even walk away.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star experience with us, Skigal08. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our spacious rooms, waterfront views and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: Had a great stay at the Balboa Bay Resort.  Very nice and clean.  Staff were very accommodating and provided excellent customer service.  Weather was cool so didn't get to enjoy the lovely pool.  Would definitely recommend and will stay again if ever in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Amy M. We are so happy to hear that our helpful staff and clean accommodations made your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary Heading: Wonderful location and very clean and updated rooms
Summary: Just a wonderful all around resort.  Very updated rooms for all electronics.  Clean rooms, I felt like a king!  The restaurants are fantastic and the pool and spa were perfect.   The valet was great with bring the car up right away.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, Odyssey42826145205. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort and that our up to date amenities, dining options, pool and spa were able to make it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary: We stayed at the Balboa Bay Resort and everything was perfect from start to finish. Luxury at its finest.  The rooms are huge, spacious, and clean. The facility is top notch in every aspect. The customer service truly superb. Can’t wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, VTLA. We are so happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and that our spacious rooms and kind staff were able to make it great. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I went to this meeting so I could stay at this resort.  I was not disappointed.  It is a great place to stay.  It also is a private club so it is also upscale when compared to other hotels but the staff is great and treats you well.  We enjoyed ourselves and will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, spchriste. We are very happy to hear that you loved your time at the Resort during your meeting. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Overall lovely; staff helpful, rooms spacious and clean, on site restaurants quite good;  Two criticisms only:   We didn't know about the parking options for our conference and paid a lot for self parking.   The other issue is that the breakfasts at the conference, although plentiful were boring: same thing every morning and the scrambled eggs were dry and tasteless.     This could be improved.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, poptoad. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for your conference and that our staff and accommodations made it enjoyable! We appreciate your feedback regarding parking and your breakfast. If you would like to reach out to the Resort, we would be happy to look into the parking fees associated with your stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This was a business/friends get away for a conference.  Loved the hotel!  Staff is extremely accommodating and professional.  Room was spacious and comfortable!  Pool area was clean and very nice!  Spa is relaxing, has lots of options and spa staff members were extremely helpful!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, Catherine M. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our helpful staff, waterfront location, room accommodations and spa helped make it great. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We always love staying at the Balboa!  The facility, staff and amenities are always excellent! The location is perfect for shopping, dining and walks around the island. The pool is beautiful....swimming, reading or just relaxing in the sun. You will not be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Culture63901922629. We are so glad to hear that you love your stays at the Resort and that our helpful staff and accommodations make them even better! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: If you want to experience true customer service in a beautiful nautical setting stay at Balboa Bay Resort. The property is updated, clean and the decor is excellent. I believe this is the only property that actually sits on the water in Newport Beach - enjoy the view.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review Happiness07140884334. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our helpful staff, waterfront locations and accommodations were able to make it great. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Very happy . We would recommend this resort and like to return here . The staff was excellent   . The views were amazing
Summary: We would def stay here again. Amazing views and the sweetest staff. The food was all delicious. We hope to return soon. The location was great. Ok I think I’m over writing this review . But def stay here
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Inspire27062801876. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront views, dining options and kind staff. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort!

Summary: We had a 2nd floor room that obviously had recently been updated. Very nice understated decor, new comfortable bed, huge bathroom with a soaking tub & separate shower, private toilet room & double sinks. The best part was the terrace that looked out over Balboa Bay. The marina was lined with yachts & one afternoon we enjoyed watching rowing teams training on the bay. We had drinks at the A&O Bar, where the staff were not very friendly, but they did provide good service & the drinks were well made. My only real complaint is that I bought a coffee at the coffee bar the morning we left & did not realize until getting in the car and driving off that the coffee was cold. Seems like it may have been left over from the day before, not good. Parking also seemed high. Would definitely
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review of Balboa Bay Resort, Snootifox. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our bay views, luxury accommodations and delicious drinks. We apologize for any inconvenience with your morning coffee. We hope to welcome you back to Newport Beach soon!

Summary: Balboa Bay was the perfect place to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary!   Everything from our beautiful Bay View Room to the F&B and service was perfect!  We will be back for sure to stay in this amazing city and venue!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your special anniversary with Balboa Bay Resort, Freddie T! We are so glad that we were able to welcome you and make your stay amazing. We can't wait to welcome you back soon and hopefully celebrate many more moments with you!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel on a busy thoroughfare
Summary: This is a beautiful and well-maintained hotel.  Service is great if things are going smoothly.  However, if something goes awry then the staff is less than stellar. Luckily the GM, Sam El-Rabaa, comes through and addresses the situation.  The hotel is situated on a busy PCH.  Much of the rooms either face a busy highway or the valet parking area.  If you are looking for a quieter room then you have to pay for it.  The back of the hotel fronts yachts and boats parked in a marina. Some restaurants are within a 10 min. walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, raylaw323. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Resort. We do have guest rooms with amazing bay views and courtyard views of our pool as well as views towards Pacific Coast Highway, which guests can choose from. We do also try to address any guest concerns of questions as best we can, which at times requires a manager. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Everything about our stay was wonderful, the people at the resort, the accommodations, the meals and the amazing setting of Newport.  We have stayed at this resort many times and have never been disappointed.  We will find our way back again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, frequenttraveller700. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stays at the Resort and the dining options, helpful staff and waterfront location. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We spent one night there and upon check in they were able to give us a fabulous upgrade to a room on the marina for $130. It was fabulous and the balcony overlooked this magnificent yacht which apparently used to be owned by Johnny Carson.  The beds were super comfortable and they supplied us with more toiletries than any hotel we have ever stayed at. The bell men and porters were the most polite and efficient ever.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, Happiness65407176800! It's a pleasure to hear that you enjoyed not only our waterfront location and accommodations, but also our level of service. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort in the not-so-distant future.

Summary Heading: Newport Beach's best in the O.C.
Summary: Great getaway in the O.C. for couples, families and groups - especially girlfriend spa getaways for the weekend to de-stress. Definitely a must to get out on the water and enjoy the coastal views and awesome and amazing sunsets.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, vickimlundy. We are happy to hear that you enjoy our waterfront location and variety of experiences. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: The overall stay is great if you love the Newport Beach area, however, it's the fake customer service shtick that drove me insane! These people don't care about you all they want is your money. We had an experience where my credit card was charged $250, without any notification from the hotel, for "ink stains on a chair". I called the hotel 4(!) times until I finally spoke to a manager who then explained he would not be providing us proof all the "upholstery" they had to replace.    The food was sub-par, I would not recommend the room service. They include a fair delivery charge & gratuity and the people who deliver your food are noticeably upset when you don't add an "extra tip".  I would not recommend you stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Trek18864764073. We apologize for any confusion about the charge for the damage to the chair in the room and have reached out to speak further about this. We look forward to continuing our conversation. Thank you for understanding.

Summary: We arrived to the hotel Friday evening and were very happy with the staff and the room accommodations.  Saturday we ordered pastries and coffee at Blend coffee shop.  It only had two tables for seating. The coffee and other items were very good. The staff was very friendly as well.  During the day we were out of the room until around 4 pm. When we arrived back our room was not made up.  I called the front desk and they immediately sent someone to take care of it. Not sure why I had to call but it was resolved.   The hotel and staff were all great!  I recommend it to anyone and will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star experience, melie12017. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your weekend at the Resort and that our helpful staff were able to make your stay even better. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Traveled with my wife, 7 year old son, and 4 yr old daughter and had a wonderful time.  The pool was excellent.  The Breakfast at Waterline was great.  All the servers were helpful and friendly however special thank you to Jose (Waiter) as he was very professional as well as patient with the children.  Eating outside has a beautiful view of the bay.  Cesar who works room service and by the pool is great.  He took care of our every need with a smile and can t thank him enough for  a great experience.  I could go on and on Jessica at the spa, Bryan at the Blend Coffee bar are all great employees and truly made our trip special.  To the Staff at the A&O bar who took time to help me look for my wedding ring that I thought I dropped I give you a special thank you as I know you were
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us Daniel R. We are so pleased to hear that your family's vacation was great! We love hearing that you all enjoyed our dining options, pool, waterfront views and helpful staff. We will be sure to pass your compliments on to our staff. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Our stay here was a wonderful experience. Will definitely be back. Everyone extremely pleasant and helpful. Restaurant was exceptional also. Room was clean and comfortable. The décor through the entire hotel was amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, Departure65005206629. We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay with us and that you loved our helpful staff, dining options and comfortable accommodations. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Stayed during early of this month for a work trip. I was “lucky” to be stuck in the airport for more than 3 hours and the resort was a welcome respite after that.   The room is spacious and the bathroom is huge. It has both standing shower and bathtub, which will be great for a couple.   It’s bar cum restaurant offers delicious food. Their baked crispy Brussels sprouts, chicken wings and cheeseburger were delicious. And the fries too.   Service was impeccable and the level of engagement with the staff was great. For a solo business traveler, you won’t feel lonely.  What cost the 5th bubble of this review was the pillows were too soft. They didn’t provide the necessary support and I ended up having to sleep on the small cushion for better neck support.  Still, overall it was a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, thetraveller8888. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort including A&O Kitchen+Bar, our helpful staff and spacious accommodations. We appreciate your feedback about the pillows and work hard to ensure every guest is comfortable. We can't wait to welcome you back for work or fun!

Summary: The brunch was good and the service was amazing. Jose the waiter was excellent. No complaints. The crab legs and bar was good  as well. The environment was laid back. The restaurant is right off the water  and amazing reviews
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review of Waterline Newport Beach at Balboa Bay Resort, Tasha B. We are so glad that you had a wonderful birthday brunch at our waterfront restaurant. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We recently returned to stay at the Balboa Bay Club Resort after more than 10 years!  It was so much more than we expected with its remodeled interiors including wide hallways, perfect lighting, and delightful bedrooms!  It truly was a treat to stay there!  And let’s talk about service!.....first class from the time we made our reservation and throughput our stay.  Jennifer at the front desk made us feel as if we had our very own personal concierge.  We will definitely return and hope to stay longer next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Pat M. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our updated finishes and helpful staff! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: This place is perfect....excellent location & wonderful staff. We are frequent visitors and always made to feel so welcome and appreciated - especIally after a long flight from New York. Already looking forward to our return visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us Suzzywalsh. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and kind staff. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights while attending a friend's wedding nearby. There are no complaints about this hotel. Everything was great. Staff was very pleasant and helpful (except for the gift shop staff as those ladies were not that friendly but not bad enough to ruin the experience). Valet guys/girls were pleasant and helpful as well. Rooms were beautiful, spacious, comfortable, and most importantly, clean! The mattress was a bit soft for my liking but again, not bad enough to ruin my experience. When i visit Newport Beach in the future, i will be sure to stay again at Balboa! It's great for both singles and families. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, wynth. We are so happy to hear that your stay with us was a great one and that our helpful staff and comfortable accommodations made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back to Newport Beach and Balboa Bay Resort again soon!

Summary Heading: Blood stain sheets left on bed
Summary: Pros: The rooms are nicely decorated and the location on the waterfront is pretty. Cons: Lack of attention to cleaning the rooms and poor management. Example of this is finding dirty, blood stained sheets that were left on our sofa bed from the previous guest, never something you want to encounter in a hotel stay. It is unsanitary and unsettling. We had housekeeping come up to make up the sofa bed for our kids and when they opened it there were messed up bloody sheets. It was so disgusting. I have never seen dirty bloody sheets at a hotel before. I had to go to the front desk to complain because no one answered the phone and we were hoping our kids wouldn’t have to hear or see what happened. However there were only two associates on duty that had no authority to do anything,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, JoSto19. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location, but want to make sure we address your concerns fully. We apologize for this situation during your stay, and want to make it right. Our team has reached out and is hopeful that we can talk more to resolve this. We look forward to connecting and hope we can welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary: Stayed overnight with my boyfriend after a wedding in the area. We selected a bay view room (#281). View from room overlooked a waterway / marina (we did have 2 trees blocking view somewhat though). Still it was beautiful and peaceful.  Lobby of hotel is gorgeous.  Check staff was very friendly (in fact all staff was friendly and very accommodating).  We received a chilled bottle of delicious white wine and 2 bottles of Evian water in the room compliments of the resort. This is a nice touch that added to our enjoyment of the hotel.  Room was beautifully appointed in creams, taupes, teals and blues.  Great products in bathroom by Fresh -- smelled like grapefruit. 2 robes in room. Bathroom towels were honestly the best I have had (and I stay in a lot of resorts). Room was very
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your five star review, Lalewood. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you loved our waterfront location and views, comfortable room accommodations, relaxing pool and helpful staff! We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: First time visiting Newport and was pleasantly surprised because I've stayed in other cities near the beach and paid the same or more and it wasn't as nice as Balboa Bay Resort.  The only thing is that those places had free self parking and Balboa doesn't.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review with us, Mee M. We are so happy to hear that your birthday trip was a great one and that you loved our waterfront Resort! We do have limited parking due to our proximity to the Bay. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: one of the best hotels ever! great staff, beautiful bay view and great price thru you guys! will definitely be back! Great food and drinks and good cost. Valet very nice and not too expensive! loved that the rusty pelican wasn't far to eat!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, Trail26823975681. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that your loved our waterfront location and views, dining options and kind staff! We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary Heading: Loved my stay at Balboa Resort
Summary: Thought it was a beautiful hotel and enjoyed my stay. The staff was amazing and exceeded my already high expectations for them!  If you have a chance to stay here you will not regret it. I give Balboa Bay 10 out of 10 stars!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, MattBMiami. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and loved our waterfront location, views and helpful staff! We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: All was very nice and staff very pleasant and helpful.  I was there for a business National Conference.  Room was clean and well supplied.  We actually forgot some items in our closet and contacted front desk and they made arrangements to have picked up for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review Getaway09671940990. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your conference at the Resort and that our helpful staff were able to help make your stay great and retrieve your items. We can't wait to welcome you back again for business of leisure!

Summary: Part business and part pleasure at the end, this place is always good with super helpful and friendly staff.   The A&O is  good for casual dining and I would say the only thing that lets it down is the lacklustre service in the Waterline restaurant, though I only eat breakfast there and have not had lunch or dinner which may be better
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort and share your five star experience with us. We are so glad to hear that you were able to enjoy the Resort for business and pleasure, and that your experience with A&O was great. We appreciate your feedback about your experience at Waterline. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: A lovely resort and private club on iconic Pacific Coast Highway, the Balboa Bay Resort is one of the few hotels in the area that are actually ON the water, so be sure to book a Bayfront  room to sit out on the balcony and enjoy the view of beautiful boats - both docked in front of the resort and and cruising the bay - as well as the magnificent homes across the channel. The resort is welcoming - from the valet, to check in, to the efficient and courteous bell staff - probably because they are also a private member's club, and all guests are treated accordingly. Room service is quick and efficient, and the food is excellent. This has become my family's go-to spot in Newport Beach during my several years of business dealings in the area, as well as for personal getaways. Two
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star experience of Balboa Bay Resort, Nelson H. We are so glad to hear that your stays at the Resort have been great, from our helpful staff to our waterfront property and views to our fun amenities. We can't wait to keep welcoming you back to Newport Beach and to the Resort!

Summary: From the moment you drive up to check in, this resort was amazing. The valet's were fast, efficient and professional. The environment was fantastic. Checking in to the hotel was very fast. The front desk employees were very friendly. They took the time to explain everything I needed to know. The rooms were heavenly.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, LoveTravel722140. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort and that our quick and helpful staff were able to make your check in experience great and that you loved our comfortable room accommodations. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I was here for a weekend to visit friends between business meetings. Overall, it’s a nice resort in a great location.  My room (2306) was spacious and nicely decorated. The view from the balcony was the best part about it. They have Fresh bath products which I loved and the bathroom had a huge soaked tub and dual vanities. My safe wasn’t working when I checked in but maintenance arrived quickly to fix it. Everyone on staff was super friendly and came across as genuinely gracious, especially Becca at the front desk & the waitstaff at A&O and the Blend.  I was a little bugged by some minor things that I only mention in case it’s a big deal for other readers. The pillows didn’t appear to have pillow protectors on them under the pillow cases. The towels weren’t very soft / a little
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, beekac. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Resort and that our staff was helpful and you loved our waterfront location and views. We appreciate your feedback about the towels and pillows and will be sure to address this with housekeeping. Our Balboa Bay Club Members pool is very popular on warm weekends, and we appreciate you sharing your experience with your room on that side of the Resort & Club. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We found the Balboa Bay Resort to be very beautiful and a convenient location to all the area attractions.  We enjoyed their Happy Hour in the bar and only wished the weather had been warmer so we could have been outside more! Every staff member was friendly and helpful. The valet parking was quick and effficient (and attentive!) Thank you for a great weekend experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star experience with us, JanT56737. We are very glad to hear that the Resort's waterfront location, helpful staff and happy hour options made your stay a great one! We can't wait to welcome you back soon to enjoy some California sunshine!

Summary: Wonderful resort with an amazing staff. Becca at the front desk was especially helpful in making some local recommendations. Ive stayed multiple times over the past few years for both business and just to get away. The on site bar A&O is a great place to grab a cocktail and relax by the fire!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort review, rwh2019. We are so happy to hear that your trips to the Resort have been great and that our helpful staff and waterfront dining help to make your stays even better. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort!

Summary: The staff were amazing to work with from their management to the servers.  Everyone took pride in the hotel and their work.  The food and presentation was excellent and tasted amazing.  I highly recommend the hotel and would work with them again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Compass24359204824. We are very happy to hear that your time at the Resort and meetings went great. It is great to hear that our staff were able to help during your stay and that your dining experiences were exceptional. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. All staff was very friendly. Felt like the front desk folks got to know us pretty quickly into our stay, and as such were able to provide some nice recommendations in the area.   Valet service was commendable. Often the valet experience can be frustrating at hotels, but we were impressed with how well-managed the valet service was at Balboa.   The onsite A&O restaurant was very good. We visited for dinner and the bartender Jill was top notch. Really knew her stuff and provided great menu guidance.   Property is pet friendly (for a fee) but note that on-site pet relief areas are limited to patches of grass in the parking lot. There is not off leash area on the premises (though there is a dog park nearby after a 7-min drive).   Gym facility was pretty
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, Bryan M. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Resort and that our helpful staff and accommodations helped you enjoy your time with us. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Don't miss the Balboa beach resort
Summary: We have stayed at many resorts and I have to say this was one of the best, if you are in southern California don't miss staying here.  The rooms, service and food couldn't be better along with a wonderful brunch on Sunday's.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, fhoward416. We are so happy to hear that you loved your stay at the Resort and that our room accommodations, helpful staff and dining made it even better. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: From check-in to the restaurants and amenities, we had a fantastic 3 night stay. The brunch at Waterline was an ideal way to spend a Sunday afternoon on the water in Newport Beach. The bar staff at the lounge bar was accommodating and knowledgeable. The staff was friendly and helpful, resort wide.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star Balboa Bay Resort experience, J2486LUromanf. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our helpful staff and Sunday brunch made it even better! We can't wait to welcome you back again.

Summary: This place is nice but the food and service failed me. I felt like at any point someone might come over and ask us to leave. (for talking to loud}. I get it I wasn't wearing a USC hat or a vineyard vines shirt. The bartender sighed when we asked for a second round of drinks. WTH never going back !
Manager Response: none

Summary: My stay at Balboa Bay was the best! Everyone is so friendly and so attentive. The Valet team, the Front Desk Staff, the Bellman, the Housekeeping Staff...I mean everyone! They all work hard to make guests feel special.  My room was clean and comfortable and view of the bay was so peaceful (spent every evening on my terrace to watch the sunset). I highly recommend staying here when you visit Newport Beach. I can't wait to come back and stay again - top notch!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star review, TarheelTraveler89. It's great to hear that our helpful staff were able to make your stay a memorable one. We can't wait to welcome you back to Newport Beach and the Resort soon!

Summary: This is our new favorite SoCal location! Rooms are beautiful. On site restaurants are terrific and service is IMPECCABLE!!! Every single staff member was helpful, gracious, and all smiles! We particularly love Becca at the front desk!!! She hooked us up with the room we wanted, gave great dining suggestions and treated us like a member of the family! We will definitely make this our home away from home!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort Experience, DcavuM. We are so glad that you had a great stay with us and loved our comfortable rooms, helpful staff and waterfront location. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Wonderful Resort and Employees.  Everyone was very helpful and caring.  The location is picturesque.  Newport Beach is a fabulous town only topped by the quality of the resort.  Will come back any chance I get.  You should too!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Fearless51110443867. We are pleased to hear that you had a great stay with us and that our helpful staff and waterfront views made it memorable. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort and Newport Beach!
