Summary: This is very much a Four Seasons style quality hotel , very classy , had a beautiful large , well specified room , the onsite bar is great and quite lively with a restaurant, pool , outside seating and great bay views .. it’s at the top end of the price spectrum in the area but certainly lives up to the price tag . Highly recommended
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, TonyF22. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us including our dining options, amenities and waterfront views. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary Heading: Escaped Super Bowl madness in ATL!
Summary: Room with a view! Had a great Massage at the Spa from Olga-thanks! Spa area was also very well equipped and has relaxing venues as well as sauna, whirlpool, & steam. Alberto was very cheerful and attentive in the dining room. Great get-away spot! The location is great and Balboa Bay provides shuttle service to nearby restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience, ClaudiaN60YA. We are so happy to hear that you loved your spa getaway and our waterfront location! We can't wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Service is top notch - rooms are beautiful and comfortable.  Amenities are amazing.  This is a wonderful place for a meeting and the area allows for extra activities and places to eat.  Outdoor activities for my team to run or walk along the coast was relaxing after a long day of meetings.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review, Fearless62124884295. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that your meeting was a success. We are also glad that our helpful staff and amenities made your time even better. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Looking forward to a return trip to this beautiful hotel. Great location with very attentive staff. Highly recommend this resort. Bay view rooms are worth the $$$$. The spa will definitely be on our agenda on a return trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Dlilly956. We are so happy to hear that you loved our waterfront location and views and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We stayed here for four nights in January, the hotel is excellent, very clean and staff very warm and welcoming. The outside pool area is spacious and very attractive, There is outdoor dining alongside the marina which we unfortunately did not get to take advantage of as we hit the one week of Southern California rains. The resort fee is high but comparable to other similar hotels in the area. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Kathy J. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our kind staff and amenities. We hope to welcome you back soon to experience more of the great California sunshine!

Summary: The resort is gorgeous.  The customer serve and food was excellent.  I would definitely stay again.  I was on a business trip so we had the food catered by the resort and the food was delicious.  The hospitality of the staff was exceptional!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Flyer45257440369. We are thrilled to hear that you loved our helpful staff and dining options! We can't wait to welcome you back, for business or leisure, again!

Summary Heading: Beautiful room, great coffee shop, modern look
Summary: Blend Coffee shop has the best coffees and smoothies! I enjoyed the shopping experience at the boutique as well. It is a busy hotel which caters for a lot of conferences.  Breakfast was good and room service was delivered with a rose and a smile from Emilio!   The room is spacious and modern, the bed is super comfy and big. I would have appreciated being asked if I preferred a quiet room but fortunately I had my earplugs packed and ready for the noisy street side.  The shuttle only covers a 3mile radius so I could go to Fashion Island for lunch and shopping.   I had to pay 25 dollars for 30min later check out, although I am a Discovery member. Late check out totally depends on availability. Friendly staff.  Great spa facilities and the massage was good. Nothing ‘wow’ but overall
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, theresapilates. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable accommodations, dining options and spa. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort!

Summary: Fantastic staff - great views - nice pool with large Jacuzzi - great relaxed vibe - terrific in house coffee shop - view are wonderful if you get a bay view room - pool view is not bad either - nice range of restaurants - one relaxed and one more higher end
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Cruiser22245973001. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our helpful staff, dining options and waterfront views were able to make your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Rows of yachts parked in front
Summary: This is what I would call the Billionaires row in Southern California.. I only went for a gig. Expect to pay high prices but premium service. Parking alone was $25.  Stroll on the walkways next to the ocean. Very romantic.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, CambodiaTravelsGuide. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our waterfront location and helpful staff. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our entire stay at the Balboa Bay Resort and within the Club facilities. The accommodations were beautiful and relaxing - (loved the “Fresh”  bathroom product essentials!). All of the food/beverages from the coffee shop to the waterfront dining was top notch! A special thank you to Taylor B, Damian G. and Rosalie U. for going out of their way to help us facilitate our amazing New Years Eve plans.The care the entire staff extended to us is to be commended and we will most definitely be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star review with us, jackieg121. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our accommodations, dining and helpful staff were able to enhance your experience! We can't wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel with a lot of hidden charges
Summary: Great hotel but they will with out notifying charge you for Wi-fi, water, wine and the swimming pool. It's 2019 and no serious hotel should charge for water and wi-fi, come on guys! Today's gold is = communication, transparency and referrals. Time to adapt.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Camper10922728139. We apologize for any confusion regarding our Resort Fee. The fee is common amongst resort properties throughout the country, and covers many amenities including WiFi, in-room bottled water, wine, and the fitness amenities, which you mentioned.  This fee is listed on our booking page within the price breakdown and it also noted on the confirmation letters. We do appreciate your feedback and hope that you will return to the Resort soon.

Summary: Many places to "meet" and hang out on the first floor,  beautifully decorated for the holidays, pool looked inviting and well maintained.    Stayed here for a work party, did the spa also, they treated me right!   I did a massage and salt scrub.  The only down side is you can hear the basketball court and weight room slightly in parts of the spa.  Nice soaking tub, and all the amenities you need to be refreshed after your treatments.   This seems a pretty popular place, and it everything was pretty busy.  I ordered food to go, the staff was super polite and did a great job, got my food right out to me even with special diet restrictions.    Went down towards the marina and watched the lighted boats tooling around, very fun to see.   Rooms were very relaxing, bedding was
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, RoxAnnaF. We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay with us and that your time at the spa, restaurants and in your room were enjoyable. We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary: My wife and I wanted to watch the annual Newport Beach Christmas Boat Parade and booked one of their rooms that was closest to the water well in advance. The valet, the front desk people, and everyone was very friendly and accommodating. The room and the view was epic. We got to see the whole parade from the front row.  After the parade was over, we were tired and wanted to turn in early for the night, but the room we selected was noisy due to the throngs of visitors at the hotel and resort. We would probably have been better off in another view room, because there was a party on the floor just above us with loud music and we could hear people walking around on the wood floors. Unfortunate...and we should have known better.  We complained about the noise and our locations, and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, bss51. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your view of the Newport Beach Christmas Boat Parade and that our helpful staff were able to make your stay enjoyable. We apologize for any inconvenience the noise from the Boat Parade festivities caused you. We hope that you will stay with us again soon and for the Boat Parade in the coming years.

Summary: Stayed here for the first time and unfortunately will not be returning.  On top of already premium room rates, be very aware that you will have to pay $30 per room, per night resort fee AND $30-$35 per night parking.  All very excessive for cheap bottle of wine and 2 “complimentary” small bottles of water.  Unfortunately this type of daylight robbery is becoming the norm for larger hotels, hiding the true cost of your stay.  I will search harder for those hotels that give a true cost of a nights’ stay!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, G1631CMchristiner. We apologize for any disappointment you experienced during your stay. We work hard to ensure every guest enjoys their time at the Resort, and will pass your feedback about our Resort fee and parking fees to the team. We hope you will return to experience the Resort again.

Summary: Great place to stay. Staff at resort are exceptional with great attention to customer satisfaction. Views of marina and sunsets are truly amazing. Place has a unique ambiance complimented by attentive staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Navigate646735. We are so happy to hear that our waterfront views and helpful staff were able to make your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Balboa Bay Resort  is a beautiful hotel with outstanding views of the bay. The rooms were well appointed and the beds were super comfy. Also the employees continuously made us feel welcome! Becca at the front desk gave us great recommendations on restaurants and places to see. She treated us with genuine warmth and hospitality. Tara, who worked at the bar/restaurant A and O, was also very friendly and made a point of remembering our wine choices and what our vacation plans were. Lovely. Finally, Victoria was an excellent server at the Waterline. We will definitely be back next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our bay front views, comfortable beds and helpful staff. We can't wait to welcome you back to Newport Beach and the Resort soon!

Summary: Booked an overnight stay in a  waterfront room for viewing Xmas parade of boats.  We had two queen beds and the room was still spacious and comfortable. The bed was one of the most comfortable I've slept in. Hotel Xmas decorations were fabulous. Staff was courteous and attentive. Enjoyed my stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your Balboa Bay Resort experience, @njmstrip589! The Christmas Boat Parade is our favorite event of the year, and we're happy that you were able to enjoy it with us. We look forward to sharing your kind words with our staff, as well as welcoming you back to the Resort!

Summary Heading: Less Than an Hour Away From LA, a Beautiful Oasis of Relaxation and Luxury
Summary: I planned my trip to Balboa Bay Club for a Christmas getaway.  The minute I arrived, I felt like I was in a Christmas Wonderland.  The hotel was decked out to the hilt with decorations, lights, trees, glitter.  It was stunning.  I completed a quick check in and was escorted to my spacious room.  I quickly unpacked, and headed to the A&O restaurant for lunch.  The view is spectacular -- right smack dab on the bay. with a bunch of large yachts dockside to make the scenario high glam.  Later that evening, we walked to a little grassy area on the hotel grounds, facing the bay, for the 110th Annual Boat Parade. It was a parade of large boats (aka yachts) on the water, totally decorated for the holidays.  So pretty!  We sipped yummy hot chocolate and nibbled on Christmas cookies, both
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating the holidays with us, BarbaraB! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed so much of the Resort, including the Spa, restaurants, and Boutique. As you mentioned, The Christmas Boat Parade is a wonderful and unique holiday experience, and we're happy to hear that you enjoyed watching it from our Bayfront Lawn. Thank you again for sharing your experience -- we look forward to not only sharing your kind words with our staff, but also to welcoming you back to the Resort!

Summary: We decided to stay here while being in Newport during the holidays. This resort is definitely a nice place to stay. It's not cheap but for us, it was worth the stay for a few nights.  The staff is super friendly.... the valet, the front desk, housekeepers, etc  The rooms all come with a balcony. We had a partial water view which still allowed for a great view to hang out on the balcony.  The rooms are good size. The two double queen beds in the room still allowed for adequate space for my wife, daughter, and me.  The location is about a 2 mile walk to the center of Balboa Island or the center of Newport Beach. We actually did the walk and back to Balboa Island with our 2yr old. It wasn't bad at all...and safe to walk.  The resort overlooks one of the many marinas in Newport and
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us this holiday season, @pennstathah, as well as sharing your experience! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your family getaway, as well our location and service, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort!

Summary: The Resort did not live up to the standards in my opinion that such a prestigious resort might be expected of.  I feel the bate and switched my confirmed reservation made three months in advance of our stay in December
Manager Response: We are sorry to learn of your disappointment with your recent stay. Providing a memorable stay for our guests is our top priority, and we apologize if we fell short in any way. We invite you to contact us directly at marketing@balboabayresort.com, so that we may learn more about your experience. Thank you.

Summary: We booked at the Resort for a two-day getaway to see the Boat Parade and have a few great meals. We booked their bed and breakfast package, which also included valet parking ($35/day value). The room was as hoped-for, right on the water, which gave us a unobstructed view of the parade. Staff here is very responsive, professional and friendly. Meals in the Waterline were very good, and not that expensive given the setting. We usually prefer B&B's when we travel (I do a lot of business hotels for work, so we want to avoid that), but the BBR is just the right size, has a great location, and is small enough to be quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating the holiday season with us, as well as sharing your five-star experience, Bob H! The Christmas Boat Parade is our favorite event of the year and we are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy it alongside a relaxing and memorable getaway. Cheers to a wonderful holiday season -- we hope to welcome you back again next year!

Summary Heading: Ritz?  Four Seasons?  This place might be better...
Summary: Very beautiful property on the water / bay.  Great rooms.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Can you ask for anything else?   We had our company Christmas party here and they bend over backwards to accommodate us.   Food was good+ which is probably their only area of improvement.  The staff at the A&O put up with our crew during the day for lunch and again late night...with grace and charm.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Odyssey07020902704. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that your holiday party was a success. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The staff here were immensively friendly and helpful, and the room was very well appointed and clean. There was zero noise pollution from other guest rooms or from the very lively first floor restaurant that I could see from the balcony. I would stay here again on future trips to Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, BuckeyeO-H-1-O. We are so glad to hear that our helpful staff and accommodations were able to make your stay in Newport Beach a great one! We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon.

Summary: I loved their spa. Everything was clean & the decor was well done. I had a facial with Jessica and it was wonderful. She was kind, helpful & my skin was very soft the next day. The waiting area has snacks & coffee which was great because some spas don’t do that. I’ll be back :)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star spa experience, Mandisan111. We are so glad that our kind staff and amenities made your spa visit enjoyable! We can't wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in beautiful Newport Beach
Summary: We stayed here for a few days and we truly enjoyed every minute of it. They upgraded our room to a bigger room for free which made our vacation more special! The staff are so courteous and helpful and we love the fact that they offer free shuttle to nearby places. We would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Marie D. We are so glad to hear that you loved your vacation with us and that our accommodations, helpful staff and waterfront location exceeded your expectations. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: The décor in the hotel was delightful.  I was given a ground floor room open to the sidewalk and parking lot without the desk advising me or asking my preference.  As a female traveler, I do not like this location and should have been asked.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you Balboa Bay Resort experience with us, Seaside06599213238. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the decor of the Resort. We will pass your feedback along to our team and do our best to accommodate preferences like this in the future. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon.

Summary Heading: Casual Vacation just me and my wife
Summary: Balboa Bay Resort was amazing we will stay here every time we go to Newport Beach the people were extremely nice as well as the staff, my wife and I wanted to know where the hotel got there pillows 4 months after we were there so I called and got a lady named Rosaly Uriarte and as you can imagine it’s an odd request but she took my email address and tracked down the company and emailed me back less than an hour later!! I loved Newport Beach and Zthe people at Balboa bay resort made it one of the best vacations my wife and I have ever taken!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing you five-star experience, Climber64774781084. We are so happy to hear that our helpful staff and comfortable accommodations were able to make your time with us enjoyable! We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon.

Summary: Rosaly Uriarte provided great service, made me feel really satisfied and Happy. I wish all of the people I have to deal with during my travels would be this way. Thanks again, Rosaly!!! Keep on doing a great job!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Happiness766865. We are so happy to hear that we were able to make your stay enjoyable! We can't wait to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: This bay-side hotel in Newport Beach was a revelation
Summary: One of us is a travel agent and we have had experience in top quality hotels around the world. Our stay at the Balboa Bay Resort was a four night stop-over to see our son in Newport Beach. This hotel exceeded our expectations from the moment we stepped out of our vehicle. The staff was obviously well-chosen and trained as we were greeted with smiles and solicitations for anything we might need ... shout-outs here for a very friendly front desk staff. I can complement Lauren at the front desk as well as Damien who came out to accompany us to our room. The room impressed. It was unusually spacious and functionally well thought-out featuring excellent lighting, a large comfortable chaise with an ottoman, an over-sized desk with two upholstered chairs, a nicely framed flat screen
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, MWJW. We are so happy to hear that our helpful staff, room accommodations and amenities exceeded your expectations. It's great to know that you loved our dining and pool. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: My girlfriend ended up bringing me to Newport Beach for the weekend away from work, I never heard about this location and was amazed on the views and features. My tv wasn't turning on with the remote but javier in engineering was able to replace it with a brand new one. Showed me how you can literally watch tv from the balcony and light up the room with the push of a button! I enjoy these small but very cool features that other places don't have. Housekeeping did a really good job on the beds and bathroom. They have room service but we decided to Uber to fashion island instead. Next time we  return I will have to reserve a room facing the yachts!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, LRod1089565. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your getaway to Newport Beach and that our helpful staff and amenities were able to make your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: AMAZING!  There is nothing lacking from this resort.  Nothing further to be desired.  This is right in our backyard and I dont think I will ever have a need to vacation anywhere else. From the beautiful views to relaxing vibes, this is a winner
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay Resort experience, Nomad12045945589. We are so happy that you loved our waterfront views and vibe. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort again soon!

Summary: Friendly staff, great food, superb location less than a mile from home. I goofed up our reservations and was still able to check-in thanks to the great front desk staff and manager! They really went the extra mile to accommodate us.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Michael C. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay-cation with us and that our helpful staff were able to get your reservation in order and help make your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary: I got a room for the night to surprise my sisters and ask them to be my maids of honor. I arrived around 4pm on a Friday. I was greeted with two smiling faces who offered me champagne and wine. Damion checked me into my room and I told him my plan for the evening. He was so kind and actually upgraded me to a gorgeous room. This room had an amazing view and was huge. My sisters were so surprised and blown away by the view. We actually live in Newport Beach so this was a stay-cation for us. We had dinner at A&O which has super fun live music, great servers, and yummy food. Then we had breakfast at Waterline which was amazing as well. All around it was a wonderful trip. Thank you Damion for an amazing room!!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, carly a. We are so pleased to hear that your stay-cation surprise was a great one! We are especially happy to hear that you enjoyed our bay views and dining experiences. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel, stunning views and great and very welcoming staff!
Summary: My wife and I stayed here attending a conference. Truly an excellent experience. It is a beautiful hotel, truly breathtaking views from our balcony and very  accommodating staff.  The front desk managers Damian Garcia and Lauren Ragan were very welcoming upon our arrival and extremely helpful through our three day stay at this beautiful resort. True professionals!  Will definitely come back and strongly recommend this wonderful place to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review Balboa Bay Resort, Excursion33117469222. We are very happy to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your time with us during your conference and that our views and helpful staff were able to make your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: My wife surprised me a weekend getaway at the Balboa Bay Resort and it was amazing.  As I have come to expect the resort itself is stunning but the staff and I hate to use the word staff because the people there are all so fabulous.   We arrived Friday afternoon and were greeted by the nicest people JR helped us with our bags and Damian checked us in, told us what was going on at the resort and gave us a glass of wine.  What a reception !  Before leaving for dinner we stopped at A&O for a glass of wine and Tara explained the wine selections and was engaging and friendly  Saturday we hung out by the pool and Ruben took great care of us. We had a great poolside lunch and a couple of drinks and he was there to make sure we had everything we needed for a nice relaxing Saturday.  We
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort five-star experience with us, Larry B. It is great to hear that every part of your stay was great and that our helpful staff were able to exceed your expectations throughout the weekend. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: Loved this hotel. Beautiful sunrise & sunsets overlooking the yacht mooring from the hotel balcony. Gorgeous restaurants on the water. Great atmosphere. Beautiful pool. Luxurious rooms & awesome bathroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, Lee M. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at the Resort and that our bay views and amenities were able to make your stay great. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary: My wife and I loved our stay at the Balboa resort. The staff is wonderfully helpful and the hotel is a jewel.  We loved the restaurant- it serves exquisite food. We enjoyed every meal. The waffles at breakfast were decadent with chocolate, walnuts, sautéed apples, and syrup. Equipment in the gym was in perfect working order.  And the location is extraordinarily convenient with very short drives to Hornblower Cruises and other venues.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Ron V. We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and that our helpful staff, dining options and waterfront location exceeded your expectations. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: I visited with my wife for a weekend conference. As we arrived, the staff at the valet parking was very energetic and on point. At check in, it was very smooth and fast. They put us up in the members area with a balcony overlooking the ocean. It was an amazing view. We will visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience with us, EdC2019. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your conference and stay at our property! It is great to hear that our staff and arrival experience were smooth. We can't wait to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel. Will definitely be back
Summary: This hotel is truly excellent. Excellent customer service on all levels, front desk, valet, swimming pool, restaurant, housekeeping. Bed and pillows  were nice and very soft. I cannot fault this hotel. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your sharing your five-star experience, Tola O. We are glad that you had a great stay with us and that our accommodations and service exceeded your expectations. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary: I would say that this is one of the best destinations I have ever had the pleasure of enjoying.  If you're visiting Orange County...you need to stay here!  From the Bay Views to the great food-watching the boats is just a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay experience, Edward P. We are so happy to hear that you loved your time with us, especially our views and dining. We can't wait to welcome you back soon to the Resort.

Summary: I was a guest for a weekend while attending a wedding and reception that was held at the resort. All aspects of my stay were outstanding! The location, facilities, my room, the food, the bar, the staff, etc. were all a 10 on a scale of 1 to 10. I'm not sure it could have been any better. I wholeheartedly recommend this resort for any function or just simply for relaxing.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star Balboa Bay experience. We are so happy that you enjoyed the wedding at the Resort and that everything went better than expected! We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Right on bay .  Very clean. Several restaurant options... although pricey.  Close to beach area and shops.  Wish we had more time to enjoy.  Don’t think the pool was heated... that would have been nice.... too cold for me to swim.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing Balboa Bay Resort, desrosierc. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our central location. Our pool is heated to 82 degrees year round to maximize guest experience. We hope to welcome you back soon to enjoy the Resort.

Summary Heading: Great hotel in newport, love the gastropub
Summary: We stayed here in October for a quick one-night getaway. The hotel is absolutely stunning and we can't wait to go back. We stayed on the club side while the other couple we were traveling with stayed on the resort side. Both rooms were nicely appointed, large and had great views of the inlet and boats. We dined at the gastropub, the food was fresh and service was on point. Later we had drinks at the outdoor lounge and listened to live music. Great ambiance and a fun place to hang out. This is going to be one of our go-to vacation spots.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your great Balboa Bay experience, DirtDiva22. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your one-night vacation with us, and that you especially enjoyed dining at A&O and our live music. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The staff, the property, the location.....I miss Balboa Bay Resort already!  This was my 6th visit and I am already looking forward to my next one.  Special shout outs to Becca Willis, Kat & Alexandra at the front desk. They go way above and beyond.  Also wanted to thank Elyod from maintenance who came up one evening to solve an issue.  Thanks to all......
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay experience, Suzzywalsh. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed all of your stays with us and that our front desk and maintenance staff were able to make your stay memorable. We can't wait to welcome you back to the Resort soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Place for a Company Event
Summary: I have hosted two of our company events here and each one was great! The staff is always very helpful and happy to accomodate. The rooms are lovely and the conference rooms are light airy and not stuffy at all, the Libray room is my favorite because it has large frech doors that open out to the water. We have eaten at each of the restuants and they were all delishious, great drinks too!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, alinafaulkner! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your events at Balboa Bay Resort and that our helpful staff, meeting room options and dining exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort.

Summary: A drive up the 101 led us to this amazing place. Luckily, they had rooms available. The staff was helpful and courteous. The rooms were beautiful and I slept like a rock! We really enjoyed the heated pool. The restaurant on-site had amazing food and service. I Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, marlaher! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our helpful staff, rooms and pool, and dining, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort.

Summary: We stayed at the resort for three nights and absolutely loved it.  The staff is very helpful and attentive.  The location is great. The property is beautiful. The rooms are large, clean and modern. This will be our go to place anytime we are in the area. Thank you for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, Harry! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations, location, and level of service, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort.

Summary: Me And Wifey Spent Our Anniversary Weekend Here. It Was Our First Time Staying At This Resort And We Loved It!! The Service Was Great And Every Meal We Ate Was Perfect. Even Though We Were About An Hour Away From Home We Felt Like We Were Miles Away From Home. We Highly Recommend This Resort And Can't Wait Till We Come Back.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us play host to your Anniversary! We are happy to hear that you had such a wonderful time and thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back for future staycations and celebrations.

Summary: This week end was just fabulous!  Alexandra was so kind and efficient.  The amenity (which I did not expect) sent by Kamia was so thoughtful.  The guys in the Valet, and Ali also, were so helpful and speedy.  Every staff member I encountered had a great positive attitude.   Many thanks to everyone who made such a difference -   It was a perfect weekend from beginning to end. (except that I did not want to go home)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, vwood444. We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations, and look forward to sharing your kind words with our staff. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to the Resort!

Summary: As a frequent traveler, I seek upscale accommodations marked by great customer reviews.  The Balboa Bay Resort was not a property on my radar, but through a special promotion, prompted my weekend getaway.    First, the property is nestled against a marina which provides great ambience and views through its dining venues.  It appears that some of the premium rooms enjoy the marina, but not all of them.  The room I was given overlooked a courtyard pool and lacked character, but suitable for a good nights sleep and morning shower; needless to say, I was not inspired to spend any time in my room.    As I was planning to spend the entire weekend in Newport Beach and return home on Monday morning, my stay was immediately cut short on Sunday morning when I had requested my car from the
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear of your disappointing experience with our valet and subsequent customer service. We pride ourselves on customer service and making sure our guests are well taken care of, so we take your experience very seriously. We are happy we were able to come to a solution which we hope helped improve this situation. We hope to be able to welcome you back to the Resort again to show you our service standards.

Summary: A good hotel on the waterfront.  i wish i had been able to use the pool; it looked really nice.  Breakfast was enjoyable.  The rooms very comfortable especially those with a view over the marina.  The statff were charming.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Ian G We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, as well as our waterfront views, and look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay, it could be better if reception explained what the resort had to offer.Bay view was great beside the lovely room, we could not find any activities resort had to offer. However, the visiting newport breach and so Laguna Beach made our trip very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay experience. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your room and our central location. We appreciate your feedback on the check in experience and covering our on-property offerings. We have our activities listed on our website under the events section for any future reference. We hope to welcome you back to the Resort soon.

Summary: Very helpful staff from valet to checking in.  The room was great, clean and a good bed.  You need to realize it’s quite a walk to the island, so most likely you’ll need to drive a car or take Uber.  They do have s house car that is very accommodating.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, krg801! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations, as well as our service. We look forward to welcoming you back to Newport Beach for future relaxing getaways!

Summary: Everyone, from the valet, check-in to check-out and in between were AMAZING. I was here for a special occasion and was treated so very well. The front desk staff could not have been more accommodating and helped to reassure me that my luggage would be take care of and I had no need to worry. Every single staff member I came upon in the hallways were the most friendly people and made me happy to be there. Kudos to the staff and management. If you could rate a hotel 10 stars, I would.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to celebrate with us, as well as sharing your amazing experience. We are happy to hear that you had such a wonderful time, and look forward to sharing your kind words with our staff. Thank you again!

Summary: All I can say is that this is a comedy hotel, dreadfull customer service, tired rooms cracked sanitary ware, no room service after 23.00 only m and m or chips  WHAT A NONESENSE !!!!! I’ve stayed in better B and B’s Do yourself a favour and swerve this hotel and go to Hyatt in Huntington, resort not as nice but hotel fantastic
Manager Response: We apologize for your disappointment with your stay, Gary L. We completed a property-wide renovation in mid-2017, which included our guestrooms, public spaces, meeting rooms, and pool. We are also happy to offer 24-hour room service for our guests, and apologize if this was not communicated properly. We hope that we have the opportunity to welcome you back to the Resort, and showcase all that we have to offer.

Summary: We stay in OC for weekend getaways fairly often and have stayed at most of the high-end resorts & hotels in Laguna / Newport.  This review is for a two night stay at Balboa Bay Resort over Labor Day weekend.  Important note - the property actually consists of two businesses:  Balboa Bay Resort which is a traditional hotel (this is the building on the left when facing the bay) and Balboa Bay Club, which is a private members only club.  It can get confusing because you can end up in a room in the Club side (which is quieter), but you do NOT get access to the amenities there.  I'll keep the review fairly short - rooms and service for the most part were good.  But given a choice, we'd opt for Pelican Hill / don't plan to return.  Yes, Pelican is typically more expensive per night,
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, AvonTravler. As you mentioned, the property is home to both the Balboa Bay Resort and Balboa Bay Club, and in order to maximize those beautiful bay views, we do have a number of Bay View rooms available on the Club side of the property. We apologize for any disappointment you experienced during your stay, and do hope that we can have the opportunity to welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary: The hotel is nice located and is clean and nice but it´s definately overrated. The service is terrible and the quality of the food of the roomservice is just worst than McDonalds. Actually the deny us a microwave because it was not a medical emergency and we were not in a suit... I wonder how they want to have families with babies in their hotel...  They have a great resort but you can not use it if you are not a member but you have to pay 30USD a day for it... just a joke. I will not repeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback, 565ignaciom. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our location, but apologize for your disappointments with the level of service you received. As a safety policy, we do not offer microwaves in our regular guestrooms --however, we are happy to provide hot water via room service for warming baby bottles. We do offer guests staying in our Bay View Suites on the Balboa Bay Club side of the property the opportunity to use the Club's spa lounges for the additional fee. We are happy to provide Balboa Bay Resort guests with access to our Resort pool, wifi access, pool service, and a welcome bottle of wine, and daily waters, as part of the Resort Fee. Again we apologize for any disappointment you experienced.

Summary: A fantastic stay : elegant and extra clean room (pool view), excellent location, quality of the staff, and tasty food in the restaurant. And our special and sincere thanks to Becca for her warm and friendly welcome. She is fully engaged to make our stay happy and easy. we were so glad to get the room ready when we  checked in at 1pm, and we are still gratefull for the customer service she provided. She called a short time later after we were in our room to ask if everything was ok and if she could do anything for us. We use to travel in luxury hotels, this is a very special intention we appreciated. In the room, we had the surprise to find a bottle of Californian wine, chocolates and balloons, to celebrate our anniversary. We highly recommend you to go there. Our son aged 9
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your amazing experience, melemma2016. We are thrilled to hear that you not only enjoyed your anniversary stay, but also returned home with memories to last a lifetime. We look forward to sharing your kind words with our staff, and hope that we have the opportunity to welcome you back to the Resort and Southern California.

Summary: We checked in to three rooms to celebrate my daughters birthday. Had the pleasure of Alexandra checking us in. I was amazed at the over the top customer service she provided. One room was not quite ready which  was the birthday girls room so we went to have a drink at the bar. She called a short time later and said our room was ready. When we went to get the keys she had made a balloon and chocolate arrangement for my daughter. This place will be a yearly go too . GREAT room Top Notch service.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to play host to your daughter's birthday celebration, Staci F! We are so happy to hear that you all enjoyed enjoyed your stay, and will be sure to share your kind words with Alexandra and the rest of the team. We look forward to welcoming you back for future celebrations!

Summary: Simply Outstanding!!!!  Every person, every meal, every detail.  Stayed for a weekend, wished we had stayed for a month.  Best place on the Southern California Coast.  We will  return. Enjoy your anniversary at the Balboa Bay Club.
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating with us, Steven G. We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed every moment of your week long getaway, and look forward to sharing your kind words with our staff. Next time, we hope you can make it for a month!

Summary: We travel a lot and have stayed at many hotels this hotel  was a 5 star experience has great service and very helpful staff. We arrived early and room was ready check in was quick with wonderful staff.  They have shuttle that can drive you to nearby mall and restaurants
Manager Response: We are happy you were able to join us during your travels, Nadia, and appreciate your kind words. We look forward to sharing your feedback with our staff, as well as welcoming you back to the Resort.

Summary: We've stayed in Orange County coastal communities many times before, mostly in Dana Point at a beach rental.  This year, we found Balboa Bay Resort.  The online reviews and photos are what attracted us to this property and they both proved to be accurate.  Our room was large, fully appointed and quiet.  We had drinks at A&O Kitchen + Bar a couple times and breakfast at the Blend most mornings.  Very good food and drinks at both.  The view at A&O was to die for.  Make sure you check out sunset there at least once.  The pool and hot tub were wonderful and staff was very attentive.  The location is ideal.  There is a lot to do in very close proximity.  We went to Fashion Island a couple times, to Balboa Island, to Catalina out of Newport Beach, and to the Pageant of the Masters in
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you discovered Balboa Bay Resort during your travels, Frank. As you mentioned, our central location makes  it easy to explore the area's many attractions, including shopping, local beaches, and art attractions. Thank you for taking the time to share your five-star experience. If your travels allow, we look forward to welcoming you back to Newport Beach and the Resort.

Summary: Nick was a wonderful bartender and host.  We ate in the bar and he took great care of us. The food and atmosphere was great too.  We will be back and stay at the Balboa Bay Club and visit Nick the Waterline bar very soon. Pam Pasadena Ca
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind words, Pam R! Nick is a valued member of our team, and we look forward to sharing your feedback with him and the rest of the team. We also look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort and Waterline Newport Beach.

Summary: This is the first time where we have encountered such a “membership issue” We have booked through booking.com not knowing the concept. As far as I understand, the property is divided in three different areas. One part is members only, one part boat club members only and the part that can be used by the hotel guests like us. To give an example; there are two outdoor pools; one large pool surrounded by walls without any view that can be used by the hotel guests and a smaller one with a nice view of the boats and the channel that can only be used by the members. There is a little nice beach area but guess what! Only the yacht club members can use that area, you are allowed to look at it from a distance though. We had a room overlooking the little beach, the boats and the marina.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Mete Z. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed so much of your stay, including our central location, waterfront views, and service. As you mentioned, we are located adjacent to The Balboa Bay Club, which is a private club, and apologize for any confusion with the property layout. In order to maximize those beautiful bay views, we do offer a number of Bay View guestrooms on The Club side of the property. During your next visit, we will be happy to accommodate a request for a Bay View room on the Resort side of the property. Thank you again!

Summary: Resort was a great place to stay, central to everything in the Newport Area, all amenities on the property were great. All staff were extremely welcoming (bar one who always looked angry). Special mention to Damien at the front desk, he is the epitome of customer service, he made us feel welcome each and every time we saw him and helped with any query, will definitely stay here again when visiting Newport Beach next.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, Andrew! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed not only our location, but also our service. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort in the not-so-distant future.

Summary: We enjoyed an excellent stay at the Balboa Bay Club in Newport Beach.  We strongly recommend the bay view rooms.  The staff was very good about making our 25th Wedding Anniversary very special.  This is a first class resort.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your Silver Anniversary, ron674, and thank you for allowing us to play host to your celebration! We appreciate your sharing your five-star experience, and look forward to welcoming you back for future celebrations.

Summary: We were looking forward to a peaceful vacation in Southern California. They just started a long construction project. Very noisy—awful. We are extremely disappointed. Were not told about this ahead of time. Now we are trying to find out what to do.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for any disturbances you experienced during your stay, KPHome. We were completing a small project on our restaurant patio, which did cause a brief period of noise. Again, we apologize for any disturbance.

Summary Heading: One of the nicest places we have stayed
Summary: If you don't stay here at least once your cheating yourself. The resort has some of the friendliest and helpful staff ever. The rooms are impeccably neat and clean, the food is the best we have had anywhere and you can't beat the views.  We will be back for sure.
Manager Response: Chris W, we couldn't be more happy to hear about your Balboa Bay Resort experience -- thank you for sharing! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon. Thank you again!

Summary: Everything was really good! The rooms were large and clean and didnt not lack anything such as slippers coffee machine or other useful stuff. Everyone was nice to us and I felt pretty welcome. The food was okay but it wasnt amazing at the main restaurant but the Waterline restaurant had good breakfast. I definitely recommend the place although it is pricey. Also they didnt have much self park places available so if you dont wanna valet you might have problems finding a spot. But the price difference is 5 bucks so it doesnt matter that much i guess.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, visit4yourself! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, as well as those extra touches, including breakfast at Waterline. We hope that your travels bring you back to Newport Beach, so that we can welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary: As a manager of another resort, I introduced myself through a phone call to the current GM. His secretary was not receptive and had a non-service attitude. No "smiles on the phone" and seemed put off for my request to meet the GM during my stay. Unfortunately the follow up was equally disappointing...no effort was made to contact me even though I personally passed a message with 2 staff members to kindly meet the GM to say hi and thank him for my stay. An excuse was given after I left the hotel, but that was just a rather poor excuse...and too late. Also, the pool service was poor at best. They include an automatic tip and although we ordered a lot of food and drinks for our party, the orders were usually wrong, late and sometimes...didn't come at all. It was even more
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not really knowing what to expect, I was surprised by the outstanding customer service on all fronts.   The friendly pick up from OC airport and delivery to the hotel. From the upgrades offered by Jasmin on reception, the golf booking provided by Emily on Concierge and then Brianna taking me up to the conference room where I could take photos of the marina.   My room was beautiful and all of the facilities offered by the resort including the pool and private beach perfect.   I’ll be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, Mina. We are happy to hear that we not only met, but exceeded your expectations! We look forward to sharing your kind words with our team, as well as welcoming you back to the Resort.  Best Wishes,  Sam El-Rabaa  General Manager - Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Clearly everyone is trained to please the customer at the Balboa Bay Resort. The Valet, Front Desk Staff, Housekeeping - everyone that you come in contact with all are pleasant and try to make you feel welcome. Becca at the Front Desk remembers your name and asks how your stay is going - the Valets each talk to you as you come and go asking if you need water or directions. The evening Desk people engage you as you come and go. Housekeeping asks if you need anything if you happen to encounter them - the servers in the bar are pleasant. The facilities are clean and comfortable. The pool is pleasant - the food there is tasty - the only thing I could suggest there is linen napkins and real silverware with certain food items. That would be a huge welcome upgrade. We would love to
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words, Kmiller123. I'm so happy to hear that our team's level of service helped to make your stay a five-star experience. We look forward to sharing your feedback with everyone, as well as welcoming you back to the Resort again soon.

Summary: An incredible resort!  The staff is friendly and helpful.  The room we had was amazing.  It’s near everything.  I would go back. The pool is a bit small but we had no problems finding a spot.  They provided free shuttle to the pier.  The valet was fantastic.   This is the way hotels used to be.  You don’t get this kind of service anymore even at other well regarded hotels.  Five stars!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, Robert! We pride ourselves on our service, and I'm so happy to hear that it shined through during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort and Newport Beach.  Best Wishes,  Sam El-Rabaa  General Manager - Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: A good hotel in a great location
Summary: We stayed for a week at the beginning of August 2018.  We were helping our son move from the UK, and were looking for a base near Huntington Beach.  Balboa Bay Resort was ideal.  At ground level, the hotel is split into two, a 'normal' hotel on one side and a members only resort on the other.  Hotel rooms are in both sides, with two restaurants in the normal hotel and a members only grill on the resort side. We had a bay view room on the third floor on the resort side, our son a normal room on the hotel side.  Our room was large, clean and the view over Lido Island was excellent. Our son's room was smaller with a view over the Pacific Coast Highway.  Pros: Hotel appeared to be recently refreshed and was clean and well presented throughout. Service was excellent.  Food at the bar
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear that you not only enjoyed your stay, but also that your son's move went smoothly! As you mentioned, both the Balboa Bay Resort and Balboa Bay Club are located on the same property. The Balboa Bay Club is a private club with 70 years of history within the Newport Beach community. In order to maximize the beautiful waterfront views for our Resort guests, we do have a number of Bay View guestrooms on the Club side of the property. Thank you again for sharing your five-star experience. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort for future visits to see your son!

Summary: My husband and I absolutely love staying at the Balboa Bay Resort. We have come to stay here every year for our anniversary, most recently being two weeks ago. It is so relaxing, the accommodations and views are beautiful, and the amenities are excellent! Our family has been coming to the Balboa Bay Resort since the 1990's, and my husband and I are happy to continue the tradition of staying here because it is still so wonderful! Both of the restaurants onsite are delicious and the Balboa Bay Resort brunches are superb! Also, the staff has always been so kind and accommodating, which always makes our stay more pleasant. Becca at the front desk is so friendly and helpful, she has been there since we started our anniversary tradition and we look forward to seeing her smiling face
Manager Response: Missgriff4, we are so happy to hear that we've become not a wonderful getaway for you and your husband, but also a part of your family's memories. We look forward to sharing your kind words with our staff, as well as welcoming you back for many years to come. Thank you again!

Summary: We felt really welcomed upon check in, the valet and the staff were exceedingly nice - so we appreciate the emphasis on kindness in training the staff. Our good-sized room was far away from the one elevator bank they have in the hotel. The room had a TERRIBLE view, it was of the road and business across the way, but once we closed the curtains we were able to ignore it. (The rooms in the pictures with the nice views are the bay view rooms.) The restaurant has a great view of the yachts parked in the bay, but none of the ground level or even first floor rooms would have the nice romantic "riviera" type-view advertised. The amenities were great - Comfy robes and slippers, Fresh® products that smelled sweet. Room service was quick, but a little bland in taste. The bathtub was
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience and kind words regarding our staff and amenities, Celestronica. We will certainly look into the  pool music, so that the style appeals to a wider audience. As you mentioned, we do have a number of room types, including Standard, Courtyard View and Bay View, which allow guests to choose from a variety of price points. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Overpriced with Poor Service... Very Disappointed
Summary: I was so hopeful that the Balboa Bay Resort would meet or exceed expectations  for this special trip - unfortunately that was far from the case. The poor experience started as soon as my wife and I checked-in and was greated by a curt and unusually rude young lady at the front desk. Not only had the reservation line arranged for the wrong room, she simply had the wrong temperament and unapologetic demeanor that left us questioning if we should move to another hotel.   Nevertheless we proceeded to check-in to a beautiful suite with a view of the guest parking lot - we spent a considerable amount of money for a room with no view. Finally to add insult to injury, the housekeeping staff consistently ignored the do not disturb sign on the door - often times waking my pregnant wife.
Manager Response: Dear cgmz2018, we are sorry to hear that you service you received didn't meet your expectations, or for that matter ours. We pride ourselves on our service, and I apologize that we fell short during your stay. I wish you and your wife the best with your new arrival and hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back to the Resort.

Summary: Excellent place to stay.  Rooms are great and the pool is large with plenty of seating.  Food is expensive, but your paying for the amazing view of the bay.  The Beach club is a happening place with drinks and entertainment.  The feel is very up scale and the service will not disappoint.  Valet is a must.
Manager Response: We're happy to hear that you enjoyed your relaxing bayfront getaway! Thank you for taking the time to share your five-star experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon, hoffr02.

Summary: The Balboa Bay Resort is one of the best luxury hotels in the area. The rooms overlook the marina inlet and across to the Balboa Peninsula.  Everything about this hotel was luxury from the entry where the concierge greet you at your car, to the impressive reception, to the large bedrooms and wet areas. Our stay was perfect and exceeded our expectations.  Access to Huntington and Newport beaches were just a short 10-15min drive, and slightly further to Laguana Beach 25 min down the coast.  Staff at the hotel were exceptional as were the quality of the facilities.  Thank you.
Manager Response: It is always such a pleasure to read reviews such as yours! In addition to our wonderful location, we pride ourselves on our service, and I'm happy to hear that it exceeded your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort in the not-so-distant future.

Summary: Stayed for a week’s holiday at the end of July to the beginning of August and it was awesome.  The staff, across the board, front desk, pool service, housekeeping, valet and maintenance were great. But I have to mention 1 person in particular because he offered outstanding service...Elyad!  We needed Elyad’s help to retrieve a cell phone and he was amazing.  He came ready to help with a solution that was creative and simple!  And it worked!  He was reassuring, funny, professional and helpful!  Balboa Bay is lucky to have an employee like Elyad. Thank you to all the staff for making our week enjoyable!  Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your five-star experience, Rogers7h7. I am pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your vacation, as well as the extraordinary service provided by Elyad. I look forward to sharing your kind words with him and the rest of the team. Thank you again!

Summary: If you go to the pool during your stay this isn’t a good choice. Often times the pool staff are lazy and socialize with each other. They are not here to serve the guest. In fact twice I went to the pool and no one asked me if I wanted anything to drink or eat. I’m sadly disappointed since I love  laying out by the pool. I had to order food and have it delivered to the hotel since they didn’t want to serve me. Oh well.  Thanks Balboa Bay for not training your staff and wasting my money for a so called relaxing vacation. 👎🏼  Picture Displays food left from the day before so someone was served. And here o am waiting and waiting. Every time I peeked over for someone they were chit chatting with each other in the shade. Must be nice to get paid to socialize. Thanks for walking by
Manager Response: none

Summary: After many amazing stays at the resort, I felt like it was time to write a review about the excellent staff at the BBC resort. Everyone there is always so friendly and helpful, starting with the front desk and valet employees and continuing from there. Aaron Trent and Melanie Hertrick were so beyond welcoming to my husband and I and they always make our stays there extra special. They remembered our favorite wine on this visit and had a bottle waiting for us to enjoy during our celebration. Our room was spacious, comfortable, and the view was spectacular, but the highlight of our anniversary trip was definitely the atmosphere created by the staff. We look forward to our next visit!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for not only making us a part of your family's memories, but also for sharing your five-star experiences. Melanie and Aaron are valued members of our team, who often go above-and-beyond to ensure a wonderful experience for our Balboa Bay Resort guests and Balboa Bay Club members. We look forward to welcoming you and your husband back for future celebrations.

Summary: The resort is quite beautiful and on par with a number of other resorts we have stayed at within the Preferred Hotels and Resorts group. Attention to detail is everything, and for the most they have accomplished that as well.  Our displeasure was specific to two items which could not have been attended to during our stay. The first item was the quality of our bed. It was extremely soft and most uncomfortable given the fact that we ended up continually rolling to the center no matter how we positioned ourselves. The second item was the water pressure in the shower. There was none.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your kind words, Jon T, as well as bringing  your concerns to our attention. We will certainly inspect the quality of the mattress and shower within your room to ensure that they meet our high-standards. We hope that if your travels bring you back to the Newport Beach area, that you will consider joining us for a longer getaway. Thank you again!

Summary: I wanted to stay at a nice resort for my birthday weekend , so I picked balboa bay resort due to the star ratings . I arrived earlier then check in time so they had only one room ready at that moment . I decided to take it because I wanted to get settled in and lay out by the pool . I entered the room and there was a terrible smoke smell , and this is suppose to be a non smoking resort . However I didn’t want to complain because they were doing me a favor by letting me get a room earlier then check in. We parked in the lot and every time you leave the lot you get charged a fee . There isn’t a daily fee they charge but you get charged each time you leave and that can be quite expensive . Over $65 for parking in the lot , so they should of told us to valet . We stayed one night
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a conference.  Very pretty resort in a lovely setting.  Rooms are comfortable and attractive, and hotel is very pretty.  Mostly good service, though bar seemed overwhelmed at times.  Over all, a nice place.
Manager Response: Hello Debra,  Thank you for sharing your recent conference experience. I enjoyed reading your comments about the lovely and attractive setting, comfortable rooms, and the good service you received from our staff. Thank you for sharing and we hope to welcome you back for another meeting or a much deserved leisure stay.   Best Wishes,   Sam El-Rabaa     General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The rooms are amazing, huge and well appointed.Even though we did not have a bay view, it did not matter as it was easy to sit and enjoy the view from the gastropub or conveniently placed benches and the rooms on the street side were surprisingly quiet. Blend is great low cost alternative for coffee and snacks in the morning and wine in the afternoon. Waterline is worth the splurge, the food is outstanding. A & O the gastropub is terrific, but short on healthy options. The service was excellent from the valet, to the bell desk, to the front desk ( Especially Hector) and the housekeeping staff. Everyone was friendly and helpful. Two minor complaints - we are nondrinkers and would have rather had a free $8 bottle of water than the complimentary bottle of wine which went to waste.
Manager Response: Hello cmgoins,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience. I’m so pleased how much you enjoyed our well-appointed rooms and dining options. And of course, love to hear about the excellent, friendly, and helpful service you received from our valet, bell, and front desk teams, especially Hector! Thank you for sharing your comments. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  My best,    Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Great space, excellent pool, huge room (suite), nice views...everything you would want but be know it is a harbor location with no beachfront, only marina. We walked for miles with no sand and no continuous path along the waterfront due to restaurants, etc.... Lovely place though, good service, valet parking, decent gym. Stayed a long weekend and would recommend. Some shops within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your Balboa Bay Resort experience, SJWolf66. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations, service, and pool. As you mentioned, while we are not directly located on the beach, our unique location on the harbor offers spectacular views of the marina and easy access to waterfront sports, such as stand-up paddleboarding, kayaking, and Duffy boat rides. If your travels allow, we look forward to welcoming you back to the Resort.

Summary: Booked into wrong rooms had to move into a new room mid stay and it didn’t have enough beds! Fridge in room broke. Service was borderline rude as if they couldn’t be bothered to deal with non-members. Won’t stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I truly sympathize and apologize for the trouble and frustration you experienced. Please know your comments regarding the service are taken very seriously and immediate action will be taken. It is a daily goal for our staff to always deliver the optimal experience for our guests at all times so I’m always disappointed when we fall short. I hope you give us another opportunity at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: There private beach view is insane
Summary: Love the the layout and newly remolded rooms. You can feel the Good VIBES in this resort. The food is always on point. Great place for meetings while watching the yachts cruise by and they also have residences you can lease for long term
Manager Response: Hello Ali,  Thank you for sharing your experience. I’m thrilled how much you loved the layout of recently remodeled room and couldn’t agree more about the good vibes you feel when on property. We look forward to welcoming you back for a meeting or just to watch the yachts cruise by while you dine.  My best,    Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This is a great venue for meetings. Fantastic rooms, gracious staff, amazing views of the bay, and great dining. The location is wonderful with other great restaurants within walking distance. Without a doubt, one of the best resorts in Newport Beach!
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for sharing your experience and mentioning the gracious service you received from our staff. We are honored to provide such a great venue with fantastic rooms, amazing view and wonderful dining to host your meeting. We’re excited to welcome you back for another meeting or for a leisure stay in the future!  Best Wishes,   Sam El-Rabaa     General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Great service! High cost but High value as well
Summary: We celebrated my girlfriend's birthday with a weekend in Newport Beach and the staff definitely made our stay an excellent one.  We were given helpful pro-tips upon arrival on where to park, eat, and visit: all like a local.  Brianna at the front desk made our visit uber special.  She was sweet, considerate, and attended to our needs aptly.  Our booking was botched by the OTA we used, but Brianna noticed the issue and pro-actively helped us rectify the issue.  Professional and classy, this is the type of person you want at the face of your establishment.  Our stay has been made more positive by our interaction with her.
Manager Response: Hello Jeff L.,  Thank you for providing such a detailed review, Jeff! Our Team Members pride themselves on providing anticipatory and personalized service and I am so pleased that Ms. Brianna was able to positively impact your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you and your girlfriend back in the future.   Best Wishes,  Sam El-Rabaa     General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Everything here was exceptional, started with welcoming check in by Becca - wow did she do a great job , the bay view room was perfect we enjoyed it so much we ordered in !!! We also spent several relaxing hours by the pool - very nice . Can’t wait to come back to this beautiful resort .....
Manager Response: Sjbrat112014,  Balboa Bay Resort is honored to be your “Oasis by the Bay”. Thank you for sharing your experience, and mentioning the warm welcome provided by Ms. Becca at the time of your arrival.  Also, I must agree that several hours at our pool is the perfect way to relax! We’re excited to welcome you back in the future!  My best,    Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Stayed here for a few days at the end of our trip. We had a bay view room which was stunning, the room is big, spotless & the bathroom was large with a walk in shower and large tub. Water and wine were in the fridge already included. Our room overlooked Balboa bay and the hotels private beach where there was loads of activities going on with food, games, outdoor pool which really got our kids excited to go to.  This is where it gets very disappointing. When we went to go and join in, we were then informed that this is only for members. Only it’s not just members than sign up to the hotels website, this is members that have their yachts in the bay and live in the local area. It’s then that you become aware that all the attention is for the members and us regular hotel guests just
Manager Response: Hello Lynetteforbe,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort as an end to your recent west coast trip. It’s wonderful to hear that you and your family enjoyed our beautifully appointed bay view accommodation. Please know that it is never our intention to make our guests feel excluded by hosting events for our club members in the public eye, my apologies for any disappointment caused by doing so. Our intention is to provide an environment that is both fun and relaxing for our guests and our members, and it appears we failed you in that regard. Please know that your feedback is very valued, and I will discuss the topics addressed with our managers.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Very nice resort...if you are a CLUB member
Summary: Family of 4 doing a week long southern CA trip.  We wanted to spend 2 nights at an Orange County beach.  I pride myself on being a pretty good vacation planner and enjoy the research that goes with planning trips.  This trip, I was a little bit hood-winked by the Balboa Bay Resort website and TripAdvisor pictures... while the Balboa Bay resort is truly a luxury property, I would not stay there again for my purposes.  1.  The property does sit on the bay in Newport Beach, however you can only see water if you are in one of the resort restaurants or have a bay view room.  There were pictures on TripAdvisor of a little beach area and grass area on the water, but I learned upon check-in that you cannot use this area- it is for CLUB MEMBERS.  I had no idea about this "Club" aspect of
Manager Response: Hello teesmc,   Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. While pleased to hear you felt the hotel was nice and luxurious with well-appointed guestrooms and amenities, I’m sorry you were disappointed with our proximity to the beach during the busy summer season and lack of access to the private Balboa Bay Club. Please know your comments will be share with our executive team. I do hope you choose to give us another try at some point in the future.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Definitely a great resort to consider for your stay in Newport Beach.  Location is good but not great if you want to be close to the beach.  The rooms are very nice and the service was first class.  We took short Ubers to get around to different restaurants, beach and bars.
Manager Response: Hello Duke D.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so pleased you enjoyed your guestroom and especially love that you received first class service from our team. I will certainly share your comments with our entire staff and we look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you choose to stay in Newport Beach.       Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Upon our arrival I was lucky enough to be checked in by employee and Assistant Front Office Manager, Damian Garcia. Damian was the most wonderful front desk employee that I have come in contact with in sometime. I do a lot of travel, but on this travel for "pleasure" not business it was so nice to be treated with the engaging kindness and the professionalism that was given by Mr. Garcia.    His disposition and willingness to help, started our girls weekend off in such a positive way that next year we will 100% consider doing another fun overnight at your resort!
Manager Response: Hello Amanda A.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to enjoy a girls weekend and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and especially love that you received such professional, kind, and helpful service from Damian. We strive to deliver this type of service, so it’s always wonderful to hear when team members like Damian deliver and help make our guest’s time on property more enjoyable and memorable. You can be certain your comments will be shared with Damian and our entire team. We truly look forward to welcoming you back next year for your girls weekend.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Very nice Hotel! Fantastic location with a wide choice of restaurants near by. Conveniently located near Newport island and the harbor. it was a relaxing stay. I would recommend a visit for a nice getaway weekend.
Manager Response: Hello hsin42001,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your weekend getaway experience. I’m so pleased you enjoyed a relaxing stay and the local surrounding area. We look forward to having you stay with us again for another nice weekend getaway very soon.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Great location on the water BUT beware certain rooms near the Valet/PCH!!
Summary: Had a terrific time with a business group at this hotel - food was excellent, service was on point and the location is on the bay - BEAUTIFUL.  The bar outside at night was fun and we ordered s'mores and wine - a perfect night cap.  The only negative was the room noise - I was in room 123 and it is on the driveway by the Valet station and where the cars go to park under the hotel and a BUSY PCH is 20 yards from there.  IT'S noisy in the morning and evening.  Everything else was great so my suggestion is ask for a room on the "inside" away from the road and driveway.  You'll have a great stay.
Manager Response: Hello Karenjo G.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your business conference and sharing your experience. I’m so pleased you enjoyed the beautiful atmosphere and ambiance of the hotel, as well as some great communal dining experiences with your co-workers. I especially love to hear that the service you received was on point. I do apologize that the busy activity at the valet created some additional noise near your guest room. I look forward to sharing your comments with our entire team and a return visit very soon.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Stayed here a week in late May/early June, and had a great time. A strategic location to stay too, when I attended the Newport Beach Jazz Festival. The staff was very helpful and the room was nice and clean. I really enjoyed the Breakfast with coffee and bagels  every morning at Blend coffeebar, which opened early at 6 am.
