Would love to stay there again if I'm in the Orange County area, and can absolutely recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Hello KrisG83,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your week-long stay and that you’d love to stay again the next time you are in Orange County. I’m very pleased you received helpful service from our staff and we look forward to having you back very soon.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I checked in at 7 PM and left at 7 AM so I have limited experience. First off, the hotel is across from a Ferrari dealership AND a Taco Bell! What more could you ask for?? The hotel itself was very nice. The only downside is the cost of the parking. I was there for 12 hours and went out and back in to the lot to get dinner. I paid $42 total for the time I was there. I got checked in really quickly once the high maintenance people in front of me were done. :) The room was great. It had a lot of tech without it being too intrusive. Easy light controls and Hulu, Crackle, etc. on the TV. You need to use your own account though. Great bathroom with a big shower. The TP even has a Balboa Bay sticker on it. Not sure where you’re supposed to put the sticker...
Manager Response: Hello Stacy S.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your very brief experience. I’m pleased you enjoyed your guestroom, specifically the in-room amenities and bathroom. We look forward to having you stay with us again for a longer getaway the next time you visit Newport Beach.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I have literally never written a review, yet after my terrific stay at the Balboa Bay Resort, I felt compelled to do so for the first time. This is the best resort, especially given the value, that I have stayed at in the last decade.  My room was even better than the photos suggested. It was phenomenal because the bed was awesome, the room was spacious, the amenities were outstanding, but most of all, the room cleaning team was exceptional every day. They go above and beyond. I've only had 5-6 spa facials, but Michelle was by the far the best I've ever experienced.  It was awesome to be able to paddleboard and for only $30/hour.  The bacon at Waterline Restaurant is the best I've ever had.  The cocktails at A&O Bar are solid.  It's a cool bar, by the way. Everything is easy at
Manager Response: Hello Peter R.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and taking the time to share your wonderful experience. I absolutely love to read how much you truly enjoyed your stay and felt compelled to share on Trip Advisor. I’m delighted you were so pleased with your clean and spacious guest room, and had such memorable facial, paddleboard, and dining experiences. I’m especially pleased to hear that the service you received from our team truly added to the overall satisfaction of your stay. You can be sure your comments will be shared with our entire staff. We truly appreciate your wonderful feedback and look forward to hosting you again very soon.    Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Fourth of July Visit - bay view is worth the spend
Summary: We wanted to try out something different this holiday week during the Fourth of July. We booked a bay view room and it was worth it bc we were able to enjoy the fireworks on both left and right side of the balcony. Design of hotel is updated and beach feel. It’s a smaller hotel and the right side of the property is dedicated to condo owners and beach club members.  Only areas of improvement would be adding some peloton or spin bikes to the fitness center. Food all around is solid and their baked bread is fresh and delicious.   Tip: Waterline is for a meal while the A&O is more catered towards cocktails.  Both have views of the boats and bay.
Manager Response: Hello calitravlerone,  Thank you for sharing your recent Fourth of July holiday experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased to hear you enjoyed the great views of the fireworks from your bay view room balcony, great dining experiences at both Waterline and A&O, and the overall atmosphere and ambiance of the hotel. We look forward to having you stay with us next July 4th or the next time you return to Newport Beach.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This resort was excellent!!! Especially wonderful was Brandon Smith who made sure to take care of me!!!!  I had to stay an extra night and my accommodations were met to include my late check out.  My room had a great view as well!
Manager Response: Hello paralegal12018,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear you had such an excellent stay and enjoyed the wonderful water views. I especially love that you received such wonderful service from Brandon. You can be certain your comments will be shared with Brandon and our entire team. We truly look forward to welcoming you back sometime very soon.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We stayed at this resort for a quick conference.  Everything was wonderful.  Check in was quick, the food was amazing and the staff very friendly.  It was nice to feel pampered and taken well care of for just a couple of days.  Oh, did I mention . . . the location is amazing and the view beautiful.  A perfect piece of heaven in crazy Southern California.
Manager Response: Hello Jennifer R.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your conference and sharing your experience. I’m so pleased you had a wonderful stay and felt the location was amazing and beautiful. I especially love to hear our staff provided very friendly service and you felt pampered for a couple days. I look forward to sharing your comments with our entire team and welcoming you back for your next conference or a relaxing getaway very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Was able to arrive early and do a check in early without any additional fees, which I really liked.  The hotel is beautiful and very clean. The in-room dining food is Spectacular. One of the best! I highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Hello Giovanna B.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m very pleased you felt the hotel is beautiful and clean, and love hearing about your wonderful in-room dining experience. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our team and we look forward to welcoming you back to the property the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Beautiful Property, Great Location, Incredible Staff
Summary: Balboa Bay Resort checks all the boxes.  The staff were very warm and welcoming.  The grounds are beautiful.  The property is very kid friendly.  My kids loved the multiple pools.  We enjoyed a great view of the water from our room.
Manager Response: Hello cmiles2018,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear how much you and  your family enjoyed your stay and that the property checked all the boxes. I especially love the warm and welcome you received from our staff and service you received throughout your stay. I look forward to sharing your comments with our team and welcoming you back for another wonderful family getaway very soon.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Excellent resort - beautiful rooms - incredible service and extra special restaurants - highly recommend - staff are on top of everything - actually remember you on your 2nd visit to any area - wish I had time for the spa as it looked fantastic
Manager Response: Hello rossiri,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to celebrate your grandchildren’s graduation and sharing your experience. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your entire time on property, the beautiful guest room, and a wonderful dining experience. I especially love to read your comments regarding name recognition and the fantastic level of personalized service you received from our entire staff. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back to the property the next time you are in the Newport Beach area.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This hotel is a beautiful property and the reception from valet parking to check-in was top notch.  However, one in my room (245), I slipped on a wet marble floor coming out of the bathroom. I saw a puddle of water in the hallway.  I called the front desk to report the fall and situation. The girl said, "Oh, I'm sorry, is it okay if I send someone from engineering up"?  A guy shows up and shows me the rust on a ceiling panel and explains how it happens all the time in this room.  He vacuums the line, leaves the standing water on the floor and says it should be fine now.  Came back at the end of my night to find a new standing puddle of water.  Really?  No offer to me me to another room, maybe check on my well being? Offer me a dinner for the inconvenience?  Just a really
Manager Response: Hello JALReviews,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. While I’m very pleased you felt the hotel was beautiful and your check-in experience was top-notched, I sincerely apologize for our lackluster reaction and the way we handled the water issue in your room. We failed to not only express the proper level of empathy, but also didn’t deliver the level of service and reaction required to properly resolve the situation. As a four-diamond hotel, we always want to deliver personalized and professional service, and strive to exceed our guest expectations at all times. Unfortunately, we fell short of our goals and I truly apologize for the lack of empathy and poor service reaction to the mechanical issue in your room. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our front desk and engineering team so we can learn from this and make certain it doesn’t happen again. Thank you again for sharing your comments. I hope you will give us another opportunity at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The Balboa Bay Club has set a very high standard and they alway meet and exceed that expectation.The facility, its location and the employees are the best. Our stay was first class and We cannot wait until our next stay. Even our pet Gamay was treated like a princess. The Best!
Manager Response: Hello Dorothy F.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to celebrate your Father's Day weekend and sharing your experience. I absolutely love that you not only had a first class stay, but that you time with us exceeded your expectations. I especially love to read your comments regarding the great service you received from our staff. I will certainly share your comments with our team and we truly look forward to welcoming you , Gamay and your entire party back to our property very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Big clean rooms, lots of food choices on property and in the surrounding area, great service from the valet to the hotel staff and great views of the harbor.  Lots to do in the area if you like the beach and boating.
Manager Response: Hello EMJT2018, Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m very pleased you enjoyed your time in your large and clean guest room, had some quality dining experiences amidst the wonderful waterfront views of the bay. I’m most pleased to hear that you experience such great service from our valet and hotel staff. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our entire team and we look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit Newport Beach.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I am a big supporter of the Discovery chain of hotels. Koa Kea is by far my favorite resort and I have also stayed at Pasea in Huntington Beach.  This hotel is beautiful, well appointed, spacious, and immaculate with beautiful bay front location.  While the rooms were spacious, the resort itself is not. This resort left us feeling segregated and it was a huge disappointment that one of the three restaurants on site was for members only.  One of the swimming pools and bay front area were also only for members.  We stayed in the side with the members only pool, restaurant, and bay front area but because we were not members, could not enjoy any of it.  We could not even walk down one of the alleyways to the bay area without being chased away.  It was not what we expected from a
Manager Response: Hello GPC2,   Thank you for sharing your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased to hear your comments regarding our property’s well appointed, spacious, and immaculate atmosphere, beautiful bay front views, and loved reading your comments about the spacious and comfortable guestroom, as well as your satisfaction with the special dog amenities. However, I do apologize you felt segregated and not being able to enjoy the private Balboa Bay Club member-only facilities. We understand the frustration this can cause and never like to hear when any guest is not 100% satisfied with their entire experience. I will make sure your comments are shared with our team. Thank you again for sharing your comments and I hope you will decided to join us at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabba General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Lujon,  in engineering was a God Send to us in the Presidential suite this weekend . It was so big and so many devices that we weren't  sure how to  use, we couldn't have enjoyed our stay without his top notch technology assistance.  Thanks for  making our stay memorable.  Anne and Jennifer
Manager Response: Hello Anne and Jennifer,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear you had an enjoyable and memorable stay, and especially love to hear about the top-notched and helpful service you received from Lujon. I always enjoy hearing when our staff goes above and beyond to enhance our guest’s experiences. You can be sure your comments will be shared with Lujon and our entire team. We truly look forward to having you both stay with us the next time you visit Newport Beach.     Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Nice stay in well located area
Summary: Stayed for one night in this hotel. I stayed on the reception building but seems that on the other block rooms are better. Anyway, room was good, clean and confortable. Location is also good with marina front view. Breakfast on the restaurant was also good, offering healthy options. Overall good experience.
Manager Response: Hello RMPD,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased to hear your overall satisfaction with your entire stay, specifically the property’s waterfront location, your clean and comfortable guestroom, and heathy breakfast at Waterline. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you return to Newport Beach for business or leisure.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: A&O Restaurant - Amazing views, service and food.
Summary: We visited BBR for a family dinner celebration and it was absolutely perfect.  Upon entering the resort the manager Damien greeted us and showed us to the A&O restaurant on the property.  Our table was on the patio with amazing views of Newport Harbor.  We watched several boats sail by and we saw an amazing sunset from our table. Our server, Josh, was friendly, attentive and very helpful.  He recommended an appetizer and was engaging and made us feel as if we were having dinner in our home.  The food was excellent and we shared from each others plates because everyone's food was so good.  They validate parking so you just walk out to your car.  JR helped us get our tix validated and made sure we got our cars.  Overall every staff member we met was friendly and helpful.  This is
Manager Response: Hello Lawrence B., Thank you for choosing A&O Kitchen+Bar for your recent family dinner celebration and sharing your experience. I absolutely love to read how much you truly enjoyed your experience and couldn’t be more pleased with the personalized, friendly, helpful and engaging level of service you received from Damian, Josh, RJ and the entire resort and restaurant teams. I never tire of hearing when our staff goes above and beyond to enhance our guest’s experiences, especially when our guests are celebration special occasions with friends and family. We truly appreciate you sharing your great experience and you can be certain your comments will be shared with our Damian, Josh, RJ and the entire team. We truly look forward to having you and your family join us again at A&O Kitchen+Bar and Balboa Bay Resort very soon.    Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I don't ever book a hotel unless they have a good fitness center, and this resort does not if you aren't a "member". The resort's website was a bit misleading with it's description of the fitness center. For all the resort/amenity fees, and high room rates you'd think the fitness center for a non-member would be much better. We asked about using the "members" fitness center (which is much better), and we were turned away. We won't be staying here again.
Manager Response: Hello Christine C.,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I apologize our fitness studio did not meet your expectations and you felt mislead based on the information on our website. I truly hope other aspects and experiences during your stay were enjoyable. Please know your comments will be shared with our leadership team.  Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: After scoring a great rate through Trip Advisor, we were very excited to try this newly renovated hotel in Newport Beach: it did not disappoint! A spectacular view with a modern chic vibe. The rooms are beautiful and spacious. The bathroom is gorgeous and their decision to replace tubs with huge showers was awesome. The bed was very comfortable and the staff was very attentive. We loved the pool and the wait staff there saw to our every need. They even provide complimentary sunscreen. We ate in their casual restaurant, and the food was delish. We highly recommend the caramel bacon popcorn; it’s to die for. Put this on your list of must stay places in SoCal.
Manager Response: Hello Ibskuuter,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort based on reading through our Trip Advisor reviews and sharing your experience. I absolutely love to read how much you truly enjoyed your experience at our recently enhanced resort. I love to read your comments about the modern chic vibe, the spacious and gorgeous guest room, time at the pool and dining experience at A&O Kitchen+Bar. I also am very pleased to hear that our staff was attentive and incredibly helpful. I will certainly share your comments with our team. We truly appreciate you sharing so many great experiences and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you frequent Newport Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Thrilled to visit this beautiful resort from Chicago.  Beautiful finishes in room, excellent pool, exceptional service.  Staff seems geniunely interested in your comfort, extending gracious hospitality throughout hotel.  Only complaint is restaurant prices are very inflated.
Manager Response: Hello Cynthia G.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your visit from Chicago. I’m so pleased to you enjoyed the atmosphere of your guest room, pool, and entire property. I especially love to hear about the exceptional, genuine, and gracious service you received from our staff. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us again very soon.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Went to brunch at Waterline yesterday and it was fantastic!  The food was phenomenal and the scenery sitting on the patio overlooking the harbor was great, but the real highlight was the incredibly friendly and prompt service we received from our server James.  I plan on coming back soon.
Manager Response: Hello 18camerona,   Thank you joining us for Sunday brunch at Waterline and sharing your comments. I’m delighted you had such a phenomenal meal and truly enjoyed the scenery and atmosphere. I’m especially pleased at the incredibly friendly, prompt and personalized service you received from James. I’ll certainly share your comments with him and the entire Waterline team. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more wonderful dining experiences at Waterline soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Alexandra at the front desk is incredibly friendly and clearly takes pride in her work. She makes you feel like you’re the only one staying here, and treats you as a friend! Very great customer service!
Manager Response: Hello alh1419,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear your level of satisfaction with the friendly and professional service you received from Alexandra at the front desk. We strive to make each and every guest feel welcome and comfortable, so it’s always great to hear when our team members deliver and exceed expectation to enhance our guest’s overall experience. You can be certain your comments will be shared with Alexandra and our entire team. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The Bay Club lost its luster for a while, but this resort restores it.  Pricey but there is nothing like it anywhere else on the Bay.   spend the money for a bayview room.  The rooms on the PCH side of the resort have traffic noise issues and when you are that close to the bay, who doesn't want to see it out your window.
Manager Response: Hello Mike N.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased to hear how much you enjoyed the bay views and ambiance of our waterfront setting. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you choose to stay in Newport Beach for business or leisure.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My husband, 8yr old son and I had a great time.   Room on the bay was cozy and clean.  Room service was impeccable.  Food was great and overall service (poolside, valet etc.) was top notch.   We rented bikes and rode down by the beach and also went roller skating nearby.   Overall great time.  We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Hello Ashaki R.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your family getaway and sharing your experience. I’m so pleased you had a wonderful time in your cozy and clean room and had some great dining experience, both in room and poolside. I love to hear that our staff at the pool and valet provide top notch service. I’ll certainly share your comments with our entire team and we look forward to having you stay with us again for your next family outing.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Been staying at BBC for 20+ years.  It's tired, clientele has gone downhill, and we were asked to leave  breakfast because brunch was starting soon.  The classic charm is gone.  Hotel needs a serious face-lift. Won't be staying there again.
Manager Response: Hello steveclehman,  Thank you for your years of support for Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your most recent Sunday breakfast experience. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused when your party was asked to be moved in order for our Waterline team to set up for our Sparkling Wine Sunday Buffet Brunch Wine Festival event. As a four-diamond hotel, we strive to provide attentive, friendly, personalized and professional service. It appears you and your party did not receive the right communication when first being seated for breakfast. As a guest, we should never ask you to leave but rather provide an alternative location for your party to enjoy the remainder of your meal. Again, I apologize for the lack of proper communication and charm you experienced from our team. I will make sure your comments are shared so we can learn from this and make certain it doesn’t happen again. Thank you again for sharing your comments. I hope you will give us another opportunity at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We experienced a most attractive and well designed resort hotel. It was a pleasure to arrive at the bright and clean lobby with free glasses of wine to boot. The staff was attentive and the room was clean and well-laid out.. We enjoyed the friendly bar/restaurant which opened up to the dock and bay.We had zero problems or complaints during our visit which is rare indeed.
Manager Response: Hello Eugene F.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoyed the atmosphere, ambiance and cleanliness of the entire property, and had the opportunity to spend some quality time at A&O Kitchen+Bar. I’m especially pleased to read your comments regarding our attentive staff and had nothing but positive experiences throughout the course of your stay. Your feedback will certainly be shared with our entire staff and we look forward to having you back for another wonderful experience the next time you choose to spend time in Newport Beach.       Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This was the first time for me in Newport Beach and I found the Balboa Bay Resort to be a great place for business meetings and to bring the family. Everything was very clean and the service was excellent. I recommend to anyone looking to stay at a very nice place while visiting California.
Manager Response: Hello williem1234,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your first Newport Beach travel experience. I’m so pleased you found the property a great place for both business and family leisure and love to hear your comments about the clean atmosphere and excellent service from our staff. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time business brings you to Newport Beach or to host your family for a fun and relaxing getaway.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Hotel was very nice with great location on the marina. Staff were very courteous and friendly. Room was lovely, spacious and highly appointed. Bathroom was fabulous and huge. Great balcony. We would definitely stay there again when in the area.
Manager Response: Hello Cathie C.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so pleased to read how much you enjoyed the location and atmosphere of the property, specifically the spacious and highly appointed guest room. I’m especially pleased to hear about the courteous and friendly service you received from our team. I’ll certainly share your comments with our entire staff, and we look forward to having you back the next time you plan to be in the area.        Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Booked a family trip (7 people, age 24 to 62 years old) and everyone enjoyed the stay and highly praised this resort. The front desk was welcoming and jumped overboard to make sure we have a great experience. Damien treated us above and beyond expectations with a surprising bottle of Champagne and chocolates for all of us to enjoy, and even convinced a local restaurant to give us a table on Mother's Day. Becca was very helpful for our active family members and recommended both a jogging route and an outstanding hiking trail in the area, which was a great fit for all of us. If you go to Newport Beach, this is the place to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Ido E,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to enjoy your large family vacation and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear how much your entire family enjoyed your stay and received such welcoming and helpful service from our team. We strive to deliver personalized service, so it’s always great to hear when staff members like Damian and Becca deliver the extra touches to enhance our guest’s overall experience. You can be certain your comments will be shared with both of them, as well as our entire team. We truly look forward to welcoming you back and family back the next time you choose to vacation in Newport Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Beautiful place on the bay. The staff are courteous, friendly and very helpful.  The rooms are super clean and spacious. The restaurant server great food, fresh  and the cocktails are delicious. The live music on Thursday night was the cherry on top!
Manager Response: Hello kramezani,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m delighted you were so pleased with the beautiful and clean ambiance and had the opportunity to enjoy some great dining experiences at A&O during your stay. I’m most pleased to hear about the courteous, friendly, and helpful service you received from the A&O staff and our entire resort team. I’ll certainly share your comments with everyone. We look forward to having you back for another great experience very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This hotel was lovely.  The room was both elegant and comfortable.  The service was also impeccable and everyone we encountered was helpful!  We received both complementary wine and bottled water.  The entire experience was a treat!
Manager Response: Hello Kriston J.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m thrilled you found the hotel lovely and enjoy your elegant and comfortable guest room. I’m most pleased to read your wonderful comments regarding the impeccable and helpful service you received from our team. I look forward to sharing your remarks with our team and we certainly look forward to having you back for another wonderful stay very soon.       Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I was here on business. The staff was excellent willing to help me with anything and everything. The room was comfortable. Very quiet room. Fresh bottled water daily and a complimentary bottle of wine. First
Manager Response: Hello Dan W.,  Thank you for sharing your recent business travel experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased you found your guest room to be comfortable and quiet. I especially love to hear about the excellent and helpful service you received from our entire team. I never tire of reading when we deliver great experience to our guests. I’ll certainly share your comments with everyone and we look forward to having you stay with us the next business brings you back to Newport Beach.        Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I had a letter of introduction from my athletic club so had a room at a reduced rate on the members side of the hotel. This is a great perk if you belong to a club that reciprocates.  The room was beautiful, with a view of the yachts moored in front and the lawn between the hotel and members side. My family and I enjoyed after dinner drinks on the members side, with music, on Friday night, and then drinks and appetizers at the A+O Kitchen and Bar on Saturday night.  The pool on the hotel side is within the hotel, so no view of the water, but no wind either. The members pool is near the marina and was windy, but was nice and warm.  I had breakfast twice in the main hotel dining room, and it was very good, especially the breakfast sandwich with “duck bacon” (sort of like
Manager Response: Hello betsyco2016,   Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort for your recent family getaway to Newport Beach and sharing your comments. I’m so pleased our property, including the private Balboa Bay Club, provided such a great atmosphere for you to enjoy some great meals both in your guest room and at the property’s restaurants, and relaxing time by the pool. We look forward to hosting you and family for another wonderful visit very soon.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This was the perfect place to start our Newport Beach vacation. The overall look/feel of the resort is high end and trendy at the same time. The pool is amazing, the food onsite was outstanding and the attention to detail by the staff was as good as it gets. We will be back!
Manager Response: Hello karensandvik,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted your time with us was the perfect place to start your Newport Beach vacation, and how much you enjoyed the resort’s ambiance and amenities. I’m most pleased to hear about the outstanding and attentive service you received from our team. I’ll certainly share your comments with our entire staff, and we look forward to having you back for another wonderful Newport vacation soon.       Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort, I didn't want to leave.
Summary: I attended a conference being held at this resort otherwise I would not have known about it.  What can I say but it's lovely.  Beautiful grounds, lovely views, small beach and outdoor cocktail/restaurant seating overlooking the docks (and an impressive array of boats to drool over).  Friendly and helpful staff, good food and nice wine selection.  Great women's clothing shop on premise with unique clothing and accessories (plan on shopping, ladies and gents).  Okay, I admit, I didn't want to leave.  Treat yourself, you deserve it!
Manager Response: Hello SARChicago,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort for your business travels and sharing your comments. I’m so pleased you enjoyed your stay, ambiance and some of the property’s amenities such as our wonderful Bayfront Boutique. I especially like to hear about the friendly and helpful service you received from our staff and that you didn’t want to leave. We take great pride in delivery these type of memorial experiences for our guests. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our entire team and we look forward to hosting you again for both business and leisure the next time you visit Newport Beach.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My family and I recently stayed at Balboa Bay resort and had a great stay.  The venue is well presented, inviting and ideally suited to couples, singles and families alike.  The team we engaged with throughout our stay were helpful, polite and very client service focused.  Keep up the great work!!
Manager Response: Hello pantonius73,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your recent family getaway. I’m delighted how impressed you were with the property and absolutely love to hear about the helpful, polite and personalized service you received from our team. We will certainly keep up the good work and look forward to welcoming you and your family back very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I recently selected the Balboa Bay Resort as the destination for a romantic weekend sojourn with my Sweetheart. Not only were the positive online reviews confirmed by the level of service with which I was greeted, they were staggeringly exceeded. From the genuinely warm reception by Damian, Kat, Lauren, Brianna, Taylor, and Emily to the nuanced carry-service of our bellman Colin, we were at home on vacation.   Our room, a bay-facing suite with a lovely little terrace, was tastefully appointed with a tidy desk where I was able to plug into work at sunrise and a granite bathtub where I was able to unplug at sunset. The housekeeping staff surprised us with a beautiful chocolate-dipped strawberry, truffle, and balloon arrangement that rivaled any 5 star experience that my travels
Manager Response: Hello rimeldrew,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to enjoy your recent romantic weekend sojourn and sharing your experience. I absolutely love to read how much you truly enjoyed your experience and couldn’t be more pleased that the enchantments of the hotel held you and your sweetheart luxuriously captive throughout the entire weekend. I also couldn’t be more pleased with the genuine, warm and personalized service you received from so many members of our team, specifically the front desk of Damian, Kat, Lauren, Brianna, Taylor, Emily, Colin, Zack, and Dan. I never tire of hearing when our team goes above and beyond to enhance our guest’s time on property, and it is clearly evident within your detailed remarks that this was the case during your stay. We truly appreciate you sharing so many great experiences in so much detail. You can be sure your comments will be shared with our front desk team, and entire staff. We truly look forward to having you and your sweetheart back for your next romantic weekend very soon.    Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Great Stay At Balboa Bay Resot
Summary: My wife and I stayed for our 10th anniversary and couldn't have been happier or more satisfied. From the moment we walked in the staff was very hands on and helpful. Once they found out it was our anniversary everyone from the front desk to the pool area congratulated us on our anniversary. It doesn't seem like much but those little touches meant a lot. Also during the stay and afterwards Lauren Beazley was beyond helpful and nice. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello croesti,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to enjoy your very special 10th anniversary and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear your level of satisfaction with the professional and helpful service you received from the moment you arrived. We strive to deliver personalized service, so it’s always great to hear when our team members deliver the extra touches to enhance our guest’s overall experience. You can be certain your comments will be shared with Lauren, as well as our entire team. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next anniversary celebration or relaxing getaway very soon.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Dear Tiana,  My wife and I want to express our deepest gratitude to you and your staff for doing such a wonderful job on Saturday evening. A very special thanks to Events Manager Katie Pool. She was our Rock Star from her immediate responses to every email or other request to her flexibility in accepting on last-minute changes all the way up to the day of the event. We can't say enough about the staff and management that evening, always asking us if we needed anything else or anything changed. Many of our friends and family have commented it was the nicest event they've ever been to. Our biggest surprise was the wedding suite that was included for Friday and Saturday night. OMG! We had a group of friends come over after the reception and all were stunned at the beauty, size and
Manager Response: Hello dalitaherdrich,  Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful comments regarding your recent wedding-vow-renewal-weekend experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I couldn’t be more delighted to hear about the outstanding, professional and efficient service you received from Tiana, Katie, and our entire team to make it such a nice event and moment. I also love that you enjoyed your suite on Friday and Saturday. Please know your comments will be shared with Tiana, Katie and our staff. We look forward to having you and your wife back for many more weekend getaways or special events in the very near future.     Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Unbelievable. Checked into the Courtyard King on Saturday & we were greeted by the nicest people. Everyone is happy to have their jobs at this property and it shows in the quality of the service. We had some GREAT old fashioned's at the Waterline restaurant and enjoyed a well-presented dessert in the late night. We were absolutely blown away by the serenity of the courtyard at night. This morning, we had breakfast overlooking the pool & if I could give 100 stars for that, I would. Start to finish, absolutely wonderful.   The final piece of our staycation was our Sunday Funday! We requested a late check out & relaxed by the pool & walked around the beautiful property. The bartender! This guy has it together! His name was Nick, & he made us drinks & was knowledgable about the
Manager Response: Hello Chris B.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to enjoy your anniversary staycation and sharing your experience. I absolutely love to hear about the professional, personalized, and friendly service you received from our team throughout your stay. It’s wonderful to also hear how much you enjoyed your dining experiences at Waterline and relaxing time at our newly enhanced pool. You can be sure your comments will be shared with Nick, along with our entire team. We truly look forward to having you and your significant other back the next time you’re looking to enjoy a quick and local relaxing getaway.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Very much enjoyed my business trip staying at the Balboa Bay Resort.  I thought it was the perfect ambiance for getting work done in a spacious room but having a resort and relaxed feel.  There is so much to d within 2 miles of the place.  Staff was very friendly and I will come back in the future.  Small nuance is that the towels in the bathroom were dated and not soft anymore.  Not worth dropping a star for but not perfect :).  Gym was very nice, spacious and 24 hours, but not as much equipment as some resorts that offer a full gym.  All in all, great stay and pleased.
Manager Response: Hello Jerry S.,   Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort for your business travels and and sharing your comments. I’m so pleased our property provided the perfect ambiance for both work and relaxation. I especially like to hear that that our staff provided friendly and helpful service, and that you plan to stay with us again. I look forward to sharing your comments with our team and welcoming you back for business or leisure the next time you visit Newport Beach.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This hotel is luxury! We were upgraded to the suite and it was incredible - exactly what we needed after a terrible small room which we had in Los Angeles. The service was amazing and the valet guys were super helpful. Pool was refreshing and room service was beyond amazing.  Will definitely be back. A highlight of our trip so far!
Manager Response: Hello Sammi H,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted to hear your time with us was the highlight of your trip, and how much you enjoyed your suite, in-room dining, and time at our newly enhanced pool.  I’m most pleased to hear about the amazing and helpful service you received from our valet team and entire team. I’ll certainly share your comments with our staff and we look forward to having you back for another wonderful getaway very soon.       Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: The Balboa Bay Resort - True Newport Beach
Summary: Visiting the greater Orange County area is complete when staying at the Balboa Bay Resort.  This is a property with a wonderful Southern California heritage founded by classic Hollywood luminaries including John Wayne and Humphrey Bogart (Wayne lived in the neighborhood).  It is close to major business in Irvine and areas surrounding Orange County airport.  You'll find it to be friendly, relaxed, comfortable, and beautifully maintained with an understated and casual elegance.  The dining room and lounge both face yachts docked right there at the property - no other local lodging option has such an outlook.  The staff is delightful at all levels...and rates are comparable (if not less than) costs of other local lodging options.  We have stayed at Balboa Bay Resort multiple times
Manager Response: Hello jamesrD5534TO,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you enjoyed your stay and love to hear your comments regarding the property’s heritage and casual elegant atmosphere. I’m especially pleased that our staff provided delightful service during your multiple visits. We truly look forward to having you stay with us again very soon.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Awesome trip to Newport Beach. We went on a staycation and really enjoyed the time spent. The rooms are fantastic, the staff is fantastic and the bar is fantastic!  If you want to be treated to a great local experience this is the place!
Manager Response: Hello jeffreyhJ8462MD,  Thank you for sharing your recent staycation experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m thrilled how much you enjoyed your time spent on property and love to hear your comments about the fantastic service your received from our staff. I always love reading when we deliver a true Newport Beach experience to our guests. I will certainly share your wonderful comments with our entire team. We truly look forward to having you back for another staycation and great local experience very soon.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We drove down to the Balboa Bay Resort for Easter. We booked two rooms and had to wait two hours for them to be ready. Nothing was done to accommodate the wait either . Granted we came before the 4 pm check in time ( which is late to begin with). But the rooms were not ready by4 pm either . Just not a good thing for a hotel of this class and price level . The pool was barely heated ( impossible to use - too cold) and it was in kind of a boxed in area ( not ocean fascing ). Just one -very small jacuzzi. The next door club had a loud Easter event that woke us up ( we had a bay fascing room). The rooms have an ok size and decor . But nothing super special. We had breakfast in our ocean fascing Terrasse . It arrived luke warm and was nothing special. Too expensive for what it was
Manager Response: Hello Jeanette B,  Thank you for taking the time to share your Easter weekend experience. I apologize your stay didn’t meet your expectations, specifically with regards to the check-in delay and noise level from the children’s Easter event. We take great pride in exceeding all our guest experiences and are disappointed when we fall short. I will make sure your comments are shared with our team. I hope you will give us another opportunity as some point in the future.   Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: From moment one I could tell this place was different. My sister and I were here for a girls weekend and we were blown away by our stay. We literally said to each other “this hotel doesn’t do anything wrong”. Everything... the decor, views, pool, surprise complimentary wine and water in our room, toiletries, lighting/tech, even the bedside clock... everything was perfection.  On thing that made our stay so exceptional was Damian. Through friendly conversation, Damian took an interest in why we were there and went above and beyond to make our stay special. He gave us a spot on dinner reservation, and when we returned to our room, he had sent a handwritten note. Who does that anymore? Damian does. Balboa Bay Resort is better because of him. I am a firm believer that people can
Manager Response: Hello Jenna B.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to enjoy a fun girls weekend with your sister and sharing your experience. I absolutely love to hear how much you enjoyed your entire experience. I especially love to hear about the friendly and personalized service you received from Damian. I never tire of hearing when our team goes above and beyond to enhance our guest’s time on property, so thank you for sharing. I’ll certainly share your comments with Damian and our entire team. We truly look forward to having you and your sister back the next time you’re looking to enjoy a girl’s weekend.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Beware that this hotel is very inflexible on bookings. I had booked a trip for my wife and daughter for a trip away for 4 nights through hotels.com. We needed to change to 3 nights due to change in school spring break dates but were told upon check in that this was not possible and we would be charged for 4 nights. There was no flexibility at all. We went back to Hotels.com, who were very helpful and were willing to make the change without cost....however the Balboa Resort refused. Really poor customer service......
Manager Response: Hello Francis C,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I truly sympathize and apologize for the trouble and frustration you experienced with you reservation change request. Unfortunately, when a reservation is made through an OTA, like Hotels.com, the actual confirmation comes from them directly, not Balboa Bay Resort. While we strive to accommodate our guests in anyway, we aren’t always able to adjust OTA reservation requests based on present availability. I apologize we were not able to make the reservation change. Please know your comments regarding the poor customer service will be reviewed and thoroughly discussed. I hope you will give us another opportunity as some point in the future. Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This is a wonderful spot  - fabulous staff, nice rooms, pool area very relaxing, lovely new spa, good food and such a pretty location on the water. Can't wait to return! Even though it's close to the main road, its secluded enough to enjoy peace and quiet.
Manager Response: Hello Suzzywalsh,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed our property and had the opportunity to experience so many of the wonderful amenities. I’m most pleased to hear that our staff provided fabulous service. We truly look forward to having you back the next time you visit Newport Beach.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: It Couldn't Have Been Any Better!!
Summary: We held our annual Luncheon at the hotel and everything was fabulous; as a matter of fact, it couldn't have been any better. From the time we contracted and started working with the catering and logistics staff, we knew that we had selected the right place. Everyone went out of their way to make sure that they accurately understood what our goals were so they could help us reach them - and we did! We smoothly transitioned 250 guests through a pop-up boutique, silent auction and luncheon with fashion show without a hitch. We were delighted with the service we received and actually were able to enjoy the event as much as our guests did. Job well done!
Manager Response: Hello sccjohnson,  Thank you for sharing your wonderful luncheon experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so thrilled how much you and your guests enjoyed the event, and especially love to hear that our staff provided such attentive and professional service. I’ll certainly share your remarks with our entire team and we look forward to having you join us again soon for another luncheon hopefully very soon.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Stayed here for four nights and was very happy with our accommodations. The room was spacious and quiet with a great view. The staff was friendly and helpful. Fitness center, pool and hot tub were all well maintained. Would definitely come here again!
Manager Response: Hello Beth C,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m thrilled how much you enjoyed your four-night stay and were so pleased with your spacious guest room and the resort’s amenities. I especially love to hear about the friendly and helpful service you received from our entire team. I always love reading when we deliver a true Newport Beach experience to our guests. I’ll certainly share your comments with everyone and we look forward to having you stay with us again soon.       Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I have stayed here twice now by choice. We have two rooms one bayfront and one standard for our sons. It is worth every penny for the bayview room with balcony. The decor is pleasant, room service is excellent. We ate onsite in a gastropub type ambiance. Very nice food with live music when we were there on a Friday night. Outside there is comfortable seating and firepits. There is a pool with sunbeds in an enclosed courtyard type area. When checking in I would advise against being put in the other building, the main building is much better. The hotel is not overbig but good location. There is valet parking, selfserve isnt woth the hassle they valet men are superquick and polite. This hotel is not cheap but you get what you pay for and I love it.
Manager Response: Hello benmores,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m thrilled how much you and your family enjoyed your time with us for the second time. I love to hear your comments regarding the décor, atmosphere and satisfaction of your dining experiences, both at A&O and in your guest room. You can be certain your comments with be shared with our team and we look forward to having you and family stay with us again very soon.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resor

Summary: Wonderful place to stay and refresh.  The staff is over the top friendly and helpful.  Plenty of dining options and good night life as well.  Rooms are very clean, quiet and comfortable.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Hello thruby,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m thrilled how much you enjoyed your refreshing stay in our clean and comfortable guest rooms, and had the opportunity to have some great dining experiences with good night life. I’m most pleased to hear about the exceptional over the top service you received from our entire team. I always love reading when we deliver a true Newport Beach experience to our guests. You can be certain I’ll share your comments with everyone here on property and we look forward to having you stay with us again during your next to the area.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I went to this hotel on company business and never saw the bill, so I can't speak much about price, however my room was very nice and clean.  The bed was very comfortable.  My room had a small balcony seating area which I would likely have used if I was there longer. Table w/2 chairs and 2 additional cushioned chairs.  Extra large shower, no tub. separate toilet area, Keurig machine.  In room medium sized Evion water I saw had a 8.00 price tag!!! Ouch!!!  Staff was all very nice and helpful.  We took about a 15 minute drive to Mastro's...that is a must go to restaurant that is nearby.
Manager Response: Hello cdjopinion,   Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m pleased you enjoyed your guest room and very much like to hear that our staff provided friendly and helpful service. I’ll certainly share your remarks with team and hope to welcome you back for business or leisure the next time you visit Newport Beach.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I stayed here for one night celebrating my friend’s birthday and we had a great time. Everyone from valet to housekeeping was fantastic. Damian and Brianna at the front desk made our stay even better by putting balloons and some truffles in our room while we were at dinner. Food at A&O was great for dinner, having a cocktail at the fire pits with the view of the harbor is priceless. Will definitely come back!”
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to review experience. I’m so pleased you and your friend choose Balboa Bay Resort to celebrate this special birthday and delighted to hear how much you enjoyed everything, especially the friendly and personalized service you received from Damian, Brianna, and our entire team. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our entire team. We look forward to having you and your friend back for many more memorable experiences very soon.     Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My wife and I stayed for a quick getaway weekend and it was magic!  We were greeted by JR who welcomed us and diecrted us to check in.  Damien and his team were amazing and made check in so easy.  In fact every staff member we ran into was so nice and so friendly.  We had happy hour drinks in A&O and Tara was so helpful and friendly and after drinks we took the shuttle to a local restaurant for dinner.  Our room was amazing with a stunning view of the bay behind the resort.   It was hard to leave and I wish we had booked a longer stay.  I wish I could give extra stars,
Manager Response: Hello Lawrence B.,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to enjoy a quick getaway weekend and sharing your experience. I absolutely love to hear about the personalized and friendly service you received upon arrival from JR, during check in from Damian, as well as our entire team throughout the duration of your stay. It’s wonderful to also hear how much you enjoyed A&O and your guest room. You can be sure your comments will be shared with everyone. We truly look forward to having you and your wife back the next time you’re looking to enjoy a quick weekend getaway.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I love this hotel. Great location and water views. The thing that stands out for me is the service. It is outstanding!  The ambiance is what you would expect from a 5 Star but being on the water adds a little something extra.
Manager Response: Hello Gbusiek,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted how much you loved the hotel, location and atmosphere. I’m especially pleased to hear about the outstanding 5-star level service you received from our entire team. You can be sure your comments will be shared with everyone and we look forward to hosting you for another great experience the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We loved our stay at Balboa Bay Resort. It has all the bells and whistles. Spacious rooms, large comfortable baths and great service.  Every aspect of the staff from parking valets to front desk to wait staff to housekeeping are exceptional. The location is easy to access and right on the harbor. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Hello Anglophile20, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m thrilled how much you loved your stay and the entire atmosphere of the property, specifically the spacious and guest rooms. I’m most pleased to hear about the exceptional service you received from our entire team. I always love reading when we deliver a true Newport Beach experience to our guests. You can be certain I’ll share your comments with everyone here on property and we look forward to having you stay with us again during your next to the area.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I recently stayed at this beautiful boutique style hotel. The accommodations are Gorgeous! They are veryluxurious with Frette linens and fresh bath products.  Rooms are spacious, light, and airy. This hotel has a definite coastal feel and is located bayfront. I dined at both restaurants at the hotel, A&O and Waterline. Brunch and dinner or both amazing! Both are lively spots and the bar has live music at night. Cocktails and food are reasonably priced. Valet parking is quick and easy!  There is also a spa located on site with very competitive pricing. The grounds are immaculate, and the views are breathtaking. There is outdoor seating at both restaurants, although I do recommend a reservation for preferred seating. I will definitely return.
Manager Response: Hello MDKlein43,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed our beautiful boutique style hotel and atmosphere. I love to hear your comments regarding your spacious and airy guest room and wonderful dining experiences at both Waterline and A&O. I’m also very pleased to hear about quick, efficient and friendly service you receive from our valet team. I’ll definitely share your wonderful comments with our entire team. We truly look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you are in town.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Just would like to be on the third floor when situated with a view of the drive up to see the Bay otherwise the room area was still good and convenient and noise level was fine and did not disturb us.
Manager Response: Hello Gayle F.,   Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort. While I understand a view of the beautiful Balboa bay adds to the overall experience, I’m pleased you enjoyed your room and had a convenient stay. I hope you will choose to saty with us the next time you frequent Newport Beach.    Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Very nice hotel with many amenities that is excellent for corporate events.  The staff and workers are very friendly and helpful.  Located conveniently off the PCH with many activity options available nearby.
Manager Response: Hello danielpX7104UG,   Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased you enjoyed the property, location and our many great amenities for corporate events. I’m most pleased to hear that our staff was friendly and helpful. I’ll certainly share your remarks with our entire team and we look forward to having you join us again soon the next time you visit Newport Beach.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The Balboa Bay Resort is a gem nestled in the Newport Beach harbor.  The view of all of the yachts tied up at the doc, the wonderful rooms, the great bar and the fine breakfast room make for a great place to stay if your travels bring you to Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Hello Kenneth E N,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you enjoyed so many of the resort’s amenities and atmosphere. We are very proud of our location and delivery a true Newport Beach experience to our guests. I’ll definitely share your comments with our entire staff and we look forward to having you stay with us again during your next visit to Newport Beach.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Great stay in a beautiful location
Summary: Stayed here for two days on a business trip. Conference facilities were good for a small group. Room was great and the view over the bay was gorgeous. Everything, including food and service, was excellent.
Manager Response: Hello Francesa,   Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your two-day business trip and sharing your experience. I’m delighted you enjoyed the food, meeting rooms, guest room and views of the gorgeous Balboa Bay. I also very much like to hear about the excellent service you received from our staff. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our team and we look forward to having you stay with us the next time business brings you to the area.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Valet parking service is the best.  The staff is courteous, friendly and very helpful.  The servers in restaurants were also courteous, friendly and very helpful.  Our room had major upgrades since the last time we stayed here. Indeed, the entire hotel has been upgraded.  We barely recognized the lobby.  This is a 5 star luxury hotel in my opinion.
Manager Response: Hello J621KHdanielg,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed our recently enhanced property and felt it is a 5-star luxury hotel. I’m especially pleased to hear about courteous, friendly and helpful service you received from our valet team, restaurant staff and entire team. I’ll definitely share your comments with everyone and we look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you choose to visit Newport Beach.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I decided to celebrate my wife’s birthday and our anniversary at this resort and, I’m so happy we stayed here. Everything was first class from check-in to check-out. Great location with amazing staff especially Damian who made our weekend so special.
Manager Response: Hello S B,  Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort to celebrate your wife’s birthday and sharing your experience. I love to hear how much you enjoyed everything from check-in to check-out, and most pleased to hear about the friendly and personalized service you received from Damian to make it such a memorable weekend. We look forward to having you and your wife join us again the next time you’re looking to celebrate a special occasion.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Love the Location and the Service is Super!
Summary: Spent a couple of work/fun days with my gal. The hotel is great. Service wonderful. View - right on the water. Only downside was our room (#115) was directly across the fitness center. Nothing like hearing doors open, weights being dropped, treadmill running at 5:30 am.  That being said, we would definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Hello rmarkman,   Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the entire property and views of the water. I do apologize however for the noise coming from our fitness studio across from your guestroom. I’m very glad to hear it didn’t impede upon your time with your significant other and you plan to return for another great experience soon. We look forward to having you back the next time you frequent the area.  Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Best Birthday at Balboa Bay Resort!
Summary: My husband booked this hotel for my birthday, and we had a wonderful time. The view from our room was spectacular. Loved the Frette robes and sheets, felt so pampered and slept fabulously. A big thanks goes out to Damian at the front desk, not sure how he knew it was my birthday, but he went out of his way to make my birthday that much more special. The staff was awesome, and they made our stay so memorable that I can't wait to come back. Thanks again, Damian.
Manager Response: Hello Peggy B.,   Thank you for taking the time to review your birthday experience. I’m so pleased your husband choose to celebrate your special day with us at Balboa Bay Resort and delighted to hear how much you enjoyed everything, especially the friendly and personalized service you received from Damian and our entire staff. You can be certain your comments will be shared with our entire team. We look forward to having you back for many more memorable experiences some time very soon.     Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I cannot describe how beautiful the room and view was.  Upon my arrival, the sun was setting against the enormous yachts providing us a breathtaking view.  The room was perfect...and clean!  So clean in fact, my wife took a bath, which I have never seen her do in a hotel restroom.  She did a little cleanliness test, and it passed.  We even used the comforter while sleeping The food was excellent and staff was even better.  We had a 2 day workshop and they provided us top notch service.  After setting down a dirty dishes on the tray, they were immediately  picked up.  All servers had a smile and were eager to tend to all our needs.
Manager Response: Hello Mike B., Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your guest room and the entire atmosphere of the property. I’m especially pleased to hear about the top-notch and friendly service you received from our catering and banquet team. I’ll definitely share your comments with our entire staff. We look forward to having you stay with us again during your next workshop or leisure visit to Newport Beach.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Great setting, staff need hospitality training
Summary: Beautiful setting but the staff consistently lacked enthusiasm and basic hospitality skills. The front desk staff seemed more interested in catching up with each other than taking care of welcoming our stay. Someone came to clear our table and I thought he was some guy off the street as he had casual clothing on and didn't smile, introduce himself, etc. I gave him a look like what's up and he abruptly responded I'm here to clear the plates... just not the service I expect at a high end establishment. I really like the location, rooms, etc.. just a little basic hospitality could go a long way
Manager Response: Hello Rosemary F.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. While pleased to hear you enjoyed the beautiful setting of the property, I’m disappointed to read that our level of staff service missed the mark. We truly strive and train our team to deliver personalized, attentive, welcoming and friendly service for each and every guest, so I never like to hear when we fall short of our goals. Please know your comments will be share with our entire team so we can use this for learning and continued growth. I hope you choose to stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort so we can deliver the experience I know we’re capable of providing.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Great location right by the harbor, next to boats at their slips.  Room was large, quiet, clean and comfortable.  Front-desk and restaurant service was faultless.  Bar was buzzing on a Friday night with live music.
Manager Response: Hello Jon H.,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoy your clean, spacious and comfortable guestroom and had the chance to enjoy live music and the energy of A&O. I’m especially like to hear your comments about the faultless service you received from our teams at the front desk and A&O. I never tier of hearing these great comments and knowing we are achieving our goals. I’ll definitely share your comments with our entire team and we look forward to having you stay with us again.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We stayed for two nights and the service from check-in when they changed the bed type to king as requested to checkout  could not have been better.  We stayed across the drive from the main hotel by the spa and the rooms wee quiet and comfortable.  You do need a car if you are going to leave the resort.  The Waterline Restaurant food quality was top notch.  The rack of lamb was as good as I have had anywhere.
Manager Response: Hello robertaF3423HH,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience and choosing to stay with us Balboa Bay Resort. I’ve delighted you enjoy your quiet and comfortable guestroom and had the opportunity to have a wonderful meal at Waterline. I’m most pleased to hear about the wonderful service you received from the moment you checked in. We take great pride on delivery exceptional and personalized service, so it’s always great to hear when we deliver.  I’ll certainly share your comments with our entire team. We truly look forward to hosting you for another quiet and relaxing stay the next time you frequent the area.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Our actual stay was great. I wasn't too pleased 3 days later when my account was hit with a $250 fee dor smoking in the room. The problem is, my wife has asthma so i couldn't even smoke in the room if I wanted to break that policy.
Manager Response: Hello 520jeff,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort. I apologize for the miscommunication regarding our smoking policy as we do not allow smoking in our guestrooms. We have designated smoking areas in multiple locations around the perimeter of the property. I understand you did admit to smoking on the balcony of your guestroom, which we do consider as part of the actual room. I apologize if this was not made clear and that it negatively impacted your overall experience. Please know your comments will be shared with our leadership team.  Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: After reading all the positive reviews I decided to stay but was quoted prices with hidden fees and had a negative overall experience.  Quoted $207 when checking in but it didn't include "amenities fee" and tax.. Also $35 mandatory valet (or $30 self park) with expectations of a tip. Turned out to be $130 over quoted price. It cost $0-$10 to park on the vacant streets of Newport Beach. Location decent but not as close to Balboa Island as was led to believe when checking in and deciding to buy room. We were also given room right on the noisy PCH highway in a nearly vacant hotel (Sunday night). Highly recommend finding somewhere else with better value
Manager Response: Hello johnathans875,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I apologize for the miscommunication regarding the cost of your stay and that it negatively impacted your overall experience. Please know your comments will be shared with our leadership team.  Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Classy and relaxing atmosphere. Great customer service. Spent lots of time conversing with employee Spencer Brooks. Great guy, bright future. Would highly recommend this resort. Location is ideal. Great food too.
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so pleased you had a fantastic stay and felt the hotel was amazing. I especially love to hear about the great service you received from Spncer at A&O. I’ll certainly share your comments with him and we look forward to hosting again very soon.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Excellent hospitality in the restaurant Waterline , Victoria provided wonderful service and was very dedicated to the restaurant , top quality cuisine representative of the resort and met expectations.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for joining us at Waterline and sharing your experience. I’m delighted that you had a great meal and it met your expectations. I’m also very pleased to hear about the exceptional service you received from Victoria. I will defineltly share these comments with her and the entire team at Waterline. We look forward to having you join us for many more meals along the water’s edge.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabba General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Stayed there with pet on New Years Eve and several nights afterwards. Changed rooms to a quieter part of the property- no problem. Service was excellent. Food is great. Pool is wonderful for lap swimmers. A restful way to recover from Christmas and begin the new year.
Manager Response: Hello Patricia C.,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort to celebrate your New Year’s Eve and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased you had an enjoyable and restful stay, and love to hear that you experience such excellent service from our team. I will certainly share your remarks with our entire staff and look forward to having you join us again soon for another relaxing retreat.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Just spent three nights in the recently updated Balboa Bay.  They put me in the Private club area in a very spacious comfortable room.  There is a nice patio and a lovely view of the water and the boats in the dock.  The in-room amenities are quite nice and the staff is friendly and helpful.  The hotel's location off a busy street is problematic if you are not on the water side of the hotel as it can be quite loud.  Worth paying a bit more for the water view.  Was disappointed that I was not able to use the "member" facilities-gym, pool and dining.  Was told I needed to go across to the hotel side of the property.  Seemed unnecessary as there was no one using any of the facilities. Also if valet parking is not included in your rate, do not pay the high price.  Just park on the
Manager Response: Hello healthspacritic,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m pleased to hear that you enjoyed your spacious guest room and in-room amenities, and especially like to hear that our staff provided friendly and helpful service. I do apologize that you were disappointed for not being able to utilize the private Balboa Bay Club facilities. I hope you choose to stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort the next time you are in the area.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Stayed here for a minerals conference, the first stay in LA area. It is a first class hotel with beautiful rooms and facilities. Good swimming pool and great coffee shop/snack restaurants with friendly staff. Superb location overlooking a massive marina full of very expensive boats. I was told this is one of the wealthiest areas in USA. 10 minutes along the road are several excellent restaurants. A group of us went to Billy's seafood recommended by the concierge. It was perfect for our group on two evenings.
Manager Response: Hello murray_lines, Thank you for sharing your recent conference experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed our waterfront location, guest room, and many of the on-property facilities. We look forward to hosting you and your group again the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: THANK YOU!!!  BECCA, JR, KORI, COLE,STEVE, SEAN.....
Summary: Just stayed at the Bay Club and had a really wonderful time.  All the staff especially, Becca making sure the room was just right for our family, JR remembering where I like the dogs beds placed, Kori helping with the broken bottle of wine....just everyone working together to save the day and making sure it was special for me and my family.  I really appreciate the time and care you all took to make sure we had a wonderful visit.  Thanks so much!
Manager Response: Hello Rhonda W., Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments.
