I’m very pleased you had an enjoyable experience with your family and love to hear how about the friendly and accommodating service you received from Becca, JR, Kori and our entire staff. You can be certain I will share your wonderful remarks with our entire team and we look forward to having you join us again soon the next time you and your family visit Newport Beach.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My wife & I stayed one night recently and I will say that it's a nice property situated across the waterway from Lido Isle.  It was pretty cool to see the yachts docked up just outside the rear of the building all lit up and decked out for the holidays.  Our room was nice, modern & clean.  However after a ridiculous, pretentious resort fee and valet parking fee this night got pricey quick.  The only thing that half way made up for it was the complimentary full bottle of red wine and bottled water in our room.    I didn't get the best night sleep due to someone in the room above us that sounded like they were pacing the floor all night in high heels.  Also around 6:30am someone in the room next to us kept knocking on the common wall.  Cheaply built building apparently.    We also
Manager Response: Hello Legamania, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. While I like you and your wife enjoyed the atmosphere of the property and the modern and clean rooms, I’m disappointed to hear about the inconvenience you encountered with the noise levels that surrounded your guest room and the shuttle service. We do in fact offer complimentary shuttle service for our guests within a two-mile radius of the property, and train our valet team to communicate the shuttle availability to our guests in a professional manner. I apologize that our team didn’t deliver the friendly and professional service we strive to provide to all our guests. I will certainly share your comments with our management and team members so we can learn from this and make certain it doesn’t happen again. Thank you again for sharing your comments. I hope you will give us another opportunity at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Certainly on the high end, this place was outstanding. From check in to check out, we truly enjoyed our stay here. The concierge was helpful in getting us a reservation on short notice, and each of the service folks was accommodating,  Worth a stop.
Manager Response: Hello David J.,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased you had an enjoyable experience and love to hear how about the friendly and accommodating service you received from staff, specifically the concierge who helped in getting you the last-minute reservations. You can be certain I will share your remarks with our entire team and we look forward to having you join us again soon the next time you visit Newport Beach.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Made to order omelets, fresh locks, shrimp cocktail, waffles with warm syrup, cheese selection, fresh fruit and more. The beautifully appointed resort offers a great weekend brunch. I took my family on their recent visit on Sunday morning. They loved it. Views of Newport Bay only enhanced the experience.
Manager Response: Hello Carolyn B.m, Thank you for sharing your comment. I’m delighted you had a wonderful Sunday brunch experience with your family at Waterline. I love to hear how much you enjoyed all the offerings, atmosphere and views. I will certainly share your comments with the entire Waterline staff and we look forward to having you join us for many more Sunday brunches soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We decided to do a local getaway & I saw Balboa Bay Resort online along with great reviews. Well, now I’m adding another great review!  The resort/hotel was beautiful & the staff was very hospitable & friendly. The one that stuck out most & went the extra mile, was Korie!! She was amazing & went above & beyond to make sure we got what we wanted & enjoyed our stay. We got a room with an amazing pool area view! It was gorgeous!  Our heat wasn’t working so we were cold all night. Hwvr, once we called about it, & the maintenance guy came, it was fixed within 5 mins!! There was also mistake on the bill, so I called & it was corrected right away.  Even with minor issues, they corrected/fixed them very quickly. The bar, restaurant, & cafe were also great with excellent staff. I will
Manager Response: Hello, Thank you for choosing Balboa Bay Resort for your local getaway and sharing your recent experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your stay and dining experiences, and especially pleased to hear about the friendly and great level of service you received from our staff, specifically Kori at the front desk. While I apologize you encountered issues with you’re the room heater and bill, I’m very glad to hear how quickly and efficiently our team responded and rectified the problems. I’ll certainly share your kind comments with Kori and our entire staff. We look forward to hosting you for your next local getaway again very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Arriving at the hotel and receiving a warm welcome from bellman and valet, we knew that we had made a great choice in our hotel stay.  Our room on third floor overlooking the large pool was large as well as very well laid out. As well, the bathroom vanity was large and perfect for two people getting ready at the same time.  But probably my favorite part of the hotel was that it was alongside the marina and we had a great view with large yachts from the deck and restaurants.  Don’t miss the romantic fire pits in the bar. We spent our evenings there with glasses of wine and good conversation.  Housekeeping forgot to leave wash cloths on the second and third evenings but that’s a minor detail as we enjoyed our stay immensely.
Manager Response: Hello Denise L., Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted you truly enjoyed the property, atmosphere and some of the wonderful amenities. I’m most pleased however to hear about the warm welcome and great service you received from our bellman and valet team. We strive to provide our guests with personal, friendly and efficient service so it always pleases me when we achieve our goals. I’ll definitely share your comments with our entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us again during your next visit to the area.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Great trip and experience at Balboa Bay Resort. Best part about the resort is the first and last impression from the Valet staff. Dane Palanjian and Matt Weeks provided service above and beyond normal to me and my extended family. We had a large contingent to move around and they offered us great solutions and service the entire stay.  Thanks Guys!!
Manager Response: Hello tom g., Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so pleased to hear how much you your time with us and especially love to hear about the fantastic service you received from Dane, Matt and the entire valet team. I’ll certainly share your comments with them along with our entire staff. We truly look forward to hosting you and your large contingent the next time you visit Newport Beach.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I cannot say enough about this 4 diamond hotel : It is one of my favorites after this visit and will definitely come back . It stands out because it is stylish , clean , and not overdone . This last feature is what makes it special .  Everything has been tastefully chosen including colors of furniture , and drapes . The art adds contrast and all combine to create a cheerful yet very classy atmosphere . The rooms are big and the bathroom is large with walk in shower.  The hotel has a heated pool (82 degrees F) so we were comfortable swimming even in early morning in November . The pool area has cabanas ( extra charge ) and pool beds ( some are free ) . They offer water , towels and sunscreen all for free !!! The pool area is connected to my favorite place : cafe blend . They have
Manager Response: Hello Sam k, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoyed the property, specifically the décor, atmosphere and amenities. We strive to provide our guests with he quintessential Southern California lifestyle experience and based on your comments, it appears we succeeded. I’ll definitely share your comments with our staff. We look forward to having you stay with us again during your next visit to the area.      Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: What can I say - this was an amazing resort and we had a fabulous time!  The A&O restaurant staff were wonderful, especially Deeana who quickly learned our drink preferences and treated us like old friends.  The bay view room is a must-have!  So romantic eating breakfast on our balcony with the incredible view of the expensive yachts and other watercraft cruising by.  We loved the personal room amenities including a fragrant shower gel and bath crystals - and a delightful anniversary  gift of chocolates. :)  Our couples massage at the spa was so relaxing, and we topped it off with a wonderful dinner at Waterline.  They even made us a special dessert plate for our anniversary!  Outstanding service all around.
Manager Response: Hello belinda774, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your time with us and had the opportunity to enjoy so many of our amenities. I love to hear your comments about the outstanding service you experienced all around and especially the friendliness from Deanna at A&O. I’ll certainly share your feedback with our entire team and we very much look forward to having you stay with us the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: The Lady Bug Festival in Charleston, SC
Summary: the Balboa Bay was amazing! I loved the offerings in all the restaurants, gorgeous bay views, awesome pool w great accommodations but most of all the customer service! Becca Willis went above and beyond to accommodate me when I needed to stay an extra day.
Manager Response: Hello Brandon V., Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed the hotel, atmosphere and amenities. And I absolutely love to hear about the wonderful customer service you received from Becca and our entire team. I’ll certainly share your comments with Becca and our entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you visit our great city of Newport Beach.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Had some family in town from Ohio and put them up at the beautiful Bay Club.  Everything was perfect from start to finish, the service has always been great but i noticed it has became even better lately!  Would like to shout out Spencer and Sam at A&O they both took incredible care of us on both meals we enjoyed at A&O. Just a great stay!
Manager Response: Hello Ida J, Thank you for sharing your recent experience and choosing Balboa Bay Resort to host your family in from Ohio. I’m so pleased to hear how much you your time on property and are impressed with our renovations and new modern atmosphere. I especially love to read about the positive comments regarding the service you received from Spencer, Sam and our entire team at A&O. I’ll certainly share them with each of them and entire team. We truly look forward to hosting your family from out of town again soon and welcome you enjoy A&O and the resort at any time.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Really cool resort and a great base for travelling around. So many good staff which really make the visit exceptional and like being at home, but I would have single out Jose in the restaurant for special praise. He handled an issue we had so well and so professionally. Very impressed!
Manager Response: Hello Tepanyaki, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your stay and love to hear your comments regarding the exceptional service you received from Jose at Waterline. I’m very pleased he took attentive and handled your issue with so much professionalism. I’ll certainly share your comments with him and we look forward to having you stay with us and join us again in Waterline very soon.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Excellent location along the water. Lobby attractive and front end staff great. Catering for all means excellent. Where improvement is needed is the furniture in the room. It is heavy and difficult to move. The desk chair should be on wheels.
Manager Response: Hello bob349, Thank you for sharing your comments. I’m very pleased you enjoyed your stay overall and experienced great service from our staff. We will note your recommendations about the furniture in the rooms and look forward to having you stay with at Balboa Bay Resort the next time you visit the area.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I attended a business conference at the resort. Although living 2 miles away, and our family frequenting the A&O restaurant on site, I have never stayed there. We have taken mini vacations to the Ritz, Montage, and the now Monarch Beach Resort and I have never experienced the level of service as at the Balboa Bay Resort. From the friendly front desk to every level of staff, all were eager to stop ,smile, and say hello. The room was large, VERY clean with every amenity a person would need. I had a bay view room and was greeted with a complimentary bottle of wine. The gym was large and bright and viewed the beautiful pool area. The food served at the event was over the top excellent which rivaled a 3 star Michelin restaurant. Bravo to the catering team! Fantastic stay, fantastic
Manager Response: Hello SCOTTYK57, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m absolutely delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and couldn’t be more pleased to hear about the exceptional level of service you received from entire team. It is our goal to provide friendly, attentive and customized service, so I never tire of reading such wonderful comments and the positive impact it had on your experience. I’ll certainly share your kind comments with our team and we truly look forward to having you stay with us again during your next mini staycation very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: 3 night stay at the coast after visiting The Grand Canyon
Summary: On arrival at 7pm, after our 9 hour drive from the Grand Canyon, we were given a room in a separate building outside & across the driveway from the main hotel reception building. We were shown access to our room via a back door as the main lobby to this separate building was being renovated. We were not aware on booking that this hotel had renovations going on.  On our way to our room we passed the ‘Members only’ small man made beach, ‘The Members Only’ pool. ‘The members only restaurant and bar’ and a ‘Members Only Fitness room’ We weren’t sure at this stage what Members only meant. Our room was positioned right opposite a lift and we could see the sheeted off area to the lobby renovations from the lift very close to our room. The room itself was lovely with a balcony over
Manager Response: Hello pitteradd, Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m pleased you enjoyed your stay overall and especially like to hear you experienced excellent service from Deanna our valet team. However, I do apologize that you came during our spa and clubhouse building lobby enhancement project. I understand the inconvenience this creates and very glad to hear we were able to have you move rooms which led to a more enjoyable experience. I also appreciate your comments about the inappropriate language from other guests while dining. You can be certain this will be shared with our team so we can properly address any situation like this n the future. We look forward to having you stay with stay with us the next time you visit the area.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Pure luxury with fun added to the mix.  I loved the outdoor fire pits where you can meet people and enjoy the views.  Pretty spectacular!!  On one side you have the open walled restaurant and on the other are yachts that are tied to the dock.  You never know who you will meet, but count on it being fun!
Manager Response: Hello Lynne W,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I’m very pleased you had the chance to experience A&O and enjoyed the atmosphere. We hope you have the opportunity to join us again for more fun very soon.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights and loved it all. We had a pool view room which was beautiful! The A&O bar is well worth a visit, great food and drinks. We loved sitting outside with cocktails to watch the sunset. All staff were attentive and very friendly. Would recommend staying here, we can’t wait to return.
Manager Response: Hello by JLW52 Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your guestroom with the pool view and time at A&O. I especially love that our staff provided attentive and friendly service throughout your stay. I will make sure to share your comments with our entire team and we look forward to hosting you for another excellent stay the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: It had been a number of years since I visited the Balboa Bay Club (Resort).  The remodel is beautiful and my balcony room was huge and very nicely appointed.  Sitting on the balcony watching the boat traffic in the harbor is great.  There is not another place like this in Newport at all.  As a life long boater I also loved waking up to see multiple beautiful yachts just outside my room.  The service, food and drinks were all excellent.  I will look forward to my next visit as this is my new place to stay in So Cal.  Make sure you try the Poke if you like tuna.  It was outstanding!
Manager Response: Hello ManOnWater, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your room and had the opportunity to take in the beautiful atmosphere and vies from your balcony. I also am very pleased you had some enjoyable dining experiences and received excellent service from our team. I’ll certainly share your kind comments with our team and we look forward to having you stay with us again very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The hotel has great potential, the food and cocktails are absolutely delicious. I loved their staff and customer service as well. Location is close to fashion island and Newport is general. They have great areas for your dog to do its business in. The only thing is that there is no noise control. The hallways by your room, when busy, feel like your neighbors are right next to you, same with the balcony. And if you have the worst luck of being there during a wedding you will hear that DJ and music blasting into the night past 10:30pm. It's not a hotel I would recommend when looking to relax. Coming from vegas, it might be even more of a party hotel than those on the strip!
Manager Response: Hello Tiffany C, Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased to hear you enjoyed the hotel’s atmosphere and location, had some great dining experiences, and our staff provided great and personalized service. However, I’m disappointed you were not able to relax at the optimal level based on the busyness of the hotel. We are very well known for providing our guests with relaxing, rejuvenating and intimate experiences, so I never like to hear when we fall short of our goals. Please know your comments will be share with our entire team so we can use this for learning and continued growth. I hope you choose to stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort so we can deliver the relaxing experience I know we’re capable of delivering.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Sitting on our balcony, looking out on Newport Harbor, we felt we were glimpsing a little bit of paradise.  The room was spacious, comfortable and provided lots of Fresh toiletries. We dined in the restaurant 3 times and each time was enjoyable.  Lots of fresh ingredients; the open-face avocado toast for breakfast was a particular treat.  “Blended”, a take-away cafe was a nice addition.  All staff was extremely helpful and friendly, as one tends to experience in So. California.  A particular “thank you” to Nick Willette, for his attentive service in the restaurant.
Manager Response: Hello MomoBit, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your spacious and comfortable guest room and love to hear how much you enjoyed your meals and overall dining experiences at Waterline.  I’m most pleased to hear that our staff was extremely helpful and friendly, especially your encounters with Nick at Waterline. I’ll certainly share your kind comments with our entire team and we look forward to having you back to enjoy another glimpse of paradise the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This is definitely a first world comment.  My faux leather black leather backpack that I picked up at Bass at a Central California Outlet Center broke.  Two of the zippers capitulated after only 3 flights/trips.  I liked the look and dreamed of a real leather one.  Well there it was sitting in the window of the boutique at this resort.  Right there waiting for me! Mine! I wondered if I was going to pay a premium because it was at a premium resort.  The answer: NO.  Thalia checked all over the internet for me and made sure that my price was competitive AND I got the senior citizen discount that I asked for.  It's a dreamy large Hammit backpack and I have one.  Thanks Thalia for your great service.  I wasn't staying at the hotel.  I was attending a conference
Manager Response: Hello ETraveler_8, Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed our very-affordable and wonderful on-property boutique, and especially love to hear about the helpful and attentive service you received from Thalia. It’s also great that you encountered great service for our restaurant and valet teams in your short time with us attending a conference. I’ll certainly share your kind remarks with Thalia and our entire team. I hope you get the chance to experience Balboa Bay Resort as a hotel guest sometime very soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We stayed over the weekend and had a MOST EXCELLENT stay from the moment we stepped out of our car until we pulled out of the driveway.  A couple stars to be recognized are Derrick in valet and Spencer in the restaurant/bar.  Attention to service and addressing guests by name as well as anticipating needs was a common practice of all encountered and it was truly MY PLEASURE to be your guest.
Manager Response: Hello anickoli, Thank you for sharing your comment. I’m delighted you had such an excellent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I absolutely love to hear about the great service you received from Derrick in valet and Spencer in A&O. Personalized, friendly and attentive service always enhances the overall experience, so I couldn’t be more pleased that our helped make it such an enjoyable weekend. You can be certain your comments will be shared with Derrick, Spencer and our entire team. We very much look forward to welcoming you and your family back very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Rooms were clean and nice, service was excellent.  Food was great, nice rooms. I loved it and definitely will recommend this facility to anyone with kids or without. great restaurants with bay view, nice branch on Sundays.
Manager Response: Hello Edmond K, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your clean and spacious guest room and dining experience at Waterline. I’m especially pleased you received such excellent service form our staff. I will certainly share your kind comments with our team and we look forward to having you stay with us again very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I've ever stayed at!
Summary: You can't beat the location of this hotel, in gorgeous Newport Beach, right on the water! But on top of that, every single thing about this hotel was great! Wonderful and helpful staff, great decoration, rooms are big and very comfortable, food was delicious! I stayed there for a work event, the meeting room was full of light and created a productive atmosphere. We also got to rent a boat and go out for a tour of the bay which was a lot of fun! I absolutely loved this hotel and can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Hello Catia M, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your spacious and comfortable guest room and love to hear how our meeting rooms created a productive atmosphere. I’m most pleased to hear that our staff was helpful and delivered great service to our group. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I was here for a convention so I didn't have the opportunity to stay here . From what I saw and heard from other guests and colleagues, this property is wonderful.How can you miss with multi million dollar yachts tied up within feet of this place? The only gripe was the lack of self parking!
Manager Response: Hello Sid k, Thank you for sharing your comment. I’m very pleased you had the chance to spend some time with us during your convention and hear about the positive feedback you received about our property from other guests and colleagues. I hope we have the opportunity to host you sometime very soon so you can get the complete Balboa Bay Resort experience.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I have never been greeted by such friendly service. Wow- the entire staff was so nice. We were traveling with our 4yr old twins and felt so welcomed. (Not typically the case with 2 crazy kids) Waterline has a great breakfast and lovely brunch. We would come back in a heartbeat! Thank you to the entire staff!
Manager Response: Hello AMalakan, Thank you for sharing your comment. I’m delighted you had a wonderful experience at Balboa Bay Resort with your family. I love to hear how much you enjoyed your breakfast and brunch at Waterline and couldn’t be more pleased with the friendly and attentive service you received from our team. I will certainly share your kind comments with the entire staff. We very much look forward to welcoming you and your family back very soon.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Took my wife for breakfast and we were amazed about the service! Jose helped us out deciding on the menu. He knows the menu left and right! Definitely recommend Balboa Bay Resort for any occasion! 5 starts for the service!
Manager Response: Hello by Carlos L Thank you for sharing your recent dining experience at Waterline. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your meal and love that Jose took such great care of you and your wife to enhance your breakfast. I’ll make sure to share your comments with Jose and the entire team at Waterline. We look forward to having you join us again for breakfast and many more dining experiences at Waterline.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I had a wonderful experience at the boutique shopping with Leslie and Thalia and an amazing expresso from Robert, Tatiana and Bryan they all are so friendly and helpful.  My mom wanted to do a little birthday shopping. Perfect mother daughter morning❤️
Manager Response: Hello plantnik Thank you for joining us at Bayfront Boutique and Blend, and sharing your comments. I’m so pleased how much you enjoyed your day of shopping with your mom while enjoying some great espresso, and even more pleased with the wonderful service you received from Lesli, Thalia, Robert Tatiana and Bryan. They are a great team and I’ll certainly share your kind remarks with all of them. We look forward to having you back for many more mother/daughter shopping excursions at our wonderful boutique.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This is the place to be without a doubt 10/10 overall, breakfast was sensational had a very memorable experience thanks to Alberto and Jose our servers, need to give breakfast a go if haven't already.  Peter N.
Manager Response: Hello Peter N., Thank you for joining us for breakfast at Waterline and sharing your recent dining experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your meal and even more pleased with the great service you received from Alberto and Jose. Great service helps to make the whole experience more enjoyable and food more delicious, so it’s always wonderful to receive such positive comments. You can be certain your remarks will be shared with Alberto, Jose and the entire team. We look forward to having you join us for many more meals at Waterline.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Had an amazing experience here as always. This is definitely the place to stay if you are in Newport beach California! Service is amazing food is amazing it is beautiful here!! The staff is so friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Hello lannclark, Thank you for sharing your comment. I’m delighted you had another amazing experience with us at Balboa Bay Resort. I love to hear how much you enjoyed your meal and that our staff provided friendly and accommodating service. I will certainly share your kind comments with our team. We very much look forward to hosting you again very soon for another amazing stay.     Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Hi I had read the reviews before going and was a bit nervous... we travel and stay in a lot of hotels but this was very last minute (booked same day) and not many options available. I was pleasantly surprised. It was all newly refurbished. Our bedroom/bathroom was delightful. The staff we dealt with were pleasant. Our stay was very short but sweet. I suppose you can't believe everything you read or else we would eat everything we see😳
Manager Response: Hello margaret091, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m very pleased to hear how pleasantly surprised you were with our hotel and guest room during short but sweet stay. I also love to hear that our staff provided pleasant and friendly service, and we look forward to having you stay with us the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: If you are lucky enough to find yourself in Newport Beach on a Sunday I would definitely recommend making your way to Waterline restaurant for brunch. The cold buffet is our favorite, with crab claws, shrimp, and all sorts of cheeses and desserts; and the entrees are fantastic. Ask for Jose--he will take great care of you as you enjoy the scenery (and the cocktails)!
Manager Response: Hello akgulick, Thank you for joining us for Sunday brunch at Waterline and sharing your recent dining experience. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your meal, atmosphere and cocktails, and even more pleased with fantastic service you received from Jose. Great service always helps to make the whole experience better and the food more delicious, so it’s always wonderful to receive such positive comments. You can be certain your remarks will be shared with Jose and the entire team. We look forward to having you join us for many more Sunday brunches at Waterline.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Thank you Robert P for making our coffee and breakfast this morning! Appreciate your service!!! Quick, convenient and great tasting. Nice selection of choices from yogurt two quiches. Great sandwiches. Eat here often and a great place to meet fellow business people and friends. Robert once help me put together a bag of Dove chocolates for friends.   Jryan
Manager Response: Hello John R, Thank you for joining us at Blend and sharing your comments. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your coffee and breakfast, and even more pleased with the wonderful service you received from Robert. It’s fantastic to hear how much you appreciate the nice variety of offerings and find Blend to be a great spot for to meet up with friends and business associates. I’ll certainly share your kind remarks with Robert and we look forward to having you back for much more coffee and breakfast very soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: At check-in I was told there was a complimentary bottle of wine in the room fridge and I was asked if I would like the bottle of  white wine changed to red. I said this was unnecessary as I am unable to drink alcohol. That's all that was said. On check out I was presented with a bill that included a $30 daily charge for the bottle of wine in the fridge. I explained what I had been told at check in and was told to read the fine print on the website!!!!!! I've done that and can't find anything about the $30 daily charge.  To make matters worse on checking my credit card account  an extra $100 has been charged to my account after I had checked out and left the resort. I have been unable to speak to the manager by phone and his email address bounces back. The charges this hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came with my family for Labor Day weekend. It was my daughter's birthday and the staff went out of their way to make it special, Damian at the front desk was especially helpful. I made a reservation through a third party (BIG MISTAKE!) and the third party gave my family of four a King room. When I told Damian the issue he fixed it right away and gave us a beautiful room. The lady at the concierge helped us get reservations for the same night at a great restaurant in Lido (Water Grill?) and was somehow able to get us duffy boat even though everywhere I called was sold out.  The shuttle service to the Balboa Bay ferry was also super helpful. We were a gang of 10 and it made it helpful to have a big van taking us without having to park in a super busy area.
Manager Response: Hello pepperla,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you and your family had a wonderful holiday weekend stay and especially pleased with the great service you received from Damian, concierge, and our entire staff. We pride ourselves on providing our guests with personal and professional guest service, so it’s always nice to hear when we deliver and help to create wonderful guest experiences. I’ll make sure to pass along and share your kind comments to all. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I was excited to experience this great resort during a business trip. I booked it through a third party like Booking.com and their site wouldn't accept my email address. I tried to enter it again an again. The rate was wothin the company budget, below 200USD per night.   So I had to call their front desk to confirm my rate (60% discount/ last minute deal), which was done on the phone, but I never received email confirmation.   Now, within 24 hours from check-in, I never received email confirmation so I called the hotel and spent 45 minutes with this young lady explaining me that I would have to pay 299USD for this stay because she couldn't find anything in their system. Well, within 24 hours notice, try to find an hotel in Newport Beach. Holiday Inn was over 250USD!!!!  For 45
Manager Response: Hello Sylvain D,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I truly sympathize and apologize for the trouble and frustration you experienced prior to check in. Unfortunately, when a reservation is made through an OTA, like Booking.com, the actual confirmation comes from them directly, not Balboa Bay Resort. Therefore, we have no control whether you receive a confirmation email. However, when once the reservation is made, we should always have the reservation information on hand. I have reviewed your experience with our reservation team and was informed the unfortunate amount of time it took to locate the confirmation was based on an inaccurate text with the last name spelled as Dulude. Ultimately, the reservation was found under Bulube. I apologize once again for the miscommunication. Please know your comments regarding how you were treated over the phone have been taken very seriously and immediate action has already been taken so we can use this as a learning experience and always deliver the optimal experience for our guests at all times. I hope you enjoyed your experience once you arrived and will join us again at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The view of the yachts and channel from our balcony was priceless.  My elderly mother was able to spend several valuable hours on the balcony with her ailing brother reminiscing about the area 85 years ago when Lido and Balboa Islands were mostly sand dunes.  They enjoyed watching the yachts and sailboats come and go as well as the crew teams out practicing. The room was very large with two sitting chairs as well as balcony furniture. The beds were wonderfully soft and comfortable.  The air-conditioning was adjustable.  The bathroom, with a separate bath and shower, was enormous. We didn't have to venture outside the hotel during our 4-day stay (although we did) as the hotel had an outstanding restaurant - the Waterline, a bar/bistro, and a coffee shop with deli offerings.  The
Manager Response: Hello jpowers495, Thank you for sharing your comments. I’m delighted your mother had such a great and relaxing stay and you had the opportunity to enjoy some great meals at Waterline. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your Sunday brunch and love that our entire staff provided cordial and professional service. I’ll be sure to share your kind remarks with our entire team and we look forward to having your mother and hopefully you and your entire family stay with us again at Balboa Bay Resort soon.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Whether for business or pleasure Balboa Bay Resort is a great choice. Great staff, great rooms, and great places to eat. Ate two meals at Waterline and can't say enough about the food and service. The room was clean, and spacious. The staff always smiled and had a great attitude no matter the request. I will spend more time at this resort.
Manager Response: Hello kirbyr6572, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your wonderful experience. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoy our guest rooms and your meals at Waterline, and especially love to hear about the great and friendly service you received from our staff. I’ll make sure your kind comments are shared with our entire team. We truly look forward to hosting you again for both business and pleasure at Balboa Bay Resort very soon.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Originally I gave the hotel a glowing review because the concierge was hovering over me. She told me to put her name in, stating how great she was. I had just met her. MANIPULATION! Several of their meals left me violently ill. No one offered to compensate or take the charge off my tab.  My morning coffee in their gift/snack/coffee shop was delicious and the workers are notable. Great foam. The hair salon colored my hair and put a conditioner on. While brushing it through, a baseball sized wad of hair ripped out of my head. She left it on too long and it, the conditioner, mowed out that chunk of hair. Worse, it was an add on cost of approximately  $40.00. On my final night, "PET FRIENDLY" Balboa Bay Resort was where I heard the news that my precious kitty Bella had been found
Manager Response: Hello minombreesISABELLA, Thank you for sharing your comments. I apologize for the miscommunication regarding your understanding our pet policy and your recent experience did not meet your expectations. Please know your comments will be shared with our leadership team.  Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My wife and I stayed at The Balboa Bay resort for 4 nights at the end of a hectic 3 week holiday in California. It was the perfect tonic following a busy few weeks of touring around the California coastline. We had a Bay view which was superb and I'd definitely recommend and spent the days relaxing by the pool where there was an abundance of towels and super service. The staff throughout the hotel were tremendous and very friendly and helpful. We ate in AO which was more informal than the main restaurant but still had a great choice of food and was very reasonably priced. We made use of the gym each day which had all new equipment and the only thing missing was a rowing machine but otherwise it was just what we wanted. We had looked at a number of hotels in the vicinity but
Manager Response: Hello SteveAD, Thank you for staying at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m delighted you chose to stay with us to end your holiday in California and love that had a superb experience. I’m very pleased you enjoyed your Bay View room, relaxing at our new pool, working out at out fitness studio and dining at A&O Kitchen+Bar, and love to hear about the tremendous service you received from our staff. Thank you very much for sharing your kind remarks and we look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit Newport Beach.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The most beautiful place to visit for waterside enjoyment. Posh boats of all shapes and sizes berthed next to fabulous homes makes this place simply fantastic. You need plenty of money to live or retire here, but it's a jewel of a place to visit xx
Manager Response: Hello CARLMLivepoolUK,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m delighted how pleased you are with our waterfront location. We truly look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort very soon.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Location of the room was horrible. Staff nice even though housekeeping or room service  walked in on me when I was half naked without any reason and acted like it was my fault. Small bug next to coffee maker. Confused on all the positive reviews... I wish I stood somewhere else!  Front desk was awesome!
Manager Response: Hello John D., Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. While I’m pleased to hear about your level of satisfaction with the friendly service you received from our housekeeping, room service and front desk teams, I sincerely apologize for your in-room experience. We take this unfortunate experience very seriously. Please know we will take the proper steps with our housekeeping and room service team members to insure this does not occur again. I truly hope you will decide to stay at Balboa Bay Resort at some point again.   Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We just stayed there for three nights and had a wonderful time.  All of the amenities were wonderful from the spa to the paddle boarding, restaurants, pool area and more.  What made our trip was the outstanding staff at the hotel.  Dan, Paul, Cole and Becca were OUTSTANDING!!  We will be back!
Manager Response: Hello aakovari, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your wonderful experience. I’m so pleased to hear how much you enjoy our resort and love that you had the opportunity to experience all our great amenities. I love to read your comments regarding the outstanding service you received from our staff, specifically Dan, Paul, Cole and Becca. I’ll make sure your kind comments are shared with our entire team. We truly look forward to hosting you again at Balboa Bay Resort the next time you visit Newport Beach.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Balboa Bay Resort for the weekend. Our room and pool area was amazing, but what stood out the most was our experience at the A&O. We dined there Friday and Saturday night. The food and drinks were great but the service from Deanna, Dorothy and Ben was top notch. Kudos to you 3, can't wait to return to this gem.
Manager Response: Hello TommyJ2326, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you had such an outstanding stay. I love to hear how much you enjoyed your room and new pool, and the fantastic dining experience at A&O Kitchen+Bar. I’m especially pleased to hear about the top notch service you received from Deanna. Dorothy and Ben. We pride ourselves on providing this high level of attentive, friendly and personalized service, so you can be sure your kind remarks with will be shared with all three of them. We look forward to welcoming you and your wife back for another relaxing getaway soon.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This was our first trip to California.The Balboa Bay Resort made this trip a perfect ten. The room was a bayveiw which made us feel like we were on the beach.The large balcony doors were left open with warm breezes flowing.i never had such a good night sleep as the mattress and bedding were so comfortable.The view of sail boats,yachts,and paddle boaters was very entertaining.The three restaurants scored another 10,as the food was outstanding.The staff went overboard to ensure we were happy.The entire hotel was a magical experience.
Manager Response: Hello Lynn S., Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m delighted you chose to stay with us during your first trip to California and love that your time at our property made it such a wonderful experience. I’m very pleased you enjoyed your room, the atmosphere and restaurants, and especially pleased that you received such great service from our staff. Thank you very much for sharing your kind remarks and we look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit Newport Beach.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Spa/Nail Salon at Balboa Bay resort
Summary: I have never felt more special and comfortable at a nail salon as I did at  the Balboa Bay resort. Yvonne and Stephanie were fabulous! Not only do they do a terrific job on mani/pedi's, they were warm inviting, called each person there by name during the visit.  I would stay at the resort again just to see them. Thanks Yvonne and Stephanie, I have two new friends from my stay.
Manager Response: Hello Renee P.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m delighted you had such a wonderful experience at our salon and received such outstanding and inviting service from Yvonne and Stephanie. We pride ourselves on providing friendly, personal and professional service, so it’s always wonderful to hear when we achieve our goals. We look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort very soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My family and I went to the Balboa Bay resort for a quick getaway. Had a great meal at A&O on Friday night. Deanna and Dorothy were amazing. The pool was a great way to beat the heat on Saturday and Rachel really kept the drinks flowing. I just wish they were showing the Mayweather fight some where in the hotel. The hostess at A&O gave us a list of bars in the area who were which was very helpful. I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello JMcnabb9999999,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your review of your experience. I’m so pleased you enjoyed our new pool and A&O Kitchen+Bar during your quick getaway and especially pleased that you received such great service from Deanna and Dorothy at A&O and Rachel at the pool. We pride ourselves on delivering personalized, attentive, and courteous service for all our guests, so it’s fantastic to hear how our these individuals and out entire staff enhanced your stay. I’ll make sure your comments are shared with everyone and we look forward to having your stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort again very soon.    Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I first want to thank the Balboa Bay Resort for understanding and implementing the basic design elements essential to people with mobility challenges.  As someone who uses a wheelchair my biggest pet peeves are beds and showers and they were wonderfully handled.  The bed was “normal” height, meaning the same height as my wheelchair seat, and there was plenty of space on all sides of it, allowing for easy positioning of my wheelchair and smooth transfers.  They hit a home run with respect to the shower, too.  The hand held had all three of the necessary components:  its height was adjustable, it pivoted left and right and it could be angled as needed. It was such a rare pleasure!  The shower shelf could not be reached from the shower bench, but I found this a minor inconvenience
Manager Response: Hello AccessibleRoutes, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very proud to read your commitments regarding our understanding and implementation of the basic design elements essential to people with mobility challenges. It’s wonderful to read your comments about the bed area and shower, and love to hear that our staff was welcoming, accommodating, helpful and eager to assist. I do apologize however for the length of the bathroom mirror and the lack of a shaving/makeup mirror. I’ll make certain your comments are shared with our team so we can provide the optimal experience within our ADA compliant rooms. Thank you again for sharing your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I chose to stay at the Balboa Bay Resort on the night I proposed to my girlfriend (now fiance!). Obviously, I was extremely nervous and wanted everything to be perfect so I called the hotel three or four times beforehand to make sure everything was set. Tatiana and Becca at the front desk were absolutely fantastic. They not only helped get my room set up (and upgraded), but gave invaluable advice as to where to catch the best sunset as part of my proposal. Upon arrival to the hotel, Cole (valet/bellman) was overwhelmingly helpful and even ran back down to my car to grab a phone charger for me. The staff at the Waterline Hotel was off-the-charts incredible. Daniella was our server and somehow made this amazing night even better. The manager (Herve?) and his AGM were insistent on
Manager Response: Hello calendweiss, Thank you for choosing to stay and celebrate your engagement night at Balboa Bay Resort. I couldn’t be more delighted to hear about the fantastic and helpful service your received from our team to make sure your evening went exactly as planned and exceeded your expectations. I’m so pleased you had a wonderful dining experience at Waterline and enjoyed your room as well. You can be certain your wonderful comments about so many valuable members of our team will be share with each of them. Thank you for sharing your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back for many more celebrations soon.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My husband and I went to BBC for a weekend getaway to see the arcade before it closed on Balboa Island. After checking in we asked if the hotel offered a shuttle service to the Fun Zone on Balboa Island they told us they did. So we got in their van with a new driver who didn't know how to turn the AC on. They he stopped the van and announced that he was dropping us off in a shopping plaza and he wasn't allowed to go any further. I asked him how far we had to walk and he told me less than a 1/2 mile. 35 minutes later and still not there I called the hotel very angry. I spoke with the valet manager who told me "you only have 9 more blocks to go". WTF  who does this? I wasn't dressed or had walking shoes on as I wasn't prepped to go on a 1 hour hike! I got a blister on my foot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The resort was gorgeous. But the request we made several weeks in advance was not honored. Requested two connected rooms with a door. Rooms were next to each other. Service was excellent.  People good!
Manager Response: Hello Valerie Q.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. I’m delighted you felt the property was gorgeous and you experience excellent service from our staff. I am however disappointed to hear you made a request several weeks in advance that was not honored. We will look very closely into this oversight so that something like this doesn’t happen again or better communicate with you prior to arrival. I thank you again for your comments and hope you choose to stay at Balboa Bay Resort sometime in the near future.    Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Facility and furnishings were beautiful; amenities were very nice!
Summary: We reserved two rooms for a party of eight friends. We were celebrating two same-day birthdays. The rooms, grounds, including pool area and food, were very good. However, we requested two rooms, that according to the listing on Tripadvisor, contained two queen beds and a sofa bed. When we arrived we were told that configuration didn't exist. We ended up requesting roll-away beds. That seemed misleading and was disappointing.
Manager Response: Hello Monica A., Thank you for choosing to stay and celebrate your birthday at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased you enjoyed your room, as well as the resort’s grounds, new pool area and experienced some great meals. However, I’m disappointed to hear you felt mislead with our guest room configurations. I’ll certainly discuss this with our team to make sure the information on TripAdvisor is accurate and easily interpreted. Thank you for sharing your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We had a wonderful experience here. Impressive from the Valet, to the Check in, to the Bell service. We also found out that they were having a Beer versus Wine Dinner the evening we arrived and the staff got us squeezed in! It was delightful! I can't say enough about how fun and good the experience was from the passed hors d'oeuvres to the four course dinner. It was totally fab.
Manager Response: Hello David V., Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m so pleased you had such an enjoyable stay and love to hear how impressed you were with the level of service you received from our valet, front desk and bell teams. I’m also delighted you had the opportunity to join us for our great Beer versus Wine special event dinner and had a wonderful time. I’ll certainly share your remarks with the entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort in the very near future.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We came in for a family reunion and stayed only one night. Valet is always so busy and crowded however once inside the hotel it is a much more peaceful experience. Check in was smooth. The decor is lovely, blues and beiges... so calming! The room and bathroom are spacious and the beds are comfortable. The commode has a door separate from the bathroom door and it's almost impossible to close as it is so small in there. We ordered room service at 9:30pm and it was at our door by 10:00. We had a pool view. I would visit again. An overall great experience!
Manager Response: Hello Svignolo, Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased to hear you and your family had a peaceful and great experience to celebrate your family reunion. It’s wonderful to read that you enjoyed the hotel’s décor, your spacious guestroom and pool/courtyard view, and had a very positive in-room dining experience. Thank you very much and we look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you visit Newport Beach.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We arrived on Thursday and sat outdoors at the lounge.  It was a great start, looking out at the bay and gorgeous boats, with live music playing, while enjoying appetizers and cocktails.  A nice touch was complimentary wine and water in the room frig.  Rooms were adequate, bathroom large and nice.  All employees we interacted with were super pleasant and helpful.  Able to rent a Duffy boat from the resort, that was a lot of fun.  We rented bikes from an outside source and parked in the bike rack out front, this way we could grab the bikes at any time to get to Balboa Island, the beaches, and restaurants.  We had a great stay and cannot wait to stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello Jill P., Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so delighted you had such a pleasant stay and had the opportunity to take advantage of the property and surrounding area. I’m very pleased you enjoyed your guestroom and especially glad to hear about the helpful and attentive service you received from our staff. I’ll be sure to share your comments with our entire team and we look forward to having you stay with us again very soon.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My wife and I recently traveled to Newport Beach and booked a room at the Balboa Bay Resort.  Although my brother had stayed at this hotel, it was our first stay there.  The hotel exceeded our expectations in many ways.  The check-in process was very easy and we were assisted to our room with luggage and a number of items we brought for our 3 day weekend.  Since this was a trip to celebrate my wife's birthday, we were impressed with the room and the fact that a nice letter greeted my wife with some birthday balloons tied to a small gift box of chocolates. I read previous postings about the rooms and they were right on.  We stayed in the garden view or pool view rooms, which obviously had been recently renovated and updated.  Very nice decorator touches and comfortable and very
Manager Response: Hello Rodell F, Thank you for taking the time to share about your recent stay. I’m so delighted your first experience at Balboa Bay Resort exceeded your expectations. It’s wonderful to hear how pleased you were with the attentive and personalized service, and that you had the opportunity to enjoy so much of the resort over your three-day birthday celebration weekend. I’ll make certain your comments are share with our front desk and valet teams. We look forward to having you stay with us for many more birthday celebrations over the coming years.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I stayed at Balboa Bay Resort for the first time while on a business trip for 3 nights. Upon walking in, I was greeted by a big and bright smile from Ms. Becca Willis. She notified me that the room was not yet ready, but that she would do what she could do expedite the room for me. She suggested I could grab a bite in the resort's restaurant and since I was starving, I was happy to check it out. She then offered to take my bags and I was grateful to leave them with her. Another day, the pool was closed for a photo shoot (which was fine with me as I had no time to use it anyway, but I could maybe see how this could upset other guests who wanted to use it) and one of the people working in the photo shoot was a little lost trying to get passage to the pool. I observed that Becca,
Manager Response: Hello AO815,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I love to hear how pleased you were with your meetings, guest room and restaurants, and especially delighted to hear about the attentive, friendly and personalized level of service you received from Becca and our entire team. We take tremendous pride in providing this level of service, so I never tire of reading positive comments like this. I will certainly share your remarks with Becca and our entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us again and hopefully you’ll have the opportunity to enjoy the fitness studio and new pool.  Warmest Regards, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Sam, the GM is a gentleman and very much a professional. His attitude and professionalism is reflected throughout the resort. His staff was joyful and responsive to all our needs. It was a great experience and look forward to our next stay.  Bill B.
Manager Response: Hello billbR2287FI, Thank you very much for sharing your recent experience. I’m delighted you had such a great stay and incredibly pleased with the joyful and responsive service you received from our staff. I appreciate the personal kind comments. I’m very proud of this hotel, the entire team and our ability to provide wonderful guest experiences. So it brings ne great joy to see this is reflected positively throughout the resort. I truly look forward to having you stay with us again at Balboa Bay Resort very soon.     Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Holy cow!  Made reservation.  Told we were getting the last room, which was a lie.  Sent to a handicap room despite paying top dollar.  Not happy.  Front desk staff not helpful.  Offered a late checkout nothing else.  Arrived late in the earning. No bellman.  Valet slow as molasses.  Why stay at a place that treats its guests this way.   Next time, stay at Island Hotel.  They know how to treat their guests.
Manager Response: Hello Bakobarry,   Thank you for your message. I apologize you had a negative experience. I would truly appreciate the chance to speak with you directly, as we value you as a guest and your feedback. I ask that you please respond with a contact phone number so I may reach out to you. Thank you for your time in advance. I hope to hear from you soon.  Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Great hotel. Rooms are huge with comfortable beds and huge bathrooms. Beautiful views of water and boats. Would definitely recommend.   Only downside is onsite bar closes at 11:30 which is too early when the place is packed.   Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Arden N.,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased to hear how much you enjoyed the hotel overall, specifically your guest room with beautiful views, large bathroom and comfortable bed. I do however apologize that A&O Kitchen+Bar closed before you were ready to end your night on a busy summer evening. I will certainly discuss extending the hours of operation in the summer for our guests. Thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Balboa Bay Resort rocked my world!
Summary: Recently my family (from Sydney, Australia) and I had the pleasure of staying at Balboa Bay Resort during July 2017. I’d like to say that we had the most wonderful experience at the resort and id have no hesitation staying at the resort again. On arrival on a Friday afternoon a staff member greeted us with a glass of crisp cold white wine and from that moment onwards it was pure bliss. We were given our room key and made our way to our room. It was classy and roomy and the bathroom was every woman’s delight. Bathtub was huge and the whole bathroom itself positively amazing. Perfect set-up if staying at the resort for a function with plenty of room for preening and getting ready. We stayed at the hotel for the intention of doing nothing but relaxing and exploring Newport Beach
Manager Response: Hello Suzana H, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you had such a relaxing and pleasurable stay after an exhausting week at Disneyland. I love to hear how much you enjoyed both your room and our new pool, and especially pleased with the friendly and helpful service you received from our entire team. You can be certain I will share your kind comments with our staff. We truly look forward to having you stay with us again for another wonderful experience the next time you are in Newport Beach.    Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: A bunch of friends decided to take a break from the hustle and bustle of everyday life and we got together at the Balboa Bay Pool. From the valet to the ambiance, we could not have asked for a better setting. That was until it came time for food and drinks. The pool deck was extremely busy but Rachele McDonald was on top of everything! We never had to even waive her down, was always there ready to get us our next drink or snack!!! And she made it look effortless. We will definitely be taking our next life break on the pool deck at Balboa Bay Resort. Thanks Rachele for making us feel special and for keeping us fed, hydrated, and smiling!
Manager Response: Hello Roni N.,   Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our newly enhanced pool. I’m delighted you and your friends decided to take a break and had a wonderful experience. I’m especially pleased with the outstanding service you received from Rachel and love to hear how well she took care of your party. We pride ourselves on providing friendly, personal and professional service, so it’s always wonderful to hear when we achieve our goals. We look forward to welcoming you back to our pool the next time you need a break from the hustle and bustle very soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The Balboa Bay Resort is a relatively well priced hotel right on the water in Newport Beach. The room was very nice, and the hotel is only 3 stories so it feels more welcoming than a giant skyscraper hotel. The people at the bar near the pool were terribly rude though.
Manager Response: Hello Connor K.,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased you enjoyed your room, our great service and location along the waterfront. However, I’m disappointed to hear about the rude people near the pool and understand how this doesn’t make for a relaxing and enjoyable day at the pool. I’ll make sure our pool staff is aware of your comments so we can best address issues like this in the future so guests like yourself are not negatively impacted while trying to enjoy a relaxing day poolside. Thank you for sharing your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back to very soon.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Super nice resort! I LOVED laying out by the pool and getting great service. Rachel our server had good energy and always checked in to refresh our drinks. The food here was yummy too. If you have the opportunity to stay at this amazing Bay front resort spend a day by the pool and order Rose Champagne and lobster sushi rolls!  To die for!
Manager Response: Hello,   Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our newly enhanced pool. I’m so pleased you had such a fulfilling day and especially pleased to hear about the with the outstanding service you received from Rachel. We strive to provide our guests with personal, efficient and friendly service, so it’s always great to hear when we deliver and help to make for memorable guest experiences. I’ll make sure to share your comments with Rachel and our pool staff. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort and pool for more relaxing and fun summer days.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We had a bay view room, two queen beds in a large room with a balcony overlooking the yacht moorings. Room was modern with a very nice large bathroom. Efficient check in and out and friendly efficient staff and housekeeping. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello billvan_10,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m so pleased you had such an enjoyable stay in your bay view room and love to hear that our staff provide efficient and friendly service. I’ll certainly share your remarks with the entire team. Thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to having you stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort in the very near future.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We are staying in a Bayview room and it is very large with a nice patio and double queen beds. The resort has been completely renovated top to bottom over the last few years, so if you haven't stayed here in awhile, take another look. Great location right near the marina. Resort fee includes a bottle of wine to enhance your stay, THAT is an nice perk! And comp high speed wifi that works great.   We had lunch at the main restaurant and it was delicious, really fresh local selections and very good service. Shout out to Nicole Coleman in sales, who hosted us and showed us the property. You will love it here!!!
Manager Response: Hello KansasDorothy,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I love to hear how pleased you are with are enhancements and how much enjoyed your bay view room and meal at Waterline. I’ll certainly share your kind remarks with Nicole and we truly look forward to having you stay with us again very soon at Balboa Bay Resort.    Warm Regards,   Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My husband and I decided to do a staycation at the resort since we have a newborn. We checked in on a Friday and didn't leave the resort at all while there. No need to! Started with our valet arrival with Hao who was super friendly and helpful. Then our check in wth Kat and Damian who made us feel like VIP our entire stay. Damian made our stay amazing. He helped us with arranging s'mores at A&O, activities to do while at the hotel and always made sure we were having the time of our lives. The concierge Emily helped with reservations and was so fun to talk to. We enjoyed both restaurants and drinks by the pool, the manager Wil was very helpful. When it was time to check out Collin and JR were awesome. Kori was wonderful during our check out. She was so genuine and wanted to make
Manager Response: Hello Rachelleannebird,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you had such an outstanding staycation. I love to hear how much you enjoyed both our restaurants and new pool, and especially pleased with the genuine, friendly and helpful service you received from our entire staff. We pride ourselves on providing this high level of personalized service, so you can be sure your kind remarks with will be shared with everyone. We look forward to having you stay with us again for another relaxing staycation soon.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I celebrated my 33rd birthday at the resort pool! I had the opportunity to work with the manager Will Shaw. He was so helpful throughout the whole planning process! He was quick to respond to my many annoying emails and questions and was present the day of to make sure everything was perfect! I do a similar birthday party each year at different hotel pools and I have to say Balboa Bay Resort's cabanas are gorgeous...there was plenty of room for all my guests, it was open and airy, I loved the TVs, the complimentary fruit bowl and waters, I could just go on and on!  Years past, other pools have not had great service but my servers Rachelle McDonald and Mackenzie Maio were on point! No one wants hungry and thirsty guests and my guests were happy! The bartender Mollie Goodman made
Manager Response: Hello Briromay,   Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our newly enhanced pool. I’m delighted you and your party had such an amazing experience and especially pleased with the outstanding service you received from Will and our entire pool staff. We pride ourselves on providing personal and professional service, so it’s wonderful to hear that Will, Rachelle, Mackenzie, Rachelle and Mollie helped make your birthday celebration so special. We look forward to welcoming to our pool for more relaxing and fun summer days at the pool very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Relaxing stay with beautiful bay views at all times.
Summary: As we drove in, you are met by courteous Valet attendants, and everything is smooth sailing from there.  The lobby was exceptionally clean and the hospitality staff was quick and efficient.  As we were assisted by a bell boy to our room, the bell boy was courteous and even offered to get ice for us if we were interested.  The room was immaculate.   The sheets smelled like bleach and the bathroom was exceptionally clean.  At the end of our first days our sleep was quiet and EXCELLENT!!   The décor was modern and contemporary which gave the sense of relaxation. We had a pool view which was amazing.  The set up was simple and yet inviting.   We ordered room service two days in a row and you will not be disappointed in their lobster omelets, coffee, the steel cut oatmeal and their
Manager Response: Hello hac0y7,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so delighted you had such a superb and relaxing getaway, and love to hear you not only had the opportunity to experience everything our hotel offers but enjoyed everything so much. I love to hear your comments regarding the courteous attitudes of our valet and the quick and efficient service from our entire team. We pride ourselves on providing this level of personalized service and I’ll be sure to share your kind remarks with our entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us again for another relaxing getaway to Newport Beach.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Absolutely amazing hotel in a gorgeous location
Summary: We have just come back from the US & I cannot speak highly enough of this amazing hotel. Beautiful location, friendly staff and luxurious facilities. The pool, the restaurants, the glass of wine on arrival and the room were all first class. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Hello Tortsman,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I love to hear you had such an enjoyable stay and delighted you were so pleased with your room, pool, restaurants, and especially pleased that our staff provided such friendly service. I’ll certainly share your remarks with the entire team and we truly look forward to having you stay with us again at Balboa Bay Resort.     Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We stayed for one night to celebrate our anniversary.  I am a fussy customer but this time I am full of praise.  Hotel excellent, staff superb, enjoyed the A&O for lunch, Waterline for dinner, room excellent, massage at spa divine, They even had the Tennis Channel in the room to watch Wimbledon!
Manager Response: Hello Richard B,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us to celebrate your anniversary and sharing your experience. I’m delighted you had such wonderful meals at our restaurants and an incredible massage. I also love to read your comments regarding the outstanding service you received from our staff. We truly strive to provide personalized, professional and friendly service so it’s wonderful to hear our team helped make your stay so enjoyable. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you’re looking to celebrate a special occasion.    Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This place just screams class from the moment you pull up to the valet to the moment you enter your room. My wife had made a non smoking room request because of her being pregnant and the staff took note and helped us celebrate this stage of our life! They brought us chocolates and balloons as we entered the resort. Becca and the staff were unbelievable!  The room was better than we could've imagined and the pool was delightful! Thank you staff from the bottom of our hearts for making our baby moon unforgettable!
Manager Response: Hello Andrew T,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience and choosing to stay with us for your baby moon. I love to hear your comments regarding the class of our resort and delighted you enjoyed your room and our new pool. I’m most pleased about the level of service you experienced from Becca and our entire team. I never tire of reading this type of great comments and will certainly share them with our team. We look forward to having your family stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort sometime soon.  Warmest Regards, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Stayed 4 nights and celebrated the 4th of July holiday.  Hotel is nice but overpriced for what you get and front desk service was average.  We checked in early (before 11 AM) and were told that they would have a room within an hour and would call us.  Not only did they not have a room until 4 PM but they never bothered to call us and tell us when it was ready, so we had to keep checking in the front desk.  Food at A/O restaurant was very good.
Manager Response: Hello Keith M.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. While pleased to hear you enjoyed your dining experience at A&O Kitchen+Bar, I’m disappointed our level of staff service missed the mark, specifically with regards to the lack of communication from our front desk regarding your check in experience. We strive to provide personalized, attentive and friendly service, so I never like to hear when we fall short of our goals. Please know your comments will be shared with our front desk team so we can use this for learning and continued growth. I thank you again for your comments and hope you choose to stay with us again at a later date.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This is our second visit we love the BBR,  last week we stopped into A&O the gastropub on property for a drink and a snack. Dorothy ran over and greeted us, she remebered my wife and I  from the last visit. She along with Jill made our night special. They are wonderful!!
