Manager Response: Hello LkC233,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort for a second time and sharing your recent experience. I’m so pleased you enjoyed your stay and dining experience at A&O Kitchen+Bar. I’m delighted to hear that Dorothy and Jill provided such great service and made for a wonderful evening. I’ll make certain your comments are shared with both of them, as well as the entire team. We truly look forward to your third stay with us very soon.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We came here for a mini vacation. So glad we came here instead of Huntington Beach.   Great location to watch the boats go down the bay.  Room was really nice.   Free water and red wine.  We had breakfast each morning and Alberto was our server each day.  Food and service was awesome.    We will be back!
Manager Response: Hello quackrr, Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I love to hear you had such an enjoyable stay with us along the water’s edge in Newport Beach. I’m delighted you were so pleased with your room and breakfasts at Waterline, and especially pleased that Alberto provided such great service. I’ll certainly share your remarks with the entire team and we truly look forward to having you stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort very soon.    Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here very much. Food at AO was great both times. I would have given it 5 stars but we had to move because our shower did not function. The hotel was nice to upgrade us with a bay view room and they did nice balloons for our daughters birthday morning. Bellman was great. Overall we will for sure stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Michael B.,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us and had the opportunity to have some great dining experiences at A&O. While I apologize for the shower issue, I’m very glad to hear that our staff provided such great and efficient service. We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Best of Newport but, PLEASE leave your dogs at home
Summary: Gracious staff, very nice accommodations, perfect location. We visited just one night at the end of our trip to stay with friends and did not want to venture out of the resort for brunch. We made reservations at the Waterline restaurant, were expecting the less-than-exceptional resort dining experience and were pleasantly surprised. Our main dishes were well prepared and tasty, staff was attentive and the seafood, cheese, charcuterie and bakery were top notch. We had a poolside room and enjoyed about 5 hours by the pool sunning and sleeping and swimming laps in the lap pool. Pool staff was very attentive and the experience was great. My only issue is that people traveling with their dogs feel they have a right to bring them anywhere in the facility.  They should be kept in a
Manager Response: Hello Joe852, Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m so delighted you enjoyed your stay and were so pleased with your brunch at Waterline and time at our newly enhanced pool. I love to hear how attentive our staff was over the extremely busy holiday. I will make certain your comments are shared with our team, and also appreciate the feedback regarding dogs on property and on the pool area grounds. You can be certain your comments will be discussed. Thank you for your review and we truly look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My boyfriend and I just had the most amazing stay at Balboa Bay Resort!  The entire staff was incredibly friendly, super accommodating, and went above and beyond to make his birthday special. From Katy checking us in with a big smile and upgrading us to a Bay View room, to Tatiana checking us out in a professional and caring manner, we were touched by the staff's genuine desire to make us feel at home. Huge kudos to Damian for managing his staff so well!!  :-)
Manager Response: Hello naranaranjo, Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I love to hear your comments regarding the outstanding service you received from our staff. We truly strive to provide personalized, professional and friendly service for each and every guest, so it’s wonderful to hear that Kate, Tatiana and Damian delivered and made your boyfriends birthday experience at Balboa Bay Resort so amazing. I’ll certainly share your remarks with each of them as well as our entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you’re looking to celebrate a special occasion.    Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Lovely view of the water, very friendly and gracious staff and decent food
Summary: Attended a luncheon in a private room at the club.  Loved standing outside the room on the terrace and enjoying the docked boats before our lunch.  The staff could not have more friendly and helpful---even though we were not Members of the club, they made us all feel welcome---and they could not do enough to assure we were pleased.  We all had salads, and I enjoyed my chicken salad.  I have been here on numerous occasions for dinner in the restaurant that takes non-Members--and recommend it.  In addition, they always do a great job on large group events.  There are very few places in Newport Beach on the water---this one is worth coming to.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great staff, fabulous restaurant, nice room
Summary: Fabulous: Room, Front Desk, Restaurant, Housekeeping/Cleaning.  Less Than Fabulous:  Full Mattresses (we kept rolling off the edges so maybe its time to replace them both?), limited walking opportunities as no access to bay/docks unless you drive off the premises left us feeling a bit isolated.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There aren't enough stars to give the Balboa Bay Resort. They made this a special special week for myself, my new bride, our five kids, and my parents. They went above and beyond numerous times to make us feel wanted and special. The accommodations were spacious and always "white glove" clean. The staff was friendly and very helpful at every step of the way. We didn't plan our wedding at the resort but you would have thought that we had with all the special things they did. We will never forget our week in Newport Beach. Thanks go especially to Becca, whose personality and attention to customer service were so memorable, our kids will never forget her. Thank you Balboa Resort for truly making our family vacation/Wedding Week amazing! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Manager Response: Hello naranaranjo, Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I couldn’t be more delighted to hear how much you enjoyed your special week with your family and love to hear about the outstanding level or service you received from our staff specifically Becca I’ll make certain your comments are shared with her and our entire team. We look forward to having you and your family back for your anniversary or any other getaway in the near future.     Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The staff member from management to housekeeping were all very nice!  They should be proud of their staff members.  Paying a little extra for the balcony looking out over the bay is worth every penny.  I would come back to this resort in a second!
Manager Response: Hello Cindy O., Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I absolutely love to hear your comments regarding our staff. We are very proud of the service they provide and the pride everyone takes in our property. I’m also pleased you enjoyed your guest room and the beautiful waterfront view. I’ll certainly share your remarks with the entire tam and we look forward to having you stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort very soon.    Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Based on reviews I had expected a stellar experience here.  what I received was nice, but not outstanding.  the location is small, not really a resort.  there is no place to walk on the water, that is reserved for boat owners.  The views from the room are of houses and boats or alternatively of the courtyard.  Staff seems a bit overwhelmed and not on the same page.  There is a boring coffee service downstairs, but it is worth paying for the coffee that the cafe provides as it is much better.  In sum, there are better places to say in the area.
Manager Response: Hello waiake1,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I apologize your stay didn’t meet or exceed your expectations. I appreciate your feedback as it gives us an opportunity to work to improve especially with regards to the professional service we strive to deliver for every guest. Thank you again for sharing your comments. I hope you will give us another opportunity at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: It was a mix between a high end resort and a motel 6.  There were certain things that this hotel had that stood up with the top resorts like room furnishings, amenities, room service, valet service and amazing location.  On the other hand the staff did not know much about an event that their resort was a part of and the signage for it was 20 feet from the front desk.  The staff overall was nice and helpful but it did not match the level the resort seemed to be shooting for.  Also housekeeping was extremely loud and disrespectful of DND signs on the doors.  Speaking at the top of there lungs and just generally not being considerate of guests in their rooms.  I have operated and been a part of many resorts and Balboa Bay Resort has all of the makings to be a  phenomenal resort but
Manager Response: Hello Jason T.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. While pleased to hear about the many areas and makings of our property you enjoyed, I’m disappointed our level of staff service missed the mark, specifically with regards to the team’s on-property event knowledge and our housekeeping services. We strive provide 4-diamond resort level amenities and top-notch, personalized and friendly service from entire team, so I never like to hear when we fall short of our goals. Please know your comments will be share with our entire team so we can use this for learning and continued growth. I hope you choose to stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort so we can deliver the experience I know we’re capable of delivering.   Warm Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Gorgeous remodel. The decor is so fresh and the rooms have beautiful decor, curtains, and a modern feel. Go for a large room with courtyard view if you can. The room is specious and the bathroom is big and very nice. The Fresh amenities are the best! This place is walking distance to some hot spots and a short uber to all the fun. It is very nice for couples and families. Clean and excellent service.
Manager Response: Hello jackie_in_cali,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your wonderful experience. I’m so pleased to hear much you liked the atmosphere of our remodeled resort and enjoyed your guest room. I’m always pleased to hear positive comments regarding our modern and contemporary décor. We look forward to hosting you the next time you choose to stay in the area.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Saree the pastry chef  and Rachel the executive chef are amazing. They each strive to provide an amazing customer experience with a memorable experience. If you want a classic socal then visit this gem.
Manager Response: Hello Jim G.,  Thank you for your review. I’m so pleased to hear your wonderful comments regarding executive chef Rachel and pastry chef Saree. We always love to hear when our guests have enjoyable and memorable dining experiences and I’ll make certain your comments are shared with both Rachel and Saree. We truly look forward to hosting you for many more classic SoCal dining experiences at Waterline and A&O Kitchen+Bar within Balboa Bay Resort.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: From the time I booked, to the pick up at the airport, to driving around the semi circle to the front entrance, to checking in, to walking into a glorious suite... everything and everyone on staff were all so pleasant and easy to work with..what a pleasure! Our suite was facing the courtyard pool area which was being remodeled at the time we were there.  This courtyard was grandiose and very picturesque and you could not see your neighbors.  We had a long balcony that accessed the living room and the bedroom.  The suite was large and beautifully decorated and had a surprise half bath just off the entry.  The bathroom and dressing room were well designed.  We are returning in a few months to see how the pool area looks...even roughed up and getting new tile, it looked beautiful.
Manager Response: Hello Karen B., Thank you for sharing your kind comments. I’m delighted you enjoyed your stay and were so pleased with your suite, the resort grounds and dining experience at Waterline. It’s wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your time on property and had a truly great experience. We truly look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: The resort is very beautiful.  Our room felt like a peaceful oasis; the colors were soothing, the furnishings were upscale and the bed... oh so comfy! We ate at one of the restaurants and had an excellent ocean view, with delicious food. The staff were friendly and accommodating. We would definitely recommend this resort.
Manager Response: Hello Cynthia L., Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I love to hear your comments regarding the beauty and peaceful oasis our property provided during your stay. I’m delighted how much you enjoyed your room and dining experiences, and especially pleased to hear that our staff provided friendly and accommodating service. I’ll certainly share your remarks with the entire team. We look forward to having you stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort the next time you come to Newport Beach.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We stayed at Balboa Bay Resort last week and had an amazing experience. Damian at the front desk made our stay so special. I asked my girlfriend to marry me and when we came back he put rose pedals all over the room, chocolate covered strawberries, etc... He did such an amazing job. Thank you so much to all the staff for making our stay so amazing.
Manager Response: Hello keithtapbarnes,   Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you had such an amazing stay and especially pleased with the great service you received from Damian and our entire staff. We pride ourselves on providing our guests with personal and professional guest service, so it’s always nice to hear when we deliver and help to create wonderful guest experiences. I’ll make sure to pass along your kind comments to Damian and our team. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime very soon.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I have been going to this resort now, once a month for about 6 months. The purpose has been for business meetings with the Surfrider Foundation and the nhunderwatercleanup.com. The menu offered and delivered at the Members Grill is consistently wonderful. The wait staff are pleasant, professional, and surprisingly easy going. I can honestly say I wish I was a resident member so I could enjoy this quality and caliber of service more often.
Manager Response: Hello Casey C.,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I’m delighted how often you’ve chosen to stay with us and continue to enjoy your experiences. I’m also pleased to hear how much you’ve enjoyed your time in Balboa bay Club’s Members Grill. While not a public restaurant and open to all resort guests, I’ll make certain your comments regarding the great service are shared with the Club’s general manager and restaurant team. We look forward to hosting you again at Balboa Bay Resort.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We stayed in a bay view room, which is a must at this resort! The room was comfortable , clean, nicely decorated and the beds were very comfortable. We ate dinner at the Waterline restaurant in the hotel .The food was very good as was the service. We also enjoyed live music as we dinned. Though we did not have a chance to use it, there is a beautiful pool .This was a nice stay, although a bit pricey. Great location!
Manager Response: Hello Christine B,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m very pleased to hear your comments regarding our newly enhanced bay view rooms and love to hear you had enjoyable dinner at Waterline. I do hope you return this summer to relax and enjoy our new pool locale that is opening on Friday, May 26. We look forward to hosting you again at Balboa Bay Resort hopefully very soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My Wife and I absolutely love staying here, it somehow manages to always get better and better. It is in an ideal location being directly on the harbor and in the heart of Newport Beach. The rooms are very well fitted. They feel very clean and modern yet still give you that seaside vibe. Damian one of the Front Office Managers is exceptional and always demonstrate genuine passion for the industry. Last time we stayed was 6 or so months ago yet he remembered not only our names, but where we worked and how we loved to dine out. We will definitively be back again soon for another relaxing night away. Thank you to the entire BBR team for being so welcoming, friendly and enthusiastic.
Manager Response: Hello Brendan88,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to not only hear how much you enjoyed the property but that each stay gets better and better. I’m most pleased to hear about the welcoming, friendly and enthusiastic level of service you received from our entire team, especially Damian. He truly has a passion for our hotel and always looks to make each guest experience memorable. Sounds like he achieved this with you. I’ll make certain your kind remarks are shared with him and our team. We truly look forward to having you join us very soon the next time you are in the Newport Beach area.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We spent my daughter's 5th bday here before heading off to Disneyland, the service was excellent, the room and grounds were beautiful, and the Duffy boat rental we got was really a beautiful way to spend an afternoon. The only issue I had, which was no fault of the resort, were the really loud ferraris and other major sports cars that would roar away due to all the George Hamilton wannabes and their babes. It was kind of surreal and hilarious to see that sort of thing, we're from San Francisco - you just don't see that everyday.  Got annoying on our 3rd day. Other than that, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Hello Farah R,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m delighted you chose to stay with us to celebrate your daughter’s 5th birthday before a magical day at Disneyland and enjoyed your room and grounds of our resort. I’m especially pleased to hear about the excellent level of service you experienced during your stay. I’ll certainly pass along your comments to our entire team. I hope to welcome you and your family back for another pre-Disneyland trip the next time you visit Orange County.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Lunch at AO kitchen and bar
Summary: My husband, daughter and I loved our water view while eating lunch at this renowned Newport Beach resort. I had a shrimp cocktail, my daughter had a chicken wrap and my husband had a very average wedge salad. We took fish tacos to go. Venue is beautiful but the food is nothing special.
Manager Response: Hello Lulu120639,  Thank you for sharing your experience at A&O Kitchen+Bar. While it’s great you and your family enjoyed the views during your lunch, however I do apologize you felt the food was average. We take great pride in exceeding all our guest experiences and are disappointed when we fall short. I will make sure your comments are shared with our team at A&O. Thank you again for sharing your comments and I hope you will decided to join us at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabba General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: This place rocks. It's very nice. Very clean very friendly.  Rooms are wonderful, beds comfy   We had a great time. The restaurant named Waterline was great. Good food good service.  If back in the area I would stay again. Don't pass it a little pricey but worth it
Manager Response: Hello Cindy K, Thank you for sharing your comments. I’m very delighted you enjoyed your stay and were so pleased with your guest room and your dining experience at Waterline. It’s wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the food and felt the service was very good. I’ll make sure your comments are shared with our entire team. We truly look forward to hosting you again at Balboa Bay Resort.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Enjoyed the harbor view room. Nice balcony to enjoy the weather and view, of course! Comfy bed and linens, friendly staff and beautiful room. We took the complimentary shuttle to fashion island even though we had a car.
Manager Response: Hello Amy O,  Thank you for the choosing to stay with us and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased to hear you how much you enjoyed your bay view room and took advantage of our complimentary shuttle to the great shopping destination Fashion Island. I also always love to hear that our staff provided friendly service during your stay. We look forward to having you join us the next time you are in the area.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabba General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Bay view room was beautiful.  Great comfortable bed, room recently remodeled.  Large bathroom, with separate shower tub and double sink.  Good quality wifi.  We were over the pool area, but it wasn't noisy at all.  Lovely to see the crew boats skimming by every morning.  Note that this is not in a beach area, but walkable beaches are a short drive away.  Waterline grill, in house dining, is s-l-o-w service but good for breakfast.  Their cafe makes a really excellent latte and has healthy snack choices.  Nice spa/salon on site.
Manager Response: Hello SR22, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I love to hear you had a wonderful stay and truly enjoyed our recently enhanced guest rooms. I’m also very pleased you had the opportunity to enjoy all the resort amenities and outlets. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you visit our great city of Newport Beach.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: My first time stay at this property. It's a beautiful property.  Main hotel bar/restaurant had great food and great service. Really tasty bar food -- the hamburger was huge and very good. Often a big burger doesn't necessarily mean a good burger, but damn, this was one tasty burger. They had some neat items-- like smores that you make yourself on a portable heat source -- our you could use the outdoor fire pits--actually you're not supposed use them--but it was Saturday night, the band was playing great music and we have a few drinks. The waitress discouraged us -- wink, wink. Great folks, fun time, lux accommodations. Mother's Day Brunch was pricey--but you're never gonna find more variety and bottomless mimosas to boot!
Manager Response: Hello jwalker999,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. I’m delighted you had such a great time at the resort and specifically our waterfront bar and restaurant A&O Kitchen+Bar. I’m pleased to her how much you enjoyed the food and atmosphere and very happy that you received such wonderful service. I look forward to sharing your kind comments with our team and welcoming you back sometime soon.  Warmest Regards, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Checked into the resort on May 9th. Beautiful room,and very clean. As the day turned into night the rooms kept getting colder and colder. We called for maintenance and gentleman came right up. He worked and worked. Come to find out the boiler had stopped. He hadn't been told this. We were not offered any type of heater. Upon checking in we should have been told there was no heat and the spa was being renovated. Upon checking out the cashier gave us no discount whatsoever.. she stated that she wasn't penilizing us for checking out a day early. I said we could not stay where there was no heat. She handed us the bill and we left
Manager Response: Hello Lulu120639,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. While I always like to hear when our guests are pleased with the cleanliness and beautiful atmosphere of your guestroom, I am sorry and apologize for the inconvenience you encountered with the cool temperature. Our engineering team works diligently to monitor and fix any issues within our guestrooms prior to our guest’ arrival. It’s very unfortunate the problem with the heater was not noticed in your room. I will make sure your comments are shared with our team so we can learn from this and make the necessary changes to insure this doesn’t happen moving forward. Thank you again for sharing your comments. I hope you will give us another opportunity at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabba General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Excellent location, great staff and nice and modern rooms.
Summary: Minutes from John Wayne/Orange County Airport, I never really gave this hotel a second glance before as I've driven down that street many times. It has an unassuming look from the street, but once you turn in, you'll find a great property. It's right on the bay and the conference rooms open up to the boardwalk. The rooms are very clean, nicely decorated with a modern, feel. The bed was comfortable as the first night I just melted away until my alarm went off the next morning. A bonus is that wifi works throughout the whole property. There was a resort fee - not sure if that's standard or not.   If the opportunity came up again, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello CSquaredC2,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I’m delighted you chose to experience Balboa Bay Resort for the first time after driving by us so frequently. It’s wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the property, especially our recently enhanced guestrooms and modern ambiance. We truly look forward to having you stay with us when the opportunity comes up again soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: An excellently-maintained property with a friendly staff. Alexandra and Damien at the front desk, Emily at concierge, were positive and helpful. The pool was closed for repairs but they arranged for us to use another a short walk away. Before we'd arrived we'd read that the hotel shuttle could take us to the beach. When we checked in though we were told "better to call yourself an Uber as the shuttle was too busy."  The property is on the marina, not the ocean, but there is plenty of outdoor seating at two restaurants to admire the sunset or watch the boats sail by.  Food was good, try the caramel popcorn w/ bacon for desert or a snack. The concierge was knowledgeable and enthusiastic and though she was not able to get us into a sold out brunch, she did try. The bell staff
Manager Response: Hello lewisjacquie,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m very pleased you felt the property was excellently-maintained and you had the opportunity to enjoy some of resort amenities and outlets. I’m also glad to hear our staff provided friendly service, specifically Alexandra, Damian and Emily. I always love to hear when our team members go above and beyond and it sounds like Emily certainly did. I’ll make certain to share your comments with her and our entire team. I do however apologize that our shuttle was in use and not able to take you to the beach. Hopefully we can make sure this happens the next time and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel & great location-pool currently under renovation
Summary: Great girls' getaway here except for the pool & spa being under renovation. The good news is that the members/owners area has a pool & jacuzzi open. You need to ask for a pass to go over to this adjacent area. It will not be offered.
Manager Response: Hello calgal405,   Thank you for the choosing to stay with us and sharing your comments. I’m very pleased to hear you had a great girls getaway and enjoyable your time at Balboa Bay Club’s pool while the resort pool locale is being enhanced. We’re very excited to re-open our pool on May 25 that will feature cabanas, variety of stylish deep seating areas, day beds and a new dining area. I look forward to having you join us for an upcoming girls getaway soon.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabba General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We went for my birthday and they went above and beyond to make my stay very pleasant. Our room was beautiful, staff very accommodating and everything was top notch. Would highly recommend this resort to anyone wanting a true 5 star rated property.
Manager Response: Hello jackief301,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us to celebrate your birthday and sharing your wonderful experience. I’m delighted you had such a pleasant stay and were so pleased with your guest room. I also love to hear that our staff was very accommodating and provided the top notch service we strive to deliver. I’ll make sure your kind comments are shared with our entire team. We truly look forward to hosting you again at Balboa Bay Resort for many more birthday and other meaningful celebrations.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We had two days at Balboa Bay Resort and it was a great hotel.  Having stayed at two other hotels in Newport Beach, it's easy for me to report this is my favorite.  Great food and service inspite of the multiple events going on at the property.  We did have a long wait for lunch but overall we highly recommend for family or couples.
Manager Response: Hello Nanny1Lorton,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. I’m very pleased to hear you how much you enjoyed Balboa Bay Resort over your recent two day stay, and incredibly delighted our hotel has become your favorite in Newport Beach. I look forward to sharing your kind comments with our team and welcoming you back sometime soon.  Warmest Regards, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: From the staff to the accommodations, our getaway was superb at the resort.   The Joseph Phelps wine dinner displayed the resort chef's incredible talents.    There was a slight misstep during our breakfast at Waterline, and Alberto provided amazing service recovery not to mention a terrific service experience.   Nick and Will (Waterline) were personable and excellent hosts.   Everyone consistently called us by our names, and Valet was prompt with our car.   We can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Hello PerriBlack, Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m delighted you had such a superb getaway and love to hear you had the opportunity to enjoy the Joseph Phelps winemaker dinner. While I apologize for the breakfast misstep, however, I’m very pleased to hear how well our staff, particularly Alberto, Nick and Will took such great care of you and helped turn a negative into a positive. We pride ourselves on providing this level of personalized service and I’ll be sure to share your kind remarks with each of them. We look forward to having you stay again the next time you return to Newport Beach.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Haven't even checked in and they are nickel and diming me already
Summary: Checking in later today, the hotel sent me an email offering early check in, how nice. They ask you what time you will arrive so I said 1 pm, then I was asked for $50 for that privilege. I have never been asked for extra payment to check in early ever before, if my room was ready I have always been able to move in. What a poor way to start someone's experience at your hotel. I will review again after I checkout but I'm curious to see how many other fees start popping up.
Manager Response: Hello cowtowntraveller, Thank you for taking the time to share your pre-arrival experience. I apologize that you were not pleased with our early check in option. I truly hope you had a positive and satisfying experience upon arrival and throughout your stay, and our staff provided top-level personalized service. I look forward to hearing a review or your entire experience and hope to welcome you back soon.   Very Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Had a wonderful work trip out in Newport Beach a couple of weeks ago. What really stood out to me was the girl at the front desk Becca. She could not have been more helpful and sweet. If you happen to get the opportunity to stay there, definitely look for her. She will make your trip that much better.
Manager Response: Hello Kyle C.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. It’s wonderful to hear you enjoyed your work trip in Newport Beach and Balboa Bay Resort, and delighted our staff provided great customer service, especially Becca at the front desk. I’ll make certain to share your kind comments with her and look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort sometime soon.  Warmest Regards, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Fantastic Staff, in a convenient location
Summary: Short drive (5 mins) to Newport Beach, and 15 min drive to John Wayne airport.  The staff is extremely friendly and extremely helpful.  The hotel is very clean/well-kept with reasonably sized rooms.  With 2 restaurants and a cafe on the premise, eating is convenient.  I ate at the bar-grill one night that opens up to the marina, and it was a chill sports bar feel with a little nautical edge.  Food was good, and service was very good.  Fitness center has a few bikes, and treadmills with one bench and some dumb-bells.  Self parking (a short walk behind the hotel) is $30/night (which is kind of an irritant, but seems to be the norm for so-cal.)  That hotel is on the Balboa Bay.  I enjoyed driving down to Newport beach and eating/drinking at the beach front restaurants.   The beach
Manager Response: Hello Darrin N,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort and sharing your experience. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoyed our resort and the city of Newport Beach. It’s always very nice to hear when our guests get the opportunity to experience and enjoy all our resort offers and our team delivers on providing top-level friendly service. I’ll make sure your kind comments are shared with our entire team and we look forward to hosting you again the next time you visit Newport Beach.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Stayed here on part of our honeymoon trip. They hotel and room was very clean and beautiful. When we checked in we were offered assistance with the luggage, but we said we were fine and brought the bell cart to the room and returned it to the lobby immediately after. On our check out day, I went to the lobby to get a cart and a bellman grabbed it out of my hands right away. He said I couldn't have it and I needed a bellman to help. I explained we did this at check in and wanted to pack up at our own pace. Another bellman came over and was very condescending and said 'we don't do that here.' He was extremely rude! So I asked if I had to struggle with all my bags without a cart and he replied yes! At check out they asked me how my stay was and I explained my situation and all they
Manager Response: Hello mjjm78,  Thank you for choosing to stay at Balboa Bay Resort for your honeymoon and sharing your experience. While I do like hearing when our guests feel our property is clean and beautiful, I do apologize for the inconvenience you encountered during your check out. As a four-diamond hotel, we train out bellman and entire team to always handle the bell carts and luggage for our guests. Unfortunately, you were provided incorrect information upon check in by a member of our team. Regardless, our team members could clearly have used better verbiage in explaining our policy and I truly apologize for the poor service. I will make sure your comments are shared with our front desk and bell team so we can learn from this and make certain it doesn’t happen again. Thank you again for sharing your comments. I hope you will give us another opportunity at some point in the future.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabba General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Thank you for a comfortable stay
Summary: We visited the Balboa Bay Resort while mourning the loss of our dear friends who passed tragically. A big thank you to Lauren who assisted with reservations, Damian upon arrival was fantastic! He even noticed it was my husbands birthday and gave us a cheers to celebrate. Tara in the bar kept up with the requests. The Tuna poke and clam chowder were delicious.  We spent 2 evenings gathering with friends and the location, ambiance and service all were a perfect tribute to our dear friends who will be forever missed. Thank you, Balboa Bay Resort for being our respite during a difficult time.
Manager Response: Hello Irishan317,   Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. While I’m incredibly sorry to hear about your loss, I’m pleased to hear our resort and team helped provided the atmosphere and service you needed during this tough time. Your comments are very much appreciated and I’ll make sure to pass them along to our entire team. We look forward to having you back under more positive circumstances very soon.    Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: What a great find!!! Absolutely wonderful!!!
Summary: What a treat for a little staycation-getaway from LA! Superb staff, amazing views, incredible accommodations, and delicious food!  Let's start with the most incredible and accommodating staff! From Collin at check-in, to Dianne at A&O, to Mollie at Waterline! Everyone was excellent and went above and beyond our expectations!   The views at this hotel are just amazing! Having brunch by the water at Waterline was such a treat. The hotel rooms themselves were well appointed, comfortable, and clean. The hotel is pet-friendly as well, so I brought my pup with me and even he received a goodie-bag at check-in!  Great find! We can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Misogynistic upper management and disrespectful, poor planning for banquet preparations.
Summary: Facilities were nice and comfortable. Staff very nice and professional except for the suits that refused to acknowledge me at the gym facility. They apparently didn't like that I had propped open the gym doors to the outside patio with weights because there was no fan available and the room stunk. As they removed the weights to close the doors, I tried to engage in conversation to explain why and suggest a fan. They walked near me twice to put the weights away without speaking to me nor even looking at me. I have to wonder if this had gone down like this if there had been a male in the room with me? Now today, we're woken at 7AM because of a banquet being set up in the patio below our room with banging and orders being barked about. I have to question why the guests in rooms in
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful service from valet, bell staff, front desk, restaurant and room service!  Excellent hospitality!  Rooms are large, well appointed, wonderfully maintained and very clean!  Highly recommend!  We only stayed one night, but this place is a gem!  Food & beverage were excellent!  From a snack in the lounge to room service for breakfast!  Well done Balboa team!
Manager Response: Hello Mdyenoham., Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Balboa Bay Resort. While limited, I’m delighted you had such a wonderful stay. I always love to hear when our guests enjoy our refreshed guestrooms and dining experiences and even more pleased when our guests comment positively on our service level. I’ll be sure to share your kind remarks with our team. We look forward to having you stay with us sometime very soon.   Sincerely, Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyable stay. From the moment we arrived we were looked after and greeted with enthusiasm.  The hotel is located on the marina and only a short distance to the beach.  The rooms were spacious and extremely comfortable.  The staff and service was exceptional. We only ate in the bar but had no complaints the food was delicious.  The pool area is tranquil and ideal.   I will definitely be back without hesitation.
Manager Response: Hello krds123,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I couldn’t be more pleased with the high level of enthusiastic service you received from our team upon arrival and throughout your stay. I’m also delighted that you enjoyed our spacious and recently refreshed guestrooms and had the opportunity to enjoy some of the resort’s amenities. I’ll make certain to pass along your kind comments. We look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort.   Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We had a large family gathering staying at the Balboa Bay Resort for two nights.  The service, particularly at the Waterline Restaurant, was outstanding.  We had several meals there with multiple tables, many people sometimes coming and going, sometimes changing seats, and the staff was exceptional in their superb service for our large party.
Manager Response: Hello traveler60820,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. I’m delighted you chose to stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort for your recent family gathering and love to hear how much you enjoyed multiple meals at Waterline. I’m especially pleased at the superb level of service you experienced from our team and will certainly share your comments. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort and Waterline soon.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I did a lot of research for this trip because I wanted to make spring break really really special for my two boys. The whole staff was amazing! Becca at the front desk was so accommodating and helpful in every way!! Everyone is so friendly there made our trip amazing. From the front desk to the maid service to the valet service everyone was amazing!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. It’s a delight to know you chose and had such a wonderful spring break experience with your family at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased to hear about the accommodating and helpful level of service you received from Becca, as well as our front desk, housekeeping and valet teams. I’ll make sure your comment is passed along to everyone as we always love it when our guests enjoy every moment of their time on property. We look forward to hosting you and your family again the next time you are in Newport Beach.  Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Perfect location. Staff were friendly and quick to accommodate. Quality bedding, pillows that made for a good nights rest. Good coffee in room as well as in lobby!! That is always a plus to me when traveling. Just a warm feel with all the amenities to make it a very enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Hello mleca,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I love hearing that you had a pleasant stay and enjoyed a great night’s rest and some of the resort amenities. I’m always pleased when our guest comment positively on the friendliness and accommodating service our staff provides. I’ll make certain to pass along your kind comments and review to our team. We look forward to welcoming you back to Balboa Bay Resort the next time you visit the area.   Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: I planned this trip for over a month and researched various hotels and resorts in the area. Based off results I selected Balboa Bay Resort. I'm glad I did. Everyone from front desk, to housekeeping, guest services and restaurant staff was very respectful and professional! Highly recommend to anyone looking for a relaxing couples getaway!
Manager Response: Hello Eaglefreedom1,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at Balboa Bay Resort. I’m very pleased you chose our resort for your couple’s getaway and delighted to hear how much you enjoyed you stay, specifically the level of service you received from our staff. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next couple’s getaway sometime very soon.    Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Great place in a great location
Summary: Hotel stay was wonderful. Staff around the hotel were extremely friendly and accommodating. Everything from inside to outside the room was clean and well kept. Standard king room was very roomy for 2, with a large bathroom and plenty of counter space. Also a great location on Highway 1, with an easy car ride into Newport Pier.
Manager Response: Hi Jon B.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m delighted you had a wonderful stay and were pleased with our recently refreshed guestrooms. I of course always love to hear when our guests comment positively on our service level. I’ll be sure to share them with our team and look forward to welcoming you back sometime very soon.   Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We had to be in California unexpectedly and flew in and out of LAX but stayed in San Diego. Traffic being what it is, (horrible), between SD and LA we decided to travel back up to LA the day before our flight so we would be closer to the airport. I started an Internet search of places to stay, we were just looking for something reasonable, nothing fancy. I checked Dana Point, Laguna, and a couple other areas but being spring break many places were booked. Our son was with us and he had a buddy in Newport Beach so we tried there and am I glad I did!!! Balboa Bay Resort is fabulous!!! Right on the water with gorgeous rooms and facilities. While I have no problem staying, (and actually really like), someplace like a Hampton, Courtyard, or other chain I also appreciate really nice
Manager Response: Hi EMCFairfax_Virginia,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and sharing your wonderful experience. I’m delighted to hear how much you enjoy our resort. I’m always pleased to hear when our guests get the opportunity to experience all our resort has to offer, and even more pleased when we exceed expectations. I’ll make sure your kind comments regarding our service are shared with our entire team. We truly look forward to hosting you again at Balboa Bay Resort the next time you visit Newport Beach.  Sincerely,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary Heading: Short visit, but enjoyed excellent service
Summary: When my wife and I visited Newport Beach recently, we stopped in to the Balboa Bay bar for coffee, and we enjoyed a warm welcome from the staff there, along with some great, fresh coffee and a tasty dessert.  Alyssa and Latavia were working in the afternoon, and they couldn't have been more welcoming and pleasant.  When we are in the area, we will be visiting again, perhaps to stay next time.
Manager Response: Hi JohnJSmallwood,  Thank you for sharing your comments. I’m delighted to hear you stopped into Blend while in the area and had such an enjoyable experience. It’s always great to hear when our staff makes our guests feel very welcoming and provides a high level of customer service. We look forward to having you stay with us at Balboa Bay Resort the next time you visit Newport Beach.   Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: Simply said this is a great place for a couple to get away. Wonderful place to relax and service wonderful. Try and face the bay well worth it. Close to great dining and a close drive to all the shops.
Manager Response: Hi Plasticpays,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience. I’m delighted you had such a relaxing time and were pleased with the location and level or service our staff provided during your getaway. We truly look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable couple’s getaway in the near future.  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort

Summary: We had a function here in February for the 3rd and last time. The hotel has gone downhill. Cost cutting and low level staff is obvious. What was a classy establishment has become a middle of the road hotel. Shame they've shifted focus away from the customer in the last 12-18 months.
Manager Response: Hello Darren K.  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience. We value your feedback and apologize that you were not satisfied with the level of service you expected to receive during your stay. It is our primary objective to provide each and every guests with a wonderful experience. Please know that your comments will be  addressed and discussed with our team so we can work to achieve our goals and deliver the optimal guest experience.   Warmest Regards,  Sam El-Rabaa General Manager Balboa Bay Resort
